GE07hv_conpu:4961: sṛṣṭā lokās trayo 'nantā yenānantyena vartmanā // HV_30.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:4963: nṛṇām indriyapūrveṇa yogena ramate ca yaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4964: gatāgatābhyāṃ yo netā tatreha ca vidhīśvaraḥ // HV_30.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:4970: yaḥ paraṃ śrūyate jyotir yaḥ paraṃ śrūyate tapaḥ // HV_30.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:4971: yaḥ paraṃ prāha parataḥ paraṃ yaḥ paramātmavān /
GE07hv_conpu:4972: [k: Ñ2 V2.3 B Dn Ds D3.4.6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:4977: ādityādis tu yo divyo yaś ca daityāntako vibhuḥ // HV_30.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:4978: yugānteṣv antako yaś ca yaś ca lokāntakāntakaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:4979: setur yo lokasetūnāṃ medhyo yo medhyakarmaṇām // HV_30.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:4980: vedyo yo vedaviduṣāṃ prabhur yaḥ prabhavātmanām /
GE07hv_conpu:4983: vinayo nayavṛttānāṃ tejas tejasvinām api // HV_30.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:4985: vigraho vigrahārhāṇāṃ gatir gatimatām api // HV_30.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:4988: rasād vai śoṇitaṃ bhavati śoṇitān māṃsam ucyate /
GE07hv_conpu:4989: māṃsāt tu medaso janma medaso 'sthi nirucyate // HV_30.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:4991: śukrād narbhaḥ samabhavad rasamūlena karmaṇā // HV_30.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:4992: tatrāpāṃ prathamo bhāgaḥ sa saumyo rāśir ucyate /
GE07hv_conpu:4993: garbhoṣmasaṃbhavo jñeyo dvitīyo rāśir ucyate // HV_30.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:4995: bhāvau rasānugāv etau vīryaṃ ca śaśipāvakau // HV_30.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:4996: kaphavarge bhavec chukraṃ pittavarge ca śoṇitam /
GE07hv_conpu:4997: kaphasya hṛdayaṃ sthānaṃ nābhyāṃ pittaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // HV_30.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:4998: dehasya madhye hṛdayaṃ sthānaṃ tu manasaḥ smṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:4999: nābhikaṇṭhāntarasthas tu tatra devo hutāśanaḥ // HV_30.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:5000: manaḥ prajāpatir jñeyaḥ kaphaḥ somo vibhāvyate /
GE07hv_conpu:5001: pittam agniḥ smṛtas tv evam agnīṣomamayaṃ jagat // HV_30.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:5003: vāyuḥ praveśanaṃ cakre saṃgataḥ paramātmanā // HV_30.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:5004: [k: After 46, K2-6 Ñ V B1.2 Dn Ds D1-4.5 (marg.) T G1.3-5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5006: sa pañcadhā śarīrastho bhidyate vardhate punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5007: prāṇāpānau samānaś ca udāno vyāna eva ca // HV_30.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:5009: apānaḥ paścimaṃ kāyam udānordhvaṃ śarīriṇaḥ // HV_30.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:5012: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam /
GE07hv_conpu:5013: tasyendriyāṇi śiṣṭāni svaṃ svaṃ yogaṃ pracakrire // HV_30.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:5014: pārthivaṃ deham āhus tu prāṇātmānaṃ ca mārutam /
GE07hv_conpu:5016: jyotiś cakṣuṣi tejaś ca teṣāṃ yantṛ manaḥ smṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:5017: grāmyāś ca viṣayāś caiva yasya vīryāt pravartitāḥ // HV_30.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:5018: ity etān puruṣaḥ sarvān sṛjaṃl lokān sanātanān /
GE07hv_conpu:5019: naidhane 'smin kathaṃ loke naratvaṃ viṣṇur āgataḥ // HV_30.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:5020: eṣa me saṃśayo brahmann eṣa me vismayo mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:5021: kathaṃ gatir gatimatām āpanno mānuṣīṃ tanum // HV_30.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:5022: śruto me svasya vaṃśasya pūrvajānāṃ ca saṃbhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5023: śrotum icchāmi viṣṇos tu vṛṣṇīnāṃ ca yathākramam // HV_30.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:5024: āścaryaṃ paramaṃ viṣṇur devair daityaiś ca kathyate /
GE07hv_conpu:5025: viṣṇor utpattim āścaryaṃ mamācakṣva mahāmune // HV_30.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:5032: [h: HV (CE) chapter 31, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of February 23, 2000 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:5035: yathāśakti tu vakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ // HV_31.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:5036: viṣṇoḥ prabhāvaśravaṇe diṣṭyā te matir utthitā /
GE07hv_conpu:5037: hanta viṣṇoḥ samastās tvaṃ śṛṇu divyāḥ pravṛttayaḥ // HV_31.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:5042: sahasraśatadhā bhūtvā pralayaṃ kārayet tu yaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5045: savanaṃ havanaṃ caiva havyaṃ hotāram eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5046: pātrāṇi ca pavitrāṇi vediṃ dīkṣāṃ caruṃ sruvam // HV_31.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:5048: adhvaryuṃ sāmagaṃ vipraṃ sadasyaṃ sadanaṃ savam // HV_31.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:5050: prāgvaṃśaṃ yajñabhūmiṃ ca hotāraṃ cayanaṃ ca yat // HV_31.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:5052: prāyaścittāni cārghyaṃ ca sthaṇḍilāni kuśāṃs tathā // HV_31.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:5053: mantraṃ yajñavahaṃ vahniṃ bhāgaṃ bhāgavahaṃ ca yat /
GE07hv_conpu:5055: āhur vedavido viprā yaṃ yajñaṃ śāśvataṃ vibhum // HV_31.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:5060: bhūyaś caiva bhaviṣyantīty evam āha pitāmahaḥ // HV_31.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:5061: yat pṛcchasi mahārāja divyāṃ puṇyāṃ kathāṃ śubhām /
GE07hv_conpu:5066: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu sarvam aśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5067: vāsudevasya māhātmyaṃ caritaṃ ca mahādyuteḥ // HV_31.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:5070: prādurbhāvāṃś ca vakṣyāmi puṇyān devaguṇair yutān // HV_31.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:5075: idaṃ purāṇaṃ paramaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃmitam |
GE07hv_conpu:5076: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi viṣṇor divyāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu |
GE07hv_conpu:5077: [k: K2.3 Ñ2.3V BD(except D1.3) G4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5078: yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata |
GE07hv_conpu:5080: tasya hy ekā mahārāja mūrtir bhavati sattama |
GE07hv_conpu:5081: nityaṃ diviṣṭhā yā rājaṃs tapaś carati duścaram |
GE07hv_conpu:5085: pūrṇe yugasahasre tu devadevo jagatpatiḥ // HV_31.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:5089: brahmā ca kapilaś caiva parameṣṭhī tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5090: devāḥ saptarṣayaś caiva tryambakaś ca mahāyaśāḥ // HV_31.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:5092: vāyuḥ samudrāḥ śailāś ca tasya dehe samāśritāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5093: sanatkumāraś ca mahānubhāvo manur mahātmā bhagavān prajākaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5098: hatau prabhavatā tena tayor dattvāmitaṃ varam // HV_31.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:5100: puṣkare yatra saṃbhūtā devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā // HV_31.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:5104: yatra viṣṇuḥ suraśreṣṭho vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ // HV_31.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:5110: ājyanāsaḥ sruvas tuṇḍaḥ sāmaghoṣasvano mahān // HV_31.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:5119: [k: All Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5130: sadyo jagāma nirvāṇaṃ medinī tasya dhāraṇāt |
GE07hv_conpu:5131: cakāra ca namaskāraṃ tasmai devāya vedhase |
GE07hv_conpu:5133: sahasraśīrṣo devādiś cakāra jagatīṃ punaḥ // HV_31.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:5135: uddhṛtā pṛthivī devī sāgarāmbudharā purā // HV_31.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:5136: vārāha eṣa kathito nārasiṃham ataḥ śṛṇu /
GE07hv_conpu:5137: yatra bhūtvā mṛgendreṇa hiraṇyakaśipur hataḥ // HV_31.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:5139: daityānām ādipuruṣaś cakāra tapa uttamam // HV_31.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:5140: daśa varśasahasrāṇi śatāni daśa pañca ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5143: brahmā prītamanās tasya tapasā niyamena ca // HV_31.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:5144: taṃ vai svayaṃbhūr bhagavān svayam āgamya bhūpate /
GE07hv_conpu:5146: ādityair vasubhiḥ sādhyair marudbhir daivataiḥ saha /
GE07hv_conpu:5148: diśābhir vidiśābhiś ca nadībhiḥ sāgarais tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:5149: nakṣatraiś ca muhūrtaiś ca khecaraiś ca mahāgrahaiḥ // HV_31.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:5152: carācaraguruḥ śrīmān vṛtaḥ sarvaiḥ surais tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:5153: brahmā brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭho daityaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_31.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:5155: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuhi // HV_31.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:5158: na mānuṣāḥ piśācā vā hanyur māṃ devasattama // HV_31.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:5159: ṛṣayo vā na māṃ śāpaiḥ kruddhā lokapitāmaha /
GE07hv_conpu:5160: śapeyus tapasā yuktā varam etaṃ vṛṇomy aham // HV_31.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:5161: na śastreṇa na cāstreṇa giriṇā pādapena vā /
GE07hv_conpu:5162: na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa syān na cānyena me vadhaḥ // HV_31.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:5165: yo māṃ nāśayituṃ śaktaḥ sa me mṛtyur bhaviṣyati |
GE07hv_conpu:5167: nākāśe vā na bhūmau vā rātrau vā divase 'pi vā |
GE07hv_conpu:5168: nāntar vā na bahir vāpi syād vadho me pitāmaha |
GE07hv_conpu:5169: paśubhir vā mṛgendrair vā pakṣibhir vā sarīsṛpaiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5170: bhaveyam aham evārkaḥ somo vāyur hutāśanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5171: salilaṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa // HV_31.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:5172: ahaṃ krodhaś ca kāmaś ca varuṇo vāsavo yamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5173: dhanadaś ca dhanādhyakṣo yakṣaḥ kiṃpuruṣādhipaḥ // HV_31.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:5176: evam uktas tu daityena svayaṃbhur bhagavāṃs tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:5179: na divā na ca rātrau vā na me mṛtyur bhaviṣyati |
GE07hv_conpu:5181: ete divyā varās tāta mayā dattās tavādbhutāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5182: sarvān kāmān imāṃs tāta prāpsyasi tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // HV_31.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:5183: evam uktvā tu bhagavāñ jagāmākāśam eva ha /
GE07hv_conpu:5185: [k: K2-4 Ñ2.3V BDn D1.2.4-6 T3.4 Ds(after 48) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5186: śrutvā devā varaṃ taṃ ca dattaṃ salilayoninā |
GE07hv_conpu:5188: tato devāś ca nāgāś ca gandharvā munayas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:5192: tat prasīdasva bhagavan vadho 'sya pravicintyatām // HV_31.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:5194: sraṣṭā ca havyakavyānām avyaktaḥ prakṛtir dhruvaḥ // HV_31.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:5195: tato lokahitaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā devaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5196: provāca bhagavān vākyaṃ sarvān devagaṇāṃs tadā // HV_31.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:5197: avaśyaṃ tridaśās tena prāptavyaṃ tapasaḥ phalam /
GE07hv_conpu:5198: tapaso 'nte 'sya bhagavān vadhaṃ viṣṇuḥ kariṣyati // HV_31.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:5199: etac chrutvā surāḥ sarve vākyaṃ paṅkajajanmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5200: svāni sthānāni divyāni jagmus te vai mudā yutāḥ // HV_31.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:5201: labdhamātre vare cāpi sarvāḥ so 'bādhata prajāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5204: satyadharmaratān dāntān purā dharṣitavāṃs tu saḥ // HV_31.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:5206: trailokyaṃ vaśam ānīya svarge vasati dānavaḥ // HV_31.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:5208: yajñiyān akarod daityān ayajñīyāś ca devatāḥ // HV_31.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:5209: ādityāś ca tataḥ sādhyā viśve 'tha vasavas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:5212: ṛṣināgāḥ suparṇāś ca ye cānye 'py evamādayaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5213: śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ viṣṇum upatasthur mahābalam // HV_31.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:5216: nārāyaṇaṃ vibhuḥ devāḥ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇyaṃ gatāḥ // HV_31.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:5218: tvaṃ hi na paramo devas tvaṃ hi na paramo guruḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5219: tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo dhātā brahmādīnāṃ surottama // HV_31.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:5221: kṣayāya ditivaṃśasya śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ bhavasva naḥ // HV_31.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:5223: bhayaṃ tyajadhvam amarā abhayaṃ vo dadāmy aham /
GE07hv_conpu:5224: tathaiva tridivaṃ devāḥ pratipadyata māciram // HV_31.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:5226: avadhyam amarendrāṇāṃ dānavendraṃ nihanmi tam // HV_31.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:5227: evam uktvā sa bhagavān visṛjya tridaśeśvarān /
GE07hv_conpu:5228: hiraṇyakaśipo rājann ājagāma hariḥ sabhām // HV_31.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:5232: nārasiṃhena vapuṣā pāṇiṃ saṃspṛśya pāṇinā // HV_31.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:5237: samutpatya nakhais tīkṣṇair vidārya nihato yudhi |
GE07hv_conpu:5239: dṛptair daityagaṇair guptaṃ hatavān ekapāṇinā // HV_31.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:5241: yatra vāmanam āśritya rūpaṃ daityavināśanam // HV_31.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:5242: baler balavato yajñe balinā viṣṇunā purā /
GE07hv_conpu:5243: vikramais tribhir akṣobhyāḥ kṣobhitās te mahāsurāḥ // HV_31.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:5244: vipracittiḥ śibiḥ śaṅkur ayaḥśaṅkus tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5246: vegavān ketumān ugraḥ sogravyagro mahāsuraḥ // HV_31.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:5247: puṣkaraḥ puṣkalaś caiva sāśvo 'śvapatir eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5250: [k: Bom. and Poona eds. ins. after 71a: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5253: śarabhaḥ śalabhaś caiva kupanaḥ kopanaḥ krathaḥ // HV_31.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:5256: vāyur gaviṣṭho namuciḥ śambaro vikṣaro mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:5257: candrahantā krodhahantā krodhavardhana eva ca // HV_31.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:5258: kālakaḥ kālakeyaś ca vṛtraḥ krodho virocanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5259: gariṣṭhaś ca variṣṭhaś ca pralambanarakāv ubhau // HV_31.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:5261: asilomā pulomā ca bāṣkalaḥ pramado madaḥ // HV_31.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:5262: khasṛmaḥ kālavadanaḥ karālaḥ keśir eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5263: ekākṣaś candrahā rāhuḥ saṃhrādaḥ sṛmaraḥ svanaḥ // HV_31.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:5272: bhīmā makaravaktrāś ca kroṣṭuvaktrāś ca dānavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5273: ākhudarduravaktrāś ca ghorā vṛkamukhās tathā // HV_31.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:5286: rūpaṃ kṛtvā mahābhīṃaṃ jahārāśu sa medinīm // HV_31.88 //
GE07hv_conpu:5288: nabhaḥ prakramamāṇasya nābhyāṃ kila samāsthitau // HV_31.89 //
GE07hv_conpu:5290: viṣṇor amitavīryasya vadanty evaṃ dvijātayaḥ // HV_31.90 //
GE07hv_conpu:5291: hṛtvā sa medinīṃ kṛtsnāṃ hatvā cāsurapuṃgavān /
GE07hv_conpu:5292: dadau śakrāya vasudhāṃ viṣṇur balavatāṃ varaḥ // HV_31.91 //
GE07hv_conpu:5293: eṣa te vāmano nāma prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5294: vedavidbhir dvijair etat kathyate vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ // HV_31.92 //
GE07hv_conpu:5296: dattātreya iti khyātaḥ kṣamayā parayā yutaḥ // HV_31.93 //
GE07hv_conpu:5297: tena naṣṭeṣu deveṣu prakriyāsu makheṣu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5298: cāturvarṇye ca saṃkīrṇe dharme śithilatāṃ gate // HV_31.94 //
GE07hv_conpu:5300: prajāsu śīryamāṇāsu dharme cākulatāṃ gate // HV_31.95 //
GE07hv_conpu:5301: sayajñāḥ sakriyā vedāḥ pratyānītā hi tena vai /
GE07hv_conpu:5302: cāturvarṇyam asaṃkīrṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tena mahātmanā // HV_31.96 //
GE07hv_conpu:5304: varadena varo datto dattātreyeṇa dhīmatā // HV_31.97 //
GE07hv_conpu:5305: etad bāhudvayaṃ yat te tat te mama kṛte nṛpa /
GE07hv_conpu:5306: śatāni daśa bāhūnāṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_31.98 //
GE07hv_conpu:5309: eṣa te vaiṣṇavaḥ śrīmān prādurbhāvo 'dbhutaḥ śubhaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5312: bhūyaś ca jāmadagnyo 'yaṃ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ // HV_31.100 //
GE07hv_conpu:5314: rāmo 'rjunam anīkasthaṃ jaghāna nṛpatiṃ prabhuḥ // HV_31.101 //
GE07hv_conpu:5316: dharṣayitvā yathākāmaṃ krośamānaṃ ca meghavat // HV_31.102 //
GE07hv_conpu:5318: paraśvadhena dīptena jñātibhiḥ sahitasya vai // HV_31.103 //
GE07hv_conpu:5320: triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivī tena niḥkṣatriyā kṛtā // HV_31.104 //
GE07hv_conpu:5324: mārīcāya dadau prītaḥ kaśyapāya vasuṃdharām // HV_31.106 //
GE07hv_conpu:5325: vāruṇāṃs turagāñ śubhrān rathaṃ ca rathināṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5326: hiraṇyam akṣayaṃ dhenūr gajendrāṃś ca mahāmatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5327: dadau tasmin mahāyajñe vājimedhe mahāyaśāḥ // HV_31.107 //
GE07hv_conpu:5329: caramāṇas tapo dīptaṃ jāmadagnyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5330: tiṣṭhate devavac chrīmān mahendre parvatottame // HV_31.108 //
GE07hv_conpu:5334: jāmadagnya iti khyātaḥ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ // HV_31.109 //
GE07hv_conpu:5338: loke rāma iti khyātas tejasā bhāskaropamaḥ // HV_31.111 //
GE07hv_conpu:5340: dharmasya ca vivṛddhyarthaṃ jajñe tatra mahāyaśāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5341: tam apy āhur manuṣyendraṃ sarvabhūtapates tanum // HV_31.112 //
GE07hv_conpu:5343: vadhārthaṃ devaśatrūṇāṃ durdharāṇi surair api // HV_31.113 //
GE07hv_conpu:5345: mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca balena balināṃ varau /
GE07hv_conpu:5346: nihatau ca nirāśau ca kṛtau tena mahātmanā // HV_31.114 //
GE07hv_conpu:5348: bhagnaṃ māheśvaraṃ cāpaṃ krīḍatā līlayā purā // HV_31.115 //
GE07hv_conpu:5351: rūpiṇī yasya pārśvasthā sīteti prathitā janaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5353: caturdaśa vane taptvā tapo varṣāṇi rāghavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5354: janasthāne vasan kāryaṃ tridaśānāṃ cakāra saḥ // HV_31.118 //
GE07hv_conpu:5356: virādhaṃ ca kabandhaṃ ca rākṣasau bhīmavikramau /
GE07hv_conpu:5359: surendravajrāśanitulyasāraiḥ śaraiḥ śarīreṣu viyojitau balāt // HV_31.120
GE07hv_conpu:5361: vālī vinihataḥ saṃkhye sugrīvaś cābhiṣecitaḥ // HV_31.121 //
GE07hv_conpu:5363: yatrāvadhyaṃ rākṣasendraṃ rāvaṇaṃ yudhi durjayam // HV_31.122 //
GE07hv_conpu:5368: jaghāna sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ sasainyaṃ rāvaṇaṃ yudhi /
GE07hv_conpu:5371: [k: Ś1 K2 Ñ2 V3 Ds D2-5 G2 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5373: rāvaṇaṃ nijaghānāśu rāmo bhūtapatiḥ purā // HV_31.126 //
GE07hv_conpu:5374: madhoś ca tanayo dṛpto lavaṇo nāma dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5376: samare yuddhaśauṇḍena tathānye cāpi rākṣasāḥ // HV_31.127 //
GE07hv_conpu:5377: etāni kṛtvā karmāṇi rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5380: na vittaharaṇaṃ cāsīd rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // HV_31.129 //
GE07hv_conpu:5381: paryadevan na vidhavā nānarthaś cābhavat tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:5382: sarvam āsīj jagaddāntaṃ rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // HV_31.130 //
GE07hv_conpu:5384: na ca sma vṛddhā bālānāṃ pretakāryāṇi kurvate // HV_31.131 //
GE07hv_conpu:5385: brahma paryaccarat kṣatraṃ viśaḥ kṣatram anuvratāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5386: śūdrāś caiva hi varṇāṃs trīñ śuśrūṣanty anahaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_31.132 //
GE07hv_conpu:5387: nāryo nātyacaran bhartṝn bhāryāṃ nātyacarat patiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5388: sarvam āsīj jagaddāntaṃ nirdasyur abhavan mahī /
GE07hv_conpu:5389: rāma eko 'bhavad bhartā rāmaḥ pālayitābhavat // HV_31.133 //
GE07hv_conpu:5391: arogāḥ prāṇinaś cāsan rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // HV_31.134 //
GE07hv_conpu:5392: devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5393: pṛthivyāṃ sahavāso 'bhūd rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // HV_31.135 //
GE07hv_conpu:5395: rāmo rāmo rāma iti prajānām abhavat kathāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5397: gāthā apy atra gāyanti ye purāṇavido janāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5398: rāme nibaddhās tattvārthā māhātmyaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ // HV_31.136 //
GE07hv_conpu:5402: ayodhyādhipatir bhūtvā rāmo rājyam akārayat // HV_31.138 //
GE07hv_conpu:5404: avyucchinno 'bhavad rāṣṭre dīyatāṃ bhujyatām iti // HV_31.139 //
GE07hv_conpu:5406: ati sūryaṃ ca candraṃ ca rāmo dāśarathir babhau // HV_31.140 //
GE07hv_conpu:5410: rāvaṇaṃ sagaṇaṃ hatvā divam ācakrame prabhuḥ // HV_31.142 //
GE07hv_conpu:5412: vikhyāto māthure kalpe sarvalokahitāya vai // HV_31.143 //
GE07hv_conpu:5413: yatra sālvaṃ ca kaṃsaṃ ca maindaṃ dvividam eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:5414: ariṣṭaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ keśiṃ pūtanāṃ daityadārikām // HV_31.144 //
GE07hv_conpu:5416: daityān mānuṣadehasthān sūdayām āsa vīryavān // HV_31.145 //
GE07hv_conpu:5418: narakaś ca hataḥ saṃkhye yavanaś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_31.146 //
GE07hv_conpu:5420: durācārāś ca nihatāḥ pārthivā ye mahītale // HV_31.147 //
GE07hv_conpu:5421: [k: K1.3.4 ÑV BDn Ds D1-4.6 T G1.4.5 M4 ins. after 147; K2 D5 after
GE07hv_conpu:5425: eko vedaś caturdhā tu kṛtas tena mahātmanā |
GE07hv_conpu:5426: janito bhārato vaṃśaḥ satyavatyāḥ sutena ca |
GE07hv_conpu:5428: [k: K2-4 Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D2 D4-6 T3.4 G1.5; T1 cont. after *148: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5429: atītāḥ kathitā rājan kathyante cāpy anāgatāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5430: kalkī viṣṇuyaśā nāma bhūyaś cotpatsyate prabhuḥ // HV_31.148 //
GE07hv_conpu:5431: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.3.4 G3.5 ins. after 148c: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5434: [k: After 148, N(except Ś1 Ñ1) T3.4 G3-5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5436: kṣapayitvā ca tān sarvān bhāvinārthena coditān |
GE07hv_conpu:5438: tataḥ kāle vyatīte tu sāmātye sahasainike |
GE07hv_conpu:5439: nṛpeṣv atha pranaṣteṣu tadā tv apragrahāḥ prajāḥ || *HV_31.148*482:5
GE07hv_conpu:5440: kṣaṇena nirvṛte caiva hatvā cānyonyam āhave |
GE07hv_conpu:5443: prajāḥ kṣayaṃ prayāsyanti sārdhaṃ kaliyugena ha |
GE07hv_conpu:5444: kṣīṇe kaliyuge tasmiṃs tataḥ kṛtayugaṃ punaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5446: [k: After line 1 of *482, Ñ2.3 V1.3 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5449: niḥśeṣāñ śuddharājāṃs tāṃs tadā sa tu kariṣyati |
GE07hv_conpu:5450: pāṣaṇḍān mlecchajātīṃś ca dasyūṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5451: nātyarthaṃ dhārmikā ye ca ye ca dharmadviṣaḥ kvacit |
GE07hv_conpu:5454: tathaiva dākṣiṇātyāṃś ca draviḍān siṃhalaiḥ saha |
GE07hv_conpu:5455: gāndhārān pāradāṃś caiva pahlavān yavanāñ śakān |
GE07hv_conpu:5456: tukhārān barbarāṃś caiva śvānikān daradān khaśān |
GE07hv_conpu:5457: lambakāṃś ca maruṃdhāṃś ca kirātāṃś caiva sa prabhuḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5460: mānuṣaḥ sa tu saṃjajñe devasyāgrasya dhīmataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5461: pūrvajanmani viṣṇuḥ sa pramatir nāma vīryavān |
GE07hv_conpu:5463: ity etā vāsudevasya daśa saṃbhūtayaḥ smṛtāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5464: taṃ taṃ kālaṃ ca kāryaṃ ca taṃ tathoddeśakāriṇam |
GE07hv_conpu:5465: aṃśena triṣu lokeṣu tāṃs tān yonīn viśaty api |
GE07hv_conpu:5468: kṛtvā bījāvaśeṣāṃ tu mahīṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā |
GE07hv_conpu:5469: saṃyodhayitvā ca khalān prāyas tān apy adhārmikān |
GE07hv_conpu:5470: tad eṣa vai tadā kalkī caritārthaḥ sasainikaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5471: prajānāṃ sādhayitvā ca saṃsiddhārthaḥ punaḥ svayam |
GE07hv_conpu:5473: [k: After line 7 of *482 Ñ2 V1.3 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5474: purāṇi hatvā grāmāṃś ca tadā duṣpragrahāḥ prajāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5476: hvasvā alpāyuṣaś caiva bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge |
GE07hv_conpu:5480: ete cānye ca bahavo divyā devaguṇair yutāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5487: viṣṇor amitavīryasya yaḥ śṛṇoti kṛtāñjaliḥ // HV_31.152 //
GE07hv_conpu:5491: nāśubhaṃ vidyate tasya putravān dyutimān bhavet |
GE07hv_conpu:5492: etās tu yogeśvarayogamāyāḥ śrutvā naro mucyati sarvapāpaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5493: ṛddhiṃ samṛddhiṃ vipulāṃś ca bhogān prāpnoti śīghraṃ bhagavatprasādāt //
GE07hv_conpu:5495: [h: HV (CE) chapter 32, transliterated by Atul Agarwala, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of February 24, 2000 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:5497: viśvatvaṃ śṛṇu me viṣṇor haritvaṃ ca kṛte yuge /
GE07hv_conpu:5498: vaikuṇṭhatvaṃ ca deveṣu kṛṣṇatvaṃ mānuṣeṣu ca // HV_32.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:5499: īśvarasya hi tasyemāṃ karmaṇāṃ gahanāṃ gatim /
GE07hv_conpu:5500: saṃpratyatītāṃ bhāvyāṃ ca śṛṇu rājan yathātatham // HV_32.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:5501: avyakto vyaktaliṅgastho ya eṣa bhagavān prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5502: nārāyaṇo hy anantātmā prabhavo 'vyaya eva ca // HV_32.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:5503: eṣa nārāyaṇo bhūtvā harir āsīt sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5504: brahmā śakraś ca somaś ca dharmaḥ śukro bṛhaspatiḥ // HV_32.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:5506: eṣa viṣṇur iti khyāta indrād avarajo 'bhavat // HV_32.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:5507: prasādajaṃ hy asya vibhor adityāṃ putrajanma tat /
GE07hv_conpu:5509: pradhānātmā purā hy eṣa brahmāṇam asṛjat prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5511: te tanvānās tanūs tatra brahmavaṃśān anuttamān /
GE07hv_conpu:5512: tebhyo 'bhavan mahātmabhyo bahudhā brahma śāśvatam // HV_32.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:5514: kīrtitaṃ kīrtanīyasya kīrtyamānaṃ nibodha me // HV_32.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:5515: vṛtte vṛtravadhe tāta vartamāne kṛte yuge /
GE07hv_conpu:5517: tatra sma dānavā ghorāḥ sarve saṃgrāmadarpitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5520: trātāraṃ manasā jagmur devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum // HV_32.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:5526: rarāsa ghorair utpātair dahyamānam ivāmbaram // HV_32.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:5528: nyubjāni ca vimānāni prapatanty utpatanti ca // HV_32.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:5531: tamasā niṣprabhaṃ sarvaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃcana /
GE07hv_conpu:5532: timiraughaparikṣiptā na rejuś ca diṣo daśa // HV_32.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:5534: dyaur na bhāty abhibhūtārkā ghoreṇa tamasā vṛtā // HV_32.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:5535: tān ghanaughān satimirān dorbhyāṃ vikṣipya sa prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5536: vapuḥ saṃdarśayām āsa divyaṃ kṛṣṇavapur hariḥ // HV_32.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:5538: tejasā vapuṣā caiva kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇam ivācalam // HV_32.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:5552: dadṛśus te sthitaṃ devaṃ divyalokamaye rathe // HV_32.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:5554: jayaśabdaṃ puraskṛtya śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // HV_32.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:5556: tuṣṭuvuś ca jagannāthaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim |
GE07hv_conpu:5557: jaya deva jagannātha jaya deva janārdana |
GE07hv_conpu:5558: jaya deva prabho viṣṇo jaya śaṅkhagadādhara |
GE07hv_conpu:5559: namas tubhyaṃ hṛṣīkeśa namo deva janārdana |
GE07hv_conpu:5561: namas tubhyaṃ prabho viṣṇo bhūtādipataye namaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5562: nama ādyāya bījāya puruṣāya namo namaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5563: namo 'stu te jagannātha namo bhūyo mahātmane |
GE07hv_conpu:5566: sa teṣāṃ tāṃ giraṃ śrutvā viṣṇur dayitadaivataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5567: manaś cakre vināśāya dānavānāṃ mahāmṛdhe // HV_32.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:5568: ākāśe tu sthito viṣṇur uttamaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5569: uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ sapratijñam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_32.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:5570: śāntiṃ vrajata bhadraṃ vo mā bhaiṣṭa marutāṃ gaṇāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5571: jitā me dānavāḥ sarve trailokyaṃ pratigṛhyatām // HV_32.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:5572: te tasya satyasaṃdhasya viṣṇor vākyena toṣitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5573: devāḥ prītiṃ parāṃ jagmuḥ prāpyevāmṛtam uttamam // HV_32.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:5574: tatas tamaḥ saṃhriyate vineśuś ca balāhakāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5575: pravavuś ca śivā vātāḥ prasannāś ca diśo daśa // HV_32.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:5576: suprabhāṇi ca jyotiṃṣi candraṃ cakruḥ pradakṣiṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:5577: dīptimanti ca tejāṃsi cakrur arkaṃ pradakṣiṇam // HV_32.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:5578: na vigrahaṃ grahāś cakruḥ praseduś cāpi sindhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5579: virajaskā babhur mārgā nākamārgādayas trayaḥ // HV_32.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:5583: yajñeṣu ca haviḥ svādu śivam āpa ca pāvakaḥ // HV_32.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:5594: giraṃ te dānavān ugrān menire nihatān yudhi |
GE07hv_conpu:5596: [h: HV (CE) chapter 33, transliterated by Atul Agarwala, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of February 24, 2000 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:5599: udyogaṃ vipulaṃ cakrur yuddhāya yudhi durjayāḥ // HV_33.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:5603: racitaṃ ratnajālaiś ca hemajālaiś ca śobhitam // HV_33.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:5613: atiṣṭhat samarākāṅkṣī meruṃ dīpta ivāṃśumān // HV_33.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:5614: tāras tu kroṣavistāram āyasaṃ vāhayan ratham /
GE07hv_conpu:5619: āyasaiḥ parighaiḥ pūrṇaṃ kṣepaṇīyaiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_33.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:5620: prāsaiḥ pāśaiś ca vitatair avasaktaiś ca mudgaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5621: śobhitaṃ trāsanīyaiś ca tomaraiḥ saparaśvadhaiḥ // HV_33.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:5622: udyataṃ dviṣatāṃ hetor dvitīyam iva mandaram /
GE07hv_conpu:5625: pramukhe tasya sainyasya dīptaśṛṅga ivācalaḥ // HV_33.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:5629: varāhaḥ pramukhe tasthau sāvaroha ivācalaḥ // HV_33.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:5630: kṣaras tu vikṣaran darpān netrābhyāṃ roṣajaṃ jalam /
GE07hv_conpu:5632: tvaṣṭā tv aṣṭādaśahayaṃ yānam āsthāya dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5633: vyūhito dānavair vyūhaiḥ paricakrāma vīryavān // HV_33.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:5638: kiśoras tv atisaṃharṣāt kiśora iva coditaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5639: abhavad daityasainyasya madhye ravir ivoditaḥ // HV_33.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:5645: hasaṃs tiṣṭhati daityānāṃ pramukhe sumukho grahaḥ // HV_33.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:5650: pattinas tv apare daityā bhīṣaṇā vikṛtānanāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5651: ekapādā dvipādāś ca nanṛtur yuddhakaṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_33.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:5655: bāhubhiḥ parighākārais tarjayanti sma dānavāḥ // HV_33.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:5656: prāsaiḥ pāśaiś ca khaḍgaiś ca tomarāṅkuśapaṭṭisaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5657: cikrīḍus te śataghnībhiḥ śitadhāraiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_33.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:5658: gaṇḍaśailaiś ca śailaiś ca parighaiś cottamāyudhaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5659: cakraiś ca daityapravarāś cakrur ānanditaṃ balam // HV_33.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:5662: evaṃ tad dānavaṃ sainyaṃ sarvaṃ yuddhamadotkaṭam /
GE07hv_conpu:5663: devān abhimukhaṃ tasthau meghānīkam ivoddhatam // HV_33.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:5667: [h: HV (CE) chapter 34, transliterated by Atul Agarwala, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of February 25, 2000 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:5669: śrutas te daityasainyasya vistaras tāta vigrahe /
GE07hv_conpu:5670: surāṇāṃ sarvasainyasya vistaraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śṛṇu // HV_34.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:5671: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca mahābalau /
GE07hv_conpu:5672: sabalāḥ sānugāś caiva saṃnahyanta yathākramam // HV_34.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:5678: dīptimadbhiḥ sadasyaiś ca brahmarṣibhir abhiṣṭutaḥ // HV_34.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:5680: gupto balāhakagaṇaiḥ parvatair iva kāmagaiḥ // HV_34.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:5681: yam ārūḍhaḥ sa bhagavān paryeti maghavān gajam /
GE07hv_conpu:5682: havir dhāneṣu gāyanti viprā makhamukhe sthitāḥ // HV_34.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:5684: indraṃ samupanṛtyanti śataśo hy apsarogaṇāḥ // HV_34.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:5687: sa syandanavaro bhāti yukto mātalinā tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:5688: kṛtsnaḥ parivṛto merur bhāskarasyeva tejasā // HV_34.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:5689: yamas tu daṇḍam udyamya kālayuktaṃ ca mudgaram /
GE07hv_conpu:5690: tasthau suragaṇānīke daityān nādena bhīṣayan // HV_34.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:5691: caturbhiḥ sāgarair gupto lelihadbhiś ca pannagaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5704: [k: N (except Ś1) T1.3.4 G1.4 (G2 after 14ab) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5706: yuktaś ca śaṅkhapadmābhyāṃ nidhīnām adhipaḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5710: prekṣamāṇaḥ śivasakhaḥ sākṣād iva śivaḥ svayam // HV_34.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:5712: kṣaumavāsāḥ śivaḥ sākṣāc chivarūpaḥ svayaṃ svayam |
GE07hv_conpu:5713: pūrvaṃ pakṣaṃ sahasrākṣaḥ pitṛrājas tu dakṣiṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:5714: varuṇaḥ paścimaṃ pakṣam uttaraṃ naravāhanaḥ // HV_34.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:5716: svāṃ svāṃ diśaṃ rarakṣus te tasya devabalasya ha // HV_34.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:5718: śriyā jājvalyamānena dīpyamānaiś ca raśmibhiḥ // HV_34.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:5722: cacāra madhye devānāṃ dvādaśātmā dineśvaraḥ // HV_34.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:5727: jyotiṣām īraṇaṃ vyomni rasānāṃ rasanaṃ prabhum /
GE07hv_conpu:5728: oṣadhīnāṃ paritrāṇaṃ nidhānam amṛtasya ca // HV_34.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:5729: jagataḥ prathamaṃ bhāgaṃ saumyaṃ śaityamayaṃ rasam /
GE07hv_conpu:5730: dadṛśur dānavāḥ somaṃ himapraharaṇaṃ sthitam // HV_34.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:5731: yaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pañcadhā bhidyate nṛṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:5732: saptaskandhagato lokāṃs trīn dadhāra cacāra ca // HV_34.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:5733: yam āhur agner yantāraṃ sarvaprabhavam īśvaram /
GE07hv_conpu:5734: saptasvaragatā yasya yonir gībhir udīryate // HV_34.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:5735: yaṃ vadanty uttamaṃ bhūtaṃ yaṃ vadanty aśarīriṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:5736: yam āhur ākāśagamaṃ śīghragaṃ śabdayoninam // HV_34.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:5737: sa vāyuḥ sarvabhūtāyur uddhataḥ svena tejasā /
GE07hv_conpu:5738: pravavau vyathayan daityān pratilomaḥ satoyadaḥ // HV_34.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:5740: cikrīḍur asibhiḥ śubhrair nirmuktair iva pannagaiḥ // HV_34.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:5742: yakṣaiś ca sumahābhogaiḥ pannagair garuḍair api |
GE07hv_conpu:5744: śarabhūtāḥ surendrāṇāṃ cerur vyāttamukhā divi // HV_34.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:5745: parvatās tu śilāśṛṅgaiḥ śataśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5746: upatasthuḥ suragaṇān prahartuṃ dānavaṃ balam // HV_34.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:5747: yaḥ sa devo hṛṣīkeśaḥ padmanābhas trivikramaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5748: kṛṣṇavartmā yugāntābho viśvasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ // HV_34.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:5755: saparīveṣam udyantaṃ savitur maṇḍalaṃ yathā // HV_34.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:5757: kareṇa kālīṃ vapuṣā śatrukālapradāṃ gadām // HV_34.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:5768: [k: K1 Ñ2.3 V1 Ds2 D3-5 (K3 D2 after 41) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5779: suparṇaḥ svena vapuṣā suparṇaṃ khecarottamam // HV_34.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:5782: tam anvayur devagaṇā munayaś ca samāhitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5783: gīrbhiḥ paramamantrābhis tuṣṭuvuś ca gadādharam // HV_34.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:5785: namas te 'stu hṛṣīkeśa jahi daityabalaṃ vibho |
GE07hv_conpu:5790: yaṃ ca jñānamayaṃ tejaḥ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5791: taṃ natāḥ sma jagannāthaṃ jahi daityagaṇān hare |
GE07hv_conpu:5792: tvāṃ stotuṃ hi vayaṃ deva śaktā varṣaśatair api |
GE07hv_conpu:5793: na hi deva jagannātha jayasva puruṣottama |
GE07hv_conpu:5794: itīritāṃ giriṃ śrutvā gantum abhyudyato hariḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5801: viṣṇor jiṣṇoḥ sahiṣṇoś ca bhrājiṣṇos tejasā vṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:5803: svasty astu devebhya iti stuvaṃs tatrāṅgirābravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:5805: svasty astv iti stuvaṃs tatra devān āṅgiraso 'bravīt |
GE07hv_conpu:5806: svasty astu daityebhya iti uśanā vākyam abravīt // HV_34.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:5808: svasti daityebhya iti cāpy uśanā vākyam ādade |
GE07hv_conpu:5810: [h: HV (CE) chapter 35, transliterated by Atul Agarwala, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of February 26, 2000 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:5812: tābhyāṃ balābhyāṃ saṃjajñe tumulo vigrahas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:5814: [k: After the ref., K1.3 Ñ2 V3 Dn Ds2 D2-6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5815: sarvadevamayo yas tu sarvadharmamayas tu yaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5816: tasya viṣṇoḥ sureśasya tejasā vidhṛtāḥ surāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5817: sabalāḥ sānugāś caiva tridaśāś ca madotkaṭāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5818: prahartuṃ dānavaṃ sainyaṃ tarasā hi samabhyayuḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5820: samīyur yudhyamānā vai parvatā iva parvataiḥ // HV_35.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:5823: tato rathaiḥ prajvalitair vāhanaiś ca pracoditaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5824: utpatadbhiś ca gaganaṃ sāsihastaiḥ samantataḥ // HV_35.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:5825: kṣipyamāṇaiś ca musalaiḥ saṃpreṣyadbhiś ca sāyakaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5826: cāpair visphāryamāṇaiś ca pātyamānaiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_35.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:5830: dānavāḥ samare jaghnur devān indrapurogamān // HV_35.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:5832: viṣaṇṇamanaso devā jagmur ārtiṃ mahāmṛdhe // HV_35.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:5834: bhinnoraskā ditisutair vemū raktaṃ vraṇair bahu // HV_35.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:5835: saṃditāḥ pāśajālaiś ca niryatnāś ca śaraiḥ kṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5836: praviṣṭā dānavīṃ māyāṃ na śekus te viceṣṭitum // HV_35.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:5838: balaṃ surāṇām asurair niṣprayatnāyudhaṃ kṛtam // HV_35.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:5839: māyāpāśānvikarṣaṃś ca chindan vajreṇa tāñ śarān /
GE07hv_conpu:5840: śakro daityabalaṃ ghoraṃ viveśa bahulocanaḥ // HV_35.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:5841: sa daityān pramukhe hatvā taddānavabalaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:5843: te 'nyonyaṃ nāvabudhyanta devān vā vāhanāni vā /
GE07hv_conpu:5848: petus te dānavagaṇāś chinnapakṣā ivācalāḥ // HV_35.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:5853: sā dadāha tamaḥ sarvaṃ māyā mayavikalpitā /
GE07hv_conpu:5854: daityāś cādityavapuṣaḥ sadya uttasthur āhave // HV_35.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:5858: śaśaṃsur vajriṇe devāḥ saṃtaptāḥ śaraṇaiṣiṇaḥ // HV_35.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:5859: saṃtapte māyayā sainye dahyamāne ca dānavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5860: codito devarājena varuṇo vākyam abravīt // HV_35.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:5861: purā brahmarṣijaḥ śakra tapas tepe sudāruṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:5862: aurvaḥ pūrvaṃ sa tejasvī sadṛśo brahmaṇo guṇaiḥ // HV_35.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:5863: taṃ tapantam ivādityaṃ tapasā jagad avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:5864: upatasthur munigaṇā devā devarṣibhiḥ saha // HV_35.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:5866: ṛṣiṃ vijñāpayām āsa purā paramatejasam // HV_35.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:5868: ṛṣivaṃśeṣu bhagavañś chinnamūlam idaṃ kulam // HV_35.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:5869: ekas tvam anapatyaś ca gotrāpatyaṃ na vartate /
GE07hv_conpu:5870: kaumāraṃ vratam āsthāya kleśam evānuvartase // HV_35.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:5872: ekadehāni tiṣṭhanti viviktāni vinā prajāḥ // HV_35.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:5874: bhavāṃs tu tapasā śreṣṭhaḥ prajāpatisamadyutiḥ // HV_35.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:5876: ādadhat svorjitaṃ tejo dvitīyāṃ kuru vai tanum // HV_35.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:5877: sa evam ukto munibhir munir manasi tāḍitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5878: jagarhe tān ṛṣigaṇān vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_35.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:5879: yathāyaṃ śāśvato dharmo munīnāṃ vihitaḥ purā /
GE07hv_conpu:5880: ārṣaṃ vai sevatāṃ karma vanyamūlaphalāśinaḥ // HV_35.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:5882: brahmacaryaṃ sucaritaṃ brahmāṇam api cālayet // HV_35.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:5884: asmākaṃ tu vanaṃ vṛttir vanyāśramanivāsinām // HV_35.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:5886: aśmakuṭṭā daśatapāḥ pañcasaptatapāś ca ye // HV_35.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:5887: ete tapasi tiṣṭhanto vratair api suduṣcaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5888: brahmacaryaṃ puraskṛtya prārthayanti parāṃ gatim // HV_35.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:5890: evam āhuḥ pare loke brahmacaryavido janāḥ // HV_35.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:5891: brahmacarye sthitaṃ dhairyaṃ brahmacarye sthitaṃ tapaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5892: ye sthitā brahmacaryeṇa brāhmaṇā divi te sthitāḥ // HV_35.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:5893: nāsti yogaṃ vinā siddhir nāsti siddhiṃ vinā yaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5894: nāsti loke yaśomūlaṃ brahmacaryāt paraṃ tapaḥ // HV_35.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:5896: brahmacaryaṃ samādhatte kim ataḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ // HV_35.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:5898: brahmacaryaṃ ca caryā ca trayaṃ syād dambhasaṃjñitam // HV_35.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:5899: kva dārāḥ kva ca saṃyogaḥ kva ca bhāvaviparyayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5900: yad iyaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā manasā mānasī prajā // HV_35.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:5901: yady asti tapaso vīryaṃ yuṣmākam amitātmanām /
GE07hv_conpu:5904: smaraṇaṃ sundarīṇāṃ ca manaso vikṛtiḥ purā |
GE07hv_conpu:5905: tasyām utpattim āsādya tasyāṃ bījaṃ ka āvehat |
GE07hv_conpu:5906: pāpātmā vikalo mūḍho bhavādṛśa iti śrutiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5907: smṛtvā brahmapadāt khinno dṛṣṭvā śukraṃ pramuñcati |
GE07hv_conpu:5908: sṛṣṭvā vidrāvayaty ātmā tasyāṃ bījaṃ ka āvahet |
GE07hv_conpu:5909: brahmacarye yadā bhūte bhaved yadi viniścayaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5914: sṛjadhvaṃ mānasān putrān prājāpatyena karmaṇā // HV_35.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:5916: na dārayogaṃ bījaṃ vā vratamuktaṃ tapasvinām // HV_35.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:5917: yad idaṃ luptadharmārthaṃ yuṣmābhir iha nirbhayaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5918: vyāhṛtaṃ sadbhir atyartham asadbhir iva me matam // HV_35.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:5920: dārayogaṃ vinā srakṣye putram ātmatanūruham // HV_35.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:5921: evam ātmānam ātmā me dvitīyaṃ janayiṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:5922: vanyenānena vidhinā didhakṣantam iva prajāḥ // HV_35.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:5928: didhakṣann iva lokāṃs trīñ jajñe paramakopanaḥ // HV_35.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:5930: kṣudhā me bādhate tāta jagad dhakṣye tyajasva mām // HV_35.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:5933: etasminn anantare brahmā munim ūrvaṃ sabhājayan /
GE07hv_conpu:5934: [k: After 53a, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.3.4 G3-5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:5936: ājagāma munir yatra vyasṛjat putram uttamam |
GE07hv_conpu:5940: putredaṃ dhāryatāṃ tejo lokānāṃ kriyatāṃ dayā // HV_35.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:5941: asyāpatyasya te vipra kariṣye sāhyam uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:5943: tathyam etan mama vacaḥ śṛṇu tvaṃ vadatāṃ vara // HV_35.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:5945: bhojanaṃ cāsya dāsyāmi yena prīto bhaviṣyati |
GE07hv_conpu:5947: dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yan me 'dya bhagavāñ śiśoḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5948: matim etāṃ dadātīha paramānugrahāya vai // HV_35.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:5950: bhagavaṃs tarpitaḥ putraḥ kair havyaiḥ prāpsyate sukham // HV_35.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:5951: kutra vāsya nivāsaḥ syād bhojanaṃ ca kimātmakam /
GE07hv_conpu:5952: vidhāsyati bhavān asya vīryatulyaṃ mahaujasaḥ // HV_35.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:5955: mama yonir jalaṃ vipra tac ca me toyapaṃ mukham // HV_35.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:5956: tatrāham āse nirataḥ piban vārimayaṃ havaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5957: taddhavis tava putrasya visṛjāmy ālayaṃ ca tat // HV_35.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:5958: tato yugānte bhūtānām eṣa cāhaṃ ca suvrata /
GE07hv_conpu:5962: evam astv iti so 'py agniḥ saṃvṛtajvālamaṇḍalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5964: pratiyātas tato brahmā te ca sarve maharṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5965: aurvasyāgneḥ prabhāvajñāḥ svāṃ svāṃ gatim upāśritāḥ // HV_35.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:5967: aurvaṃ praṇatasarvāṅgo vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha // HV_35.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:5969: tapasā te muniśreṣṭha parituṣṭaḥ pitāmahaḥ // HV_35.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:5970: ahaṃ tu tava putrasya tava caiva mahāvrata /
GE07hv_conpu:5971: bhṛtya ity avagantavyaḥ ślāghyo 'smi yadi karmaṇā // HV_35.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:5972: taṃ mā paśya samāpannaṃ tavaivārādhane ratam /
GE07hv_conpu:5973: yat sīdeyaṃ muniśreṣṭha tavaiva syātparājayaḥ // HV_35.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:5975: śiṣyo 'smi te tapaḥśreṣṭha surebhyo me bhayaṃ nuda |
GE07hv_conpu:5977: dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya te 'haṃ gurur mataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5978: nāsti te tapasānena bhayam adyeha suvrata // HV_35.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:5979: imāṃ ca māyāṃ gṛhṇīṣva mama putreṇa nirmitām /
GE07hv_conpu:5980: nirindhanām agnimayīṃ duḥsparśāṃ pāvakair api // HV_35.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:5982: rakṣiṣyaty ātmapakṣaṃ ca parāṃś ca pradahiṣyati // HV_35.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:5983: evam astv iti tāṃ gṛhya praṇamya munipuṃgavam /
GE07hv_conpu:5984: jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ kṛtārtho dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_35.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:5985: saiṣā durviṣahā māyā devair api durāsadā /
GE07hv_conpu:5987: tasmiṃs tu vyutthite daitye nirvīyaiṣā na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5988: śāpo hy asyāḥ purā dattaḥ sṛṣṭā yenaiva tejasā // HV_35.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:5989: yady eṣā pratihantavyā kartavyo bhagavān sukhī /
GE07hv_conpu:5990: dīyatāṃ me sakhā śakra toyayonir niśākaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5992: tenāhaṃ saha saṃgamya yādobhiś ca samāhitaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:5993: māyām etāṃ haniṣyāmi tvatprasādān na saṃśayaḥ // HV_35.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:5995: [h: HV (CE) chapter 36, transliterated by Atul Agarwala, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of February 27, 2000 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:5997: evam astv iti saṃhṛṣṭaḥ śakras tridaśavardhanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:5999: gaccha soma sahāyatvaṃ kuru pāśadharasya vai /
GE07hv_conpu:6000: asurāṇāṃ vināśāya jayārthaṃ ca divaukasām // HV_36.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:6002: tvanmayaṃ sarvalokānāṃ rasaṃ rasavido viduḥ // HV_36.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:6003: kṣayavṛddhis tava vyaktā sāgare khe ca maṇḍale /
GE07hv_conpu:6004: parivartasy ahorātraṃ kālaṃ jagati yojayan // HV_36.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:6006: na viduḥ soma devāś ca ye ca nakṣatrayoginaḥ // HV_36.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:6007: tvam ādityapathād ūrdhvaṃ jyotiṣāṃ copari sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6008: tamaḥ protsārya vapuṣā bhāsayasy akhilaṃ jagat // HV_36.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6013: tvaṃ kāntiḥ kāntavapuṣāṃ tvaṃ somaḥ somavṛttinām /
GE07hv_conpu:6014: saumyas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ timiraghnas tvam ṛkṣarāṭ // HV_36.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6015: tad gaccha tvaṃ sahānena varuṇena varūthinā /
GE07hv_conpu:6016: śamayasvāsurīṃ māyāṃ yayā dahyāma saṃyuge // HV_36.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6018: yan mā vadasi yuddhārthe devarāja varaprada /
GE07hv_conpu:6021: vimāyān vimadāṃś caiva daityasaṃghān mahāhave // HV_36.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:6023: veṣṭayanti sma tān ghorān daityān meghagaṇā iva // HV_36.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6025: jaghnatur himapātaiś ca pāśapātaiś ca dānavān // HV_36.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:6027: mṛdhe ceratur ambhobhiḥ kṣubdhāv iva mahārṇavau // HV_36.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:6028: tābhyām āplāvitaṃ sainyaṃ tad dānavam adṛśyata /
GE07hv_conpu:6031: tāṃ māyāṃ śamayām āstāṃ devau daiteyanirmitām // HV_36.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:6033: na śekuś calituṃ daityā viśiraskā ivādrayaḥ // HV_36.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:6034: śītāṃśunihatās te tu petur daityā himārditāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6036: teṣāṃ tu divi daityānāṃ viparītaprabhāṇi ha /
GE07hv_conpu:6037: vimānāni vicitrāṇi prapatanty utpatanti ca // HV_36.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:6039: mayo dadarśa māyāvī dānavān divi dānavaḥ // HV_36.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:6044: nirmitāṃ svena putreṇa krauñcena divi kāmagām /
GE07hv_conpu:6045: prathitāṃ pārvatīṃ māyāṃ sasṛje sa samantataḥ // HV_36.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:6047: nijaghne devasaṃghāṃs tān dānavāṃś cāpy ajīvayat // HV_36.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6051: abhavad dyaur asaṃhāryā pṛthivī parvatair iva // HV_36.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:6056: sa hi yuddhagataḥ śrīmān īśo na sma vyakampata /
GE07hv_conpu:6057: sahiṣṇutvāj jagatsvāmī na cukrodha gadādharaḥ // HV_36.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:6061: [k: N (except Ś1 K1 Ñ1) S (except M1-3) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6064: coditau viṣṇuvākyena tau māyām apakarṣatām // HV_36.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:6066: dagdhā sā pārvatī māyā bhasmabhūtā nanāśa ha // HV_36.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:6068: daityasenāṃ dadahatur yugānteṣv iva mūrcchitau // HV_36.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:6069: vāyuḥ pradhāvitas tatra paścād agniś ca mārutāt /
GE07hv_conpu:6076: saṃprahṛṣṭeṣu deveṣu sādhu sādhv iti sarvaśaḥ // HV_36.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:6078: dikṣu sarvāsu śuddhāsu pravṛtte dharmasaṃstare // HV_36.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:6082: virājamānā devās tu tato munigaṇaiḥ saha |
GE07hv_conpu:6084: yajñaśobhiṣu deveṣu svargārthaṃ darśayatsu ca // HV_36.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:6086: bhāve tapasi śuddhānām abhāve pāpakarmaṇām // HV_36.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:6090: svadharmastheṣu varṇeṣu loke 'sminn āśrameṣu ca // HV_36.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:6092: [k: N (except Ś1) T2.4 G1.3-5 M4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6094: praśāntakalmaṣe loke śānte tamasi dāruṇe // HV_36.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:6096: tanmayā vimalā lokās tābhyāṃ jayakṛtakriyāḥ // HV_36.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:6098: kālanemir iti khyāto dānavaḥ pratyadṛśyata // HV_36.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:6103: kakṣe mahati saṃvṛddho nidāgha iva pāvakaḥ // HV_36.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:6106: bāhubhis tulayan vyoma kṣipan padbhyāṃ mahīdharān /
GE07hv_conpu:6109: didhakṣantam ivāyāntaṃ sarvān devagaṇān mṛdhe // HV_36.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:6111: saṃvartakāle tṛṣitaṃ dṛptaṃ mṛtyum ivotthitam // HV_36.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:6115: dānavān devanihatān uttiṣṭhata iti bruvan // HV_36.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:6117: vīkṣanti sma surāḥ sarve bhayavitrastalocanāḥ // HV_36.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:6118: taṃ sma vīkṣanti bhūtāni kramantaṃ kālaneminam /
GE07hv_conpu:6123: kālanemir babhau daityaḥ saviṣṇur iva mandaraḥ // HV_36.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:6125: dṛṣṭvā kālam ivāyāntaṃ kālanemiṃ bhayāvaham // HV_36.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:6127: [h: HV (CE) chapter 37, transliterated by Atul Agarwala, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of February 27, 2000 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:6129: dānavānāṃ tu piprīṣuḥ kālanemiḥ sa dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6130: vyavardhata mahātejās tapānte jalado yathā // HV_37.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:6137: mantram abhyasyataṃ teṣāṃ vyūhaṃ ca paridhāvatām /
GE07hv_conpu:6138: prekṣatāṃ cābhavat prītir dānavaṃ kālaneminam // HV_37.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:6139: ye tu tatra mayasyāsan mukhyā yuddhapuraḥsarāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6140: te'pi sarve bhayaṃ tyaktvā hṛṣṭā yoddhum upasthitāḥ // HV_37.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:6141: mayas tāro varāhaś ca hayagrīvaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:6142: vipracittisutaḥ śvetaḥ kharalambāv ubhāv api // HV_37.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6143: ariṣṭo baliputraś ca kiśorāṣṭrau tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6146: dānavāḥ kṛtino jagmuḥ kālaneminam uttamam // HV_37.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:6147: te gadābhiś ca gurvībhiś cakraiś ca saparaśvaghaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6148: kālakalpaiś ca musalaiḥ kṣepaṇīyaiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_37.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6150: paṭṭisair bhiṇḍipālaiś ca parighaiś cottamāyasaiḥ // HV_37.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6151: ghātanībhiś ca gurvībhiḥ śataghnībhis tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6152: yugair yantraiś ca nirmuktair argalaiś cāgratāḍitaiḥ // HV_37.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:6155: dorbhiś cāyatapīnābhiḥ prāsaiḥ pāśaiś ca mudgaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6156: sarpair lelihyamānaiś ca visarpadbhiś ca sāyakaiḥ // HV_37.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:6157: vajraiḥ praharaṇīyaiś ca dīpyadbhiś cāpi tomaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6158: vikośaiś cāsibhis tīkṣṇaiḥ śūlaiś ca śitanirmalaiḥ // HV_37.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6171: tayoś camvos tadānīṃ tu babhūva sa samāgamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6172: dvāvāpṛthivyoḥ saṃyogo yathā syād yugaparyaye // HV_37.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:6175: niścakramur balābhyāṃ tu tābhyāṃ bhīmāḥ surāsurāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6177: tābhyāṃ balābhyāṃ saṃhṛṣṭāś cerus te devadānavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6178: vanābhyāṃ pārvatīyābhyāṃ puṣpitābhyāṃ yathā gajāḥ // HV_37.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:6179: samājaghnus tato bherīḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuś ca naikaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6180: sa dyāṃ divaṃ bhuvaṃ caiva diśaś ca samapūrayat // HV_37.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:6182: duṃdubhīnāṃ ca ninadā daityam antardadhuḥ svanam // HV_37.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6184: babhañjur bāhubhir bāhūn dvaṃdvam anye yuyutsavaḥ // HV_37.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:6185: devatās tv aśanīr ghorāḥ parighāṃś cottamāyasān /
GE07hv_conpu:6186: sasarjur ājau nistriṃśān gadā gurvīś ca dānavāḥ // HV_37.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:6188: paripetur bhṛśaṃ kecin nyubjāḥ kecic ca jajñire // HV_37.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:6190: samīyus te susaṃrabdhā roṣād anyonyam āhave // HV_37.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:6192: rathā rathair nirudhyante padātāś ca padātibhiḥ // HV_37.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:6193: teṣāṃ rathānāṃ tumulaḥ sa śabdaḥ śabdavāhinām /
GE07hv_conpu:6194: nabhaḥ svasvāna hi yathā nabhasye jaladasvanaiḥ // HV_37.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:6197: babhañjire rathān kecit kecit saṃmṛditā rathaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6198: saṃbādham eke saṃprāpya na śekuś calituṃ rathāḥ // HV_37.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:6199: anyonyam anye samare dorbhyām utkṣipya darpitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6201: astrair anye vinirbhinnā raktaṃ vemur hatā yudhi /
GE07hv_conpu:6207: etasminn antare kruddhaḥ kālanemiḥ sa dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6213: tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca gagane vavṛdhus tasya bāhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6216: divyam ākāśam āvavre parvatair ucchritair iva // HV_37.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:6222: na śekuś calituṃ devāḥ kālanemihatā yudhi // HV_37.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:6223: muṣṭibhir nihatāḥ kecit kecid dhi vidalīkṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6226: na śekur yatnavanto 'pi yatnaṃ kartuṃ vicetasaḥ // HV_37.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:6231: adyaprabhṛti devendro na tvaṃ bhavasi vṛtrahan |
GE07hv_conpu:6232: eṣa te gadayā śakra śiro bhetsyāmi paśyataḥ || *HV_37.46*517:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:6234: bhaviṣyāmi na saṃdeho hatvā tvām ugrapauruṣam |
GE07hv_conpu:6235: iti bruvāṇaṃ samare vṛtrahā vajram ādade |
GE07hv_conpu:6236: jaghāna tarasā śakro vajreṇa hi sa dānavam |
GE07hv_conpu:6238: aśaktaṃ vajram āsīt tu dānavaṃ hantum ojasā |
GE07hv_conpu:6239: punaḥ papāta sahasā śakrasyaiva tadā karam |
GE07hv_conpu:6240: kālanemis tu sahasā gadām ādāya yatnataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:6243: sasrāva rudhiraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ gajarājas tadā balī |
GE07hv_conpu:6244: punaś ca gadayā rājaṃs tadā samaramūrdhani |
GE07hv_conpu:6252: airāvatagataḥ saṃkhye calituṃ na śaśāka ha // HV_37.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:6254: nirvyāpāraḥ kṛtas tena vipāśo varuṇo mṛdhe // HV_37.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:6257: jaghāna devarājam ca somaṃ varuṇam aśvinau |
GE07hv_conpu:6264: svaśaktyā tāḍayām āsa vasum urvyāṃ papāta saḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:6265: dhanadaś ca kṛtāntaś ca varuṇaś ca śacīpatiḥ || *HV_37.48*518:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:6267: nivārya tāni śastrāṇi tāñ jaghāna pṛthak pṛthak |
GE07hv_conpu:6268: yamena preṣitaṃ daṇḍaṃ jagṛhe sa mahāsuraḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:6269: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve lokapālā mahaujasaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:6271: vajreṇa nihato daityo na cakampe girir yathā |
GE07hv_conpu:6272: punar vajreṇa taṃ daityam indro mārutavartmani |
GE07hv_conpu:6273: sthitas tadā jṛmbhaṇena jigīrṇe sāyudhaṃ hariḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:6275: tatkṣaṇād eva devendraḥ pārśvaṃ nirbhidya niryayau ||
GE07hv_conpu:6277: tataḥ śūlam amoghaṃ tu śaṃkaro hantum ādade |
GE07hv_conpu:6279: na śūlena na cānyena hantuṃ śakyo mahāsuraḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:6280: śūlaṃ etad amoghaṃ ca mā prayuñkṣva mahāsure || *HV_37.48*518:25 |
GE07hv_conpu:6281: ity uktaḥ śūlapāṇiḥ sa saṃjahārāyudhaṃ svakam |
GE07hv_conpu:6283: ūcuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ mahātmāno gīrbhiḥ stutvā janārdanam |
GE07hv_conpu:6289: tadaiva lokapālāś ca nihatās tena saṃyugam |
GE07hv_conpu:6291: yāmyām avasthām amaro nītaḥ svāṃ diśam āviśat // HV_37.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:6293: lokapālās tu te sarve mānuṣīṃ tanum āsthitāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:6294: vihāya svapadaṃ rājan vivadanti sma mānuṣe |
GE07hv_conpu:6295: sa lokapālān utsādya hṛtvā teṣāṃ ca karma tat /
GE07hv_conpu:6296: dikṣu sarvāsu dehaṃ svaṃ caturdhā vidadhe tadā // HV_37.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:6298: jahāra lakṣmīṃ somasya taṃ cāsya viṣayaṃ mahat // HV_37.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:6300: sāyanaṃ cāsya viṣayaṃ jahāra dinakarma ca // HV_37.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:6302: vāyuṃ ca tarasā jitvā cakārātmavaśānugam // HV_37.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:6303: sa samudrān samānīya sarvāś ca sarito balāt /
GE07hv_conpu:6304: cakārātmavaśe vīryād dehabhūtāś ca sindhavaḥ // HV_37.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:6305: āpaḥ sa vaśagāḥ kṛtvā divijātāś ca bhūmijāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6306: sthāpayām āsa jagatīṃ suguptāṃ dharaṇīdharaiḥ // HV_37.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:6312: taṃ tuṣṭuvur daityagaṇā devā iva pitāmaham // HV_37.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:6314: [h: HV (CE) chapter 38, transliterated by Atul Agarwala, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of March 2, 2000 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:6317: vedo dharmaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ śrīś ca nārāyaṇāśrayā // HV_38.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:6319: vaiṣṇavaṃ padam anvicchan yayau nārāyaṇāntikam // HV_38.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:6321: dānavānāṃ vināśāya bhrāmayantaṃ gadāṃ śubhām // HV_38.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:6323: svārūḍhaṃ svarṇapatrāḍhyaṃ śikhinaṃ kāśyapaṃ khagam // HV_38.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:6325: dānavo viṣṇum akṣobhyaṃ babhāṣe kṣubdhamānasaḥ // HV_38.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:6326: ayaṃ sa ripur asmākaṃ pūrveṣāṃ dānavarṣiṇām /
GE07hv_conpu:6327: arṇavāvāsinaś caiva madhor vai kaiṭabhasya ca // HV_38.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6328: ayaṃ sa vigraho 'smākam aśāmyaḥ kila kathyate /
GE07hv_conpu:6329: yena naḥ saṃyugeṣv adya bahavo dānavā hatāḥ // HV_38.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:6332: ayaṃ sa viṣṇur devānāṃ vaikuṇṭhaś ca divaukasām /
GE07hv_conpu:6333: ananto bhoginām apsu svayaṃbhūś ca svayaṃbhuvaḥ // HV_38.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6334: ayaṃ sa nātho devānām asmābhir viprakṛṣyatām /
GE07hv_conpu:6335: asya krodhaṃ samāsādya hiraṇyakaśipur hataḥ // HV_38.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6336: asya cchāyāṃ samāśritya devā makhamukhe sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6337: ājyaṃ maharṣibhir dattam aśnuvanti tridhā hutam // HV_38.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:6338: ayaṃ sa nidhane hetuḥ sarveṣāṃ daitavadviṣām /
GE07hv_conpu:6339: asya cakraṃ praviṣṭāni kulāny asmākam āhave // HV_38.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:6340: ayaṃ sa kila yuddheṣu surārthe tyaktajīvitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6341: savitus tejasā tulyaṃ cakraṃ kṣipati śatruṣu // HV_38.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6342: ayaṃ sa kālo daityānāṃ kālabhūte mayi sthite /
GE07hv_conpu:6343: atikrāntasya kālasya phalaṃ prāpsyati durmatiḥ // HV_38.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:6344: diṣṭyedānīṃ samakṣaṃ me viṣṇur eṣa samāgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6345: adya madbāṇaniṣpiṣṭo mayy eva praṇamiṣyati // HV_38.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:6346: yāsyāmy apacitiṃ diṣṭyā pūrveṣām adya saṃyuge /
GE07hv_conpu:6347: imaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ hatvā dānavānāṃ bhayāvaham // HV_38.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:6348: kṣipram eva vadhiṣyāmi raṇe nārāyaṇaṃ śairaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6349: jātyantaragato hy eṣa mṛdhe bādhati dānavān // HV_38.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:6350: eṣo 'ntakaḥ purā bhūtvā padmanābha iti smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6351: jaghānaikārṇave ghore tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau // HV_38.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:6352: [k: K2 Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D4.6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6355: pitaraṃ me jaghānaiko hiraṇyakaśipuṃ purā // HV_38.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:6357: [k: Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D4.6 T2 G M4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6358: yajñakāle baler yo vai kṛtvā vāmanarūpatām |
GE07hv_conpu:6359: trīṃl lokāṃś ca jahāraiṣa kramamāṇas tribhiḥ kramaiḥ // HV_38.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:6360: bhūyas tv idānīṃ samare saṃprāpte tārakāmaye /
GE07hv_conpu:6361: mayā saha samāgamya sadevo vinaśiṣyati // HV_38.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:6362: sa evam uktvā bahudhā kṣipan nārāyaṇaṃ raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:6365: kṣamābalena manasā sasmitaṃ vākyam abravīt // HV_38.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:6366: alaṃ darpabalaṃ daitya sthiraṃ matkrodhajaṃ balam /
GE07hv_conpu:6367: hatas tvaṃ darpajair doṣaiḥ kṣamāṃ yo 'tītya bhāṣase // HV_38.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:6368: adhamas tvaṃ mama mato dhig etat tava vāgbalam /
GE07hv_conpu:6369: na tatra puruṣāḥ santi yatra garjanti yoṣitaḥ // HV_38.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6370: ahaṃ tvāṃ daitya paśyāmi pūrveṣāṃ mārgagāminam /
GE07hv_conpu:6371: prajāpatikṛtaṃ setuṃ ko bhittvā svastimān vrajet // HV_38.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:6373: sveṣu sveṣu ca sthāneṣu sthāpayiṣyāmi devatāḥ // HV_38.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:6374: evaṃ bruvati vākyaṃ tu mṛdhe śrīvatsadhāriṇi /
GE07hv_conpu:6375: jahāsa dānavaḥ krodhād dhastāṃś cakre ca sāyudhān // HV_38.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:6377: krodhād rudhiraraktākṣo viṣṇor vakṣasy atāḍayat // HV_38.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:6381: na cacāla harir yuddhe 'kampyamāna ivācalaḥ // HV_38.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:6384: mumoca jvalitāṃ ghorāṃ saṃrabdho garuḍopari // HV_38.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:6385: karmaṇā tena daityasya viṣṇur vismayam āgamat /
GE07hv_conpu:6387: sa tena tāḍitaḥ pakṣī cacāla ca punaḥ punaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:6389: yena tasya suparṇasya patitā mūrdhni sā gadā // HV_38.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:6390: [k: K1-3 Ñ2.3V BD (except D1) T3.4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6394: jaghnus te samare viṣṇuṃ gopālaṃ ca mahāraṇe |
GE07hv_conpu:6395: bhramantaṃ ghūrṇamānaṃ ca stutiṃ devāḥ pracakrire |
GE07hv_conpu:6398: uttasthau ca raṇād viṣṇur amaraiḥ saṃstutaḥ purā |
GE07hv_conpu:6399: hataṃ viṣṇuṃ samājñāya śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau sa dānavaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:6400: mṛdaṅgāṃś ca tridhā tatra vādayanto mahāsurāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:6402: suparṇaṃ vyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣataṃ ca vapur ātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6404: vyavardhata ca vegena suparṇena samaṃ vibhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6405: bhujāś cāsya vyavardhanta vyāpnuvanto diśo daśa // HV_38.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:6406: sa diśaḥ pradiśaś caiva khaṃ ca gāṃ caiva pūrayan /
GE07hv_conpu:6407: vavṛdhe sa punar lokān krāntukāma ivaujasā // HV_38.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:6409: ṛṣayaḥ saha gandharvais tuṣṭuvur madhusūdanam // HV_38.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:6412: viṣṇo kṛṣṇa hṛṣīkeśa jahi daityaṃ mahābalam |
GE07hv_conpu:6414: pāhi naḥ sakalān asmāñ jahi daityaṃ mahābalam |
GE07hv_conpu:6415: sa dyāṃ kirīṭena likhan sābhram ambaram ambaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6416: padbhyām ākramya vasudhāṃ diśaḥ pracchādya bāhubhiḥ // HV_38.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:6426: kravyādāni ca bhūtāni tṛptiṃ yānti mahāmṛdhe // HV_38.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:6428: cakram udyasya samare krodhadīpto gadādharaḥ // HV_38.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:6429: saṃmuṣṇan dānavaṃ tejaḥ samare svena tejasā /
GE07hv_conpu:6430: ciccheda bāhūṃś cakreṇa śrīdharaḥ kālaneminaḥ // HV_38.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:6431: tac ca vaktraśataṃ ghoraṃ sāgnicūrṇāṭṭahāsi yat /
GE07hv_conpu:6432: tasya daityasya cakreṇa pramamātha balād dhariḥ // HV_38.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:6433: sa cchinnabāhur viśirā na prākampata dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6434: kabandhāvasthitaḥ saṃkhye viśākha iva pādapaḥ // HV_38.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:6435: taṃ vitatya mahāpakṣau vāyoḥ kṛtvā samaṃ javam /
GE07hv_conpu:6436: urasā pātayām āsa garuḍaḥ kālaneminam // HV_38.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:6437: sa tasya deho vimukho viśākhaḥ khāt paribhraman /
GE07hv_conpu:6438: nipapāta divaṃ tyaktvā kṣobhayan dharaṇītalam // HV_38.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:6439: tasmin nipatite daitye devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:6440: sādhu sādhv iti vaikuṇṭhaṃ sametāḥ pratyapūjayan // HV_38.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:6441: apare ye tu daityā vai yuddhe dṛṣṭaparākramāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6442: te sarve bāhubhir vyāptā na śekuś calituṃ raṇe // HV_38.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:6443: kāṃścit keśeṣu jagrāha kāṃścit kaṇṭhe nyapīḍayat /
GE07hv_conpu:6444: pāṭayan kasyacid vaktraṃ madhye kāṃścid agṛhyata // HV_38.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:6448: tasthau śakrapriyaṃ kṛtvā kṛtakarmā gadādharaḥ // HV_38.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:6450: taṃ deśam ājagāmāśu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ // HV_38.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:6452: devadevo hariṃ devaṃ pūjayan vākyam abravīt // HV_38.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:6453: kṛtaṃ deva mahatkarma surāṇāṃ śalyam uddhṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:6454: vadhenānena daityānāṃ vayaṃ ca paritoṣitāḥ // HV_38.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:6455: yo 'yaṃ tvayā hato viṣṇo kālanemir mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6456: tvam eko 'sya mṛdhe hantā nānyaḥ kaścana vidyate // HV_38.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:6457: eṣa devān paribhavaṃl lokāṃś ca sacarācarān /
GE07hv_conpu:6458: ṛṣīṇāṃ kadanaṃ kṛtvā mām api pratigarjati // HV_38.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:6460: yad ayaṃ kālatulyābhaḥ kālanemir nipātitaḥ // HV_38.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:6461: tadāgacchasva bhadraṃ te gacchāma divam uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:6462: brahmarṣayas tvāṃ tatrasthāḥ pratīkṣante sadogatāḥ // HV_38.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:6463: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) S (except M1-3) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6464: ahaṃ maharṣayaś caiva tatra tvāṃ vadatāṃ vara |
GE07hv_conpu:6466: kiṃ cāhaṃ tava dāsyāmi varaṃ varabhṛtāṃ vara /
GE07hv_conpu:6467: sureṣv api sadaityeṣu varāṇāṃ varado bhavān // HV_38.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:6469: asminn eva mṛdhe viṣṇo śakrāya sumahātmane // HV_38.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:6470: evam ukto bhagavatā brahmaṇā harir īśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6471: devāñ śakramukhān sarvān uvāca śubhayā girā // HV_38.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:6472: śrūyatāṃ tridaśāḥ sarve yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6474: asmin naḥ samare sarve kālanemimukhā hatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6475: dānavā vikramopetāḥ śakrād api mahattarāḥ // HV_38.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:6476: asmin mahati saṃkrande dvāv eva tu viniḥsṛtau /
GE07hv_conpu:6477: vairocaniś ca daityendraḥ svarbhānuś ca mahāgrahaḥ // HV_38.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:6478: tad iṣṭāṃ bhajatāṃ śakro diśaṃ varuṇa eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6479: yāmyāṃ yamaḥ pālayatām uttarāṃ ca dhanādhipaḥ // HV_38.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:6480: ṛkṣaiḥ saha yathāyogaṃ kālaṃ caratu candramāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6481: abdaṃ hy ṛtumukhaṃ sūryo bhajatām ayanaiḥ saha // HV_38.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:6483: hūyantām agnayo viprair vedadṛṣṭena karmaṇā // HV_38.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:6485: śrāddhena pitaraś caiva tṛptiṃ yāntu yathāsukham // HV_38.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:6486: vāyuś caratu mārgasthas tridhā dīpyatu pāvakaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6487: trayo varṇāś ca lokāṃs trīṃs tarpayantv ātmajair guṇaiḥ // HV_38.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:6489: dakṣiṇāś cāpi vartantāṃ yathoktaṃ sarvasatriṇām // HV_38.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:6490: gāś ca sūryo rasān somo vāyuḥ prāṇāṃś ca prāṇiṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:6491: tarpayantaḥ pravartantāṃ śivaiḥ saumyaiś ca karmabhiḥ // HV_38.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:6493: trailokyamātaraḥ sarvāḥ sāgaraṃ yāntu nimnagāḥ // HV_38.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:6494: daityebhyas tyajyatāṃ bhītiḥ śāntiṃ vrajata devatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6495: svasti vo 'stu gamiṣyāmi brahmalokaṃ sanātanam // HV_38.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:6496: svagṛhe svargaloke vā saṃgrāme vā viśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6497: visrambho vo na gantavyo nityaṃ kṣudrā hi dānavāḥ // HV_38.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:6498: chidreṣu praharanty ete na caiṣāṃ saṃsthitir dhruvā /
GE07hv_conpu:6499: saumyānām ṛjubhāvānāṃ bhavatāṃ cārjavā matiḥ // HV_38.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:6500: [k: N(except Ś1 Ñ1) S(except M1-3) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6503: yadā ca sudurādharṣaṃ dānavebhyo bhayaṃ bhavet |
GE07hv_conpu:6506: jagāma brahmaṇā sārdhaṃ brahmalokaṃ mahāyaśāḥ // HV_38.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:6508: dānavānāṃ ca viṣṇoś ca yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // HV_38.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:6510: [h: HV (CE) chapter 39, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of July 20, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:6513: brahmalokaṃ gato brahman vaikuṇṭhaḥ kiṃ cakāra ha // HV_39.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:6515: viṣṇur daityavadhe vṛtte devair akṛtasatkriyaḥ // HV_39.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:6516: brahmaloke ca kiṃ sthānaṃ kaṃ vā yogam upāsta saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6517: kaṃ vā dadhāra niyamaṃ sa vibhur bhūtabhāvanaḥ // HV_39.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:6518: kathaṃ tatrāsatas tasya viśvaṃ jagad idaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:6521: kathaṃ ca brahmalokastho dhuraṃ vahati laukikīm // HV_39.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:6522: caritaṃ tasya viprendra divyaṃ bhagavato divi /
GE07hv_conpu:6523: vistareṇa yathātattvaṃ sarvam icchāmi veditum // HV_39.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6526: brahmalokaṃ yathārūḍho brahmaṇā saha modate // HV_39.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:6527: kāmaṃ tasya gatiḥ sūkṣmā devair api durānugā /
GE07hv_conpu:6528: yat tu śakṣyāmy ahaṃ vaktuṃ tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu // HV_39.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:6529: eṣa lokamayo devo lokāś caitan mayāstrayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6530: eṣa devamayaś caiva devāś caitan mayā divi // HV_39.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6531: devena vardhate yad dhi sarvaṃ tad dhi janārdanāt /
GE07hv_conpu:6532: yat pravṛttaṃ ca devebhyas tad viddhi madhusūdanāt // HV_39.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6533: agnīṣomamayaṃ lokaṃ yaṃ vidur viduṣo janāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6534: taṃ somam agniṃ lokaṃ ca veda viṣṇuṃ pitāmahaḥ // HV_39.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:6535: kṣīrād yathā dadhi bhaved dadhnaḥ sarpir yathā bhavet /
GE07hv_conpu:6536: mathyamāneṣu bhūteṣu tathā loko janārdanāt // HV_39.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:6537: yathendriyaiś ca bhūtaiś ca paramātmā vidhīyate /
GE07hv_conpu:6538: tathā vedaiś ca devaiś ca lokaiś ca vidito hariḥ // HV_39.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6540: tathā prāṇeśvarāvāptir devānāṃ divi vaiṣṇavī // HV_39.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:6542: lokatantradharo hy eva mantrair mantra ivārcyate // HV_39.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:6543: asya pāraṃ na paśyanti bahavaḥ pāratantriṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6544: eṣa pāraṃ paraṃ caiva lokānāṃ veda mādhavaḥ // HV_39.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:6546: śṛṇu vai yat tadā vṛttaṃ brahmaloke purātanam // HV_39.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:6547: sa gatvā brahmaṇo lokaṃ dṛṣṭvā paitāmahaṃ padam /
GE07hv_conpu:6548: vavande tān ṛṣīn sarvān viṣṇur ārṣeṇa karmaṇā // HV_39.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:6549: so 'gniṃ prāk savane dṛṣṭvā hūyamānaṃ maharṣibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6550: avandata mahātejāḥ kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ vidhim // HV_39.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:6551: sa dadarśa makheṣv ājyair ijyamānaṃ maharṣibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6552: bhāgaṃ yajñiyam aśnānaṃ svadeham aparaṃ sthitam // HV_39.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:6556: makheṣu ca brahmarṣibhiḥ śataśaḥ kṛtalakṣaṇān // HV_39.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:6558: yajñair ijyantam ātmānam paśyaṃs tatra cacāra ha // HV_39.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:6559: tam ūcur ṛṣayo devāḥ sadasyāḥ sadasi sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6565: prabhus tvaṃ sarvadevānāṃ lokānāṃ prabhur avyayaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:6566: tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam |
GE07hv_conpu:6567: idaṃ yajñiyam ātithyaṃ mantrataḥ pratigṛhyatām // HV_39.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6568: tvam asya yajñapūtasya pātraṃ pādyasya pāvanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6569: atithis tvaṃ hi mantroktaḥ sa dṛṣṭaḥ satataṃ mataḥ // HV_39.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:6570: tvayi yoddhu gate viṣṇo na prāvartanta naḥ kriyāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6571: avaiṣṇavasya yajñasya na hi karma vidhīyate // HV_39.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:6575: yady ātmānam ihāsmābhir ijyamānaṃ nirīkṣase // HV_39.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:6576: evam astv iti tān viprān bhagavān pratyapūjayat /
GE07hv_conpu:6577: mumude brahmalokastho brahmaiva hi pitāmahaḥ // HV_39.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:6578: [h: HV (CE) chapter 40, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of September 16, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:6580: ṛṣibhiḥ pūjitas tais tu viveśa harir īśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6582: sa tatra viviśe hṛṣṭas tān āmantrya sadogatān /
GE07hv_conpu:6584: svena nāmnā parijñātaṃ sa taṃ nārāyaṇāśramam /
GE07hv_conpu:6585: praviśann eva bhagavān āyudhāni vyasarjayat // HV_40.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:6587: svadhiṣṭhitaṃ bhūtagaṇaiḥ śāśvataiś ca maharṣibhiḥ // HV_40.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:6590: na tatra viṣayo vāyor nendor nāpi vivasvataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6591: vapuṣā padmanābhasya sa deśas tejasā vṛtaḥ // HV_40.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6592: sa tatra praviśann eva jaṭābhāraṃ samudvahan /
GE07hv_conpu:6595: upatasthe mahātmānaṃ nidrā taṃ kālarūpiṇī // HV_40.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:6600: harir ekārṇavoktena vratena vratināṃ varaḥ // HV_40.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6601: taṃ śayānaṃ mahātmānaṃ bhavāya jagataḥ prabhum /
GE07hv_conpu:6602: upāsāṃ cakrire viṣṇuṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tadā // HV_40.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6604: ādyasya sadanaṃ padmaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sūryasaṃnibham // HV_40.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:6605: [k: K1-3 Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D2-5 T1.3.4 G3.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6610: prajānāṃ paṅktayo hy oghair niṣpatanti viśanti ca // HV_40.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6611: te sṛṣṭāḥ prāṇinām oghā vibhaktā brahmaṇā svayam /
GE07hv_conpu:6612: caturdhā svāṃ gatiṃ jagmuḥ kṛtāntoktena karmaṇā // HV_40.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:6613: na taṃ veda svayaṃ brahmā nāpi brahmarṣayo 'vyayāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6614: viṣṇuṃ nidrāmayaṃ yogaṃ praviṣṭaṃ tamasāvṛtam // HV_40.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:6616: na vidus taṃ kvacit suptaṃ kvacid āsīnam āsane // HV_40.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:6617: jāgarti ko 'tra kaḥ śete kaḥ śvasan kaś ca neṅgate /
GE07hv_conpu:6618: ko bhogavān ko dyutimān kṛṣṇāt kṛṣṇataraś ca kaḥ // HV_40.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:6619: vimṛśanti sma taṃ devaṃ divyābhir upapattibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6622: na cainaṃ śekur anveṣṭuṃ karmato janmato 'pi vā // HV_40.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:6623: kathābhis tatpradiṣṭābhir ye tasya caritaṃ viduḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6624: purāṇaṃ taṃ purāṇeṣu ṛṣayaḥ saṃpracakṣate // HV_40.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:6625: śrūyate cāsya caritaṃ deveṣv api purātanam /
GE07hv_conpu:6626: mahāpurāṇāt prabhṛti paraṃ tasya na vidyate // HV_40.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:6628: tat purāṇād ṛte tasya caritaṃ naiva vidyate |
GE07hv_conpu:6629: yac cāsya veda vedo 'pi caritaṃ svaprabhāvajam /
GE07hv_conpu:6630: tenemāḥ śrutayo vyāptā vaidikā laukikāś ca yāḥ // HV_40.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:6633: yadainaṃ vīkṣituṃ devā na śekuḥ suptam acyutam /
GE07hv_conpu:6634: tataḥ svapiti gharmānte jāgarti jaladakṣaye // HV_40.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:6635: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1; D6 om.) T1.3.4 G3.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6636: sa hi yajñāś ca vedāś ca yajñāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:6637: yā tu yajñagatiḥ proktā sa eṣa puruṣottamaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:6638: tasmin supte na vartante mantrapūtāḥ kratukriyāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6641: śaratprabhṛti yajñā hi jāgrati śrīdhare harau |
GE07hv_conpu:6642: tad idaṃ vārṣikaṃ cakraṃ kārayaty ambudeśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6643: vaiṣṇavaṃ karma kurvāṇaḥ supte viṣṇau puraṃdaraḥ // HV_40.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6644: yā hy eṣā gahvarī māyā nidreti jagati sthitā /
GE07hv_conpu:6645: akasmād dveṣiṇī ghorā kālarātrir mahīkṣitām // HV_40.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:6648: naitayā kaścid āviṣṭo jṛmbhamāṇo muhur muhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6649: śaktaḥ prasahituṃ vegaṃ majjann iva mahārṇave // HV_40.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:6650: annajā bhuvi martyānāṃ śramajā vā kathaṃcana /
GE07hv_conpu:6651: naiśā bhavati lokasya nidrā sarvasya laukikī // HV_40.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:6652: svapnānte kṣīyate hy eṣā prāyaśo bhuvi dehinām /
GE07hv_conpu:6653: mṛtyukāle ca bhūtānāṃ prāṇān nāśayate bhṛśam // HV_40.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:6654: deveṣv api dadhāraināṃ nānyo nārāyaṇād ṛte /
GE07hv_conpu:6657: lokān alpena kālena bhajate bhūtamohinī // HV_40.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:6660: sa tayā nidrayā channas tasmin nārāyaṇāśrame /
GE07hv_conpu:6661: śete sma hi tadā viṣṇur mohayañ jagad avyayaḥ // HV_40.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:6663: jagmuḥ kṛtayugaṃ caiva tretā caiva yugottamam // HV_40.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:6664: sa tu dvāparaparyante dṛṣṭvā lokān suduḥkhitān /
GE07hv_conpu:6667: jahīhi nidrāṃ sahajāṃ bhuktapūrvām iva srajam /
GE07hv_conpu:6668: ime te brahmaṇā sārdhaṃ devā darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_40.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:6672: śṛṇu viṣṇo śubhāṃ vācaṃ bhūvyomāgnyanilāmbhasām // HV_40.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:6673: ime tvā sapta munayaḥ sahitā munimaṇḍalaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6674: stuvanti deva divyābhir geyābhir gīrbhir añjasā // HV_40.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:6676: kāraṇaṃ kiṃcid utpannaṃ devānāṃ kāryagauravāt // HV_40.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:6679: tvayi supte jagat suptaṃ tvayi jāgrati jāgṛtam || *HV_40.41*537:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:6681: kiṃ tvaṃ svapiṣi govinda naṣṭe jagati sāṃpratam |
GE07hv_conpu:6684: sa saṃkṣipya jagat sarvaṃ timiraughaṃ vidārayan /
GE07hv_conpu:6685: udatiṣṭhad dhṛṣīkeśaḥ śriyā paramayā jvalan // HV_40.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:6686: sa dadarśa surān sarvān sametān sapitāmahān /
GE07hv_conpu:6690: kuto vo vigraho devāḥ kuto vo bhayam āgatam /
GE07hv_conpu:6691: kasya vā kena vā kāryaṃ kiṃ vā mayi na vartate // HV_40.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:6692: na khalv akuśalaṃ loke vartate dānavotthitam /
GE07hv_conpu:6693: nṛṇām āyāsajananaṃ śīghram icchāmi veditum // HV_40.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:6695: śivāya bhavatām arthe sthitaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi vaḥ // HV_40.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:6697: [h: HV (CE) chapter 41, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of September 12, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:6700: uvāca paramaṃ vākyaṃ hitaṃ sarvadivaukasām // HV_41.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:6701: nāsti kiṃcid bhayaṃ viṣṇo surāṇām asurāntaka /
GE07hv_conpu:6702: yeṣāṃ bhavān abhayadaḥ karṇadhāro raṇe raṇe // HV_41.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:6704: dharme prayatamānānāṃ mānavānāṃ kuto bhayam // HV_41.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:6705: satye dharme ca niratā mānavā vigatajvarāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6707: mānavānāṃ ca patayaḥ pārthivāś ca parasparam /
GE07hv_conpu:6708: ṣaḍbhāgam upayuñjānā na bhedaṃ kurvate mithaḥ // HV_41.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:6710: akarair viprayuktārthāḥ kośam āpūrayan sadā // HV_41.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6712: atīkṣṇad aṇḍāś caturo varṇāñ jugupur añjasā // HV_41.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:6716: yajanti ca yathākālaṃ yajñair vipuladakṣiṇaiḥ // HV_41.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6718: śrāddhaiś ca medhyaiḥ śataśas tarpayanti pitāmahān // HV_41.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6719: naiṣām aviditaṃ kiṃcit trividhaṃ bhuvi vidyate /
GE07hv_conpu:6720: vaidikaṃ laukikaṃ caiva dharmaśāstroktam eva ca // HV_41.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:6722: bhūyaḥ kṛtayugaṃ kartum utsahante narādhipāḥ // HV_41.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:6723: teṣām eva prabhāvena śivaṃ varṣati vāsavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6724: yathārthaṃ ca vavur vātā virajaskā diśo daśa // HV_41.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6728: nirutpātā ca vasudhā supracārāś ca vai grahāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6729: candramāś ca sanakṣatraḥ saumyaṃ carati yogataḥ // HV_41.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:6730: anulomakaraḥ sūryo ayane dve cacāra ha /
GE07hv_conpu:6731: havyaiś ca vividhais tṛptaḥ śubhagandho hutāśanaḥ // HV_41.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:6733: tarpayatsu mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ nṛṇāṃ kālabhayaṃ kutaḥ // HV_41.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:6735: rājñāṃ balair balavatāṃ pīḍyate vasudhātalam // HV_41.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:6737: pṛthivī samanuprāptā naur ivāsann aviplavā // HV_41.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:6739: jalotpīḍākulā svedaṃ darśayantī muhur muhuḥ // HV_41.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:6740: kṣatriyāṇāṃ vapurbhiś ca tejasā ca balena ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6741: nṛṇāṃ ca rāṣṭrair vistīrṇaiḥ śrāmyatīva vasuṃdharā // HV_41.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:6744: tac chṛṇuṣva mahābāho rahasyam idam uttamam |
GE07hv_conpu:6745: pure pure narapatiḥ koṭisaṃkhyair balair vṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6746: rāṣṭre rāṣṭre ca bahavo grāmāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // HV_41.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:6747: bhūmipānāṃ sahasraiś ca teṣāṃ ca balināṃ balaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6748: grāmāyutāḍhyai rāṣṭraiś ca bhūmir nirvivarīkṛtā // HV_41.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:6749: seyaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ kṛtvā niśceṣṭaṃ kālam agrataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6750: prāptā mamālayaṃ viṣṇo bhavāṃś cāsyāḥ parā gatiḥ // HV_41.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:6751: karmabhūmir ihasthānāṃ bhūmir eṣā vyathāṃ gatā /
GE07hv_conpu:6752: yathā na sīdet tatkāryaṃ jagaty eṣā hi śāśvatī // HV_41.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:6753: asyā hi pīḍane doṣo mahān syān madhusūdana /
GE07hv_conpu:6754: kriyālopaś ca lokānāṃ dūṣitaṃ ca jagad bhavet // HV_41.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6756: sahajāṃ yā kṣamāṃ tyaktvā calatvam acalā gatā // HV_41.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:6757: tad asyāḥ śrutavantaḥ sma tac cāpi bhavatā śrutam /
GE07hv_conpu:6758: bhārāvataraṇārthaṃ hi mantrayāmas tvayā saha // HV_41.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:6759: satpathe hi sthitāḥ sarve rājāno rāṣṭravardhanāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6760: narāṇāṃ ca trayo varṇā brāhmaṇān anuyāyinaḥ // HV_41.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:6761: sarvaṃ satyamayaṃ vākyaṃ varṇā dharmaparās tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:6762: sarve vedaparā viprāḥ sarve vipraparā narāḥ // HV_41.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:6764: yathā dharmavadho na syāt tathā mantraḥ pravartatām // HV_41.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:6765: satāṃ gatir iyaṃ nānyā dharmaś cāsyāḥ susādhanam /
GE07hv_conpu:6766: rājñāṃ caiva vadhaḥ kāryo dharaṇyā bhāranirṇaye // HV_41.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:6773: [h: HV (CE) chapter 42, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of July 30, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:6775: bāḍham ity eva saha tair durdināmbhodanisvanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6778: sa jatāmaṇḍalaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ bibhrat kṛṣṇavapur hariḥ // HV_42.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:6781: pīte vasāno vasane lokānāṃ gurur avyayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6782: hariḥ so 'bhavad ālakṣyaḥ sasaṃdhyābhra ivācalaḥ // HV_42.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:6786: dadṛśur devatās tatra svāṃ sabhāṃ kāmarūpiṇīm // HV_42.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:6792: [k: D2 ins., D5 ins. line 1 after 9: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6797: yathānideśaṃ tridaśā viviśus te sabhāṃ śubhām // HV_42.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6798: te niṣedur yathokteṣu vimāneṣv āsaneṣu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6799: bhadrāsaneṣu pīṭheṣu kuthāsv āstaraṇeṣu ca // HV_42.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:6800: tataḥ prabhañjano vāyur brahmaṇā sādhu coditaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6801: mā śabda iti sarvatra pracakrāma sabhāṃ śubhām // HV_42.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:6803: babhāṣe dharaṇī vākyaṃ svedāt karuṇabhāṣiṇī // HV_42.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6804: [k: K1.3 Ñ2.3 V B2 Dn D2.3.5 T3 ins., B1 after 34ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6806: tvayā dhāryā tv ahaṃ deva tvayā vai dhāryate jagat |
GE07hv_conpu:6807: tvaṃ dhārayasi bhūtāni bhuvanaṃ tvaṃ bibharṣi ca || *HV_42.13*542:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:6808: yat tvayā dhāryate kiṃcit tejasā ca balena ca |
GE07hv_conpu:6809: tatas tava prasādena mayā paścāt tu dhāryate || *HV_42.13*542:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:6810: tvayā dhṛtaṃ dhārayāmi nādhṛtaṃ dhārayāmy aham |
GE07hv_conpu:6811: na hi tad vidyate bhūtaṃ yat tvayā nānudhāryate || *HV_42.13*542:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:6812: tvam eva kuruṣe deva nārāyaṇa yuge yuge |
GE07hv_conpu:6815: trāyasva māṃ suraśreṣṭha tavaiva śaraṇaṃ gatām || *HV_42.13*542:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:6817: tvām eva śaraṇaṃ nityam upayāsye sanātanam || *HV_42.13*542:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:6818: tāvan me 'sti bhayaṃ bhūyo yāvan na tvāṃ kakudminam |
GE07hv_conpu:6819: śaraṇaṃ yāmi manasā śataśo hy upalakṣaye |
GE07hv_conpu:6821: māṃ ca badhvā kṛtau pūrvaṃ mṛṅmayau dvau mahāsurau // HV_42.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:6822: karṇasrotodbhavau tau hi viṣṇor asya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6824: tau viveśa svayaṃ vāyur brahmaṇā sādhu coditaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6825: tau divaṃ chādayantau tu vavṛdhāte mahāsurau // HV_42.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:6826: vāyuprāṇau tu tau gṛhya brahmā parimṛśyañ śanaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6827: ekaṃ mṛdutaraṃ mene kaṭhinaṃ veda cāparam // HV_42.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:6828: nāmanī tu tayoś cakre sa vibhuḥ salilodbhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6829: mṛdus tv ayaṃ madhur nāma kaṭhinaḥ kaiṭabho 'bhavat // HV_42.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:6831: sarvam ekārṇavaṃ lokaṃ yoddhukāmau sunirbhayau // HV_42.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:6835: rocayām āsa vasatiṃ guhyāṃ brahmā caturmukhaḥ // HV_42.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:6837: bahūn varṣagaṇān apsu śayānau na cakampatuḥ // HV_42.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:6838: atha dīrghasya kālasya tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau /
GE07hv_conpu:6839: ājagmatus tam uddeśaṃ yatra brahmā vyavasthitaḥ // HV_42.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:6840: dṛṣṭvā tāv asurau ghorau mahāntau yuddhadurmadau /
GE07hv_conpu:6841: [k: K2 Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D2.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:6842: brahmaṇā tāḍito viṣṇuḥ padmanālena vai purā |
GE07hv_conpu:6844: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ tayos tasya ca vai tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:6845: ekārṇave tadā loke trailokye jalatāṃ gate // HV_42.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6846: tad abhūt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ varṣasaṃkhyāḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6847: na ca tāv asurau yuddhe tadā śramam avāpatuḥ // HV_42.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:6848: atha dīrghasya kālasya tau daityau yuddhadurmadau /
GE07hv_conpu:6849: ūcatuḥ prītamanasau devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ hariṃ // HV_42.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:6850: prītau svas tava yuddhena ślāghyas tvaṃ mṛtyur āhave /
GE07hv_conpu:6851: āvāṃ jahi na yatrorvī jalena samabhiplutā // HV_42.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:6852: hatau ca tava putratvaṃ prāpnuyāvaḥ surottama /
GE07hv_conpu:6853: so hy āvāṃ yudhi nirjetā tasyāvāṃ vihitau sutau // HV_42.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:6854: sa hi gṛhya mṛdhe daityau dorbhyāṃ tau samapīḍayat /
GE07hv_conpu:6855: janmatur nidhanaṃ cāpi tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau // HV_42.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:6856: tāv ubhāv āplutau toye vapurbhyām ekatāṃ gatau /
GE07hv_conpu:6857: medo mumucatur daityau mathyamānau jalormibhiḥ // HV_42.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:6858: medasā tajjalaṃ vyāptaṃ tābhyāṃ antardadhe tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:6859: nārāyaṇaś ca bhagavān asṛjat sa punaḥ prajāḥ // HV_42.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:6860: daityayor medasā channā medinīti tataḥ smṛtā /
GE07hv_conpu:6861: prabhāvāt padmanābhasya śāśvatī ca nṛṇāṃ kṛtā // HV_42.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:6864: hṛtāhaṃ kramatā bhūyas tadā yuṣmākam agrataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6865: baleḥ sakāśād daityasya viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // HV_42.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:6867: anāthā jagato nāthaṃ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā // HV_42.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:6868: agniḥ suvarṇasya gurur gavāṃ sūryo guruḥ smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6869: akṣatrāṇāṃ guruḥ somo mama nārāyaṇo guruḥ // HV_42.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:6871: mayā dhṛtaṃ dhārayate sarvam etad gadādharaḥ // HV_42.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:6875: bhārgaveṇa pituḥ śrāddhe kaśyapāya niveditā // HV_42.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:6878: sa māṃ brahmarṣir apy āha kim urvi tvam avāṅmukhī /
GE07hv_conpu:6881: patayo me hatā brahman bhārgaveṇa mahātmanā // HV_42.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:6883: vidhavā śūnyanagarā na dhārayitum utsahe // HV_42.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:6884: tan mahyaṃ dīyatāṃ bhartā bhagavaṃs tvatsamo nṛpaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6885: rakṣet sagrāmanagarāṃ yo māṃ sāgaramālinīm // HV_42.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:6886: sa śrutvā bhagavān vākyaṃ bāḍham ity abravīt prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6887: tato māṃ mānavendrāya manave saṃprayacchata // HV_42.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:6889: vipulenāsmi kālena pārthivāt pārthivaṃ gatā // HV_42.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:6892: bahavaḥ kṣatriyāḥ śūrā māṃ jitvā divam āśritāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6893: te sma kālavaśaṃ prāpya mayy eva pralayaṃ gatāḥ // HV_42.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:6894: matkṛte vigrahā loke vṛtte vartanta eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6897: jagaddhitārthaṃ kuruta rājñāṃ hetuṃ raṇakṣaye // HV_42.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:6899: ekaś cakradharaḥ śrīmān abhayaṃ me prayacchatu // HV_42.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:6901: bhāro yady avaroptavyo viṣṇur eṣa bravītu mām // HV_42.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:6904: mā bhair dharaṇi kalyāṇi śāntiṃ vraja samāhite |
GE07hv_conpu:6905: eṣa tvām ucitaṃ sthānaṃ sthāpayāmi vasiṃdhare |
GE07hv_conpu:6909: [h: HV (CE) chapter 43, transliterated and proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_conpu:6912: te śrutvā pṛthivīvākyaṃ sarva eva divaukasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6915: śarīrakartā lokānāṃ tvaṃ hi lokasya ceśvaraḥ // HV_43.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:6916: yat kartavyaṃ mahendreṇa yamena varuṇena ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6917: yad vā kāryaṃ dhaneśena svayaṃ nārāyaṇena vā // HV_43.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:6918: yad vā candramasā kāryaṃ bhāskareṇānilena vā /
GE07hv_conpu:6919: ādityair vasubhir vāpi rudrair vā lokabhāvanaiḥ // HV_43.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:6920: aśvibhyāṃ vā surāgryābhyāṃ sādhyair vā tridivālayaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6922: marudbhir vā suraśreṣṭhaiḥ pāvakenāpi ca prabho |
GE07hv_conpu:6923: bṛhaspatyuśanobhyāṃ vā kālena kalināpi vā // HV_43.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:6924: maheśvareṇa vā brahman viśākhena guhena vā /
GE07hv_conpu:6926: parvataiḥ śailamukhyair vā sāgarair vā mahormibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6927: gaṅgāmukhābhir divyābhiḥ saridbhir vā sureśvara // HV_43.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:6928: kṣipram ājñāpaya vibho katham aṃśaḥ prayujyatām /
GE07hv_conpu:6929: yadi te pārthivaṃ kāryaṃ kāryaṃ pārthivavigrahe // HV_43.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:6931: antarikṣagatā ye ca pṛthivyāṃ ye ca pārthivāḥ // HV_43.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:6932: sadasyānāṃ ca viprāṇāṃ pārthivānāṃ kuleṣu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:6933: ayonijāś cāpi tanūḥ sṛjāma jagatītale // HV_43.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:6935: devaiḥ parivṛtaḥ prāha vākyaṃ lokapitāmahaḥ // HV_43.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:6936: rocate me suraśreṣṭhā yuṣmākam api niścayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6939: bhāvayanto bhuvaṃ devīṃ labdhvā tribhuvanaśriyam // HV_43.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:6940: pārthive bhārate vaṃśe pūrvam eva vijānatā /
GE07hv_conpu:6941: pṛthivyāṃ saṃbhavam imaṃ śrūyatāṃ yan mayā kṛtam // HV_43.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:6942: samudre 'haṃ surāḥ pūrve velām āsādya paścimām /
GE07hv_conpu:6943: āse sārdhaṃ tanūjena kaśyapena mahātmanā // HV_43.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:6945: itivṛttaiś ca bahubhiḥ purāṇaprabhavair guṇaiḥ // HV_43.16 //
