GE07hv_conpu:6948: kurvatas tu kathās tās tāḥ samudraḥ saha gaṅgayā /
GE07hv_conpu:6954: sa māṃ paribhavann eva svāṃ velāṃ samatikraman /
GE07hv_conpu:6955: kledayām āsa capalair lāvaṇair ambuvisravaiḥ // HV_43.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:6956: taṃ ca deśaṃ vyavasitaḥ samudro 'dbhir vimarditum /
GE07hv_conpu:6957: uktaḥ saṃrabdhayā vācā śānto 'sīti tato mayā // HV_43.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:6958: śānto 'sīty uktamātras tu tanutvaṃ sāgaro gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6960: bhūyaś caiva mayā śaptaḥ samudraḥ saha gaṅgayā /
GE07hv_conpu:6961: sakāraṇāṃ matiṃ kṛtvā yuṣmākaṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_43.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:6963: gacchārṇava mahīpālo rājaiva tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi // HV_43.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:6964: tatrāpi sahajāṃ līlāṃ dhārayan svena tejasā /
GE07hv_conpu:6965: bhaviṣyasi nṛṇāṃ bhartā bhāratānāṃ kulodvahaḥ // HV_43.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:6966: śānto 'sīti mayoktas tvaṃ yac cāsi tanutāṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6967: sutanur yaśasā loke śaṃtanus tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi // HV_43.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:6970: iyam apy āgatā gaṅgā tavārthe varavarṇinī |
GE07hv_conpu:6971: rūpiṇī vai saric chreṣṭhā tatra tvām upayāsyati // HV_43.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:6972: evam uktas tu māṃ kruddhaḥ so 'bhigamyāṛṇavo 'bravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:6973: māṃ prabho devadeveśa kimarthaṃ śaptavān asi // HV_43.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:6975: aśapo 'sadṛśair vākyair ātmajaṃ māṃ kim ātmanā // HV_43.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:6977: yady ahaṃ calito brahman ko 'tra doṣo mamātmanaḥ // HV_43.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:6978: kṣiptābhiḥ pavanenādbhiḥ spṛṣṭo yady asi parvaṇi /
GE07hv_conpu:6979: atra me bhagavan kiṃ nu vidyate śāpakāraṇam // HV_43.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:6980: uddhūtaiś ca mahāvātaiḥ pravṛddhaiś ca balāhakaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:6981: parvaṇā cenduyuktena tribhiḥ kṣubdho 'smi kāraṇaiḥ // HV_43.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:6983: kṣantum arhasi me brahmañ śāpo 'yaṃ vinivartyatām // HV_43.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:6984: evaṃ mayi nirālambe śāpāc chithilatāṃ gate /
GE07hv_conpu:6985: kāruṇyaṃ kuru deveśa pramāṇaṃ yady avekṣase // HV_43.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:6986: asyāś ca deva gaṅgāyā gāṃ gatāyās tavājñayā /
GE07hv_conpu:6987: maddoṣāt samadoṣāyāḥ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // HV_43.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:6989: prasādaṃ kuru me brahman vidyate śāpakāraṇam |
GE07hv_conpu:6990: tam ahaṃ ślakṣṇayā vācā mahārṇavam athābruvam /
GE07hv_conpu:6992: śāntiṃ vraja na bhetavyaṃ prasanno 'smi mahāmate /
GE07hv_conpu:6993: śāpe 'smin saritāṃ nātha bhaviṣyaṃ śṛṇu kāraṇam // HV_43.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:6994: tvaṃ gaccha bhārate vaṃśe svadehaṃ svena tejasā /
GE07hv_conpu:6995: ādhatsva saritāṃ nātha tyaktvemāṃ sāgarīṃ tanum // HV_43.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:6997: pālayaṃś caturo varṇān raṃsyase salileśvara // HV_43.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:6998: iyaṃ ca tvāṃ saric chreṣṭhā bibhratī mānuṣīṃ tanum /
GE07hv_conpu:7003: prājāpatyena vidhinā gaṅgayā saha sāgara // HV_43.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:7004: vasavaḥ pracyutāḥ svargāt praviṣṭāś ca rasātalam /
GE07hv_conpu:7005: teṣām utpādanārthāya tvaṃ mayā viniyojitaḥ // HV_43.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:7006: aṣṭau tāñ jāhnavīgarbhān apatyārthaṃ dadāmy aham /
GE07hv_conpu:7008: utpādya tvaṃ vasūñ śīghraṃ kṛtvā kurukulaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:7009: praveṣṭāsi tanuṃ tyaktvā punaḥ sāgara sāgarīm // HV_43.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:7010: evam etan mayā pūrvaṃ hitārthaṃ vaḥ surottamāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7011: bhaviṣyaṃ paśyatā bhāraṃ pṛthivyāḥ pārthivātmakam // HV_43.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:7012: tad eṣa śaṃtanor vaṃśaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ropito mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:7013: vasavo yatra gaṅgāyāṃ utpannās tridivaukasaḥ // HV_43.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:7014: adyāpi bhuvi gāṅgeyas tatraiva vasur aṣṭamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7015: sapteme vasavaḥ prāptāḥ sa ekaḥ parilambate // HV_43.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:7016: dvitīyāyāṃ striyāṃ sṛṣṭā dvitīyā śaṃtanos tanuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7017: vicitravīryo dyutimān āsīd rājā pratāpavān // HV_43.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:7018: vaicitravīryau dvāv eva pārthivau bhuvi sāṃpratam /
GE07hv_conpu:7019: pāṇḍuś ca dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca vikhyātau puruṣarṣabhau // HV_43.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:7020: tatra pāṇḍoḥ śriyā juṣṭe dve bhārye yauvanasthite /
GE07hv_conpu:7021: śubhe kuntī ca mādrī ca devayoṣopame bhuvi // HV_43.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:7023: gāndhārī bhuvi vikhyātā bhartur nityaṃ vrate sthitā // HV_43.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:7024: atra vo 'ṃśā vibhajyantāṃ vipakṣaḥ pakṣa eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:7025: putrāṇāṃ hi tayo rājñor bhavitā vigraho mahān // HV_43.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:7026: teṣāṃ vimarde dāyādye nṛpāṇāṃ bhavitā kṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7027: yugāntapratimaṃ caiva bhaviṣyati mahad bhayam // HV_43.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:7031: kṣayaṃ yāsyanti śastreṇa pārthivāḥ saha vāhanaiḥ // HV_43.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:7035: samāptam idam ākhyāsye tṛtīyaṃ dvāparaṃ yugam // HV_43.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:7037: tiṣyaṃ prapatsyate paścād yugaṃ dāruṇamānuṣam // HV_43.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:7040: maheśvaraṃ kumāraṃ ca dvau ca devau samāśritāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7041: bhaviṣyanti narāḥ sarve loke nasthavirāyuṣaḥ // HV_43.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:7042: tad eṣa nirṇayaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ pārthivāntakaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7043: aṃśāvataraṇaṃ sarve surāḥ kuruta māciram // HV_43.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:7044: dharmasyāṃśo 'tha kuntyāṃ vai mādryāṃ ca viniyujyatām /
GE07hv_conpu:7045: vigrahasya kalir mūlaṃ gāndhāryāṃ viniyujyatām // HV_43.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:7048: gacchatv iyaṃ vasumatī svāṃ yoniṃ lokadhāriṇī /
GE07hv_conpu:7049: sṛṣṭo 'yaṃ naiṣṭhiko rājñām upāyo lokaviśrutaḥ // HV_43.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:7051: pṛthivī saha kālena vadhāya pṛthivīkṣitām // HV_43.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:7053: naraṃ caiva purāṇarṣiṃ śeṣaṃ ca dharaṇīdharam // HV_43.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:7055: varuṇaṃ ca yamaṃ caiva sūryācandramasau tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:7058: yathā te kathitaṃ pūrvam aṃśāvataraṇaṃ mayā // HV_43.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:7059: ayonijā yonijāś ca te devāḥ pṛthivītale /
GE07hv_conpu:7066: kuruvaṃśe ca devās te pāñcāleṣu ca pārthivāḥ // HV_43.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:7069: [k: K2-4 Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D1.3-5 T G1-3.5 M ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7071: ācālayeyuḥ śailāṃs te kruddhā bhindyur mahītalam /
GE07hv_conpu:7074: nārāyaṇe samāveśya lokāñ śāntim upāgamat // HV_43.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:7075: bhūyaḥ śṛṇu yathā viṣṇur avatīrṇo mahītalam /
GE07hv_conpu:7076: prajānāṃ vai hitārthāya prabhuḥ prāṇadhaneśvaraḥ // HV_43.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:7078: kule pūjye yaśaskāmo jajñe nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_43.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:7080: [h: HV (CE) chapter 44, transliterated and proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_conpu:7083: kṛtakārye gate kāle jagatyāṃ ca yathānayam /
GE07hv_conpu:7084: aṃśāvataraṇe vṛtte surāṇāṃ bhārate kule // HV_44.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:7086: aśvinor devabhiṣajor bhāge vai bhāskarasya ca // HV_44.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:7088: vasūnām aṣṭame bhāge prāg eva dharaṇīṃ gate // HV_44.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:7089: mṛtyor bhāge kṣitigate kaler bhāge tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:7090: bhāge somasya vahneś ca varuṇasya ca gāṃ gate // HV_44.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:7091: śaṃkarasya gate bhāge viśveṣāṃ ca divaukasām /
GE07hv_conpu:7095: varuṇasya gate tv aṃśe pṛthivīṃ janamejaya |
GE07hv_conpu:7101: vīṇāṃ gṛhītvā mahatīṃ kakṣāsaktāṃ sakhīm iva // HV_44.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:7103: daṇḍī kamaṇḍaludharaḥ sākṣāc chakra ivāparaḥ // HV_44.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:7109: gātā caturṇāṃ vedānām udgātā prathamartvijām // HV_44.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:7114: sthito devasabhāmadhye saṃrabdho viṣṇum abravīt // HV_44.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:7116: svaraiś ca saptabhir viṣṇuṃ jagau vipraḥ sa nāradaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7117: ṣaḍjaṃ prathamam āvidhya ṛṣabhaṃ ca tataḥ param || *HV_44.12*554:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7119: pañcamaṃ ca tataḥ kurvan niṣādaṃ tadanantaram || *HV_44.12*554:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:7120: kākalīṃ ca vimātrāṃ tu tato dve ca śrutī prabho |
GE07hv_conpu:7121: tisras tisras tathā rājaṃl layaiś ca saha sarvaśaḥ || *HV_44.12*554:6
GE07hv_conpu:7123: taiś cāpi saptabhir vācyaṃ vācakaiś cāpi sarvaśaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7125: etaiḥ saptabhir ādyeśaṃ vicinvan prabhavaṃ tathā |
GE07hv_conpu:7126: evaṃ samāpya geyaṃ tu vākyam etad uvāca ha |
GE07hv_conpu:7127: aṃśāvataraṇaṃ viṣṇo yad idaṃ tridaśaiḥ kṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:7128: kṣayāya pṛthivīndrāṇāṃ sarvam etad akāraṇam // HV_44.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:7129: yad etat pārthivaṃ kṣatraṃ sthitaṃ tvayi vidhīśvara /
GE07hv_conpu:7131: na yuktaṃ jānatā deva tvayā tattvārthadarśinā /
GE07hv_conpu:7132: devadeva pṛthivyarthe prayoktuṃ kāryam īdṛśam // HV_44.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:7133: tvaṃ hi cakṣuṣmatāṃ cakṣuḥ ślāghyaḥ prabhavatāṃ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7134: śreṣṭho yogavatāṃ yogī gatir gatimatām api // HV_44.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:7135: devabhāgān gatān dṛṣṭvā kiṃ tvaṃ sarvāgrago vibhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7136: vasuṃdharāyāḥ sāhyārtham aṃśaṃ svaṃ nānuyuñjase // HV_44.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:7138: jagatyāṃ saṃtariṣyanti kāryāt kāryāntaraṃ gatāḥ // HV_44.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:7139: tad ahaṃ tvarayā viṣṇo prāptaḥ surasabhām imām /
GE07hv_conpu:7140: tava saṃcodanārthaṃ vai śṛṇu cāpy atra kāraṇam // HV_44.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:7141: ye tvayā nihatā daityāḥ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye /
GE07hv_conpu:7142: teṣāṃ śṛṇu gatiṃ viṣṇo ye gatāḥ pṛthivītalam // HV_44.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:7143: pūḥ pṛthivyāṃ samuditā mathurā nāma nāmataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7145: madhur nāma mahān āsīd dānavo yudhi durjayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7147: ghoraṃ madhuvanaṃ nāma yatrāsau nyavasat tadā // HV_44.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:7148: tasya putro mahān āsīl lavaṇo nāma dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7151: trāsanaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ bale mahati tasthivān // HV_44.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:7152: sa tatra dānavaḥ krīḍan varṣapūgān anekaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7155: rājyaṃ śāsati dharmajñe rākṣasānāṃ bhayāvahe // HV_44.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:7156: sa dānavo balaślāghī ghoraṃ vanam upāśritaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7157: preṣayām āsa rāmāya dūtaṃ paruṣavādinam // HV_44.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:7158: viṣayāsannabhūto 'smi tava rāma ripuś ca saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7159: na ca sāmantam icchanti rājāno baladarpitam // HV_44.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:7161: jetavyā ripavaḥ sarve sphītaṃ viṣayam icchatā // HV_44.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:7163: jetavyānīndriyāṇy ādau taj jaye hi dhruvo jayaḥ // HV_44.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:7165: nayānām upadeśena nāsti lokasamo guruḥ // HV_44.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:7167: balajyeṣṭhasya nṛpater nāsti sāmantajaṃ bhayam // HV_44.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:7169: amitrāṇāṃ priyakarair mohair adhṛtir īśvaraḥ // HV_44.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:7170: yat tvayā strīkṛte mohāt sabalo rāvaṇo hataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7171: naitad aupayikaṃ manye mahat te karma kutsitam // HV_44.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:7173: prahṛtaṃ rākṣase nīce naiṣa dṛṣṭaḥ satāṃ vidhiḥ // HV_44.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:7174: satām akrodhajo dharmaḥ śubhāṃ nayati sadgatim /
GE07hv_conpu:7175: yat tvayā nihato mohād dūṣitāś ca vanaukasaḥ // HV_44.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:7176: sa eva rāvaṇo dhanyo yas tvayā vratacāriṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:7177: strīnimittaṃ hato yuddhe grāmyān dharmān avekṣatā // HV_44.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:7178: yadi te sa hataḥ saṃkhye durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7179: yudhyasvādya mayā sārdhaṃ mṛdhe yady asi vīryavān // HV_44.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:7180: tasya dūtasya tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tattvavādinaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7182: asad etat tvayā dūta kathitaṃ tasya gauravāt /
GE07hv_conpu:7183: yan māṃ kṣipasi doṣeṇa vedātmānaṃ ca susthiram // HV_44.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:7184: yady ahaṃ satpathe mūḍho yadi vā rāvaṇo hataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7185: yadi vā me hṛtā bhāryā tasya kā paridevanā // HV_44.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:7186: na vāṅmātreṇa duṣyanti sādhavaḥ satpathe sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7187: jāgarti ca yathā daivaṃ sadā satsv itareṣu ca // HV_44.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:7188: kṛtaṃ dūtena yat kāryaṃ gaccha tvaṃ dūta māciram /
GE07hv_conpu:7191: tasya daityasya durbuddhe mṛdhe pratikariṣyati // HV_44.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:7192: evam uktaḥ sa dūtas tu yayau saumitriṇā saha /
GE07hv_conpu:7194: sa śīghrayānaḥ saṃprāptas tad dānavavanaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:7195: cakre niveśaṃ saumitrir vanānte yuddhalālasaḥ // HV_44.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:7196: tato dūtasya vacanāt sa daityaḥ krodhamūrcchitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7197: jaghane tad vanaṃ kṛtvā yuddhāyābhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ // HV_44.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:7198: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ saumitrer dānavasya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:7199: ubhayor eva dhṛtayoḥ śūrayo raṇamūrdhani // HV_44.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:7201: na ca tau yuddhavaimukhyaṃ śramaṃ vāpy upajagmatuḥ // HV_44.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:7202: atha saumitriṇā bāṇaiḥ pīḍito dānavo yudhi /
GE07hv_conpu:7203: tataḥ sa śūlarahitaḥ paryahīyata dānavaḥ // HV_44.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:7205: sa gṛhītvāṅkuśaṃ caiva devair dattavaraṃ raṇe |
GE07hv_conpu:7210: śiraś ciccheda khaḍgena lavaṇasya mahāmṛdhe // HV_44.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:7211: [k: For 50cd, Ñ2 V1.3 B1.2(marg) Ds D4.5 subst.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7212: aṅkuśaṃ caiva ciccheda daityasya ca śiro mahat |
GE07hv_conpu:7213: sa hatvā dānavaṃ saṃkhye saumitrir mitranandanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7214: tad vanaṃ tasya daityasya cicchedāstreṇa buddhimān // HV_44.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:7215: chittvā vanaṃ sa saumitrir niveśam abhirocayat /
GE07hv_conpu:7216: bhavāya tasya deśasya purīṃ paramadharmavit // HV_44.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:7217: tasmin madhuvanasthāne mathurā nāma sā purī /
GE07hv_conpu:7218: śatrughnena purā sṛṣṭā hatvā taṃ dānavaṃ raṇe // HV_44.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:7228: kṣetrāṇi rasavanty asyāḥ kāle devaś ca varṣati // HV_44.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:7233: yamunāyās taṭe ramye mathurā nāma viśrutā |
GE07hv_conpu:7235: niviṣṭo viṣayaś caiva śūrasenas tato 'bhavat // HV_44.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:7238: tasya putratvam āpanno yo 'sauviṣṇo tvayā hataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7243: bhayadaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ satpathād bāhyatāṃ gataḥ // HV_44.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:7245: yuktas tenaiva darpeṇa prajānāṃ lomaharṣaṇaḥ // HV_44.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:7248: sa kaṃsas tatra saṃbhūtas tvayā yuddhe parājitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7250: sa badhvā pitaraṃ rājā mathurām abhyarakṣata |
GE07hv_conpu:7252: yo 'py asau hayavikrānto hayagrīva iti smṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7253: keśī nāma hayo jātaḥ sa tasyaiva jaghanyajaḥ // HV_44.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:7255: vṛndāvane vasaty eko nṛṇāṃ māṃsāni bhakṣayan // HV_44.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:7257: gavām aritvam āpannaḥ kāmarūpī mahāsuraḥ // HV_44.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:7258: riṣṭo nāma diteḥ putro variṣṭho dānaveṣu yaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7259: sa kuñjaratvam āpanno daityaḥ kaṃsasya vāhanaḥ // HV_44.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:7260: [k: For 70cd, K2-4 ÑV BD (D6 om.) T3.4 subst.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7261: kuñjaratvam agād daityaḥ kaṃsasyaiva sa vāhanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7263: pralambo nāma bhūtvāsau vaṭaṃ bhāṇḍīram āśritaḥ // HV_44.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:7265: śikharo nāma balavān ya āsīd dānavarṣabhaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7266: khara ity ucyate daityo dhenukaḥ so 'surottamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7267: ghoraṃ tālavanaṃ daityaś caraty utsārayan prajāḥ // HV_44.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:7268: varāhaś ca kiśoraś ca tāv ubhau dānavottamau /
GE07hv_conpu:7269: mallau raṅgagatau tau tu jātau cāṇūramuṣṭikau // HV_44.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:7270: yau tau mayaś ca tāraś ca dānavau dānavāntaka /
GE07hv_conpu:7271: prāgjyotiṣe tau bhaumasya narakasya pure ratau // HV_44.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:7272: ete daityā vinihatās tvayā viṣṇo nirākṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7273: mānuṣaṃ vapur āsthāya bādhante bhuvi mānavān // HV_44.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:7275: tava prasādāt teṣāṃ vai dānavānāṃ kṣayo bhavet // HV_44.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:7276: tava te divi bibhyanti tvatto bibhyanti sāgare /
GE07hv_conpu:7277: pṛthivyāṃ bibhyati tvatto nānyasya tu kathaṃcana // HV_44.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:7279: divaś cyutasya daityasya gatir bhavati medinī // HV_44.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:7281: durlabhaṃ svargagamanaṃ tvayi jāgrati keśava // HV_44.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:7282: tad āgaccha svayaṃ viṣṇo gacchāva pṛthivītalam /
GE07hv_conpu:7285: tāsu sṛṣṭās tvayā devāḥ saṃbhaviṣyanti bhūtale // HV_44.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:7287: setsyate ca sa kāryārtho yasyārthe bhūmir āgatā // HV_44.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:7288: tvaṃ bhārate kāryagurus tvaṃ cakṣus tvaṃ parāyaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7289: tad āgaccha hṛṣīkeśa kṣitau tāñ jahi dānavān // HV_44.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:7291: [h: HV (CE) chapter 45, transliterated and proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_conpu:7295: pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ vareṇyaḥ prabhur īśvaraḥ // HV_45.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:7296: trailokyasya hitārthāya yan mā vadasi nārada /
GE07hv_conpu:7297: tasya samyakpravṛttasya śrūyatām uttaraṃ vacaḥ // HV_45.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:7298: viditā dehino jātā mayaite bhuvi dānavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7299: yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ samāsthāya daityaḥ puṣyati vigraham // HV_45.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:7301: keśinaṃ cāpi jānāmi daityaṃ turagavigraham // HV_45.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:7303: ariṣṭaṃ caiva jānāmi daityaṃ vṛṣabharūpiṇam // HV_45.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:7304: vidito me kharaś caiva pralambaś ca mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7305: sā ca me viditā vipra pūtanā duhitā baleḥ // HV_45.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:7308: vidito me jarāsaṃdhaḥ sthito mūrdhni mahīkṣitām /
GE07hv_conpu:7309: prāgjyotiṣapure cāpi narakaṃ sādhu tarkaye // HV_45.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:7310: [k: Ñ2.3V BDs D4 T3.4 ins. after 8, D2 cont. after *563: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7316: [k: T1.2 G M4 cont., M1-3 ins. after 8: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7317: śiśupālaṃ ca jānāmi tau haṃsaḍimakau tathā |
GE07hv_conpu:7318: jānāmi pauṇḍraṃ sālvaṃ ca taṃ kālayavanaṃ tathā || *HV_45.8*564:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7319: ekalavyaṃ ca jānāmi ye cānye duṣṭacāriṇaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7320: tān sarvān nihaniṣyāmi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā |
GE07hv_conpu:7321: mayy āsaktāṃ ca jānāmi bhāratīṃ mahatīṃ dhuram /
GE07hv_conpu:7322: tac ca sarvaṃ vijānāmi yathā sthāsyanti te nṛpāḥ // HV_45.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:7323: kṣayo bhuvi mayā dṛṣṭaḥ śakraloke ca satkriyā /
GE07hv_conpu:7325: saṃpravekṣyāmy ahaṃ yogam ātmanaś ca parasya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:7326: saṃprāpya pārthivaṃ lokaṃ mānuṣatvam upāgataḥ // HV_45.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:7327: kaṃsādīṃś cāpi tān sarvān vadhiṣyāmi mahāsurān /
GE07hv_conpu:7328: tena tena vidhānena yena yaḥ śāntim eṣyati // HV_45.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:7329: anupraviśya yogena tās tā hi gatayo mama /
GE07hv_conpu:7330: amīṣām amarendrāṇāṃ hantavyā ripavo yudhi // HV_45.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:7333: viniścayo hi prāg eva nāradāyaṃ kṛto mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:7334: nivāsaṃ tu na me brahmā vidadhāti pitāmahaḥ // HV_45.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:7335: yatra deśe yathā jāto yena veṣeṇa vā vasan /
GE07hv_conpu:7336: tān ahaṃ samare hanyāṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha // HV_45.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:7338: nārāyaṇemaṃ siddhārtham upāyaṃ śṛṇu me vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:7339: bhuvi yas te janayitā jananī ca bhaviṣyati // HV_45.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:7340: yatra vai tvaṃ mahābāho jātaḥ kulakaro bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:7342: tāṃś cāsurān samutsādya vaṃśaṃ kṛtvātmano mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:7343: sthāpayiṣyasi maryādāṃ nṛṇāṃ tan me niśāmaya // HV_45.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:7344: purā hi kaśyapo viṣṇo varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7345: jahāra yajñiyā gāvaḥ payodāś ca mahāmakhe // HV_45.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:7346: aditiḥ surabhiś cobhe dve bhārye kaśyapasya tu /
GE07hv_conpu:7347: pradīyamānā gās tās tu naicchatāṃ varuṇasya vai // HV_45.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:7349: uvāca bhagavan gāvo guruṇā me hṛtā iti // HV_45.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:7350: kṛtakāryo hi gās tās tu nānujānāti me guruḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7351: anvavartata bhārye dve aditiṃ surabhiṃ tathā // HV_45.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:7352: mama tā hy akṣayā gāvo divyāḥ kāmadughā vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:7353: caranti sagārān sarvān rakṣitāḥ svena tejasā // HV_45.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:7354: kas tā dharṣayituṃ śakto mama gāḥ kaśyapād ṛte /
GE07hv_conpu:7355: akṣayaṃ yāḥ kṣaranty agraṃ payo devāmṛtopamam // HV_45.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:7356: prabhur vā vyutthito brahman gurur vā yadi vetaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7357: tvayā niyamyāḥ sarve vai tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ // HV_45.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:7358: yadi prabhavatāṃ daṇḍo loke kāryam ajānatām /
GE07hv_conpu:7359: na vidyate lokaguro na syur vai lokasetavaḥ // HV_45.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:7360: yathā vāstu tathā vāstu kartavye bhagavān prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7361: mama gāvaḥ pratīyantāṃ tato gantāsmi sāgaram // HV_45.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:7362: yas te 'tmā devatā gāvo yā gāvaḥ sa tvam avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:7363: lokānāṃ tvatpravṛttānām ekaṃ gobrāhmaṇaṃ smṛtam // HV_45.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:7364: trātavyāḥ prathamaṃ gāvas trātās trāyanti tā dvijān /
GE07hv_conpu:7367: gavāṃ kāraṇatattvajñaḥ kaśyape śāpam utsṛjam // HV_45.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:7369: sa tenāṃśena jagatīṃ gatvā gopatvam eṣyati // HV_45.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:7370: yā ca sā surabhir nāma yāditiś ca surāraṇiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7371: te 'py ubhe tasya vai bhārye saha tenaiva yāsyataḥ // HV_45.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:7372: [k: K1(marg.).2.3 Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D1.2.4.5 T3.4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7373: tābhyāṃ saha sa gopatve kaśyapo bhuvi raṃsyate |
GE07hv_conpu:7375: vasudeva iti khyāto goṣu tiṣṭhati bhūtale // HV_45.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:7376: girir govardhano nāma mathurāyās tv adūrataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7377: tatrāsau goṣu nirataḥ kaṃsasya karadāyakaḥ // HV_45.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:7378: tasya bhāryādvayaṃ caiva aditiḥ surabhis tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:7379: devakī rohiṇī caiva vasudevasya dhīmataḥ // HV_45.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:7381: surabhī rohiṇī devī cāditir devakī tv abhūt |
GE07hv_conpu:7383: jayāśīrvacanais tv ete vardhayanti divaukasaḥ // HV_45.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:7384: ātmānam ātmanā hi tvam avatārya mahītalam /
GE07hv_conpu:7385: devakīṃ rohiṇīṃ caiva garbhābhyāṃ paritoṣaya // HV_45.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:7387: vardhayasva mahābāho purā traivikrame yathā // HV_45.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:7390: gāś ca te rakṣato viṣṇo vanāni paridhāvataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7391: vanamālāparikṣiptaṃ dhanyā drakṣyanti te vapuḥ // HV_45.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:7396: bāle tvayi mahābāho loko bālatvam eṣyati // HV_45.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:7399: goṣu gopā bhaviṣyanti sahāyāḥ satataṃ tava |
GE07hv_conpu:7400: vane cārayato gās tu goṣṭhāṃś ca paridhāvataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7401: majjato yamunāyāṃ ca ratim āpsyanti te tvayi // HV_45.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:7403: yas tvayā tāta ity uktaḥ putra ity eva vakṣyati // HV_45.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:7405: sa hi dhanyataro loke yasya tvaṃ putratāṃ gataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7406: sa hi puṇyakṛtāṃ śreṣṭho yas tvāṃ putreti kīrtayet || *HV_45.44*569:2
GE07hv_conpu:7408: te hi puṇyakṛtāṃ śreṣṭhāḥ praṇamyāḥ sarvajantubhiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7409: atha vā kasya putratvaṃ gaccheran yatra kaśyapāt /
GE07hv_conpu:7410: kā ca dhārayituṃ śaktā viṣṇo tvām aditiṃ vinā // HV_45.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:7412: vayam apy ālayaṃ svaṃ gacchāmo madhusūdana // HV_45.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:7413: [k: T G1.2.4.5 M ins. after 46, G3 after 48ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7415: jagāma sa prabhur gehaṃ devāś cāpi yathāgatam |
GE07hv_conpu:7417: jagāma viṣṇuḥ svaṃ deśaṃ kṣīrodasyottarāṃ diśam // HV_45.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:7418: tatraiva pārvatī nāma guhā meroḥ sudurgamā /
GE07hv_conpu:7419: tribhis tasyaiva vikrāntair nityaṃ parvasu pūjitā // HV_45.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:7420: purāṇaṃ tatra vinyasya dehaṃ harir udāradhīḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7421: ātmānaṃ yojayām āsa vasudevagṛhe prabhuḥ // HV_45.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:7423: [h: HV (CE) ch. 46, transliterated by Peter Schreiner; version March 4,
GE07hv_conpu:7425: [k: Before the ref., Poona ed. ins. the introductory mantra; while
GE07hv_conpu:7431: māṃ nirāśaṃ gatakleśaṃ kurvan āśaṃ hare 'niśam |
GE07hv_conpu:7433: jñātvā viṣṇuṃ kṣitigataṃ bhāgāṃś ca tridivaukasām /
GE07hv_conpu:7434: vināśaśaṃsī kaṃsasya nārado mathurāṃ yayau // HV_46.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:7436: preṣayām āsa kaṃsasya ugrasenasutasya vai // HV_46.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:7439: sa dūtaḥ kathayām āsa muner āgamanaṃ nṛpe |
GE07hv_conpu:7440: [k: On the other hand, T1.2G MG(ed.) ins. after 2: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7442: iti śrutvā sa kaṃsasya dvārapālas tvarann iva || *HV_46.2*573:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7443: gatvā tu tvaritaṃ rājann uvāca madhureśvaram |
GE07hv_conpu:7451: niṣasādāsane tasmin sa vai śakrasakho muniḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7454: gate tv evaṃ mama vacaḥ śrūyatāṃ gṛhyatāṃ ca vai // HV_46.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:7456: evaṃ gate mahārāja śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama |
GE07hv_conpu:7458: gataḥ sūryasakhaṃ tāta vipulaṃ meruparvatam // HV_46.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:7460: āplutaṃ me sutīrthāsu saritsu saha daivataiḥ // HV_46.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:7461: divyā tridhārā dṛṣṭā me puṇyā tripathagā nadī /
GE07hv_conpu:7463: divyāṃ tripathagāṃ dṛṣṭvā puṇyāṃ bhāgirathīṃ nadīm |
GE07hv_conpu:7465: divyā tripathagā dṛṣṭā puṇyā bhāgīrathī nadī |
GE07hv_conpu:7466: [k: After 10ab, N (except Ś1 K4 Ñ1; D6 om.)T GM4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7467: smaraṇād eva sarveṣām aṃhasāṃ yā vibhedinī |
GE07hv_conpu:7468: upaspṛṣṭaṃ ca tīrtheṣu divyeṣu ca yathākramam // HV_46.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:7472: saṃgṛhya vīṇāṃ saṃsaktām agacchaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sabhām // HV_46.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:7475: tatra manatrayatām evaṃ devatānāṃ mayā śrutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7477: tatraiṣā devakī yā te mathurāyāṃ pitṛṣvasā /
GE07hv_conpu:7478: asyā garbho 'ṣṭamaḥ kaṃsa sa te mṛtyur bhaviṣyati // HV_46.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:7479: devānāṃ sa tu sarvasvaṃ tridivasya gatiś ca saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7480: paraṃ rahasyaṃ devānāṃ sa te mṛtyur bhaviṣyati // HV_46.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:7481: parato 'pi paras tv eṣāṃ svayaṃbhūś ca savayaṃbhuvām /
GE07hv_conpu:7482: tatas te tan mahad bhūtaṃ divyaṃ na kathayāmy aham // HV_46.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:7483: ślāghyaś ca sa hi te mṛtyur bhūtapūrvaś ca taṃ smara /
GE07hv_conpu:7484: yatnaś ca kriyatāṃ kaṃsa garbhasthe yadi śakyate // HV_46.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:7485: eṣā me tvadgatā prītir ityarthaṃ cāham āgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7486: bhujyantāṃ sarvakāmārthāḥ svasti te 'stu vrajāmy aham // HV_46.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:7490: ity uktvā nārade yāte tasya vākyaṃ vicintayan /
GE07hv_conpu:7491: jahāsoccais tataḥ kaṃsaḥ pakāśadaśanaś ciram // HV_46.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:7492: sasmitaṃ ceva provāca bhṛtyānām agrataḥ sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7493: hāsyaḥ khalu sa sattveṣu nārado na viśāradaḥ // HV_46.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:7494: nāhaṃ bhīṣayituṃ śakyo devair api savāsavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7495: āhavasthaḥ śayāno vā pramato matta eva vā // HV_46.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:7496: yo 'haṃ dorbhyām udārābhyāṃ kṣobhaye 'haṃ dharām imām /
GE07hv_conpu:7497: ko 'sti yo mānuṣe loke māṃ kṣobhayitum utsahet // HV_46.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:7500: ājñāpyatāṃ hayaḥ keśī pralambo dhenukas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:7501: ariṣṭo vṛṣabhaś caiva pūtanā kāliyas tathā // HV_46.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:7503: praharadhvaṃ ca sarveṣu ye 'smākaṃ pakṣadūṣakāḥ // HV_46.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:7504: garbhasthānām api gatir vijñeyā bhuvi dehinām /
GE07hv_conpu:7505: nāradena hi garbhebhyo bhayaṃ naḥ samudāhṛtam // HV_46.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:7507: māṃ ca vo nātham āśritya nāsti devakṛtaṃ bhayam // HV_46.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:7508: sa tu kelikilo vipro bhedaśīlaś ca nāradaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7509: suśliṣṭān api lokeṣu bhedayaṃl labhate ratim // HV_46.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:7511: ghaṭayāno narendrāṇāṃ tantrīvairāṇi caiva ha // HV_46.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:7512: evaṃ sa vilapann eva vāṅmātreṇa tu kevalam /
GE07hv_conpu:7513: viveśa kaṃso bhavanaṃ dahyamānena cetasā // HV_46.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:7514: [h: HV (CE) ch. 47, transliterated by Peter Schreiner; version March 4,
GE07hv_conpu:7517: so ājñāpayata saṃrabdhaḥ sacivān ātmano hitān /
GE07hv_conpu:7518: yattā bhavata sarve vai devakyā garabhakṛntane // HV_47.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:7519: prathamād eva hantavyā garbhās te sarva eva hi /
GE07hv_conpu:7520: mūlād eva hi hantavyaḥ so 'nartho yatra saṃśayaḥ // HV_47.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:7521: devakī ca gṛhe guptā pracchannair abhirakṣitā /
GE07hv_conpu:7522: svairaṃ caratu visrabdhā madbalair yatnam āsthitaiḥ // HV_47.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:7523: māsān vai puṣpamāsādīn gaṇayantu mama striyaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7524: pariṇāme tu garbhasya śeṣaṃ jñāsyāmahe vayam // HV_47.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:7526: apramattair mama hitai rātrāv ahani caiva ha /
GE07hv_conpu:7527: strībhir varṣavaraiś caiva vaktavyaṃ na ca kāraṇam // HV_47.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:7528: eṣa mānuṣako yatno mānuṣair eva sādhyate /
GE07hv_conpu:7529: śrūyatāṃ yena daivaṃ hi madvidhaiḥ pratihanyate // HV_47.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:7531: yatnena cānukūlena daivam apy anuvartate // HV_47.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:7533: bhayena mantrayām āsa śrutārtho nāradāt sa vai // HV_47.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:7540: antardhānaṃ gato viṣṇuś cintayām āsa vīryavān // HV_47.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:7542: aṣṭame ca mayā garbhe kāryam ādhānam ātmanaḥ // HV_47.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:7543: tasya cintayatas tv evaṃ pātālam agaman manaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7544: yatra te garbhaśayanāḥ ṣadgarbhā nāma dānavāḥ // HV_47.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:7546: amarapratimā yuddhe putrā vai kālaneminaḥ // HV_47.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:7547: [k: After 12, all Mss. (except Ś1 M1-3; G4 damaged) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7553: teṣāṃ prīto 'bhavad brahmā ṣadgarbhāṇāṃ varaṃ dadau /
GE07hv_conpu:7554: [k: Ñ (except Ś1) T G1.3-5 M4 G2 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7557: brūta vo yasya yaḥ kāmaḥ ko varo vaḥ pradīyatāṃ // HV_47.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:7558: te tu sarve samānārthā daityā brahmāṇam abruvan /
GE07hv_conpu:7559: yadi no bhagavān prītaḥ śrūyatāṃ no varo varaḥ // HV_47.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:7563: mā bhūd vadho no bhagavan dadāsi yadi no varam // HV_47.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:7565: bhavadbhir yad idaṃ proktaṃ sarvam etad bhaviṣyati // HV_47.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:7566: ṣaḍgarbhāṇāṃ varaṃ dasttvā svayaṃbhūs tridivaṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7567: tato hiraṇyakaśipuḥ saroṣo vākyam abravīt // HV_47.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:7568: mām utsṛjya varo yasmād vṛto vaḥ padmasaṃbhavāt /
GE07hv_conpu:7569: tasmād vas tyājitaḥ snehaḥ śatrubhūtāṃs tyajāmy aham // HV_47.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:7570: ṣaḍgarbhā iti yo yaṃ vaḥ śabdaḥ pitrābhivardhitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7571: sa eva vo garbhagatān pitā sarvān vadhiṣyati // HV_47.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:7572: ṣaḍ eva devakīgarbhāḥ ṣadgarbhā vai mahāsurāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7573: bhaviṣyanti tataḥ kaṃso garbhasthān vo vadhiṣyati // HV_47.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:7575: śaptvā caivaṃ tato daityān daityeśo roṣamūrcchitaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7577: jñātvā haris tu taṃ śāpaṃ kaṃsasya ca viniścayam |
GE07hv_conpu:7578: jagāmātha tato viṣṇuḥ pātālaṃ yatra te śurāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7580: sa dadarśa jale suptān ṣaḍgarbhān garbhasaṃsthitān /
GE07hv_conpu:7581: nidrayā kālarūpiṇyā sarvān antarhitān iva // HV_47.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:7582: svapnarūpeṇa teṣāṃ vai viṣṇur dehān athāviśat /
GE07hv_conpu:7583: prāṇeśvarāṃś ca niṣkṛṣya nidrāyai pradadau tadā // HV_47.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:7584: tāṃ covāca tadā nidrāṃ viṣṇuḥ satyaparākramaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7586: imān prāṇeśvarān gṛhya ṣaḍgarbhān nāma dehinaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7587: [k:K NV B2 Dn Ds D1.4.5 G4 ins. after 27a, D6 after 27b: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7590: ṣaṭsu garbheṣu devakyā yojayasva yathākramam // HV_47.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:7591: jāteṣv eteṣu garbheṣu nīteṣu ca yamakṣayam /
GE07hv_conpu:7592: kaṃsasya viphale yatne devakyāḥ saphale śrame // HV_47.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:7594: yena sarvasya lokasya devi devī bhavīṣyasi // HV_47.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:7599: sa saṃkrāmayitavyas te saptame māsi rohiṇīm // HV_47.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:7600: saṃkarṣaṇāt tu garbhasya sa tu saṃkarṣaṇo yuvā /
GE07hv_conpu:7601: bhaviṣyaty agrajo bhrātā mama śītāṃśudarśanaḥ // HV_47.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:7603: aṣṭame mayi garbhasthe kaṃso yatnaṃ kariṣyati // HV_47.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:7604: yā tu sā nandagopasya dayitā kaṃsagopateḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7605: yaśodā nāma bhadraṃ te bhāryā gopakulodvahā // HV_47.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:7606: tasyās tvaṃ navamo 'smākaṃ kule garbho bhaviṣyasi /
GE07hv_conpu:7607: navamyām eva saṃjāto kṛṣṇapakṣasya vai tithau // HV_47.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:7608: ahaṃ tv abhijito yoge niśāyā yauvane gate /
GE07hv_conpu:7610: aṣṭamasya tu māsasya jātāv āvāṃ tataḥ samam /
GE07hv_conpu:7611: prāpsyāvo garabhavyatyāsaṃ prāpte kaṃsasya śasane // HV_47.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:7612: ahaṃ yaśodāṃ yāsyāmi tvaṃ devi bhaja devakīm /
GE07hv_conpu:7613: āvayor garbhavyatyāse kaṃso gacchatu mūḍhatām // HV_47.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:7614: tatas tvāṃ gṛhya caraṇe śilāyāṃ nirasiṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:7617: nirasyamānā gagane sthānaṃ prāpsyasi śāśvatam // HV_47.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:7619: bibhratī vipulān bāhūn mama bāhūpamān bhuvi // HV_47.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:7620: triśikhaṃ śūlam udyamya khaḍgaṃ ca kanakatsarum /
GE07hv_conpu:7621: pātrīṃ ca pūrṇāṃ madhunaḥ paṅkajaṃ ca sunirmalam // HV_47.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:7628: [k: K Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D1-5 T3.4 subst.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7629: bhujagābhair bhujair bhīmair bhūṣayantī diśo daśa |
GE07hv_conpu:7633: aṅgajena mayūrāṇām aṅgadena ca bhāsvatā // HV_47.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:7635: kaumāraṃ vratam āsthāya atridivaṃ tvaṃ gamiṣyasi // HV_47.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:7636: tatra tvāṃ śatadṛk śakro matpradiṣṭena karmaṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:7637: abhiṣekeṇa divyena daivataiḥ saha yokṣyate // HV_47.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:7638: tatraiva tvāṃ bhaginyarthe grahiṣyati sa vāsavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7639: kuśikasya tu gotreṇa kauśikī tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi // HV_47.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:7640: sa te vindhye nagaśreṣṭhe sthānaṃ dāsyati śāśvatam /
GE07hv_conpu:7641: tataḥ sthānasahasreais tvaṃ pṛthivīṃ śobhayiṣyasi // HV_47.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:7643: tau ca kṛtvā manasi māṃ sānugau nāśayiṣyasi // HV_47.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:7647: tithau navamyāṃ pūjāṃ ca prāpsyase sapaśukriyām // HV_47.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:7648: ye ca tvāṃ matprabhāvajñāḥ praṇamiṣyanti mānavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7649: na teṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kiṃcit putrato dhanato 'pi vā // HV_47.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:7651: dasyubhir vā niruddhānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ paramā nṛṇām // HV_47.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:7652: tvaṃ siddhiḥ śrīr dhṛtiḥ kīrtir hrīr vidyā saṃnatir matiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7654: saṃdhyā lakṣmīr vapur medhā kāntiḥ śraddhā kriyā gatiḥ |

GE07hv_conpu:7676: yaś caitat paṭhate stotraṃ śṛṇuyād vāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ |

GE07hv_conpu:7678: [h: HV (CE) ch. 48, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz

GE07hv_conpu:7683: jagrāha sapta tān garbhān yathāvat samudāhṛtān // HV_48.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:7684: ṣaḍgarbhān niḥsṛtān kaṃsas tāñ jaghāna śilātale /
GE07hv_conpu:7685: āpannaṃ saptamaṃ garbhaṃ sā nināyātha rohiṇīm // HV_48.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:7688: sā svapnam iva taṃ dṛṣṭvā garbhaṃ niḥsṛtam ātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7689: apaśyantī ca taṃ garbhaṃ muhūrtaṃ vyathitābhavat // HV_48.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:7690: tām āha nidrā saṃvignāṃ naiśe tamasi rohiṇīm /
GE07hv_conpu:7691: rohiṇīm iva somasya vasudevasya rohiṇīm // HV_48.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:7693: saṃkarṣaṇo nāma śubhe tava putro bhaviṣyati // HV_48.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:7694: sā taṃ putram avāpyaiva hṛṣṭā kiṃcid avāṅmukhī /
GE07hv_conpu:7695: viveśa rohiṇī veśma suprabhā rohiṇī yathā // HV_48.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:7696: tasya garbhasya mārgeṇa garbham ādhatta devakī /
GE07hv_conpu:7697: yadarthaṃ sapta te garbhāḥ kaṃsena vinipātitāḥ // HV_48.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:7698: taṃ tu garbhaṃ prayatnena rarakṣur tasya rakṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7699: [k: D6 T G1.2.4.5 M ins. after 9ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7700: jāgrataḥ prayatāḥ sarve māsān saṃkhyāya śastriṇaḥ |

GE07hv_conpu:7702: [k: D6 T G1.2.4.5 M ins. after 9: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7703: yasminn ahani deveśaṃ garbham ādatta devakī |
GE07hv_conpu:7704: yaśodāpi samādhatta garbhaṃ tadahar eva tu /
GE07hv_conpu:7705: viṣṇoḥ śarīrajāṃ nidrāṃ viṣṇor nirdeśakāriṇīm // HV_48.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:7706: garbhakāle tv asaṃpūrṇe aṣṭame māsi te striyau /
GE07hv_conpu:7707: devakī ca yaśodā ca suṣuvāte samaṃ tadā // HV_48.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:7708: yām eva rajanīṃ kṛṣṇo jajñe vṛṣṇikule prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7709: tām eva rajanīṃ kanyāṃ yaśodāpi vyajāyata /
GE07hv_conpu:7710: nandagopasya bhāryā vai kaṃsagopasya saṃmatā // HV_48.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:7711: tulyakālaṃ hi garbhiṇyau yaśodā devakī tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:7712: [k: After 13ab, D6 T2 G1.3-5 M4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7714: rohiṇyām ardharātre ca sudhāṃśor udaye tathā |
GE07hv_conpu:7715: devaky ajanayad viṣṇuṃ yaśodā tāṃ tu kanyakām /
GE07hv_conpu:7718: jajvaluś cāgnayaḥ śāntā jāyamāne janārdane // HV_48.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:7719: śivāḥ saṃpravavur vātāḥ praśāntam abhavad rajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7720: jyotīṃsi ca prakāśanta jāyamāne janārdane // HV_48.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:7721: [k: K1.2,V1.2,B,Ds,D2.4.5 ins. after 15; Ñ2,Dn after line 1 of *601;
GE07hv_conpu:7723: abhijin nāma nakṣatraṃ jayantī nāma śarvarī |
GE07hv_conpu:7724: muhūrto vijayo nāma yatra jāto janārdanaḥ || *HV_48.15*598:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7726: jāyate bhagavāṃs tatra nayanair mohayañ jagat |
GE07hv_conpu:7728: ākāśāt puṣpavarṣaṃ ca vavarṣa tridiveśvaraḥ // HV_48.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:7729: [k: D6,T2-4,G,M ins. after 16; T1 after line 2 of *601: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7733: bālyaṃ vapuḥ samāsthāya tūṣṇīm āste 'tha paśyata || *HV_48.16*599:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:7741: arthyābhir gīrbhir evaṃ taṃ jāyamānaṃ janārdanam |
GE07hv_conpu:7746: indraś ca tridaśaiḥ sārdhaṃ tuṣṭāva madhusūdanam || *HV_48.17*601:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7747: vasudevas tu taṃ rātrau jātaṃ putram adhokṣajam |
GE07hv_conpu:7748: śrīvatsalakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā yutaṃ divyaiś ca lakṣaṇaiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7750: devakī ca tato dīnā tam uvāca śucismitā |
GE07hv_conpu:7751: upasaṃhara sarvāsu divyaṃ rūpam idaṃ hare || *HV_48.17*601A:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7755: uvāca vasudevas taṃ rūpaṃ saṃhara vai prabho |
GE07hv_conpu:7756: bhīto 'haṃ deva kaṃsasya tasmād evaṃ vadāmy aham |
GE07hv_conpu:7757: mama putrā hatās tena tava jyeṣṭhāmbujekṣaṇa || *HV_48.17*602:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:7762: [k: D6,T2,G1-3.5,M ins. after 17; T1.3.4,G4 cont. after *602: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7763: evaṃ samākule kāle suṣupū rakṣiṇas tadā || *HV_48.17*604:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:7764: na kevalaṃ rakṣitāraḥ sāyudhā mohitāḥ kila |
GE07hv_conpu:7765: sā purī madhurā sarvā suṣvāpa harimāyayā |
GE07hv_conpu:7766: vasudevād ṛte tasmād devakyāś ca mahīpate || *HV_48.17*604:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:7771: śayānam ambuje patre vaṭapatre yathā purā |
GE07hv_conpu:7773: tatra dṛṣṭo jarāyur na na ca prasavavedanā || *HV_48.17*604:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:7776: vasudevas tu saṃgṛhya dārakaṃ kṣipram eva tu /
GE07hv_conpu:7777: [k: D6 T1.3 G M4 ins. after 18ab; M1-3 subst. for 18ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7778: śayānam aṅke devakyā rātrāv ādāya yādavaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7779: yaśodāyā gṛhaṃ bhīto viveśa sutavatsalaḥ // HV_48.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:7792: mārgaṃ dadau sindhur iva śriyaḥ pateḥ || *HV_48.18*606:12 |*
GE07hv_conpu:7797: yaśodāyās tv avijñātaṃ tatra nikṣipya dārakam /
GE07hv_conpu:7798: gṛhya tāṃ dārikāṃ cāpi devakīśayane 'nyasat // HV_48.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:7800: suptā eva tadā sarve rakṣiṇo viṣṇumāyayā |
GE07hv_conpu:7802: vasudevaḥ kṛtārtho vai nirjagāma niveśanāt // HV_48.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:7804: bahir antaḥ puradvāraḥ sarvāḥ pūrvavad āvṛtāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7806: te tu tūrṇam upavrajya devakyā garbhajanma tat |
GE07hv_conpu:7809: nivedayām_āsa tadā kanyāṃ tāṃ varavarṇinīm // HV_48.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:7811: bhīto nivedayām āsa jātā naḥ kanyaketi ha |
GE07hv_conpu:7812: tac chrutvā tvaritaḥ kaṃso rakṣibhiḥ saha vegitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7814: sa tatra tvarito dvāri kiṃ jātam iti cābravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:7815: dīyatāṃ śīghram ity evaṃ vāgbhiḥ samabhitarjayat // HV_48.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:7817: [k: After 24ab, N (except Ś1 D6) T1.3.4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7819: dārikā putra jāteti kaṃsaṃ tūvāca devakī // HV_48.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:7820: śrīmanto me hatāḥ sapta putragarbhās tvayā vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:7821: dārikeyaṃ hataivaiṣā paśyasva yadi manyase // HV_48.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:7822: dṛṣṭvā kaṃsas tu tāṃ kanyām ahṛṣyata mudā yutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7823: hataivaiṣā yadā kanyā jātety uktvā vṛthāmatiḥ // HV_48.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:7825: kaṃsasya purato nyastā pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīsamā // HV_48.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:7826: pāde tāṃ gṛhya puruṣaḥ samāvidhyāvadhūya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:7833: kanyaiva cābhavan nityaṃ divyā devair abhiṣṭutā // HV_48.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:7838: sā vai niśi tamograste babhau bhūtagaṇākule /
GE07hv_conpu:7839: nṛtyatī hasatī caiva viparītena bhāsvatī // HV_48.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:7841: jahāsa ca mahāhāsaṃ kaṃsaṃ ca ruṣitābravīt // HV_48.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:7842: kaṃsa kaṃsa vināśāya yad ahaṃ ghātitā tvayā /
GE07hv_conpu:7843: sahasā ca samutkṣipya śilāyāṃ vinipātitā // HV_48.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:7845: pāṭayitvā karair deham uṣṇaṃ pāsyāmi śoṇitam // HV_48.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:7846: evam uktvā vaco ghoraṃ sā yatheṣṭena vartmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:7847: khaṃ sā devālayaṃ devī sagaṇā vicacāra ha // HV_48.36 //

GE07hv_conpu:7849: sā kanyā vavṛdhe atra vṛṣṇisadmani pūjitā |
GE07hv_conpu:7850: putravat pālyamānā sā devī devājñayā tadā || *HV_48.36*612:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:7851: viddhi caināṃ athotpannām aṃśād devīṃ prajāpateḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7853: tāṃ vai sarve sumanasaḥ pūjayanti sā yādavāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7856: ekānaṃśeti yām āhur utpannāṃ mānavā bhuvi |
GE07hv_conpu:7857: tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ kaṃsas tu tāṃ mene mṛtyum ātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7858: vivikte devakīṃ caiva vrīḍitaḥ pratyabhāṣata // HV_48.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:7859: pitṛṣvasaḥ kṛto yatnas tava garbhā hatā mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:7860: anyathaivānyato devi mama mṛtyuḥ samutthitaḥ // HV_48.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:7861: nairāśyena kṛto yatnaḥ svajane prahṛtaṃ mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:7862: daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa na cātikrāntavān aham // HV_48.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:7863: tyaja garbhakṛtāṃ cintāṃ tvam imāṃ śokakārikām /
GE07hv_conpu:7864: hetubhūtas tv ahaṃ teṣāṃ sati kālaviparyaye // HV_48.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:7865: kāla eva nṛṇāṃ śatruḥ kālaś ca pariṇāmakaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7866: kālo nayati sarvaṃ vai hetubhūtaś ca madvidhaḥ // HV_48.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:7867: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3V BD S (except M1-3) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7869: idaṃ tu kaṣṭaṃ yaj jantuḥ kartāham iti manyate |
GE07hv_conpu:7870: mā kārṣīḥ putrajāṃ cintāṃ vilāpaṃ śokajaṃ tyaja /
GE07hv_conpu:7871: evaṃprāyā nṛṇāṃ yonir nāsti kālasya saṃsthitiḥ // HV_48.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:7872: patāmi pādayor mūrdhnā putravat tava devaki /
GE07hv_conpu:7873: madgatas tyajyatāṃ roṣo jānāmy apakṛtaṃ svayam // HV_48.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:7874: [k: K4 Ñ2 V2.3 B Ds D6 T1.3 G M4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:7875: ity uktavantaṃ kaṃsaṃ sā devakī vākyam abravīt |
GE07hv_conpu:7877: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha vatseti kaṃsaṃ māteva jalpatī // HV_48.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:7879: mamāgrato hatā garbhā ye tvayā kālarūpiṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:7880: kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ na vai putra kṛtānto hy atra kāraṇam // HV_48.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:7881: garbhakṛntanam etan me sahanīyaṃ tvayā kṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:7882: mūrdhnā padbhyāṃ nipatatā svaṃ ca karma jugupsatā // HV_48.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:7883: garbhe 'pi niyato mṛtyur bālye 'pi na nivartate /
GE07hv_conpu:7884: yuvāpi mṛtyor vaśagaḥ sthaviro mṛta eva tu // HV_48.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:7885: kālamūlam idaṃ sarvaṃ hetubhūtas tvam eva hi |
GE07hv_conpu:7886: ajāte darśanaṃ nāsti yathā nāsti tathaiva saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7887: jāto 'py ajātatāṃ yāti vidhātrā yatra nīyate // HV_48.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:7888: tad gaccha putra mā te bhūn madgataṃ manyukāraṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:7889: mṛtyunāpahṛte pūrvaṃ śeṣo hetuḥ pravartate // HV_48.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:7891: mātāpitros tu kāryeṇa janmatas tūpapadyate // HV_48.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:7892: niśamya devakīvākyaṃ sa kaṃsaḥ svam niveśanam /

GE07hv_conpu:7895: kṛtye pratihate dīno jagāma vimanā bhṛśam // HV_48.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:7898: [h: HV (CE) ch. 49, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz

GE07hv_conpu:7900: version of March 4, 2002. Not yet proof-read. :h]
GE07hv_conpu:7902: prāg eva vasudevas tu vraje śuśrāva rohiṇīm /
GE07hv_conpu:7903: prajātāṃ putram evāgre candrāt kāntatarānanam // HV_49.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:7904: sa nandagopaṃ tvaritaḥ provāca śubhayā girā /
GE07hv_conpu:7905: gacchānayā saha tvaṃ tu vrajam eva yaśodayā // HV_49.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:7906: [k: D6,T1.2,G,M4 ins. after 2; M1.2 after 2ab; M3 cont. after *618:
GE07hv_conpu:7908: yadā ca rohiṇī putraṃ prasūtā kamalekṣaṇā |
GE07hv_conpu:7912: rauhiṇeyaṃ ca me putraṃ parirakṣa śiśuṃ vraje // HV_49.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:7915: bālye kelikilaḥ sarvo bālye mūrcchanty amānuṣāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:7916: bālye caṇḍatamaḥ sarvas tatra yatnaparo bhava // HV_49.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:7918: yo 'ham ekasya putrasya na paśyāmi śiśor mukham // HV_49.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:7919: hriyate hi balāt prajñā prājñasyāpi sato mama /
GE07hv_conpu:7920: asmād dhi me bhayaṃ kaṃsān nirghṛṇād vai śiśor vadhe // HV_49.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:7921: tad yathā rauhiṇeyaṃ tvaṃ nandagopa mamātmajam /
GE07hv_conpu:7922: gopāyasi yathā tāta tattvānveṣī tathā kuru /
GE07hv_conpu:7923: vighnā hi bahavo loke bālān uttrāsayanti hi // HV_49.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:7924: sa ca putro mama jyāyān kanīyāṃs tava cāpy ayam /
GE07hv_conpu:7925: ubhāv api samaṃ premṇā nirīkṣasva yathāsukham // HV_49.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:7927: śobhetāṃ govraje tasmin nandagopa tathā kuru // HV_49.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:7928: na ca vṛndāvane kāryo gavāṃ ghoṣaḥ kadācana /
GE07hv_conpu:7931: tatra vāse tu bhetavyaṃ keśinaḥ pāpadarśinaḥ // HV_49.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:7933: goṣṭheṣu gobhyo vatsebhyo rakṣyau te dvāv imau śiśū // HV_49.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:7935: yamunā naiva gantavyā tasyāṃ vasati kāliyaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:7937: ime tvāṃ tvarayantīha pakṣiṇaḥ savyadakṣiṇāḥ // HV_49.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:7939: yānaṃ yaśodayā sārdham āruroha mudā yutaḥ // HV_49.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:7942: śayane taṃ śiśuṃ caiva saṃveśya mṛdusaṃstare |
GE07hv_conpu:7957: hambhāravaiś ca vatsānāṃ sarvataḥ kṛtanisvanam // HV_49.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:7959: paryanteśv āvṛtaṃ vanyair bṛhadbhiḥ patitair drumaiḥ // HV_49.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:7960: vatsānāṃ ropitaiḥ kīlair dāmabhiś ca vibhūṣitam /
GE07hv_conpu:7980: svanantīnāṃ ca śabdena mayūrā nanṛtus tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:7985: sa tatra praviśan hṛṣṭo govrajaṃ gopanāditam /
GE07hv_conpu:7986: pratyudgato gopavṛddhaiḥ strībhir vṛddhābhir eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:7989: tatra taṃ bālasūryābhaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ gūḍhaṃ nyaveśayat // HV_49.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:7993: brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā bhojanaṃ ca yathākramam |
GE07hv_conpu:7994: gopāś caivotsavaṃ cakrur gobhyo viprebhya eva ca |

GE07hv_conpu:7997: version of March 4, 2002. Not yet proof-read. :h]
GE07hv_conpu:8003: pracchanna eva gopānāṃ saṃskārān akarot tayoḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8004: dārakau kṛtanāmānau vavṛdhāte sukhaṃ ca tau /
GE07hv_conpu:8005: jyeṣṭhaḥ saṃkarṣaṇo nāma yavīyān kṛṣṇa eva tu // HV_50.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:8007: vyavardhata gavāṃ madhye sāgarasya ivāmbudaḥ // HV_50.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:8010: avadhānaparo bhūtvā śṛṇu rājan yad icchasi || *HV_50.3*630:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:8011: sa tatra yogam āsthāya dānavāṃś cāvadhīt kila || *HV_50.3*630:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:8012: kaścid danoḥ suto vīraḥ kṛṣṇasya vadhakāṅkṣayā |
GE07hv_conpu:8013: nandasya priyatām āyāc chākaṭaṃ vapur udvahan |
GE07hv_conpu:8014: śakaṭasya tv adhaḥ suptaṃ kadācit putragṛddhinī /
GE07hv_conpu:8015: yaśodā taṃ samutsṛjya jagāma yamunāṃ nadīm // HV_50.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:8019: hāsyaṃ kurvañ śiśuḥ kṛṣṇo netrābhyāṃ parivibhraman ||
GE07hv_conpu:8020: karaṃ kareṇa saṃpīḍya pādaṃ pādena pīḍayan |
GE07hv_conpu:8023: ruroda madhuraṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pādāv ūrdhvaṃ prasārayan // HV_50.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:8025: [k: M3 ins. *631. D6,T,G,M1.2.4 ins. after 6ab: M3 cont. after *631:
GE07hv_conpu:8028: nyubjaṃ payodharākāṅkṣī cakāra ca ruroda ca // HV_50.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:8031: sā dadarśa viparyastaṃ śakaṭaṃ vāyunā vinā /
GE07hv_conpu:8032: hāheti kṛtvā tvaritā dārakaṃ jagṛhe tadā // HV_50.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:8033: na sā bubodha tat tena śakaṭaṃ parivartitam /
GE07hv_conpu:8034: svasti me dārakāyeti prītyā bhītā ca sābhavat // HV_50.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:8035: kiṃ nu vakṣyati te putra pitā paramakopanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8036: tvayy adhaḥ śakaṭe supte śakaṭe ca viloḍite // HV_50.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:8037: kiṃ me snānena duḥsnānaṃ kiṃ ca me gamane nadīm /
GE07hv_conpu:8038: paryaste śakaṭe putra yā tvā paśyāmy apāvṛtam // HV_50.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:8040: kāṣāye vāsasī bibhran nandagopo vrajāntikam // HV_50.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:8044: api me svasti putrāyety asakṛd vacanaṃ vadan // HV_50.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:8045: pibantaṃ stanam ālakṣya putraṃ svastho 'bravīt punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8046: vṛṣayuddhaṃ vinā kena paryastaṃ śakaṭaṃ mama // HV_50.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:8048: na vijānāmy ahaṃ kena śakaṭaṃ pātitaṃ bhuvi // HV_50.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:8050: āgatā ca viparyastam apaśyaṃ śakaṭaṃ bhuvi // HV_50.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:8051: tayoḥ kathayator evam abruvaṃs tatra dārakāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8052: anena śiśunā yānam etat pādena pātitam /
GE07hv_conpu:8053: asmābhiḥ saṃpatadbhis tu dṛṣṭam etad yadṛcchayā // HV_50.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:8055: nandagopas tu tac chrutvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ yayau |
GE07hv_conpu:8056: prahṛṣṭaś caiva bhītaś ca kim etad iti cintayan |
GE07hv_conpu:8057: na ca te śraddadhur gopāḥ sarve mānuṣabuddhayaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8059: svasthāne śakaṭaṃ caiva cakrabandham akārayan // HV_50.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:8061: nando 'ṅkam enam āropya bhūreṇuṃ parigṛhya ca |
GE07hv_conpu:8062: pradakṣiṇaṃ śiraḥ kurvan mantram etaj jajāpa ha |
GE07hv_conpu:8063: viṣṇus te pūrvataḥ pātu rudro rakṣatu dakṣiṇam |
GE07hv_conpu:8064: brahmā ca paścimaṃ pāyāt skando rakṣatv athottaram |
GE07hv_conpu:8065: upariṣṭāt tathā sūryaḥ pāyāc cādhaś ca vāsukiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8066: pāyāc ca tvām atho vatsa śiṣṭāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ samīraṇaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8068: gāvo rakṣantu sarvatra bhūmiḥ pātu sadāśivaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8069: evam uccārya nandas tu kṛṣṇaṃ pasparśa sarvaśaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8070: sa eva mantro bālānāṃ rakṣāyai parikīrtitaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8071: [k: K1.2,Ñ,V,B,D1-5,T3 ins. after the addl. colophon; K3.4,Ñ1,Dn,Ds
GE07hv_conpu:8084: sā muñca muñca bālam iti prabhāṣiṇī |
GE07hv_conpu:8089: sādrir mahī dyauś ca cacāla sagrahā |
GE07hv_conpu:8097: cūrṇayām āsa rājendra mahad āsīt tad adbhutam || *HV_50.20*637:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:8102: bālaṃ ca tasyā urasi krīḍantam akutobhayam |
GE07hv_conpu:8107: rakṣāṃ cakruś ca śakṛtā dvādaśāṅgeṣu nāmabhiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8111: dadau stanaṃ ca kṛṣṇāya tatra suptajane niśi /
GE07hv_conpu:8112: tasyāḥ stanaṃ papau kṛṣṇaḥ prāṇaiḥ saha nanāda ca // HV_50.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:8115: patantīṃ tāṃ tu saṃdṛśya śakunīṃ bhayaviklavām |
GE07hv_conpu:8118: cakrākrāntā tu śakunī papāta ca mamāra ca |
GE07hv_conpu:8119: nanāda ca mahānādaṃ punaḥ punar asau hariḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8120: tena śabdena vitrastās tato bubudhire janāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8121: sa nandagopo gopāś ca yaśodā ca suviklavā // HV_50.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:8122: te tām apaśyan patitāṃ visaṃjñāṃ vipayodharām /
GE07hv_conpu:8123: śakuniṃ nihatāṃ bhūmau vajreṇeva vidāritām // HV_50.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:8124: idaṃ kiṃ nv iti saṃtrastāḥ kasyedaṃ karma ceti ca /
GE07hv_conpu:8125: nandagopaṃ puraskṛtya gopās taṃ paryavārayan // HV_50.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:8126: [k: After 25, N (except Ś1, Ñ1),S (except M1-3) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:8127: nādhyagacchanta ca tadā hetuṃ tatra kadācana |
GE07hv_conpu:8131: ko 'yaṃ vidhir na jānāmi vismayo me mahān ayam /
GE07hv_conpu:8132: putrasya me bhayaṃ bhīru bhīrutvaṃ samupāgatam // HV_50.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:8133: yaśodā tv abravīd bhītā nārya jānāmi kiṃ nv idam /
GE07hv_conpu:8134: dārakeṇa sahānena suptā śabdena bodhitā // HV_50.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:8136: kaṃsād bhayaṃ cakārograṃ vismayaṃ ca jagāma ha // HV_50.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:8137: [h: HV (CE) ch. 51, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz
GE07hv_conpu:8138: Podzeit, extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner.
GE07hv_conpu:8141: kāle gacchati saumyau tau dārakau kṛtanāmakau /
GE07hv_conpu:8143: pañca saṃvatsarān prāptau śobhayānau vrajaṃ muhuḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8145: tāv anyonyagatau bālau bālyād evaikatāṃ gatau /
GE07hv_conpu:8150: ekacaryau mahāvīryāv ekasya śiśutāṃ gatau // HV_51.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:8152: kṛtsnasya jagato gopau saṃvṛttau gopadārakau // HV_51.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:8156: rejatuḥ pāṃśudigdhāṅgau dṛptau kalabhakāv iva // HV_51.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:8158: tau tatra paridhāvetāṃ kumārāv iva pāvakī // HV_51.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:8162: janaṃ ca vipra kurvāṇau hasantau ca kvacit kvacit // HV_51.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:8172: ehi vatsa piba stanyaṃ durvoḍhuṃ mama saṃprati || *HV_51.13ab*642:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:8173: etāvantam itaḥ kālaṃ kvā gato 'si gṛhād bahiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8174: ity ādāya kare putraṃ gṛhān nirvāsya sā ruṣā |
GE07hv_conpu:8175: ānāyya śakaṭīmūlaṃ bhartsayantī punaḥ punaḥ // HV_51.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:8177: yadi śaknoṣi gaccheti tam uktvā karma sākarot /
GE07hv_conpu:8178: vyagrāyām tu yaśodāyām nirjagāma tato 'ṅgaṇāt // HV_51.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:8179: śiśulīlāṃ tataḥ kurvan kṛṣṇo vismāpayan vrajam /
GE07hv_conpu:8180: so 'ṅgaṇān niḥsṛtaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ karṣamāṇa udūkhalam // HV_51.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:8181: sa yamābhyām pravṛddhābhyām arjunābhyāṃ caran vane /
GE07hv_conpu:8182: niścakrāma śiśur madhyāt karṣamāṇa udūkhalam // HV_51.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:8183: tat tasya karṣato baddham tiryag gatam udūkhalam /
GE07hv_conpu:8184: lagnaṃ tābhyāṃ samūlābhyām arjunābhyāṃ cakarṣa ha // HV_51.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:8185: tāv arjunau kṛṣyamāṇau tena bālena raṃhasā /
GE07hv_conpu:8186: samūlaviṭapau bhagnau sa tu madhye jahāsa vai // HV_51.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:8188: tad dāma tasya bālasya prabhāvād abhavad dṛḍham // HV_51.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:8190: krandantyo vismayantyaś ca yaśodānikaṭaṃ yayuḥ // HV_51.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:8191: tās tu saṃbhrāntavadanā yaśodām ūcur aṅganāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8192: ehy āgaccha yaśodeti saṃbhrame kiṃ vilambase // HV_51.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:8193: yau tāv arjunavṛkṣau tu vraje satyopayācitau /
GE07hv_conpu:8195: tāv etau tava putrasya patitāv upari drumau |
GE07hv_conpu:8196: putrasyopari tāv etau patitau te mahīruhau // HV_51.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:8197: dṛḍhena dāmnā tatraiva baddho vatsa ivodare /
GE07hv_conpu:8198: jahāsa madhye vṛkṣābhyāṃ tava putraḥ sa bālakaḥ // HV_51.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:8199: [k: M1.3 subst. for 23cd; M2 ins. after 23ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:8200: prahasann eva vṛkṣābhyāṃ madhye krīḍann ivāṅgaṇe |
GE07hv_conpu:8202: putram ānaya jīvantuṃ muktaṃ mṛtyumukhād iva // HV_51.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:8204: taṃ deśam agamad yatra patitau tau mahādrumau // HV_51.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:8205: dadarśa tābhyāṃ sā madhye drumābhyām ātmajaṃ śiśum /
GE07hv_conpu:8206: dāmnā nibaddham udare karṣamāṇam udūkhalam // HV_51.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:8207: sagopīgopavṛddhaś ca sayuvā ca vrajas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:8208: paryagacchat tato draṣṭuṃ gopeṣu mahad adbhutam // HV_51.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:8213: vinā vātaṃ vinā varṣaṃ vidyutprapatanaṃ vinā /
GE07hv_conpu:8214: vinā hastikṛtaṃ doṣam kenemau pātitau drumau // HV_51.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:8215: aho bata na śobhetāṃ vimūlāv arjunāv imau /
GE07hv_conpu:8216: imau nipatitau bhūmau vitoyau jaladāv iva // HV_51.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:8217: [k: After 30, B2 Poona, Bom. and Cal. eds. and G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:8219: nandagopa prasannau te drumāv evaṃgatāv api /
GE07hv_conpu:8220: yatra te dārako mukto vimūlābhyām avikṣataḥ // HV_51.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:8221: autpātikam idaṃ ghoṣe tṛtīyaṃ vartate tv iha /
GE07hv_conpu:8222: pūtanāyā nipātaś ca drumayoḥ śakaṭasya ca // HV_51.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:8223: asmin sthāne niveśo 'yaṃ ghoṣasyāsya na vidyate /
GE07hv_conpu:8224: utpātā hy atra dṛśyante kathayanto naśobhanam // HV_51.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:8225: nandagopas tu sahasā muktvā kṛṣṇam udūkhalāt /
GE07hv_conpu:8226: niveśya cāṅke suciraṃ mṛtaṃ punar ivāgatam // HV_51.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:8227: [k: K1.4,Ñ2,V2,B2.3,Dn,Ds,D2.3,T3,M4,G(ed.) ins. after 34: D5 after the repetition of 34cd:
GE07hv_conpu:8229: tato yaśodāṃ garhan vai nandagopo viveśa ha /
GE07hv_conpu:8230: sa ca gopajanaḥ sarvo ghoṣam eva jagāma ha // HV_51.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:8231: sa ca tenaiva nāmnā tu kṛṣṇo vai dāmabandhanāt /
GE07hv_conpu:8233: yena dāmnā nibaddho 'sāv udare sudṛḍhaṃ vraje |
GE07hv_conpu:8234: ghoṣe dāmodara iti gopībhiḥ parigīyate // HV_51.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:8236: kṛṣṇasya bharataśreṣṭha ghoṣe nivasatas tadā // HV_51.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:8237: [h: HV (CE) ch. 52, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz
GE07hv_conpu:8238: Podzeit, extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner.
GE07hv_conpu:8242: tasminn eva vrajasthāne saptavarṣau babhūvatuḥ // HV_52.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:8246: [k: D6,T2,G,M1-3 ins. after 3ab; T1,M4,G(ed.) after the repetition of
GE07hv_conpu:8249: śuśubhāte vanagatau triśīrṣāv iva pannagau // HV_52.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:8258: kālayantau ca daṇḍena vatsān vatsau diśaṃ prati || *HV_52.5*650:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:8262: khādantau khādayantau ca mūlāni ca phalāni ca || *HV_52.5*650:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:8263: tindukaṃ bhakṣayantu ca gopair āpatya bhūtale |
GE07hv_conpu:8264: kīlair āpatya vṛkṣebhyaḥ khādayantu phalāni ca |
GE07hv_conpu:8265: kvacid dhasantāv anyonyaṃ krīḍamānau kvacit kvacit /
GE07hv_conpu:8269: kvacid vṛkṣeṣu viśrāntau sthalīṣv iva yathāsukham |
GE07hv_conpu:8276: evaṃ tu vatsapālau tau śobhayām āsatur vanam |
GE07hv_conpu:8277: cañcūryantau ramantau sma kiśorāv iva cañcalau // HV_52.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:8279: gāyantu ca kvacid geyān susvaraṃ madhurasvaram |
GE07hv_conpu:8281: gajān paravaśān geyaiḥ kurvantau ca gahāvane |
GE07hv_conpu:8282: lokam itthaṃ carantau ca ramayantau ca ceṣṭitaiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8283: atha dāmodaraḥ śrīmān saṃkarṣaṇam uvāca ha /
GE07hv_conpu:8284: ārya nāsmin vane śakyaṃ gopālaiḥ saha krīḍitum // HV_52.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:8287: gahanānīha yāny āsan kānanāni vanāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:8289: govāteṣv api ye vṛkṣāḥ parivṛttārgaleṣu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:8290: sarve goṣṭhāgniṣu gatāḥ kṣayam akṣayavarcasaḥ // HV_52.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:8291: saṃnikṛṣṭāni yāny āsan kāṣṭhāni ca tṛṇāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:8296: [k: K1.2,Ñ2(last two first time),V2,B,Dn,Ds,D2.3,T1,G4 ins. after 13;
GE07hv_conpu:8297: K2(second time).3,Ñ1.2(second time) after 16ab; Ñ3,V1 after 14ab;
GE07hv_conpu:8301: nirvihaṃgam idaṃ śūnyaṃ nirvyañjanam ivāśanam // HV_52.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:8302: vikrīyamāṇaiḥ kaṣṭhaiś ca śākaiś ca vanasaṃbhavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8304: śailānāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ ghoṣo ghoṣāṇāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vanam /
GE07hv_conpu:8305: [k: After 16ab, K2(second time).3,Ñ1.2(second time) ins. *655, while
GE07hv_conpu:8306: K1,Ñ3,V,B,D,T2,G,M4 ins. after 16ab; K2,Ñ2 cont. after *655; T3.4 after
GE07hv_conpu:8308: vanānāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ gāvas tāś cāsmākaṃ parā gatiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8309: tasmād anyad vanaṃ yāmaḥ pratyagravayasendhanam // HV_52.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:8310: icchanty anupabhuktāni bhoktuṃ gāvas tṛṇāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:8311: tasmād vanaṃ navatṛṇaṃ gacchantu dhanino vrajāḥ // HV_52.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:8313: praśastā vai vrajā loke yathā vai cakracāriṇaḥ // HV_52.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:8315: na tṛṇaṃ bhuñjate gāvo nāpi tatpayaso hitam // HV_52.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:8317: carāmaḥ sahitā gobhiḥ kṣipraṃ saṃvāhyatāṃ vrajaḥ // HV_52.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:8324: tasya govardhano nāma nātidūre girir mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:8327: bhāṇḍīro nāma śuśubhe nīlamegha ivāmbare // HV_52.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:8329: prayātā nandanasyeva nalinī saritāṃ varā // HV_52.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:8330: tatra govardhanaṃ caiva bhāṇḍīraṃ ca vanaspatim /
GE07hv_conpu:8331: kālindīṃ ca nadīṃ ramyāṃ drakṣyāvaś carataḥ sukham // HV_52.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:8333: sukhaṃ carantaṃ drakṣyāvaḥ kālindīṃ ca nadīṃ śubhām |
GE07hv_conpu:8334: tatrāyaṃ vasatāṃ ghoṣas tyajyatāṃ nirguṇaṃ vanam /
GE07hv_conpu:8335: saṃvāhayāma bhadraṃ te kiṃcid utpādya kāraṇam // HV_52.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:8339: viniṣpetur bhayakarāḥ sarvataḥ śataśo vṛkāḥ // HV_52.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:8342: vṛkān niṣpatitān dṛṣṭvā goṣu vatseṣv atho nṛṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:8343: gopīṣu ca yathākāmaṃ vraje trāso 'bhavan mahān // HV_52.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:8344: te vṛkāḥ pancabaddhāś ca daśabaddhās tathāpare /
GE07hv_conpu:8350: bhakṣayadbhiś ca tair vatsāṃs trāsayadbhiś ca govrajān /
GE07hv_conpu:8351: niśi bālān haradbhiś ca vṛkair utsādyate vrajaḥ // HV_52.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:8352: na vanaṃ śakyate gantuṃ na gāś ca parirakṣitum /
GE07hv_conpu:8353: na vanāt kiṃcid āhartuṃ na ca vā tarituṃ nadīm // HV_52.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:8355: trastā hy udvignamanaso gatās tasmin vane 'vasan |
GE07hv_conpu:8357: vrajo niṣpandaceṣṭaḥ sa ekasthānacaraḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_52.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:8358: [h: HV (CE) ch. 53, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz

GE07hv_conpu:8362: ītiṃ vṛkānāṃ dṛṣṭvā tu vardhamānāṃ durāsadām /

GE07hv_conpu:8380: adyaiva niścayaprāptir yadi gantavyam eva naḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8381: śīghram ājñāpyatāṃ ghoṣaḥ sajjībhavata māciram // HV_53.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:8383: śīghram gāvaḥ prakālyantāṃ yujyantāṃ śakaṭāni ca // HV_53.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:8385: vṛndāvanam itaḥ sthānān niveśāya ca gamyatām // HV_53.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:8386: tac chrutvā nandagopasya vacanaṃ sādhu bhāṣitam /

GE07hv_conpu:8390: prayāhy uttiṣṭha gacchāmaḥ kiṃ śeṣe yāhi yojaya /
GE07hv_conpu:8391: uttiṣṭhati vraje tasmin gopakolāhalo hy abhūt // HV_53.13 //

GE07hv_conpu:8405: niveśaṃ vipulaṃ cakre niveśāya gavāṃ hitam // HV_53.20 //

GE07hv_conpu:8415: chādanārthaṃ prakīrṇaiś ca kaṭais tṛṇagṛhais tathā // HV_53.25 //

GE07hv_conpu:8422: yuvabhiḥ sthaviraiś caiva gopair vyagrakarair bhṛśam /
GE07hv_conpu:8423: viśasadbhiḥ kuṭhāraiś ca kāṣṭhāny api tarūn api // HV_53.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:8426: tās tu kāmadughā gāvaḥ sarvakālatṛṇaṃ vanam /

GE07hv_conpu:8434: tās tu gāvaḥ sa ghoṣaś ca sa ca saṃkarṣaṇo yuvā /

GE07hv_conpu:8438: na tatra prāṇināṃ duḥkhaṃ sa ca sarvasukhāvahaḥ |

GE07hv_conpu:8546: kadācit tu tadā kṛṣṇo vinā saṃkarṣaṇaṃ gurum /

GE07hv_conpu:8553: sūkṣme vasāno vasane sasaṃdhya iva toyadaḥ // HV_55.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:8557: rarāja tasya tadbālye ruciroṣṭhapuṭaṃ mukham // HV_55.6 //

GE07hv_conpu:8573: reme ca tatra ramyāsu citrāsu vanarājiṣu /

GE07hv_conpu:8745: saṃditaṃ sarpabhogena kṛṣyamāṇaṃ yathā mṛgam // HV_56.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:8747: putraṃ katham imaṃ dṛṣṭvā yaśode nāvadīryate // HV_56.22 //

GE07hv_conpu:8751: praviśāmo na yāsyāmaḥ sarvā dāmodaraṃ vinā // HV_56.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:8752: divasaḥ ko vinā sūryaṃ vinā candreṇa kā niśā /
GE07hv_conpu:8753: vinā vṛṣeṇa kā gāvo vinā kṛṣṇena ko vrajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8754: vinā kṛṣṇaṃ na yāsyāmo vivatsā iva dhenavaḥ // HV_56.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:8755: tāsāṃ vilapitaṃ śrutvā teṣām ca vrajavāsinām /
GE07hv_conpu:8759: saṃkarṣaṇas tu saṃkruddho babhāṣe kṛṣṇam avyayam // HV_56.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:8761: damyatām eṣa vai kṣipraṃ sarparājo viṣāyudhaḥ // HV_56.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:8762: ime no bāndhavās tāta tvāṃ matvā mānuṣaṃ prabho /

GE07hv_conpu:8767: śiro 'sya kṛṣṇo jagrāha svahastenāvanāmya ca // HV_56.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:8768: tasyāruroha sahasā madhyamaṃ tan mahac chiraḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:8775: asyaiḥ sarudhirodgāraiḥ kātaraṃ vākyam abravīt // HV_56.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:8777: damito 'haṃ hataviṣo vaśagas te varānana // HV_56.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:8779: kasya vā vaśatāṃ yāmi jīvitaṃ me pradīyatām // HV_56.34 //

GE07hv_conpu:8785: prasanne tvayi deveśa vainateyo na māṃ haret |
GE07hv_conpu:8786: tasmād vidhatsva yat kāryaṃ mayā kartavyam īśvara |
GE07hv_conpu:8787: ity uktvā sa śirobhis tu kṛṣṇapādāv apūjayat |
GE07hv_conpu:8790: tavāsmin yamunātoye naiva sthānaṃ dadāmy aham /
GE07hv_conpu:8792: yaś ceha bhūyo dṛśyeta sthale vā yadi vā jale /
GE07hv_conpu:8793: tava bhṛtyas tanūjo vā kṣipraṃ vadhyaḥ sa me bhavet // HV_56.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:8794: śivaṃ cāsya jalasyāstu tvaṃ ca gaccha mahārṇavam /
GE07hv_conpu:8795: sthāne tv iha bhaved doṣas tavāntakaraṇo mahān // HV_56.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:8796: matpadāni ca te sarpa dṛṣṭvā mūrdhani sāgare /
GE07hv_conpu:8797: garudaḥ pannagaripus tvayi na prahariṣyati // HV_56.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:8800: [k: *682 occurs twice, after 56.34 and after 56.39; the second occurrence has been numbered *682A. :k]
GE07hv_conpu:8802: paśyatām eva gopānāṃ jagāmādarśanaṃ hradāt // HV_56.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:8803: nirjite tu gate sarpe kṛṣṇam uttīrya viṣṭhitam /
GE07hv_conpu:8804: vismitās tuṣṭuvur gopāś cakruś caiva pradakṣiṇam // HV_56.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:8806: dhanyo 'sy anugṛhīto 'si yasya te putra īdṛśaḥ // HV_56.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:8808: āpatsu śaraṇaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ prabhuś cāyatalocanaḥ // HV_56.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:8810: sarvais tīrthaiḥ sukhaṃ gāvo vicariṣyanti naḥ sadā // HV_56.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:8811: vyaktam eva vayaṃ gopā vane yat kṛṣṇam īdṛśam /
GE07hv_conpu:8812: mahadbhūtaṃ na jānīmaś channam agnim iva vraje // HV_56.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:8813: evaṃ te vismitāḥ sarve stuvantaḥ kṛṣṇam avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:8814: jagmur gopagaṇā ghoṣaṃ devāś caitrarathaṃ yathā // HV_56.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:8815: [h: HV (CE) ch. 57, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz
GE07hv_conpu:8816: Podzeit, extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner; March
GE07hv_conpu:8820: tam eva ceratur deśam sahitau rāmakeśavau // HV_57.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:8821: jagmatus tau tu saṃraktau godhanaiḥ saha gāminau /
GE07hv_conpu:8822: giriṃ govardhanaṃ ramyaṃ vasudevasutāv ubhau // HV_57.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:8824: dadṛśāte 'tha tau vīrau ramyaṃ tālavanaṃ mahat // HV_57.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:8827: sa tu deśaḥ samaḥ snigdho loṣṭapāṣāṇavarjitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8831: tatra dāmodaro vākyam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8832: aho tālaphalaiḥ pakvair vāsiteyaṃ vanasthalī // HV_57.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:8833: svādūny ārya sugandhīni śyāmāni rasavanti ca /
GE07hv_conpu:8835: yady eṣām īdṛśo gandho madhuro ghrānasaṃmataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8838: pātayaṃs tālapakvāni cālayām āsa tāṃs tarūn // HV_57.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:8839: tat tu tālavanaṃ nṝṇām asevyaṃ duratikramam /
GE07hv_conpu:8843: pakvāni caiva rājendra pātayām āsa kāmataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8846: sa tat talavanaṃ ghoraṃ gardabhaḥ parirakṣati /
GE07hv_conpu:8848: tālaśabdaṃ sa taṃ śrutvā saṃghuṣṭaṃ phalapātane /
GE07hv_conpu:8849: nāmarṣayata saṃkruddhas tālasvanam iva dvipaḥ // HV_57.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:8851: stabdhākṣo heṣitapaṭuḥ khurair nirdārayan mahīm // HV_57.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:8853: āpatann eva dadṛśe rauhiṇeyam avasthitam // HV_57.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:8854: tālānāṃ tam adho dṛṣṭvā sa dhvajākāram avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:8855: rauhiṇeyaṃ kharo duṣṭaḥ so 'daśad daśanāyudhaḥ // HV_57.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:8856: padbhyām ubhābhyāṃ ca punaḥ paścimābhyāṃ parāṅmukhaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8857: jaghānorasi daityaḥ sa rauhiṇeyaṃ nirāyudham // HV_57.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:8858: tābhyām eva sa jagrāha padbhyāṃ taṃ daityagardabham /
GE07hv_conpu:8861: kharas tālaphalaiḥ sārdhaṃ papāta dharaṇītale // HV_57.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:8862: taṃ gatāsuṃ gataśrīkaṃ patitaṃ vīkṣya gardabham /
GE07hv_conpu:8863: jñātīṃs tathāparāṃs tasya cikṣepa tṛṇarājani // HV_57.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:8865: te sarve tālapakvaiś ca nipetur dharaṇītale |
GE07hv_conpu:8866: sā bhūr gardabhadehaiś ca tālapakvaiś ca pātitaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8869: ramyaṃ tālavanaṃ tadd hi bhūyo ramyataraṃ babhau // HV_57.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:8871: caranti sma sukhaṃ gāvas tattālavanam uttamam // HV_57.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:8873: vītaśokā vanaṃ sarve cañcūryante sma te sukham // HV_57.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:8875: drumaparṇāsane kṛtvā tau yathārhaṃ niṣidatuḥ // HV_57.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:8876: [h: HV (CE) ch. 58, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz
GE07hv_conpu:8877: Podzeit, extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner; March
GE07hv_conpu:8880: atha tau jātaharṣau tu vasudevasutāv ubhau /
GE07hv_conpu:8881: tattālavanam utsṛjya bhūyo bhāṇḍīraṃ āgatau // HV_58.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:8885: nāmabhir vyāharantau ca savatsā gāḥ paraṃtapau // HV_58.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:8894: tāv enaṃ mānuṣīṃ dīkṣāṃ vahantau surapūjitau /
GE07hv_conpu:8896: tau tu bhāṇḍīram ucite kāle krīḍānuvartinau /
GE07hv_conpu:8897: prāptau paramaśākhāḍhyaṃ nyagrodhaṃ śākhināṃ varam // HV_58.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:8898: tatra spandolikābhiś ca yuddhamārgaiś ca daṃśitau /
GE07hv_conpu:8899: aśmabhiḥ kṣepaṇīyaiś ca tau vyāyāmam akurvatām // HV_58.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:8900: yuddhamārgaiś ca vividhair gopālaiḥ sahitāv ubhau /
GE07hv_conpu:8903: pralambo 'bhyāgamat teṣāṃ chidrānveṣī tayos tadā // HV_58.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:8905: lobhayānaḥ sa tau vīrau hāsyaiḥ krīḍanakais tathā // HV_58.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:8907: mānuṣaṃ vapur āsthāya pralambo dānavottamaḥ // HV_58.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:8908: prakrīḍitāś ca te sarve saha tenāmarāriṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:8910: sa tu chidrāntaraprepsuḥ pralambo gopatāṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8911: dṛṣṭiṃ paridadhe kṛṣṇe rauhiṇeye ca dāruṇām // HV_58.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:8915: prakrīḍitāś ca te sarve dvau dvau yugapad utpatan // HV_58.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:8917: saṃkarṣaṇas tu plutavān pralambena sahānaghaḥ // HV_58.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:8918: gopālās tv apare dvaṃdvaṃ gopālair aparaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_conpu:8919: pradrutā laṅghayanto vai te 'nyonyaṃ laghuvikramāḥ // HV_58.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:8921: gopālaiḥ kṛṣṇapakṣīyair gopālās tv apare jitāḥ // HV_58.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:8922: te vāhayantas tv anyonyam saṃharṣāt sahasā drutāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8923: bhāṇḍīraskandham uddiśya maryādāṃ punar āgaman // HV_58.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:8924: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ tu skandhena śīghram utkṣipya dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8925: drutaṃ jagāma vimukhaḥ sacandra iva toyadaḥ // HV_58.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:8929: sa bhāram asahaṃs tasya rauhiṇeyasya dhīmataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8932: svaṃ vapur darśayām āsa pralambo dānavottamaḥ // HV_58.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:8936: raudraḥ śakaṭacakrākṣo nāmayaṃs caraṇaiḥ kṣitim // HV_58.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:8938: dhīraḥ pralambaḥ prayayau toyalamba ivāmbudaḥ // HV_58.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:8941: hriyamāṇaḥ pralambena sa tu saṃkarṣaṇo yuvā /
GE07hv_conpu:8943: sa saṃdigdham ivātmānaṃ mene saṃkarṣaṇas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:8944: daityaskandhagataḥ śrīmān kṛṣṇaṃ cedam uvāca ha // HV_58.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:8947: katham asya mayā kāryaṃ śāsanaṃ duṣṭacetasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8949: tam āha sasmitaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sāmnā harṣakalena vai /
GE07hv_conpu:8950: abhijño rauhiṇeyasya vṛttasya ca balasya ca // HV_58.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:8952: yas tvaṃ jaganmayaṃ guhyaṃ guhyād guhyataraṃ gataḥ // HV_58.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:8953: smarārya tanum ātmānam lokānāṃ tvaṃ viparyaye /
GE07hv_conpu:8956: ātmavṛttapravṛttāni saṃsmarādyaṃ ca vai vapuḥ // HV_58.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:8957: śiraḥ khaṃ te jalaṃ mūrtiḥ kṣamā bhūr dahano mukham /
GE07hv_conpu:8958: vāyur lokāyur ucchvāso manaḥsraṣṭā manus tava // HV_58.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:8963: yat tvayā darśitaṃ loke tat paśyanti divaukasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8964: yat tvayā noktapūrvaṃ hi kas tad anveṣṭum arhati // HV_58.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:8965: yad veditavyaṃ loke 'smiṃs tat tvayā samudāhṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:8966: viditaṃ yat tavaikasya devā api na tad viduḥ // HV_58.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:8967: ātmajaṃ te vapur vyomni na paśyanty ātmasaṃbhavam /
GE07hv_conpu:8968: yat tu te kṛtrimaṃ rūpaṃ tad arcanti divaukasaḥ // HV_58.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:8971: davair na dṛṣṭaś cāntas te tenānanta iti smṛta /
GE07hv_conpu:8972: tvaṃ hi sūkṣmo mahān ekaḥ sūkṣmair api durāsadaḥ // HV_58.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:8973: tvayy eva parvatastambhā śāśvatī jagatī sthitā /
GE07hv_conpu:8974: acalā prāṇināṃ yonir dhārayaty akhilaṃ jagat // HV_58.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:8977: yathā tvam asi lokānāṃ tathāhaṃ tac ca me matam /
GE07hv_conpu:8978: ubhāv ekaśarīrau svo jagadarthe dvidhā kṛtau // HV_58.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:8980: ahaṃ vā śāśvataḥ kṛṣṇas tvaṃ vā śeṣaḥ purātanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:8981: lokānāṃ śāśvato devas tvaṃ hi śeṣaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8982: āvayor dehamātreṇa dvidhedaṃ dhāryate jagat // HV_58.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:8983: ahaṃ yaḥ sa bhavān eva yas tvaṃ so 'haṃ sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:8984: dvāv eva vihitau hy āvām ekadehau mahābalau // HV_58.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:8985: tadāsse mūḍhavat kiṃ tvaṃ prāg enaṃ jahi dānavam /
GE07hv_conpu:8986: mūrdhni devaripuṃ deva vajrakalpena muṣṭinā // HV_58.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:8988: sa balena tadā pūrṇas trailokyāntaracāriṇā // HV_58.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:8992: muṣṭinā vajrakalpena mūrdhni vīraḥ samāhanat // HV_58.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:8993: tasyottamāṅgaṃ sve kāye vikapālaṃ viveśa ha /
GE07hv_conpu:8996: jānudbhyāṃ jagatīṃ caiva gatāsuḥ sa jagāma ha // HV_58.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:8997: jagatyāṃ vinikīrṇasya tasya rūpam abhūt tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:9001: sa nihatya pralambaṃ tu saṃhṛtya balam ātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9002: paryaṣvajata kṛṣṇaṃ vai rauhiṇeyaḥ pratāpavān // HV_58.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:9003: taṃ tu kṛṣṇaś ca gopāś ca divisthāś ca divaukasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9004: tuṣṭuvur nihate daitye jayāśīrbhir mahābalam // HV_58.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:9006: [k: After 57ab Ś1 K1.3 Ñ2 V2 Dn Ds1 (marg.) Ds2 D4.5 (marg.) ins.:
GE07hv_conpu:9009: baladeveti nāmasya devaiś coktaṃ divi sthitaiḥ // HV_58.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:9010: balaṃ tu baladevasya tadā bhuvi janā viduḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9011: karmajaṃ nihate daitye devair api durāsade // HV_58 //
GE07hv_conpu:9012: [h: HV (CE) ch. 59, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz
GE07hv_conpu:9013: Podzeit, extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner; March
GE07hv_conpu:9015: tayoḥ pravṛttayor evaṃ kṛṣṇasya ca balasya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:9016: vane vicarator māsau vyatiyātau sma vārṣikau // HV_59.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:9017: vrajam ājagmatus tau tu vraje śuśruvatus tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:9018: prāptaṃ śakramahaṃ vīrau gopāṃś cotsavalālasān // HV_59.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:9019: kautūhalād idaṃ vākyaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ provāca tatra vai /
GE07hv_conpu:9020: ko 'yaṃ śakramaho nāma yena vo harṣa āgataḥ // HV_59.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:9021: tatra vṛddhatamas tv eko gopo vākyam uvāca ha /
GE07hv_conpu:9022: śrūyatāṃ tāta śakrasya yadarthaṃ maha iṣyate // HV_59.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:9024: tasya cāyaṃ kratuḥ kṛṣṇa lokapālasya śāśvataḥ // HV_59.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:9028: saṃprahṛṣṭaḥ sa bhagavān prīṇayaty akhilaṃ jagat // HV_59.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:9029: tena saṃpāditaṃ sasyaṃ vayam anye ca mānavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9031: devo varṣati lokeṣu tataḥ sasyaṃ pravartate /
GE07hv_conpu:9032: pṛthivyāṃ tarpitāyāṃ ca sāmṛtaṃ lakṣyate jagat // HV_59.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:9033: kṣīravatya imā gāvo vatsavatyaś ca nirvṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9034: tena saṃvardhitā gāvas tṛṇaiḥ puṣṭāḥ sapuṃgavāḥ // HV_59.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:9035: nāsasyā nātṛṇā gāvo na bubhukṣārdito janaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9036: dṛśyate yatra dṛśyante vṛṣṭimanto balāhakāḥ // HV_59.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:9037: dudoha savitur gā vai śakro divyāḥ payasvalāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9038: tāḥ kṣaranti navaṃ kṣīraṃ medhyaṃ meghaughadhāritam // HV_59.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:9039: vāyvīritaṃ tu megheṣu karoti ninadaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:9040: javenāvarjitaṃ caiva garjatīti janā viduḥ // HV_59.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:9046: bahubhiḥ kāmagair meghaiḥ śakro bhṛtyair iveśvaraḥ // HV_59.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:9048: kvacic chīkaramuktābhaṃ kurvadbhir gaganaṃ ghanaiḥ // HV_59.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:9051: maṇḍayaty eva devendro viśvam eva nabho ghanaiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:9052: evam etat payo dugdhaṃ gobhiḥ sūryasya vāridaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9053: parjanyaḥ sarvalokānāṃ bhavāya bhuvi varṣati // HV_59.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:9055: yasmāt prāvṛḍ iyaṃ kṛṣṇa śakrasya bhuvi bhāvinī |
GE07hv_conpu:9056: tasmāt prāvṛṣi rājānaḥ sarve śakraṃ mudā yutāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9057: mahaiḥ sureśam arcanti vayam anye ca mānavāḥ // HV_59.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:9061: gāvo 'smaddaivataṃ viddhi girayaś ca vanāni ca // HV_59.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:9063: asmākaṃ gauḥ parā vṛttir etat traividhyam ucyate /
GE07hv_conpu:9064: vidyayā yo yayā yuktas tasya sā daivataṃ param // HV_59.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:9065: [k: After 21, Ñ2.3 V B1.2 Dn Ds T3.4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:9067: yo 'nyasya phalam aśnānaḥ karoty anyasya satkriyām /
GE07hv_conpu:9068: dvāv anarthau sa labhate pretya ceha ca mānavaḥ // HV_59.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:9069: kṛṣyantāḥ prathitāḥ sīmāḥ sīmāntaṃ śrūyate vanam /
