GE07hv_conpu:9410: trailokyam apy utsahate grasituṃ kiṃ punar vrajam // HV_61.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:9412: gopānāṃ tumulo jajñe meghanādaś ca bāhyataḥ // HV_61.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:9414: tasya śailasya vipulaṃ pradaraṃ gahvarodaram // HV_61.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:9416: dadhāraikena hastena śailaṃ priyam ivātithim // HV_61.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:9417: tato vrajasya bhāṇḍāni yuktāni śakaṭāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:9418: viviśur varṣabhītāni tad gṛhaṃ girinirmitam // HV_61.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:9419: atidaivaṃ tu kṛṣṇasya dṛṣṭvā tat karma vajrabhṛt /
GE07hv_conpu:9420: mithyāpratijño jaladān vārayāmāsa vai vibhuḥ // HV_61.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:9422: jagāma saṃvṛto meghair vṛtrahā svargam uttamam // HV_61.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:9423: nivṛtte saptarātre tu tiṣye skanne śatakratau /
GE07hv_conpu:9424: gatābhre vimale vyomni divase dīptabhāskare // HV_61.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:9426: khaṃ ca sthānaṃ tato ghoṣaḥ pratyayāt punar eva saḥ // HV_61.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:9428: prīto niveśayāmāsa dhruvāya varado vibhuḥ // HV_61.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:9429: [h: HV (CE) ch. 62, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz
GE07hv_conpu:9430: Podzeit, extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner; March
GE07hv_conpu:9433: dhṛtaṃ govardhanaṃ dṛṣṭvā paritrātaṃ ca gokulam /
GE07hv_conpu:9434: kṛṣṇasya darśanaṃ śakro rocayāmāsa vismitaḥ // HV_62.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:9439: taṃ dṛśya bālaṃ mahatā tejasā dīptam avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:9442: paryāptanayanaḥ śakraḥ sarvair netrair udaikṣata // HV_62.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:9446: sūpaviṣṭaṃ śilāpṛṣṭe śakraḥ sa vrīḍito 'bhavat // HV_62.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:9450: chāyayā ca tayā yuktaṃ keśavaṃ yajñarūpiṇam |
GE07hv_conpu:9452: upatasthe gajaṃ hitvā kṛṣṇaṃ balaniṣūdanaḥ // HV_62.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:9454: rarāja devarājo vai vajrapūrṇakaraḥ prabhuḥ // HV_62.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:9456: [k: N (except Ś1),T,G1-3.5,M4 ins. after 10ab; G4 after 8: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:9462: [k: D6,T,G,M4 ins. after line 4; M1-3 after 10ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:9463: praṇāma akaroc chakraḥ kṣantavyam iti cābravīt |
GE07hv_conpu:9469: namas te viśvarūpāya namo lokahitāya te |
GE07hv_conpu:9473: yā yās tu devadevasya mūrtayo mūrtimattara |
GE07hv_conpu:9474: namas tābhyas tathā viṣṇo sarvābhyaḥ sarvakāmada ||
GE07hv_conpu:9476: ajñānād etha vā jñānād roṣād vā yadunandana || *HV_62.10ab*721A:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:9478: na kenacid bhavāñ śāsyaḥ śāstā sarvasya vai prabho ||
GE07hv_conpu:9479: tvannimittam idaṃ sarvam aindraṃ mama sudurlabham |
GE07hv_conpu:9481: tataś ca devadeveśa kṣantavyaṃ dāsa ity aham |
GE07hv_conpu:9482: ity uktvātha punar vākyaṃ vyājahāra śacīpatiḥ || *HV_62.10ab*721A:20
GE07hv_conpu:9486: na hi dāseṣu kopo 'sti svāmināṃ svāmisattama |
GE07hv_conpu:9487: atha divyena madhuram vyājahāra svareṇa tam // HV_62.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:9489: atidaivaṃ kṛtaṃ karma tvayā prītimatā gavām // HV_62.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:9491: yat tvayā rakṣitā gāvas tenāsmi paritoṣitaḥ // HV_62.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:9493: dhṛto veśma ivākāśe ko hy etena na vismayet // HV_62.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:9494: pratiṣiddhe mama mahe mayeyaṃ ruṣitena vai /
GE07hv_conpu:9495: ativṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā kṛṣṇa gavāṃ vai saptarātrikī // HV_62.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:9497: devaiḥ sadānavagaṇair durnivāryā mayi sthite // HV_62.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:9498: aho me supriyaṃ kṛṣṇa yat tvaṃ mānuṣadehavān /
GE07hv_conpu:9499: samagraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo vinigūhasi roṣitaḥ // HV_62.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:9500: sādhitaṃ devatānāṃ hi manye 'haṃ kāryam avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:9501: tvayi mānuṣyam āpanne yuktenaivaṃ svatejasā // HV_62.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:9502: setsyate vīra kāryārtho na kiṃcit parihāsyate /
GE07hv_conpu:9503: devānām yad bhavān netā sarvakāryapurogamaḥ // HV_62.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:9504: ekas tvam asi lokānāṃ devānāṃ ca sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9505: dvitīyaṃ nānupaśyāmi dhuraṃ yas te samudvahet // HV_62.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:9506: yathā hi puṃgavaḥ śreṣṭho magne dhuri niyujyate /
GE07hv_conpu:9507: evaṃ tvam asi devānāṃ magnānāṃ dvijavāhana // HV_62.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:9509: brahmaṇā sādhu nirdiṣṭaṃ dhātubhya iva kāñcanam // HV_62.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:9510: svayaṃ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān buddhyātha vayasāpi vā /
GE07hv_conpu:9511: na tvānugantuṃ śakto vai paṅgur drutagatiṃ yathā // HV_62.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:9513: garutmān pakṣiṇāṃ śreṣṭho devatānāṃ bhavān varaḥ // HV_62.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:9514: apām adhastāl loko vai tasyopari mahīdharāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9515: nāgānām upariṣṭād bhūḥ pṛthivyupari mānuṣāḥ // HV_62.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:9516: manuṣyalokād ūrdhvaṃ tu khagānāṃ gatir ucyate /
GE07hv_conpu:9517: ākāśasyopari ravir dvāraṃ svargasya bhānumān // HV_62.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:9519: yatrāhaṃ kṛṣṇa devānām aindre vinihitaḥ pade // HV_62.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:9523: tatra somagatiś caiva jyotiṣāṃ ca mahātmanām // HV_62.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:9524: tasyopari gavāṃ lokaḥ sādhyās taṃ pālayanti hi /
GE07hv_conpu:9525: sa hi sarvagataḥ kṛṣṇa mahākāśagato mahān // HV_62.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:9527: yāṃ na vidmo vayaṃ sarve pṛcchanto 'pi pitāmaham // HV_62.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:9531: lokas tv arvāg duṣkṛtināṃ nāgalokas tu dāruṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9532: pṛthivī karmaśīlānāṃ kṣetraṃ sarvasya karmaṇaḥ // HV_62.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:9535: brāhme tapasi yuktānāṃ brahmalokaḥ parā gatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9536: gavām eva hi goloko durārohā hi sā gatiḥ // HV_62.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:9537: sa tu lokas tvayā kṛṣṇa sīdamānaḥ kṛtātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:9538: dhṛto dhṛtimatā vīra nighnatopadravaṃ gavām // HV_62.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:9539: tad ahaṃ samanuprāpto gavāṃ vākyena coditaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9540: brahmanaś ca mahābhāga gauravāt tava cāgataḥ // HV_62.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:9542: aditer garbhaparyāye pūrvajas te purātanaḥ // HV_62.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:9543: tejas tejasvinaś caiva yat te darśitavān aham /
GE07hv_conpu:9544: megharūpeṇa tat sarvaṃ kṣantum arhasi me vibho // HV_62.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:9545: evaṃ kṣāntamanāḥ kṛṣṇa svena saumyena tejasā /
GE07hv_conpu:9546: brahmaṇaḥ śṛṇu me vākyaṃ gavāṃ ca gajavikrama // HV_62.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:9547: āha tvā bhagavān brahmā gāvaś cākāśagā divi /
GE07hv_conpu:9548: karmabhis toṣitā divyais tava saṃrakṣaṇādibhiḥ // HV_62.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:9549: bhavatā rakṣitā gāvo gobhir lokāś ca rakṣitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9550: yad vayaṃ puṃgavaiḥ sārdhaṃ vardhāmaḥ prasavais tathā // HV_62.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:9551: karṣakān puṃgavair vāhyair medhyena haviṣā surān /
GE07hv_conpu:9553: tad asmākaṃ gurus tvaṃ hi prāṇadaś ca mahābala /
GE07hv_conpu:9554: adyaprabhṛti no rājā tvam indro vai bhaviṣyasi // HV_62.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:9555: tasmāt tvaṃ kāñcanaiḥ pūrṇair divyasya payaso ghaṭaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9556: ebhis tvam abhiṣicyasva mayā hastāvanāmitaiḥ // HV_62.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:9557: ahaṃ kilendro devānāṃ tvaṃ gavām indratāṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9558: govinda iti lokās tvāṃ stoṣyanti bhuvi śāśvatam // HV_62.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:9559: mamopari yathendras tvam sthāpito gobhir īśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9560: upendra iti kṛṣṇa tvām gāsyanti divi devatāḥ // HV_62.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:9561: ye ceme vārṣikā māsāś catvāro vihitā mama /
GE07hv_conpu:9562: eṣām ardhaṃ prayacchāmi śaratkālaṃ tu paścimam // HV_62.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:9563: varṣārdhe ca dhvajo nityaṃ tataḥ pūjām avāpsyati /
GE07hv_conpu:9564: mamāmbuprabhavaṃ darpaṃ tadā tyakṣyanti barhinaḥ // HV_62.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:9568: sahasraraśmir ādityas tāpayan svena tejasā // HV_62.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:9570: yāvat sukhatarais toyair vipluteṣu pluteṣu ca // HV_62.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:9571: [k: N (except Ś,Ñ1),T2-4,G,M4 ins. after 49; T1 after 52ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:9574: goṣu caiva prahṛṣṭāsu kṣarantīṣu payo bahu // HV_62.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:9575: nivṛtteṣu ca megheṣu niryātya jagato jalam /
GE07hv_conpu:9576: ākāśe śastrasaṃkāśe haṃseṣu vicaratsu ca // HV_62.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:9577: jātapadmeṣu toyeṣu vāpīṣu ca saritsu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:9579: taḍāgeṣu ca kānteṣu toyeṣu vimaleṣu ca |
GE07hv_conpu:9582: sasasyāyāṃ ca sīmāyāṃ manoharyāṃ muner api // HV_62.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:9585: ikṣumatsu ca deśeṣu pravṛtteṣu makheṣu ca // HV_62.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:9587: loke 'smin kṛṣṇa nikhile yathaiva tridive tathā // HV_62.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:9588: narās tvāṃ caiva māṃ caiva dhvajākārāsu yaṣṭiṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:9589: mahendraś cāpy upendraś ca mahīyetāṃ mahītale // HV_62.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:9591: mānavāḥ praṇamiṣyanti teṣāṃ nāsty anayāgamaḥ // HV_62.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:9595: kṛtvā nīrājanaṃ divyair alaṃkṛtya ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:9596: tataḥ śakras tu tān gṛhya ghaṭān divyapayodharān /
GE07hv_conpu:9598: dṛṣṭvā tam abhiṣicyantaṃ gāvas tāḥ saha yūthapaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9599: stanaiḥ prasnavasaṃyuktaiḥ siṣicuḥ kṛṣṇam avyayam // HV_62.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:9600: meghāś ca divi muktābhiḥ sāmṛtābhiḥ samantataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9603: vavarṣuḥ puṣpavarṣaṃ ca nedus tūryāṇi cāmbare // HV_62.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:9606: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:9608: ete ca munayaḥ sarve siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:9609: ekārṇavavimuktaṃ ca dadhāra vasudhā vapuḥ // HV_62.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:9610: prasādaṃ sāgarā jagmur vavur vātā jagaddhitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9611: ītayaḥ praśamaṃ jagmur jagmur nirvairatāṃ nṛpāḥ // HV_62.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:9615: mārgastho vibabhau bhānuḥ somo yogena saṃgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9617: madaṃ prasusruvur nāgā yātās toṣaṃ vane mṛgāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9618: alaṃkṛtā gātraruhair vātubhir bhānti parvatāḥ // HV_62.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:9621: abhiṣiktaṃ tu taṃ gobhiḥ śakro govindam avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:9623: eṣa me prathamaḥ kṛṣṇa niyogo goṣu yaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9625: kṣipraṃ saṃsādhyatāṃ kaṃsaḥ keśī ca turagādhamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9626: ariṣṭaś ca madāviṣṭo rājarājyaṃ tataḥ kuru // HV_62.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:9627: pitṛṣvasari jātas te mamāṃśo 'ham iva sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9628: sa te rakṣyaś ca mānyaś ca sakhye ca viniyujyatām // HV_62.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:9629: tvayā hy anugṛhītaḥ sa tava vṛttānuvartakaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9630: tvadvaśe vartamānaḥ sa prāpsyate vipulaṃ yaśaḥ // HV_62.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:9631: bhāratasya ca vaṃśasya sa variṣṭho dhanurdharaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9632: bhaviṣyaty anurūpaś ca tvām ṛte na ca raṃsyate // HV_62.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:9633: bhārataṃ tvayi cāsaktaṃ tasmiṃś ca puruṣottame /
GE07hv_conpu:9634: ubhābhyām api saṃyoge yāsyanti nidhanaṃ nṛpāḥ // HV_62.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:9635: pratijñātaṃ ca me kṛṣṇa ṛṣimadhye sureṣu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:9636: mama putro 'rjuno nāma jātaḥ kuntyāṃ kurūdvahaḥ // HV_62.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:9638: taṃ pravekṣyanti vai sarve rājānaḥ śastrayodhinaḥ // HV_62.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:9642: nānuyāsyanti rājāno devā vā tvāṃ vinā prabho // HV_62.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:9643: sa te bandhuḥ sahāyaś ca saṃgrāmeṣu bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:9644: tasya yogo vidhātavyas tvayā govinda matkṛte // HV_62.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:9645: draṣṭavyaḥ sa yathāhaṃ vai tvayā mānyaś ca nityaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9646: jñātā tvam eva lokānām arjunasya ca nityaśaḥ // HV_62.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:9647: tvayā hi nityaṃ rakṣyaḥ sa āhaveṣu mahatsu ca /
GE07hv_conpu:9648: rakṣitasya tvayā tasya na mṛtyuḥ prabhaviṣyati // HV_62.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:9649: arjunaṃ viddhi māṃ kṛṣṇa māṃ caivātmānam ātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:9650: ātmā te 'haṃ yathā śaśvat tathaiva tava so 'rjuna // HV_62.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:9651: tvayā lokān imāñ jitvā baler hastāt tribhiḥ kramaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9652: devatānāṃ kṛto rājā purā jyeṣṭhakramād aham // HV_62.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:9653: tvāṃ ca satyamayaṃ jñātvā satyeṣṭaṃ satyavikramam /
GE07hv_conpu:9654: satyenopetya devā vai yojayanti ripukṣaye // HV_62.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:9655: so 'rjuno nāma me putraḥ pitus te bhaginīsutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9656: iha sauhṛdatāṃ yātu bhūtvā sahacaraḥ purā // HV_62.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:9657: tasya te yudhyataḥ kṛṣṇa svasthāne 'tha gṛhe 'pi vā /
GE07hv_conpu:9658: voḍhavyā puṃgaveneva dhūḥ sarvā raṇavāhinī // HV_62.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:9660: abhitas tan mahadyuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati mahīkṣitām // HV_62.86 //
GE07hv_conpu:9662: vijayasyārjuno bhoktā yaśasā tvaṃ tu yokṣyase // HV_62.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:9663: etan me kṛṣṇa kārtsnyena kartum arhasi bhāṣitam /
GE07hv_conpu:9664: yady ahaṃ te surāś caiva satyaṃ ca priyam acyuta // HV_62.88 //
GE07hv_conpu:9665: śakrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇo govindatāṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9666: prītena manasā yuktaḥ prativākyaṃ jagāda ha // HV_62.89 //
GE07hv_conpu:9667: prīto 'smi darśanād eva tava śakra śacīpate /
GE07hv_conpu:9668: yat tvayābhihitaṃ cedaṃ na kiṃcit parihāsyate // HV_62.90 //
GE07hv_conpu:9670: jāne pitṛṣvasā dattā pāṇḍor vasumatīpateḥ // HV_62.91 //
GE07hv_conpu:9672: bhīmasenaṃ ca jānāmi vāyoḥ saṃtānajāṃ tanum // HV_62.92 //
GE07hv_conpu:9675: aśvibhyāṃ sādhu jānāmi sṛṣṭaṃ putradvayaṃ śubham /
GE07hv_conpu:9676: nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca mādryāḥ kukṣibhavāv ubhau // HV_62.93 //
GE07hv_conpu:9677: kānīnaṃ cāpi jānāmi savituḥ prathamaṃ sutam /
GE07hv_conpu:9678: pitṛṣvasari karṇaṃ vai prasūtaṃ sūtatāṃ gatam // HV_62.94 //
GE07hv_conpu:9679: dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca me sarve viditā yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9683: tad gaccha tridivaṃ śakra sukhāya tridivaukasām /
GE07hv_conpu:9684: nārjunasya ripuḥ kaścin mamāgre prabhaviṣyati // HV_62.96 //
GE07hv_conpu:9685: arjunārthe ca tān sarvān pāṇḍavān akṣatān yudhi /
GE07hv_conpu:9686: kuntyā niryātayiṣyāmi nivṛtte bhārate mṛdhe // HV_62.97 //
GE07hv_conpu:9687: yac ca vakṣyati māṃ śakra tanūjas tava so 'rjunaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9688: bhṛtyavat tat kariṣyāmi tava snehena yantritaḥ // HV_62.98 //
GE07hv_conpu:9689: satyasaṃdhasya tac chrutvā priyaṃ prītasya bhāṣitam /
GE07hv_conpu:9692: kṛṣṇasya sākṣāt tridivaṃ jagāma tridaśeśvaraḥ // HV_62.99 //
GE07hv_conpu:9697: [h: HV (CE) ch. 63, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz
GE07hv_conpu:9698: Podzeit, extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner; March
GE07hv_conpu:9701: gate śakre tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pūjyamāno vrajaukasaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9702: govardhanadharaḥ śrīmān viveśa vrajam eva ha // HV_63.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:9703: taṃ sma vṛddhābhinandanti jñātayaś ca sahoṣitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:9704: dhanyāḥ smo 'nugṛhītāḥ smas tvaddhṛtena nagena ha // HV_63.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:9705: gāvo varṣabhayāt tīrṇā vayaṃ tīrṇā mahābhayāt /

GE07hv_conpu:10025: na kṛtaghnasya loko 'sti bāndhavasya viśeṣataḥ // HV_65.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:10027: yaḥ kṛtaghno 'nubandhena prītiṃ vahati dāruṇām // HV_65.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:10029: apāpe pāpahṛdayo yaḥ pāpam anutiṣṭhati // HV_65.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:10032: ahaṃ vā svajanaḥ ślāghyaḥ sa vā ślāghyataraḥ sutaḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:10035: yuddhavyuparame te tu sahāśnanti mahāvane // HV_65.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:10037: vadhyate yo 'ntaraprepsuḥ svajano yāti vikriyām // HV_65.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:10038: kalis tvaṃ hi vināśāya mayā puṣṭo vijānatā /
GE07hv_conpu:10041: tad dattaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ piṇḍaṃ yad dattaṃ tava jānatā |
GE07hv_conpu:10042: tac chvabhyo yadi dattaṃ syāc chreyo mama bhaviṣyati |
GE07hv_conpu:10044: amarṣī vairaśīlaś ca sadā pāpamatiḥ śaṭhaḥ // HV_65.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:10045: sthāne yadukulaṃ mūḍha śocanīyaṃ tvayā kṛtam /

GE07hv_conpu:10050: na tena vṛddho bhavati yenāsya palitaṃ śiraḥ |

GE07hv_conpu:10052: kevalaṃ vayasā vṛddho yathā śaradi toyadaḥ // HV_65.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:10053: kiṃ ca tvaṃ sādhu jānīṣe vasudeva vṛthāmate /

GE07hv_conpu:10055: chinnāśas tvaṃ vṛthāvṛddha mithyā hy evaṃ vicāritam /

GE07hv_conpu:10057: prahartukāmo viśvaste yas tvaṃ svasthena cetasā /

GE07hv_conpu:10059: na me vṛddhavadhaḥ kaścid dvijastrīvadha eva vā /

GE07hv_conpu:10086: asmākam api mallau dvau sajjau jayadhṛtotsavau /

GE07hv_conpu:10093: janasyāmantritasyārthe yathā syāt sarvam avyayam // HV_65.90 //

GE07hv_conpu:10102: sāntvam eva tu bāleṣu pradhānaṃ prathamo nayaḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:11367: tataś cacāla vasudhā mañcāś caiva jughūrṇire /
GE07hv_conpu:11368: mukutāc cāpi kaṃsasya papāta maṇir uttamaḥ // HV_75.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:11369: dorbhyām ānamya kṛṣṇas tu cāṇūraṃ pūrṇajīvitam /
GE07hv_conpu:11370: prāharan muṣṭinā mūrdhni vakṣasyāhatya jānunā // HV_75.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:11372: tāpanīye yathā ghaṇṭe vakṣyopari vilambite // HV_75.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:11373: sa papāta ca raṅgasya madhye niḥsṛtalocanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11376: saṃniruddho mahāmārgaḥ sa śaileneva lakṣyate // HV_75.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:11377: [h: HV (CE) ch. 76, transliterated by Peter Schreiner; version of March 4,
GE07hv_conpu:11381: jagrāha muṣṭikaṃ raṅge kṛṣṇas tosalakaṃ punaḥ // HV_76.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:11386: saṃnipāte tu tau mallau prathame krodhamūrcchitau /
GE07hv_conpu:11393: mukhād rudhiram atyartham ājagāma mumūrṣataḥ // HV_76.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:11397: śirasy abhyahanad vīro vajreṇeva mahāgirim // HV_76.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:11399: papātābhimukhas tatra tato nādo mahān abhūt // HV_76.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:11403: andhre tadā mahāmalle muṣṭike ca nipātite // HV_76.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:11409: vasudevo jarāṃ tyaktvā snehena taruṇāyate // HV_76.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:11410: vāramukhyāś ca tāḥ sarvāḥ kṛṣṇasya mukhapaṅkajam /
GE07hv_conpu:11415: dīptam antargataṃ tasya hṛdayaṃ mānasāgninā // HV_76.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:11423: so ājñāpayata saṃkruddhaḥ puruṣān vyāyatān bahūn /
GE07hv_conpu:11424: gopāv etau samājaughān niṣkrāmyetāṃ vanecarau // HV_76.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:11425: na caitau draṣṭum icchāmi vikṛtau pāpadarśinau /
GE07hv_conpu:11426: gopānām api me rājye na kaścit sthātum arhati // HV_76.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:11427: nandagopaś ca durmedhāḥ pāpeṣv abhirato mama /
GE07hv_conpu:11429: vasudevaś ca durvṛtto nityaṃ chadmacaro mama /
GE07hv_conpu:11430: avṛddhārheṇa daṇḍena kṣipram adyaiva vadhyatām // HV_76.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:11432: eṣāṃ hriyantāṃ gāvaś ca yac cāsti vasu kiṃcana // HV_76.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:11435: kṣipte pitari cukrodha nandagope ca keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11436: jñātīnāṃ ca vyathāṃ dṛṣṭvā visaṃjñāṃ caiva devakīm // HV_76.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:11437: sa siṃha iva vegena kesarī jātavikramaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11440: asajjan vāyunā kṣipto yathā vidyud ghanād ghanam // HV_76.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:11441: dadṛśur na hi taṃ sarve raṅgamadhyād avaplutam /
GE07hv_conpu:11444: ākāśād iva govindaṃ mene tatrāgataṃ vibhum // HV_76.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:11446: tam āviśantam ālokya mṛtyum ātmana āsanāt |
GE07hv_conpu:11453: kiṃcid dayāparāmṛṣṭo hantuṃ naicchat sa keśavaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11457: sthitaḥ kaṃsas tu mañceṣu prasvinnaḥ sarvagātrakaiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11460: jahi kaṃsaṃ yavīyāṃsam āyudhaiś ca vivarjitam || *HV_76.28*848:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:11461: etac chrutvā tu kaṃsaṃ sa sahasotthitavāṃs tataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11462: vadan vākyaṃ janān vīkṣya vepamāno yathā nagaḥ || *HV_76.28*848:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:11464: devam ūrjastaraṃ jñātvā yathā yatno hi pauruṣaḥ || *HV_76.28*848:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:11466: jahi gopa mahābāho prāṇā [hi] tvarayanti mām || *HV_76.28*848:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:11469: mūrdhajeṣu parāmṛṣṭaḥ kaṃso vai raṅgasaṃsadi // HV_76.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:11471: sirasas tasya kṛṣṇena parāmṛṣṭasya pāṇinā // HV_76.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:11472: sa hastagrastakeśaś ca kaṃso niryatnatāṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11473: tathaiva ca visaṃmūḍho vihvalaḥ samapadyata // HV_76.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:11474: nigṛhītaś ca keśeṣu mandāsur iva niḥśvasan /
GE07hv_conpu:11475: na śaśāka mukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ kaṃsaḥ kṛṣṇasya vai tadā // HV_76.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:11477: pralambābhyāṃ ca bāhubhyāṃ gātrair visṛtabhūṣaṇaiḥ // HV_76.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:11479: veṣṭamānaḥ samākṣiptaḥ kaṃsaḥ kṛṣṇena tejasā // HV_76.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:11481: śirasy abhyahanat kṛṣṇo muṣṭinā balavad balī |
GE07hv_conpu:11482: yenaiva muṣṭinā viṣṇur yathā syāt prāṇasaṃśayaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11483: cakarṣa ca mahāraṅge mañcān niṣkramya keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11484: keśeṣu balavad gṛhya kaṃsaṃ kleśārhatāṃ gatam // HV_76.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:11488: samājavāṭe parikhāṃ dehakṛṣṭāṃ cakāra ha // HV_76.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:11491: dharaṇyāṃ mṛditaḥ śete tasya dehaḥ sukhocitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11493: tasya tad vadanaṃ śyāvaṃ suptākṣaṃ mukuṭaṃ vinā /
GE07hv_conpu:11494: na vibhāti viparyastaṃ vipalāśaṃ yathāmbujam // HV_76.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:11495: asaṃgrāme hataḥ kaṃsaḥ sa bāṇair aparikṣataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11501: mātuś ca śirasā pādau nipīḍya yadunandanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11504: abhiṣekaṃ tadā cakre devakī kṛṣṇam avyayam |
GE07hv_conpu:11505: [k: After *851 G3.5 cont.; D6,T1.2,G1.2.4,M ins. after 43: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11506: ugrasenasya ca tadā vavande śirasā hariḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11508: yādavāṃś caiva tān sarvān yathāsthānaṃ yathāvayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11509: papraccha kuśalaṃ kṛṣṇo dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā // HV_76.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:11511: bāhubhyām eva tarasā sunāmānam apothayat // HV_76.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:11514: tau jitārī jitakrodhau ciraṃ viproṣitau vraje /
GE07hv_conpu:11515: svapitur bhavanaṃ vīrau jagmatur hṛṣṭamānasau // HV_76.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:11517: te ca devāḥ samunayo hate kaṃse durātmani |
GE07hv_conpu:11518: namaskṛtya jagannāthaṃ svaṃ svaṃ jagmur yathālayam |
GE07hv_conpu:11521: hatvā pūtānikāṃ vibhajya śakaṭaṃ bhaṅktvārjunau dānavān |
GE07hv_conpu:11523: hatvā keśinam unmadaṃ viṣataruṃ coddhṛtya govardhanaṃ |
GE07hv_conpu:11524: yaḥ kaṃsaṃ sagajendramallam avadhīt tasmai namo viṣṇave ||
GE07hv_conpu:11527: iti stutvā bahuvidhaṃ te devā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11528: [h: HV (CE) chapter 77, transliterated by John Brockington, proof-read by John Brockington, version of 7th November 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:11530: bhartāraṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣīṇapuṇyam iva graham /
GE07hv_conpu:11531: kaṃsapatnyo hataṃ kaṃsaṃ samantāt paryavārayan // HV_77.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:11533: bhāryāḥ sma dṛṣṭvā śocanti mṛgyo mṛgavadhe yathā // HV_77.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:11534: hā hatāḥ sma mahābāho hatāṣā hatabāndhavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11535: vīraptnyo hate vīre tvayi vīravratapriye // HV_77.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:11536: imām avasthāṃ paśyantyaḥ paścimāṃ tava naiṣṭhikīm /
GE07hv_conpu:11538: chinnamūlāḥ sma saṃvṛttāḥ parityaktāḥ sma śobhanaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11539: tvayi pañcatvam āpanne nāthe 'smākaṃ mahābale // HV_77.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:11541: latā iva viceṣṭantyaḥ śayanīyāni neṣyati // HV_77.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:11543: dahaty arko mukhaṃ kāntaṃ nistoyam iva paṅkajam // HV_77.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:11544: imau te śravaṇau śūnyau na śobhete vikuṇḍalau /
GE07hv_conpu:11546: kva te sa mukuṭo vīra sarvaratnavibhūṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11547: atyantaṃ śiraso lakṣmīṃ yo dadhāty arkasaprabhaḥ // HV_77.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:11549: kathaṃ dīnena kartavyaṃ tvayi lokāntaraṃ gate // HV_77.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:11550: nanu nāma striyaḥ sādhvyaḥ priyabhogeṣv avañcitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11551: patīnām aparityajyās tvaṃ tu nas tyajya gacchasi // HV_77.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:11555: kālatulyaḥ sapatnānāṃ tvaṃ kṣipram apanīyase // HV_77.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:11556: vayaṃ duḥkheṣv anucitāḥ sukheṣv eva tu yojitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11557: kathaṃ vatsyāma vidhavā nātha kārpaṇyam āśritāḥ // HV_77.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:11558: strīṇāṃ cāritralubdhānāṃ patir ekaḥ parā gatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11559: tvaṃ hi naḥ sā gatiś chinnā kṛtāntena balīyasā // HV_77.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:11561: [k: Ñ2 V.12 B Ds (D2 after 12) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11563: roditavye dhruve magnāḥ kva gacchāmas tvayā vinā // HV_77.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:11564: saha tvayā gataḥ kālas tvadaṅke krīḍitaṃ gatam /
GE07hv_conpu:11565: kṣaṇena ca vihīnāḥ sma anityā hi nṛṇāṃ gatiḥ // HV_77.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:11566: aho bata vipannāḥ sma vipanne tvayi mānada /
GE07hv_conpu:11569: tvayi kāmavaśāḥ sarvāḥ sa nas tyajya kva gacchasi // HV_77.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:11570: [k: Ñ3 V2.3 B Dn Ds D4 (V1 after 18ab, D2 after *856) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11571: asmākaṃ tvam anāthānāṃ nātho hy asi suropama |
GE07hv_conpu:11573: prativākyaṃ jagannātha dātum arhasi mānada // HV_77.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:11575: gamanaṃ te mahārāja dāruṇaṃ pratibhāti naḥ // HV_77.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:11576: nūnaṃ kāntatarāḥ kānta tasmiṃl loke varastriyaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11577: tatas tvaṃ prasthito vīra vihāyemaṃ gṛhe janam // HV_77.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:11578: kiṃ nu te karuṇaṃ vīra bhāryāsv etāsu bhūmipa /
GE07hv_conpu:11581: ye parityajya dārān svān nirapekṣā vrajanti ha // HV_77.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:11582: apatitvaṃ striyāḥ śreyo na tu śūraḥ striyāḥ patiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11583: svargastrīṇāṃ priyāḥ śurās teṣām api ca tāḥ priyāḥ // HV_77.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:11584: aho kṣipram adṛśyena nayatā tvayā raṇapriyam /
GE07hv_conpu:11585: prahṛtaṃ naḥ kṛtāntena sarvāsām antarātmasu // HV_77.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:11586: hatvā jarāsaṃdhabalaṃ jitvā yakṣāṃś ca saṃyuge /
GE07hv_conpu:11588: jarāsaṃdhabalaṃ jitvā hatvā rājñāṃ ca saṃyuge |
GE07hv_conpu:11590: jitvā devagaṇaṃ yuddhe yakṣān api ca saṃyuge |
GE07hv_conpu:11591: kathaṃ mānuṣamātreṇa hatas tvaṃ jagatīpate // HV_77.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:11593: amartyair ajito yuddhe martyenāsi kathaṃ hataḥ // HV_77.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:11597: sāyakair jaladān bhittvā balād varṣaṃ pravartitam // HV_77.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:11599: preṣayāṇā varārhāṇi ratnāny ācchādanāni ca // HV_77.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:11601: kathaṃ prāṇāntikaṃ ghoram īdṛśaṃ bhayam āgatam // HV_77.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:11602: prāptāḥ smo vidhavāśabdaṃ tvayi nāthe nipātite /
GE07hv_conpu:11603: apramattāḥ pramattāḥ sma kṛtāntena nirākṛtāḥ // HV_77.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:11604: yady evaṃ nātha gantavyaṃ yadi vā vismṛtā vayam /
GE07hv_conpu:11605: vākyamātreṇa yāsyeti kartavyo naḥ parigrahaḥ // HV_77.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:11606: prasīda nātha bhītāḥ sma pādau te yāma mūrdhabhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11608: aho vīra kathaṃ śeṣe niṣaṇṇas tṛṇapāṃsuṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:11609: śayānasya hi te bhūmau kasmān nodvijate manaḥ // HV_77.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:11611: prahṛtaṃ kena sarvāsu nārīsv evaṃ sudāruṇam // HV_77.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:11613: kiṃ vayaṃ sati gantavye saha bhartrā rudāmahe // HV_77.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:11615: kva me vatsaḥ kva me putra iti rorūyate bhṛśam // HV_77.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:11616: sāpaśyat taṃ hataṃ putraṃ nipītaṃ śaśinaṃ yathā /
GE07hv_conpu:11617: hṛdayena vidīrṇena śrāmyamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ // HV_77.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:11620: hā hatāsmīti vāśantī papāta bhuvi duḥkhitā |
GE07hv_conpu:11621: snuṣāṇām ārtanādena vilalāpa ruroda ca // HV_77.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:11622: sā tasya vadanaṃ dīnam utsaṅge putragṛddhinī /
GE07hv_conpu:11623: kṛtvā putreti karuṇaṃ vilalāpārtayā girā // HV_77.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:11625: kim idaṃ tvaritaṃ tāta prasthānaṃ kṛtavān asi // HV_77.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:11626: prasuptaś cāsi vivṛte kiṃ putra śayanaṃ vinā /
GE07hv_conpu:11627: tāta naivaṃvidhā bhūmau śerate kṛtalakṣaṇāḥ // HV_77.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:11631: bāndhavebhyo bhayaṃ ghoram anivāryaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_77.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:11633: jñātibhyo bhayam utpannaṃ śarīrāntakaraṃ mahat // HV_77.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:11635: vinamrasya hy anaukasya (?) vaktur vigraham ṛcchataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11637: sā patiṃ bhūpatiṃ vṛddham ugrasenaṃ vicetasam /
GE07hv_conpu:11638: uvāca rudatī vākyaṃ vivatsā saurabhī yathā // HV_77.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:11639: ehy ehi rājan dharmātman paśya putraṃ janeśvaram /
GE07hv_conpu:11646: pretakāryāṇi kāryāṇi mṛtaḥ kim aparādhyate // HV_77.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:11647: evam uktvā patiṃ bhojaṃ keśān ārujya duḥkhitā /
GE07hv_conpu:11648: putrasya mukham īkṣantī vilalāpaiva sā bhṛśam // HV_77.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:11649: imās te kiṃ kariṣyanti bhāryā rājan sukhocitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11650: tvāṃ patiṃ supatiṃ prāpya yā vipannamanorathāḥ // HV_77.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:11651: imaṃ te pitaraṃ vṛddhaṃ kṛṣṇasya vaśavartinam /
GE07hv_conpu:11652: kathaṃ drakṣyāmi śuṣyantaṃ kāsārasalilaṃ yathā // HV_77.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:11653: ahaṃ te jananī putra kimarthaṃ nābhibhāṣase /
GE07hv_conpu:11654: prasthito dīrgham adhvānaṃ parityajyya priyaṃ janam // HV_77.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:11656: ācchidya mama mandāyā nīyase nayakovida // HV_77.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:11659: nāmāni ca gṛhītāni samyagvṛttāni tair guṇaiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11660: rudanti tava bhṛtyānāṃ kulāni kulayūthapa // HV_77.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:11662: trāhi dīnaṃ janaṃ sarvaṃ puram antaḥpuraṃ tathā // HV_77.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:11665: [h: HV (CE) chapter 78, transliterated by John Brockington, proof-read by John Brockington, version of 12th November 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:11667: ugrasenas tu kṛṣṇasya samīpaṃ duḥkhito yayau /
GE07hv_conpu:11669: sa dadarśa gṛhe kṛṣṇaṃ yādavair abhisaṃvṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:11676: vaidhavyaṃ strīsahasrāṇāṃ kaṃsasyāsya kṛte kṛtam // HV_78.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:11678: evam ārtaṃ rudantīṣu mayā bhartari pātite // HV_78.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:11681: kaṃsasya hi vadhaḥ śreyān prāg evābhimato mama /
GE07hv_conpu:11682: sutām udvejanīyasya pāpeṣv abhiratasya ca // HV_78.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:11684: akliṣṭaṃ maraṇaṃ śreyo na vidviṣṭasya jīvitam // HV_78.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:11685: kaṃsaḥ pāparatiś caiva sādhūnāṃ cāpy asaṃmataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11686: dhikśabdapatitaś caiva jīvite cāsya kā dayā // HV_78.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:11687: svarge tapobhṛtāṃ vāsaḥ phalaṃ puṇyasya karmaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11688: ihāpi yaśasā yuktas tatrasthair upadhāryate // HV_78.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:11689: yadi syur nirvṛttā lokāḥ syuś ca dharmaparāḥ prajāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11690: narā dharmapravṛttāś ca na nṛpo vikṛto bhavet // HV_78.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:11694: kartāraḥ sulabhā loke duṣkṛtasyeha karmaṇaḥ // HV_78.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:11695: hataḥ so 'yaṃ mayā kaṃsaḥ sādhv etad avagamyatām /
GE07hv_conpu:11696: mūlacchedaḥ kṛtas tasya viparītasya karmaṇaḥ // HV_78.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:11698: na ced dhanyāṃ durācāraṃ vinaṅkṣyati tadā jagat |
GE07hv_conpu:11699: kaḥ kuryāt khalv idaṃ kāryaṃ badhvā pitaram ojasā |
GE07hv_conpu:11700: rājyaṃ sakalasāmantaṃ kariṣyati sadā hi saḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11701: tad eṣa sāntvyatāṃ sarvaḥ śokārtaḥ pramadājanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11702: paurāś ca puryāṃ śreṇyaś ca sāntvyatāṃ sarva eva hi // HV_78.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:11712: putra niryātitaḥ krodho nīto yāmyāṃ diśaṃ ripuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11713: svadharmādhigatā kīrtir nāma viśrāvitaṃ bhuvi // HV_78.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:11714: sthāpitaṃ satsu māhātmyaṃ śaṅkitā ripavaḥ kṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11715: sthāpito yādavo vaṃśo garvitāḥ suhṛdaḥ kṛtāḥ // HV_78.19 //

GE07hv_conpu:11726: evaṃ hi vihite yoge paryāpte kṛṣṇa vigrahe /
GE07hv_conpu:11728: [k: N (except K4 D2) T1-3 G1-3 M4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11729: tvaṃ gatiś cāgatiś caiva yadūnāṃ yadunandana |
GE07hv_conpu:11730: śṛṇu tad bruvatāṃ vīra kṛpaṇānām idaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11732: tava prasādād govinde pretakāryaṃ kriyate ha // HV_78.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:11734: sasnuṣo 'haṃ sabhāryaś ca cariṣyāmi mṛgaiḥ saha // HV_78.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:11736: ānṛṇyaṃ laukikaṃ kṛṣṇa gataḥ kila bhavāmy aham // HV_78.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:11737: asyāgniṃ paścimaṃ dattvā cittisthāne vidhiṃ vinā /
GE07hv_conpu:11739: etan me kṛṣṇa vijñāpyaṃ sneho 'tra mama yujyatām /
GE07hv_conpu:11740: prāpnotu sugatiṃ tatra kṛpaṇaḥ paścimāṃ kriyām // HV_78.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:11741: etac chrutvā vacas tasya kṛṣṇaḥ paramaharṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11742: pratyuvācograsenaṃ vai sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_78.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:11743: [k: K2.3 Ñ2.3 V1.2B DT1.2 (second time, first time after 25ab) G M ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11744: kālayuktam idaṃ tāta tvayaitad bhāṣitaṃ vacaḥ |

GE07hv_conpu:11751: kule mahati te janma vedān viditavān asi |

GE07hv_conpu:11753: sthāvarāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ jaṅgamānāṃ ca pārthiva |

GE07hv_conpu:11764: yathāyaṃ muhyate loko hy atra karmaiva kāraṇam || *HV_78.32ab*870:14

GE07hv_conpu:11768: kālena nidhanaṃ gatvā kālenaiva ca jāyate |
GE07hv_conpu:11769: kālas tu sarvabhūtānāṃ nigrahe pragrahe rataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11770: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni kālasya vaśagāni vai || *HV_78.32ab*870:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:11772: nāhaṃ vai kāraṇaṃ tatra kālas tatra tu kāraṇam || *HV_78.32ab*870:22
GE07hv_conpu:11773: atha vāhaṃ bhaviṣyāmi kāraṇaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11775: kālas tu balavān rājan durvijñeyā hi sā gatiḥ || *HV_78.32ab*870:25 |
GE07hv_conpu:11777: gatiḥ kālasya sā yena sarvaṃ kālasya gocaram |
GE07hv_conpu:11778: bravīmi yad ahaṃ tāta tad anuṣṭhīyatāṃ vacaḥ // HV_78.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:11779: na hi rājyena me kāryaṃ nāpy ahaṃ rājyalālasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11780: na cāpi rājyalubdhena mayā kaṃso nipātitaḥ // HV_78.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:11781: kiṃ tu lokahitārthāya kīrtyarthaṃ ca sutas tava /
GE07hv_conpu:11783: ahaṃ sa eva gomadhye gopaiḥ saha vanecaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11784: prītimān vicariṣyāmi kāmacārī yathā gajaḥ // HV_78.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:11785: etāvac chataśo 'py evaṃ satyena prabravīmi te /
GE07hv_conpu:11786: na me kāryaṃ nṛpatvena vijñāpyaṃ kriyatām idam // HV_78.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:11787: bhavān rājāstu me mānyo yadūnām agraṇīḥ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11789: yadi te matpriyaṃ kāryaṃ yadi vā nāsti te vyathā /
GE07hv_conpu:11790: mayā nisṛṣṭaṃ rājyaṃ svaṃ cirāya pratigṛhyatām // HV_78.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:11791: [k: K1.2 Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D2-4.5(marg.).6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:11793: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ nottaraṃ pratyabhāṣata |
GE07hv_conpu:11797: abhiṣekeṇa govindo yojayām āsa yogavit // HV_78.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:11799: cakāra saha kṛṣṇena kaṃsasya nidhanakriyām // HV_78.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:11800: taṃ sarve yādavā mukhyā rājānaṃ kṛṣṇaśāsanāt /
GE07hv_conpu:11801: anujagmuḥ purīmārge devā iva śatakratum // HV_78.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:11802: rajanyāṃ tu prabhātāyāṃ tataḥ sūrye cirodite /
GE07hv_conpu:11803: paścimaṃ kaṃsasaṃskāraṃ cakrus te yadupuṃgavāḥ // HV_78.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:11805: naiṣṭhikena vidhānena cakrus te tasya satkriyām // HV_78.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:11806: sa nīto yamunātīram uttaraṃ nṛpateḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11807: saṃskṛtaś ca yathānyāyaṃ naidhanena citāgninā // HV_78.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:11809: saṃskāraṃ lambhayām āsuḥ saha kṛṣṇena yādavāḥ // HV_78.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:11811: akṣayaṃ cāpi pretebhyo bhāṣamāṇāḥ pratasthire // HV_78.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:11813: akṣayaṃ bhāṣamāṇaś ca pretebhyaś ca pratasthire |

GE07hv_conpu:11816: hiraṇyasya suvarṇasya daśa koṭīs tathā hariḥ |

GE07hv_conpu:11833: sa kṛṣṇas tatra balavān rauhiṇeyena saṃgataḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:11838: pitur yuvābhyāṃ snigdhābhyāṃ poṣitau lalitau bhṛśam |

GE07hv_conpu:11840: sa pitā sā ca jananī yau puṣṇītāṃ svaputravat || *HV_79.0*876:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:11842: yāta yūyaṃ vrajaṃ tāta vayaṃ ca snehaduḥkhitān |
GE07hv_conpu:11843: jñātīn vo draṣṭum eṣyāmo vidhāya suhṛdāṃ sukham || *HV_79.0*876:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:11844: evaṃ sāntvayya bhagavān sa nandavrajam acyutaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11846: ity uktas tau pariṣvajya nandaḥ praṇayavihvalaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11847: pūrayann aśrubhir netre saha gopair vrajaṃ yayau |
GE07hv_conpu:11850: cakāra mathurāṃ vīrah. sa ratnākarabhūṣaṇām // HV_79.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:11851: kasyacit tv atha kālasya sahitau rāmakeśavau /
GE07hv_conpu:11858: pratijagrāha tāu kāśyo vidyāḥ prādāc ca kevalāḥ // HV_79.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:11859: tau ca śrutidharau vīrau yathāvat pratipadyatām /
GE07hv_conpu:11860: ahorātraiś catuḥṣaṣṭyā sāṅgaṃ vedam adhīyatām // HV_79.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:11862: sāṅgaṃ vedam adhīyatāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭyā dinais tathā |
GE07hv_conpu:11865: lekhyaṃ ca gaṇitaṃ cobhau prāpnutāṃ yadunandanau |
GE07hv_conpu:11866: gāndhavavedaṃ kṛtsnaṃ ca tathā lekhyāś ca tāv ubhau |
GE07hv_conpu:11868: tāv ubhau jagmatur vīrau guruṃ sāṃdīpaniṃ tataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:11871: tena tau satkṛtau rājan vicarantāv avantiṣu || *HV_79.6ab*879:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:11874: acireṇaiva kālena gurus tāv abhyaṣikṣayat // HV_79.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:11875: atīvamānuṣīṃ medhāṃ tayoś cintya gurus tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:11876: mene tāv āgatau devāv ubhau candradivākarau // HV_79.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:11877: dadarśa ca mahātmānāv ubhau tāv api parvasu /
GE07hv_conpu:11878: pūjayantau mahādevaṃ sākṣāt tryakṣam avasthitam // HV_79.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:11880: gurvarthaṃ kiṃ dadānīti rāmeṇa saha bhārata // HV_79.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:11881: tayoḥ prabhāvaṃ sa jñātvā guruḥ provāca hṛṣṭavat /
GE07hv_conpu:11882: putram icchāmy ahaṃ dattaṃ yo mṛto lavaṇāmbhasi // HV_79.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:11883: putra eko hi me jātaḥ sa cāpi timinā hṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11884: prabhāse tīrthayātrāyāṃ taṃ me tvaṃ punar ānaya // HV_79.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:11886: gatvā samudraṃ tejasvī viveśāntarjalaṃ hariḥ // HV_79.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:11887: samudraḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā darśayām āsa taṃ tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:11888: tam āha kṛṣṇaḥ kvāsau bhoḥ putraḥ sāṃdīpaner iti // HV_79.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:11889: samudras tam uvācedaṃ daityaḥ pañcajano mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:11890: timirūpeṇa taṃ bālaṃ grastavān iti mādhava // HV_79.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:11892: unmathya salilād asmād grastavān iti bhārata |
GE07hv_conpu:11894: na cāsasāda taṃ bālaṃ guruputraṃ tadācyutaḥ // HV_79.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:11895: sa tu pañcajanaṃ hatvā śaṅkhaṃ lebhe janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11896: yaḥ sa devamanuṣyeṣu pāñcajanya iti śrutaḥ // HV_79.16 //

GE07hv_conpu:11901: tam uvāca tato viṣṇuṃ mṛtyunā cāhṛto hare |
GE07hv_conpu:11903: aho dhārṣṭyaṃ tato mṛtyor ity uktvā dhanur ādade || *HV_79.16*881:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:11904: ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ dīyatām iti cābravīt |
GE07hv_conpu:11905: kruddhaṃ viṣṇuṃ samājñāya dattavān kila bālakam |

GE07hv_conpu:11914: kim āgamanakṛtyaṃ te kiṃ karomīti cābravīt || *HV_79.17ab*884:2 |

GE07hv_conpu:11919: dīrghakālagataḥ pretaḥ punar āsīc charīravān // HV_79.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:11920: tad aśakyam acintyaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sumahad adbhutam /

GE07hv_conpu:11922: sa guroḥ putram ādāya pāñcajanyaṃ ca mādhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11923: ratnāni ca mahārhāṇi punar āyāj jagatpatiḥ // HV_79.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:11924: rakṣasas tasya ratnāni mahārhāṇi bahūni ca /

GE07hv_conpu:11931: sametya mumude rājan pūjayan rāmakeśavau // HV_79.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:11932: kṛtāstrau tāv ubhau vīrau gurum āmantrya suvratau /
GE07hv_conpu:11933: āyātau mathurāṃ bhūyo vasudevasutāv ubhau // HV_79.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:11937: sabālavṛddhā sā caiva purī samabhivartata // HV_79.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:11939: rathyāḥ patākāmālinyo bhrājanti sma samantataḥ // HV_79.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:11945: sve pure nirbhayāḥ sarve krīḍadhvaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ // HV_79.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:11948: na tatra kaś cid dīno vā malino vā vicetanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:11949: mathurāyāṃ babhau rājan govinde samupasthite // HV_79.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:11951: naranārīgaṇāḥ sarve bhejire manasaḥ sukham // HV_79.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:11952: śivāś ca vātāḥ pravavur virajaskā diśo daśa /
GE07hv_conpu:11953: daivatāni ca sarvāṇi hṛṣṭāny āyataneṣv api // HV_79.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:11954: yāni liṅgāni lokasya babhuḥ kṛtayuge purā /

GE07hv_conpu:11957: hariyuktena govindo viveśa mathurāṃ purīm // HV_79.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:11958: viśantaṃ mathurāṃ ramyāṃ tam upendram ariṃdamam /

GE07hv_conpu:12040: kṛtvā sarvasamudyogaṃ krodhād abhiyayau yadūn // HV_80.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:12042: mitrāṇi jñātayaś caiva saṃyuktāḥ suhṛdas tathā // HV_80.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:12043: ta enam anvayuḥ sarve sainyaiḥ samuditair vṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12044: [k: T1.3(second time) G3(second time) M ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12045: ye nṛpāḥ parvatāt tasmād gomantād vrīḷitā gatāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12046: te ca sarve yadūn hantuṃ jarāsaṃdhaṃ samanvayuḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12048: kārūṣo dantavaktraś ca cedirājaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:12049: kaliṅgādhipatiś caiva pauṇḍraś ca balināṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12050: āhvṛtiḥ kauśikaś caiva bhīṣmakaś ca narādhipaḥ // HV_80.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:12051: putraś ca bhīṣmakasyāpi rukmī mukhyo dhanurbhṛtām /
GE07hv_conpu:12052: vāsudevārjunābhyāṃ yaḥ spardhate sma sadā bale // HV_80.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:12053: veṇudāriḥ śrutarvā ca krāthaś caivāṃśumān api /
GE07hv_conpu:12054: aṅgarājaś ca balavān vaṅgānām adhipas tathā // HV_80.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:12056: suhmeśvaraś ca vikrānto videhādhipatis tathā // HV_80.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:12058: sālvarājaś ca vikrānto daradaś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_80.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:12060: sauvīrarājaḥ śaibyaś ca pāṇḍyaś ca balināṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12061: gāndhārarājaḥ subalo nagnajic ca mahābalaḥ // HV_80.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:12064: [k: K3 Dn Ds D5 cont., K1.4 ÑV BD1.3.4.6 T2.3(both times).4
GE07hv_conpu:12065: G1.2.3(first time).5 ins., K2 after 14, D2 after 14ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12067: ete cānye ca rājāno balavanto mahārathāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12068: tam anvayur jarāsaṃdhaṃ vidviṣanto janārdanam // HV_80.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:12070: ūṣuḥ saṃrudhya mathurāṃ parikṣipya balais tadā // HV_80.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:12071: [h: HV (CE) chapter 81, transliterated by John Brockington, proof-read by John Brockington, version of 17th December 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:12074: [k: After the ref. D6 T2 G1.4.5 M4 ins. a passage given in App. I
GE07hv_conpu:12076: apaśyan vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve puraskṛtya janārdanam // HV_81.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:12078: tān āgatān nṛpān rājan māgadhān rājasattamān |
GE07hv_conpu:12079: tato hṛṣṭamanāḥ kṛṣṇo rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:12080: tvarate khalu kāryārtho devatānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ // HV_81.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:12082: lakṣyante hi dhvajāgrāṇi rathānāṃ vātaraṃhasām // HV_81.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:12084: chatrāṇy ārya virājante procchritāni sitāni ca // HV_81.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:12086: abhivartanti naḥ śubhrā yathā khe haṃsapaṅktayaḥ // HV_81.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:12087: kāle khalu nṛpaḥ prāpto jarāsaṃdho mahīpatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12090: yuddhārambhaḥ prayoktavyo balaṃ tāvad vimṛśyatām // HV_81.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:12091: evam uktvā tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ svasthaḥ saṃgrāmalālasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12093: vīkṣamāṇaś ca tān sarvān nṛpān yaduvaro 'vyayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12094: ātmānam ātmanā vākyam uvāca hṛdi mantravit // HV_81.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:12095: ime te pṛthivīpālāḥ pārthive vartmani sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12096: ye vināśam iheṣyanti śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā // HV_81.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:12097: prokṣitāḥ khalv ime manye mṛtyunā nṛpapuṃgavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12098: svargagāni tathā hy eṣāṃ vapūṃṣi pracakāśire // HV_81.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:12112: rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair yuktair asaṅgagatibhiḥ kva cit // HV_81.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:12116: vājibhir meghasaṃkāśaiḥ plavadbhir iva pattibhiḥ // HV_81.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:12121: sa rathair meghanirghoṣair gajaiś ca madaśiñcitaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12122: heṣamāṇaiś ca turagaiḥ kṣveḍamāṇaiś ca pattibhiḥ // HV_81.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:12123: nādayāno diśaḥ sarvās tasyāḥ puryā vanāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:12124: [k: T1.3(second time) G3.5 M G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12126: sa rājā sāgarākāraḥ sasainyaḥ pratyadṛśyata // HV_81.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:12130: turagaiś ca javopetaiḥ pattibhiḥ khagamair iva // HV_81.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:12135: babhau tasya niviṣṭasya balaśrīḥ śibirasya vai /
GE07hv_conpu:12138: ārohaṇārthaṃ puryās te samīyur yuddhalālasāḥ // HV_81.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:12139: samavāyīkṛtāḥ sarve yamunām anu te nṛpāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12142: yugānte bhidyamānānāṃ sāgarāṇāṃ yathā svanaḥ // HV_81.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:12144: cerur mā śabda ity evaṃ bruvanto rājaśasanāt // HV_81.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:12148: jarāsaṃdho bṛhad vākyaṃ bṛhaspatir ivādade // HV_81.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:12150: sarvato nagarī ceyaṃ janaughaiḥ parivāryatām // HV_81.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:12152: [k: Ñ2.3 V1.2 B Ds D4-6 T1 G3 G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12153: kāryā bhūmiḥ samā sarvā jalaughaiś ca pariplutā |
GE07hv_conpu:12154: ūrdhvaṃ cāpāni vāhyantāṃ prāsā vai tomarās tathā // HV_81.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:12155: dāryatāṃ caiva ṭaṅkaughaiḥ khanitraiś ca purī drutam /
GE07hv_conpu:12156: nṛpaś ca yuddhamārgajñā vinyasyantām adūrataḥ // HV_81.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:12158: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.2.3(first time).4 G ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12159: yāvad etau raṇe gopau vasudevasutāv ubhau |
GE07hv_conpu:12160: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca ghātayāmi śitaiḥ śaraiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12161: ākāśam api bāṇaughair niḥsaṃpātaṃ yathā bhavet // HV_81.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:12163: teṣu teṣv avakāśeṣu śīghram āruhyatāṃ purī // HV_81.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:12166: drumaḥ kiṃpuruṣaś caiva pārvatīyaṣ ca dāmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12167: nagaryāḥ paścimaṃ dvāraṃ kṣipram ārohayantv iti // HV_81.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:12168: pauravo veṇudāriś ca vaidarbhaḥ somakas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:12169: rukmī ca bhojādhipatiḥ sūryākṣaś caiva mālavaḥ // HV_81.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:12175: chāgaliḥ purumitraś ca virāṭaś ca mahīpatiḥ // HV_81.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:12177: bhūriśravās trigartaś ca bāṇaḥ pañcanadas tathā // HV_81.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:12180: ulūkaḥ kaitaveyaś ca vīraś cāṃśumataḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12182: uttamaujāś ca śalyaś ca kauravāḥ kaikayās tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:12183: vaidiśo vāmadevaś ca sāketaś ca sinīpatiḥ // HV_81.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:12184: pūrvaṃ nagaranirvyūham eteṣv āyattam astu vaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12186: ahaṃ ca daradaś caiva cedirājaś ca saṃgatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12188: evam eṣā purī kṣipraṃ samantād veṣṭitā balaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12190: gadino ye gadābhis te parighaiḥ parighāyudhāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12191: apare vividhaiḥ śastrair dārayantu purīm imām // HV_81.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:12193: kāryā bhūmisamā sarvā bhavadbhir vasudhādhipaiḥ // HV_81.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:12197: athābhyayād yadūn kruddhaḥ saha sarvair narādhipaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12198: pratijagmur daśārhās taṃ vyūḍhānīkāḥ prahāriṇaḥ // HV_81.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:12200: tāv āgatau tadā dṛṣṭvā yādavau sainyam agragau |
GE07hv_conpu:12201: ruṣāha māgadho vīkṣya he kṛṣṇa puruṣādhama |
GE07hv_conpu:12202: na tvayā yoddhum icchāmi bālakeneti lajjayā || *HV_81.51*911:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:12203: tava rāma yada śraddhā yuddhe sthairyaṃ samudvaha |
GE07hv_conpu:12204: hato vā maccharaiś channa dehaḥ svar yāhi māṃ jahi || *HV_81.51*911:5
GE07hv_conpu:12206: na vai śūrā vikatthante darśayanty eva pauruṣam |
GE07hv_conpu:12207: na gṛhṇīmo vaco rājan nāturasya mumūrṣataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12209: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ teṣāṃ devāsuropamam /
GE07hv_conpu:12211: [k: D6 T1.2.3(second time) G1.3.5 M G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12216: rathasthau daṃśitau caiva ceratus tatra yādavau /
GE07hv_conpu:12217: makarāv iva saṃrabdhau samudrakṣobhaṇāv ubhau // HV_81.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:12218: tābhyāṃ mṛdhe prayuktābhyāṃ yādavābhyāṃ matir babhau /
GE07hv_conpu:12219: [k: For 55ab K1.3.4 Ñ2.3V BD T2.3(first time).4 G1.2.5 subst.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12220: tayoḥ prayudhyatoḥ saṃkhye matir āsīd dhṛtātmanoḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12222: tataḥ khān nipatanti sma dīptāny āhavasaṃplave /
GE07hv_conpu:12223: lelihānāni divyāni mahānti sudṛḍhāni ca // HV_81.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:12225: tṛṣitāny āhave bhoktuṃ nṛpamāṃsāni vai bhṛśam // HV_81.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:12227: prabhayā bhāsamānāni daṃśitāni diśo daśa // HV_81.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:12228: halaṃ saṃvartakaṃ nāma saunandaṃ musalaṃ tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:12229: dhanuṣāṃ pravaraṃ śārṅgaṃ gadā kaumodakī ca ha // HV_81.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:12233: taṃ sarpam iva sarpantaṃ divyamālākulaṃ mṛdhe // HV_81.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:12234: saunandaṃ ca tataḥ śrīmān nirānandakaraṃ dviṣām /
GE07hv_conpu:12235: savyena sātvatāṃ śreṣṭho jagrāha musalottamam // HV_81.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:12237: nāmnā śārṅgam iti khyātaṃ viṣṇur jagrāha vīryavān // HV_81.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:12239: viṣaktā kumudākṣasya nāmnā kaumodakīti sā // HV_81.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:12240: tau sapraharaṇau vīrau sākṣād viṣṇos tanūpamau /
GE07hv_conpu:12241: samare rāmagovindau ripūṃs tān pratyayudhyatām // HV_81.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:12245: [k: N (except Ñ1) T1.2.3(first time).4 G ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12247: halam udyamya rāmas tu sarpendram iva kopitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12248: cacāra samare vīro dviṣatām antako yathā // HV_81.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:12250: cakāra roṣaṃ saphalaṃ nāgeṣu ca hayeṣu ca // HV_81.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:12252: rāmo virājan samare nirmamantha yathācalān // HV_81.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:12256: dhig etāṃ kṣatravṛttiṃ vaḥ samare kātarātmanām // HV_81.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:12259: bhītāḥ kasmān nivartadhvaṃ dhig etāṃ kṣatravṛttitām /
GE07hv_conpu:12261: [k: N (except Ś1Ñ1 D1) T1.2.3(first time).4 G1.2.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12262: atha vā tiṣṭhata rathaiḥ prekṣakāḥ samavasthitāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12263: yāvad etau raṇe gopau preṣayāmi yamakṣayam // HV_81.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:12265: sthito 'smi yuddhe saṃrabdhaḥ kṣatriyā vijayāya hi |
GE07hv_conpu:12266: tatas te kṣatriyāḥ sarve jarāsaṃdhena coditāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12267: sṛjantaḥ śarajālāni hṛṣṭā yoddhuṃ vyavasthitāḥ // HV_81.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:12273: raṇe te 'bhigatā rejuḥ syandanasthā mahīkṣitaḥ // HV_81.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:12274: te yuddharāgā rathino vyagāhanta yudhāṃ varāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12275: gadābhiś caiva gurvībhiḥ kṣepaṇīyaiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_81.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:12276: [k: Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D2-5 T3(first time).4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12278: [k: D6 T1.2.3(second time) G1.3.5 M G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12280: dadhmau śaṅkhaṃ mahānādaṃ diśaḥ sarvā vinādayan || *HV_81.78*918:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12283: kim u sainyāni sarvāṇi vitrastānīti kā kathā |
GE07hv_conpu:12284: suparṇadhajam āsthāya kṛṣṇas tu ratham uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:12285: tadābhyayāj jarāsaṃdhaṃ śarair vivyādha cāṣṭabhiḥ // HV_81.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:12286: [k: D6 T1.3(second time) G1.3.5 M ins., T2 cont. after *918, G4 ins.
GE07hv_conpu:12288: so 'pi vidhvāṣṭabhir viṣṇum ugrasenaṃ dadarśa ha |
GE07hv_conpu:12289: pārśvasthaṃ ca harer āha śṛṇu rājan vaco mama || *HV_81.79*919:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12290: tvaṃ kim āsīn nṛpo rānan vṛṣṇīnāṃ sāṃprataṃ vada |
GE07hv_conpu:12291: ajñānām agraṇīḥ sa tvaṃ ko 'nyas tvatsadṛśo bhuvi || *HV_81.79*919:4
GE07hv_conpu:12292: yat tu dattaṃ kilānena piṇḍam ātmajaghātinā |
GE07hv_conpu:12293: tad bhuṅkte tad bhavān nityaṃ vadāndha kim ataḥ param ||
GE07hv_conpu:12294: hatvā cāyaṃ sutaṃ śauris tava rājaka nirdayaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12295: tvām eva rājye saṃsthāpya sāṃprataṃ yuddhalālasaḥ || *HV_81.79*919:8
GE07hv_conpu:12297: kevalaṃ vayasā vṛddho na tu jñānena rājaka || *HV_81.79*919:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:12299: ito yāhi vṛthāvṛddha tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ nāham utsahe || *HV_81.79*919:12 |
GE07hv_conpu:12300: atha yuddhaṃ samālipsuḥ kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha mamāgrataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12301: haniṣye tvāṃ hi sabalaṃ sahariṃ sabalaṃ tathā || *HV_81.79*919:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:12302: ity uktvā dhanur ādāya tasthau tatpuratas tadā || *HV_81.79*919:15 |
GE07hv_conpu:12303: tac chrutva roṣatāmrākṣo babhāṣe māgadhaṃ hariḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12305: tvam idānīṃ samāyāsi balaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12307: sa evāsmi śiśū rājan bhavān api sa eva hi |
GE07hv_conpu:12308: naitad yuktaṃ vṛthā rājann ugrasenaṃ prabhāṣitum |
GE07hv_conpu:12309: mām eva vada rājendra śatrur asmi tava prabho |
GE07hv_conpu:12310: drakṣyase yat kṛtaṃ rājan mayā sāṃpratam īdṛśam || *HV_81.79*919:23 |
GE07hv_conpu:12311: atha kiṃ bahunoktena śiraś chetsyāmi te nṛpa |
GE07hv_conpu:12312: na karoṣi yadi tvaṃ hi rājendrādya palāyanam || *HV_81.79*919:25 |
GE07hv_conpu:12313: ity uktvā pañcaviṃśatyā nṛpaṃ vivyādha keśavaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12314: sārathiṃ cāsya vivyādha pañcabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12315: jaghāna turagāṃś cājau yatamānasya vīryavān // HV_81.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:12316: [k: T2 G1.4.5 ins., D6 T1 G3 M after 80ab, T3(second time) after second occurrence of 80ab:
GE07hv_conpu:12318: dhvajaṃ cāsya praciccheda sārathiṃ ca jaghāna ha || *HV_81.80*920:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12320: viratho vidhanuṣkaś ca tasthau bhūtalam āsthitaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12322: senānīḥ kauśikaś caiva kṛṣṇaṃ vivyādhatuḥ śaraiḥ // HV_81.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:12323: tribhir vivyādha saṃsaktaṃ baladevaṃ ca kauśikaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12325: javenābhyardayac cāpi tān arīñ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ // HV_81.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:12326: [k: N (except Ñ1) T3(first time) G ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12328: taṃ citrasenaḥ saṃrabdho vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12329: kauśikaḥ pañcabhiś cāpi jarāsaṃdhaś ca saptabhiḥ // HV_81.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:12330: tribhis tribhiś ca nārācais tān bibheda janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12331: [k: D6 T1.2.3(second time) G1.4.5 M ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12334: sa śaro 'tha mahārāja rājānaṃ sa vyacūcudat |
GE07hv_conpu:12335: pitā kaṃsasya rājendra śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ || *HV_81.84ab*922:4
GE07hv_conpu:12336: saptatyā ca jarāsaṃdhaṃ punaś ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12338: śarair daśasahasraiś ca mādhavasya hi paśyataḥ || *HV_81.84ab*922:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:12340: punar ādāya cāpaṃ tu jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavān |
GE07hv_conpu:12343: dhanuś cāsya dvidhā rājan muṣṭideśe tathākarot || *HV_81.84ab*922:12
GE07hv_conpu:12345: vivyādha rājan rājendro rājānaṃ hṛdaye prabhuḥ || *HV_81.84ab*922:14
GE07hv_conpu:12347: rathaṃ cāsya dvidhā cakre dhvajaṃ ca prādunon nṛpaḥ ||
GE07hv_conpu:12353: pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiś caiva baladevaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_81.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:12355: baladevo dhanuś cājau bhallenāsya dvidhākarot // HV_81.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:12356: sa cchinnadhanvā viratho gadām ādāya vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:12360: gadayā ca jaghānāśvān kopāt sa magadheśvaraḥ // HV_81.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:12361: [k: K2.3 Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D1-4.8 T2.3(second time).4 G1.2.4.5 ins., K1
GE07hv_conpu:12365: tayos tu yuddham abhavat parasparavadhaiṣiṇoḥ // HV_81.88 //
