GE07hv_conpu:12368: citrasenas tu saṃsaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmeṇa māgadham |
GE07hv_conpu:12370: tato balena mahatā gajānīkena cāpy atha |
GE07hv_conpu:12375: prādur babhūva tumulaḥ senayor ubhayos tayoḥ // HV_81.90 //
GE07hv_conpu:12377: ubhayoḥ senayo rājan prādur āsīn mahāsvanaḥ // HV_81.91 //
GE07hv_conpu:12382: rathinaḥ sādinaś caiva pattayaś ca sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12383: gajāś cātibalās tatra saṃnipetur abhītavat // HV_81.94 //
GE07hv_conpu:12386: sa saṃprahāras tumulas tyaktvā prāṇān avartata /
GE07hv_conpu:12387: vṛṣṇībhiḥ saha yodhānāṃ jarāsaṃdhasya dāruṇaḥ // HV_81.95 //
GE07hv_conpu:12388: tataḥ śinir anādhṛṣṭir babhrur vipṛthur āhukaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12397: [k: Ś1 K1-3 Ñ2.3 B Dn Ds D2.4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12399: prācyaiś ca dākṣiṇātyaiś ca guptavīryabalānvitaiḥ // HV_81.100 //
GE07hv_conpu:12402: sātyakiś citrakaḥ śyāmo yuyudhānaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:12403: rājādhidevo mṛduraḥ śvaphalkaś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_81.102 //
GE07hv_conpu:12404: satrājic ca prasenaś ca balena mahatā vṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12405: vyūhasya pakṣaṃ te savyaṃ pratīyur dviṣatāṃ mṛdhe // HV_81.103 //
GE07hv_conpu:12410: evaṃ yuddham abhūt teṣāṃ śūrāṇāṃ harṣavardhanam |
GE07hv_conpu:12412: rājabhiś cāpi bahubhir veṇudārimukhaiḥ saha // HV_81.104 //
GE07hv_conpu:12414: [k: Ñ3 V1.2 B2.3 Cal. ed. ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12415: pratīcyaiś ca balodagrair dhārtarāṣṭraiś ca pālitam |
GE07hv_conpu:12416: [h: HV (CE) chapter 82, transliterated by John Brockington, proof-read by John Brockington, version of 21st December 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:12418: tato yuddhāni vṛṣṇīnāṃ babhūva sumahānty atha /
GE07hv_conpu:12420: [k: T1.3(second time) G3.5 M G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12425: [k: D6 T1.2.3(second time) G1.3-5 M ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12429: yuddham āsīd dhi sainyānāṃ sainikair bharatarṣabha // HV_82.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:12430: [k: N (except Ś1 K3 Ñ1) T1.2.3(first time).4 G M4 ins., T3(second
GE07hv_conpu:12432: ahāni pañca caikaṃ ca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau ca dāruṇam |
GE07hv_conpu:12433: gajair gajā hayair aśvāḥ padātāś ca padātibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12434: rathā rathair vimiśraiś ca yodhā yuyudhire nṛpa // HV_82.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:12437: [k: after 5, T1.3 G3.5 M ins. a passage given in App.I (No.17) :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12438: [k: Ś1 K ÑV BDn Ds D1-4 T4 G1.2 ins., D5 ins. after 4: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12439: avekṣya rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇo rukmiṇaṃ na vyapothayat || *HV_82.5*932:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:12441: vārayām āsa kṛṣṇo vai śarāṃs tasya tu śikṣayā |
GE07hv_conpu:12442: [k: D6 T2 G1.4.5 then ins. a passage given in App.I (No.17): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12448: tasmin vimarde yodhānāṃ saṃkhyāvyaktir na vidyate // HV_82.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:12450: āvṛnvann abhyayād vīras taṃ ca rājā sa māgadhaḥ // HV_82.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:12451: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T2.3(first time).4 G1.2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12453: anyonyaṃ vividhair astrair vidhvā vidhvā vinedatuḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12455: gade gṛhītvā vikrāntāv anyonyam abhidhāvatām // HV_82.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:12457: dadṛśāte mahātmānau girī saśikharāv ubhau // HV_82.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:12460: ubhau tau paramācāryau loke khyātau mahābalau /
GE07hv_conpu:12461: mattāv iva gajau yuddhe anyonyam abhidhāvatām // HV_82.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:12462: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12465: pitāmahaś ca bhagavān yuddhaṃ draṣṭuṃ samāgataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12467: śuśubhe 'bhyadhikaṃ rājan divaṃ jyotir gaṇair iva // HV_82.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:12469: savyaṃ maṇḍalam āvṛtya baladevas tu dakṣiṇam // HV_82.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:12471: dantābhyām iva mātaṅgau nādayantau diśo daśa // HV_82.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:12475: gadā gadābhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vindhyaṃ girim ivācalam // HV_82.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:12476: rāmasya tu gadāvegaṃ vīryāt sa magadheśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12477: sehe dhairyeṇa mahatā śikṣayā ca vyapohayat // HV_82.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:12478: [k: K Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D1-5 T3(first time).4 G2 ins., D6 T2 G1.4.5
GE07hv_conpu:12480: evaṃ tau tatra saṃgrāme vicarantau mahābalau |
GE07hv_conpu:12482: vyāyacchantau ciraṃ kālaṃ pariśrāntau ca tasthatuḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12483: samāśvāsya muhūrtaṃ tu punar anyonyam āhatām || *HV_82.19*936:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:12484: evaṃ tau yodhamukhyau tu samaṃ yuyudhatuś ciram |
GE07hv_conpu:12485: na ca tau yuddhavaimukhyam ubhāv eva prajagmatuḥ || *HV_82.19*936:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:12487: rāmaḥ kruddho gadāṃ tyaktvā jagrāha musalottamam || *HV_82.19*936:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:12488: tam udyataṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā musalaṃ ghoradarśanam |
GE07hv_conpu:12490: [k: D6 T1.2.3(second time) G1.3-5 M ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12491: kruddho 'tha rāmabhadras tu gadayā taṃ jagāma ha |
GE07hv_conpu:12493: prathamas tv atha rāmeṇa gadāpādaḥ samādade |
GE07hv_conpu:12495: caturthaṃ tu jarāsaṃdhaḥ pañcamaṃ tu yadūdvahaḥ || *HV_82.19*937:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:12496: tayoḥ pādaprahāraś ca cālayām āsa medinīm || *HV_82.19*937:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:12497: tato devāḥ sagandharvā yakṣāś ca paramarṣayaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12498: bhītāḥ svastīti caivāhur lokānāṃ brahmaṇaś ca ha || *HV_82.19*937:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:12499: tataḥ kruddho jarāputras tāḍayām āsa vakṣasi |
GE07hv_conpu:12500: śoṇitaṃ codvaman rāmaḥ śramaṃ ca samavāpa ha || *HV_82.19*937:10 |
GE07hv_conpu:12501: viśramya bhūmau kiṃcit tu punar utthāya yādavaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12503: papāta ca mahīṃ vīro gatāsur iva niḥśvasan |
GE07hv_conpu:12504: hato hato jarāsaṃdha ity ūcur yādaveśvarāḥ || *HV_82.19*937:14 |
GE07hv_conpu:12506: gadayā ca samājaghne vakṣasy eva halāyudham || *HV_82.19*937:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:12507: mūrcchāṃ caiva samāpede saṃjñāṃ ca pratilabdhavān |
GE07hv_conpu:12508: tato rudhirarāśis tu babhau jalam ivodgataḥ || *HV_82.19*937:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:12513: dvāv eva mṛtyū rājendra saṃgatāv iva śobhitau || *HV_82.19*937:23 |
GE07hv_conpu:12514: tataḥ kruddho haladharaś chettum aicchaj jarāsutam |
GE07hv_conpu:12515: ūrū ca pothayām āsa gadayā rājasaṃsadi || *HV_82.19*937:25 |
GE07hv_conpu:12516: ūrvo raktaṃ samāpede majjā samabhavat tataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12517: tato halī jarāsaṃdhaṃ śiraś chettum udaikṣata |
GE07hv_conpu:12519: [k: Ś1 K2 Ñ2.3 V1.2 B Dn Ds D2.5.6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12521: na tvayā rāma vadhyo 'yam alaṃ khedena mādhava // HV_82.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:12522: vihito 'sya mayā mṛtyus tasmāt sādhu vyupārama /
GE07hv_conpu:12523: acireṇaiva kālena prāṇāṃs tyakṣyati māgadhaḥ // HV_82.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:12524: jarāsaṃdhas tu tac chrutvā vimanāḥ samapadyata /
GE07hv_conpu:12525: na prajahre tatas tasmai punar eva halāyudhaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12526: tau vyupāramatāṃ caiva vṛṣṇayas te ca pārthivāḥ // HV_82.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:12527: prasaktam abhavad yuddhaṃ teṣām eva mahātmanām /
GE07hv_conpu:12530: te sarve nirjitā rājan kṛṣṇena ripughātinā |
GE07hv_conpu:12533: astaṃ yāte dinakare nānusasrus tadā niśi // HV_82.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:12538: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 Ñ1) T2.3(first time).4 G1.2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12539: khāc cyutāny āyudhāny eva tāny evāntardadhus tadā || *HV_82.25*941:1
GE07hv_conpu:12541: rājānaś cānugā ye 'sya svarāṣṭrāṇy eva te yayuḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12542: jarāsaṃdhaṃ tu te jitvā manyante naiva taṃ jitam /
GE07hv_conpu:12543: vṛṣṇayaḥ kuruśārdūla rājā hy atibalaḥ sa vai // HV_82.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:12545: ko nāma hi jarāsaṃdhaṃ raṇe jetuṃ mahīpatiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12547: daśa cāṣṭau ca saṃgrāmāñ jarāsaṃdhasya yādavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12548: dadur na cainaṃ samare hantuṃ śekur mahārathāḥ // HV_82.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:12550: kṛṣṇas tu samare rājañ śaktimān api māgadham |
GE07hv_conpu:12551: anyo mṛtyur iti jñātvā na ca hiṃsitavān prabhuḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12553: jarāsaṃdhasya nṛpates tadarthaṃ yāḥ samāgatāḥ // HV_82.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:12555: bārhadrathena rājendra rājabhiḥ sahitena vai // HV_82.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:12556: [k: Ñ2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins., K2 after the first occurrence of line 9 of App.I (No. 18): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12558: jitvā tu māgadhaṃ saṃkhye jarāsaṃdhaṃ mahīpatim /
GE07hv_conpu:12559: viharanti sma sukhino vṛṣṇisiṃhā mahārathāḥ // HV_82.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:12561: ojas tejo balaṃ dhīr dhṛtir iti mahimā śrīr yaśo rūpam ājñā |
GE07hv_conpu:12562: vīryaṃ cetyevamādīn paramaguṇagaṇān ye smaranto labhante |
GE07hv_conpu:12563: yad bhaktānāṃ yam ājñāpy akhilajanamanaḥkṣobhaṇī naiti pārśvaṃ |
GE07hv_conpu:12564: cetas tvaṃ tasya śaśvac caraṇakamalayor bhṛṅgatāṃ yāhi viṣṇoḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12565: [h: HV (CE) chapter 83, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic, proof-read by Kreshimir Krnic, version of June 15, 2004 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:12567: etasminn eva kāle tu smṛtvā gopeṣu yatkṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:12568: jagāmaiko vrajaṃ rāmaḥ kṛṣṇasyānumate svayam // HV_83.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:12569: sa tatra gatvā ramyāṇi dadarśa vipulāni vai /
GE07hv_conpu:12570: bhuktapūrvāṇy araṇyāni sarāṃsi surabhīṇi ca // HV_83.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:12571: sa praviṣṭaḥ pravegena taṃ vrajaṃ kṛṣṇapūrvajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12573: sa tān sarvān ābabhāṣe yathāpūrvaṃ yathāvidhi /
GE07hv_conpu:12574: gopaṃs tenaiva vidhinā yathānyāyaṃ yathāvayaḥ // HV_83.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:12575: tathaiva prāha tān sarvāṃs tathaiva pariharṣayan /
GE07hv_conpu:12576: tathaiva saha gopībhī rocayan madhurāḥ kathāḥ // HV_83.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:12577: tam ūcuḥ sthavirā gopāḥ priyaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12578: rāmaṃ ramayatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pravāsāt punarāgatam // HV_83.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:12581: jīvitasya phalaṃ prāptam adya te darśanena ca |
GE07hv_conpu:12582: adya smo nirvṛtās tāta yat tvāṃ paśyāma nirvṛtam // HV_83.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:12583: prītāś caiva vayaṃ vīra yat tvaṃ punar ihāgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12584: vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu rāmaḥ śatrubhayaṃkaraḥ // HV_83.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:12588: [k: B2 inserts *947 after the first occurrence of 9ab :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12590: atha vā prāṇinas tāta ramante janmabhūmiṣu // HV_83.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:12592: ye sma dṛṣṭās tvayā tāta kāṅkṣamāṇās tavāgamam // HV_83.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:12593: diṣṭyā te nihatā mallāḥ kaṃsaś ca vinipātitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12595: samudre ca śruto 'smābhis timinā saha vigrahaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12596: [k: K3 Ñ1 V2 Dn D1 (marg.) T2 G2 M4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12598: [k: K3 V2 Dn D1 (marg.) T2 G2 M4 cont.: K1.2.4 Ñ2.3 V1.3 B Ds D1
GE07hv_conpu:12600: gomante ca śruto 'smābhiḥ kṣatriyaiḥ saha vigrahaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12601: daradasya vadhaś caiva jarāsaṃdhe ca yā matiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12603: tac cāyudhāvataraṇaṃ śrutaṃ naḥ paramāhave // HV_83.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:12606: [k: K2 Ñ2.3 V1.3 B1.2 D2.5 (marg.) G2 cont.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12610: [k: V2 cont.: Ñ2 V3 cont. after *951: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12612: yuddhaṃ sarvair narendraiś ca yādavānāṃ mahātmanām |
GE07hv_conpu:12613: mathurāyāṃ praveśaś ca kīrtanīyaḥ surair api /
GE07hv_conpu:12614: pratiṣṭhitā ca vasudhā śaṅkitāḥ sarvapārthivāḥ // HV_83.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:12615: tava cāgamanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sabhāgyāḥ sma yathā purā /
GE07hv_conpu:12616: tena sma parituṣṭāś ca hṛṣitāś ca sabāndhavāḥ // HV_83.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:12617: pratyuvāca tato rāmaḥ sarvāṃs tān abhitaḥ sthitān /
GE07hv_conpu:12618: yādaveṣv api sarveṣu bhavanto mama bāndhavāḥ // HV_83.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:12619: sahāsmābhir gataṃ bālyaṃ sahāsmābhī rataṃ vane /
GE07hv_conpu:12620: bhavadbhir vardhitāś caiva kathaṃ yāsyāma vikriyām // HV_83.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:12621: gṛheṣu bhavatāṃ bhuktaṃ gāvaś ca parirakṣitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12622: asmākaṃ bāndhavāḥ sarve bhavanto baddhasauhṛdāḥ // HV_83.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:12623: evaṃ bhuvati sattvaṃ vai gopamadhye halāyudhe /
GE07hv_conpu:12626: evaṃ bahuvidhālāpaṃ kṛtvā gopais tu lāṅgalī |
GE07hv_conpu:12628: tato vanāntaragato reme rāmo mahābalaḥ // HV_83.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:12633: upajahrus tatas tasmai vanyāni vividhāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:12634: pratyagraramaṇīyāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca // HV_83.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:12635: medhyāṃś ca vividhān bhakṣān gandhāṃś ca hṛdayaṃ gamān /
GE07hv_conpu:12640: vibabhāv urasā rāmaḥ kailāseneva mandaraḥ // HV_83.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:12642: rarāja vapuṣā śubhraḥ śaśīva ghanamālayā // HV_83.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:12644: tathā bhujāgraśliṣṭena musalena ca bhāsvatā // HV_83.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:12646: śaiśirīṣv iva rātrīṣu yathā khedālasaḥ śaśī // HV_83.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:12647: sa matto yamunām āha snātum icche mahānadi /
GE07hv_conpu:12650: nābhyavartata taṃ deśaṃ strīsvabhāvena mohitā // HV_83.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:12652: cakāra ca halaṃ haste karṣaṇādhomukhaṃ balī // HV_83.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:12654: mumucuḥ puṣpakośaiś ca svaṃ rajorañjitaṃ jalam // HV_83.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:12656: cakarṣa yamunāṃ rāmo vyutthitāṃ vanitām iva // HV_83.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:12670: matteva kuṭilā nārī rājamārgeṇa gacchatī // HV_83.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:12672: unmārgānītamārgā sā yena vṛndāvanaṃ vanam // HV_83.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:12673: vṛndāvanasya madhyena sā nītā yamunā nadī /
GE07hv_conpu:12675: sā yadā samatikrāntā nadī vṛndāvanaṃ vanam /
GE07hv_conpu:12676: tataḥ strīvigrahā bhūtvā yamunā rāmam abravīt // HV_83.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:12678: viparītam idaṃ rūpaṃ toyaṃ ca mama jāyate // HV_83.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:12681: rauhiṇeya hasiṣyati māṃ nandaḥ saṃgatā tvayā |
GE07hv_conpu:12683: prāptāṃ māṃ sāgare nūnaṃ sapatnyo vegagarvitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12685: prasādaṃ kuru me vīra yāce tvāṃ kṛṣṇapūrvaja /
GE07hv_conpu:12686: [k: K2 Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D4.6 T3.4 G2 (G(ed.) after 44ab) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12690: mārgam ādiṣṭam icchāmi kva gacchāmi mahābhuja // HV_83.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:12691: tām evaṃ bruvatīṃ drṣṭvā yamunāṃ lāṅgalāyudhaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12694: deśam ambupradānena nikhilaṃ bhāvayasva naḥ // HV_83.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:12695: eṣa te subhru saṃdeśaḥ kathitaḥ sāgaraṃgame /
GE07hv_conpu:12696: śāntiṃ vraja mahābhāge gamyatāṃ ca yathāsukham /
GE07hv_conpu:12697: lokā hi yāvat sthāsyanti tāvat sthāsyati me yaśaḥ // HV_83.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:12700: ity uktā sā tathā cakre yamunā rāmaśāsanam |
GE07hv_conpu:12701: anujñātā tu rāmeṇa yathāmārgaṃ jagāma sā |
GE07hv_conpu:12703: sādhu sādhv iti rāmāya praṇāmaṃ cakrire tadā // HV_83.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:12707: tāṃ visṛjya mahāvegāṃ tāṃś ca sarvān vrajaukasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12708: tataḥ saṃcintya manasā buddhyā niścitya caiva ha /
GE07hv_conpu:12710: sa gatvā mathurāṃ rāmo bhavane madhusūdanam /
GE07hv_conpu:12711: parivartamānaṃ dadṛśe pṛthivyāḥ sāram avyayam // HV_83.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:12714: sa dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam āyāntaṃ rāmaṃ laṅgaladhāriṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:12715: sahasotthāya govindo dadāv āsanam uttamam // HV_83.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:12716: [k: D6 T1-3 G1.3.4 (both times).5 M ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12718: punaḥ praṇāmam akarot svāgataṃ te halāyudha |
GE07hv_conpu:12719: upaviṣṭaṃ tato rāmaṃ papraccha kuśalaṃ vraje /
GE07hv_conpu:12720: bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu goṣu caiva janārdanaḥ // HV_83.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:12722: sarvatra kuśalaṃ kṛṣṇa yeṣāṃ kuśalam icchasi // HV_83.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:12723: tatas tayor vicitrāś ca paurāṇyaś ca kathābhavan /
GE07hv_conpu:12725: [h: HV (CE) chapter 84, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic, proof-read by Kreshimir Krnic, version of June 15, 2004 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:12727: kasyacit tv atha kālasya sabhāyāṃ yadusaṃsadi /
GE07hv_conpu:12728: babhāṣe puṇḍarīkākṣo hetumad vākyam uttamam // HV_84.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:12730: śrūyatāṃ yādavā vākyaṃ sarve cāvahitā mama |
GE07hv_conpu:12732: vayaṃ caiveha saṃbhūtā vraje ca parivardhitāḥ // HV_84.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:12733: tad idānīṃ gataṃ duḥkhaṃ śatravaṣ ca parājitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12734: nṛpeṣu janitaṃ vairaṃ jarāsaṃdhe ca vigrahaḥ // HV_84.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:12735: vāhanāni ca naḥ santi pādātaṃ cāpy anantakam /
GE07hv_conpu:12736: ratnāni ca vicitrāṇi mitrāṇi bahulāni ca // HV_84.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:12737: iyaṃ ca māthurī bhūmir alpā gamyā parasya naḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12738: vṛddhiś cāpi parāsmākaṃ balato mitratas tathā // HV_84.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:12739: kumārakoṭyo yāś cemā gaṇāś caiva padātinām /
GE07hv_conpu:12740: eṣām apīha vasatāṃ saṃmardam upalakṣaye // HV_84.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:12741: tan me na rocate hy atra nivāso yadupuṃgavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12742: purīṃ niveśayiṣyāmi mama tat kṣantum arhatha // HV_84.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:12743: etad yady anukūlaṃ vo mamābhiprāyajaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12744: bhavāya bhavatāṃ kāle rocatāṃ yadusaṃsadi // HV_84.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:12745: tam ūcur yādavāḥ sarve hṛṣṭena manasā tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:12746: sādhyatāṃ yad abhipretaṃ janasyāsya bhavāya ca // HV_84.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:12747: tataḥ saṃmantrayām āsur vṛṣṇayo mantram uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:12749: kṛtaḥ sainyakṣayaś cāpi mahān iha narādhipaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12750: balāni ca sasainyāni hantuṃ varṣaśatair api /
GE07hv_conpu:12751: na śakṣyāmo hy atas teṣām apayāne 'bhavan matiḥ // HV_84.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:12752: etasminn antare rājā sa kālayavano mahān /
GE07hv_conpu:12755: te kālayavanaṃ caiva śrutvaivaṃ pratipedire // HV_84.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:12759: adyaiva divasaḥ puṇyo niryāma sapadānugāḥ // HV_84.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:12763: susaṃnaddhair gajair mattai rathair aśvaiś ca daṃśitaiḥ // HV_84.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:12765: niryayur yādavāḥ sarve mathurām apahāya vai // HV_84.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:12769: pratyaṅmukhā yayur hṛṣṭā vṛṣṇayo bharatarṣabha // HV_84.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:12779: mumudur yādavāḥ sarve devāḥ svargagatā iva // HV_84.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:12780: puravāstu vicinvan sa kṛṣṇas tu paravīrahā /
GE07hv_conpu:12793: niveśaṃ tatra sainyānāṃ rocayanti sma yādavāḥ // HV_84.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:12799: dhruvāya tatra nyavasat keśavaḥ saha yādavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12800: deśe puraniveśāya sa yadupravaro vibhuḥ // HV_84.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:12801: tasyāstu vidhivan nāma vāstūni ca gadāgrajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12803: evaṃ dvāravatīṃ caiva purīṃ prāpya sabāndhavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12804: sukhino nyavasan rājan svarge devagaṇā iva // HV_84.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:12806: jarāsaṃdhabhayāc cāpi purīṃ dvāravatīṃ yayau // HV_84.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:12807: [h: ḥV (CE) chapter 85, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic, proof-read by Kreshimir Krnic, version of June 20, 2004 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:12812: madhyadeśasya kakudaṃ dhāma lakṣmyāś ca kevalam // HV_85.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:12816: sa kālayavanaś cāpi kṛṣṇe kiṃ pratyapadyata // HV_85.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:12818: kiṃ cakāra mahābāhur mahāyogī mahāmanāḥ // HV_85.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:12819: kiṃvīryaḥ kālayavanaḥ kena jātaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:12820: yam asahyaṃ samālakṣya vyapayāto janārdanaḥ // HV_85.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:12822: vṛṣṇīnām andhakānāṃ ca gurur gārgyo mahātapāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12823: brahmacārī purā bhūtvā na sma dārān sa vindati // HV_85.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:12824: tathā hi vartamānaṃ taṃ ūrdhvaretasam avyayam /
GE07hv_conpu:12826: gārgyaṃ goṣṭhe dvijaṃ syālaḥ ṣaṇḍham ity uktavān dvijaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12827: yadūnāṃ saṃnidhau sarve jahasur yādavās tataḥ || *HV_85.8ab*965:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:12830: syālo 'bhiśaptavān gārgyam apumān iti bhūpate // HV_85.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:12831: so 'bhiśaptas tadā rājan nagare tv amitaṃjaye /
GE07hv_conpu:12832: lipsuḥ putraṃ tato gatvā tapas tepe sudāruṇam // HV_85.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:12833: tato dvādaśa varṣāṇi so 'yaś cūrṇam abhakṣayat /
GE07hv_conpu:12835: rudras tasmai varaṃ prādāt samarthaṃ yudhi nigrahe /
GE07hv_conpu:12836: vṛṣṇīnām andhakānāṃ ca sarvatejomayaṃ sutam // HV_85.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:12837: tataḥ śuśrāva taṃ rājā yavanādhipatir varam /
GE07hv_conpu:12839: tam upānāyya sa nṛpaḥ sāntvayitvā dvijottamam /
GE07hv_conpu:12842: dhārayām āsa gārgyasya garbhaṃ durdharam acyutam // HV_85.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:12844: sa kālayavano nāma jajñe śūro mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12845: aputrasyātha rājñas tu vavṛdhe 'ntaḥpure śiśuḥ // HV_85.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:12846: tasminn uparate rājan sa kālayavano nṛpaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12848: vṛṣṇyandhakakulaṃ tasya nārado vai nyavedayat // HV_85.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:12849: jñātvā tu varadānaṃ tan nāradān madhusūdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12850: upapraikṣata tejasvī vardhantaṃ yavaneṣu tam // HV_85.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:12851: sa vivṛddho yadā rājā yavanānāṃ mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12852: tata enaṃ nṛpā mlecchāḥ saṃśrityānuyayus tadā // HV_85.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:12853: śakās tuṣārā daradāḥ pāradās taṅgaṇāḥ khaśāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12854: pahlavāḥ śataśaś cānye mlecchā haimavatās tathā // HV_85.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:12855: sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā dasyubhiḥ śalabhair iva /
GE07hv_conpu:12858: pṛthivīṃ kampayām āsa sainyena mahatā tadā // HV_85.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:12860: mūtreṇa śakṛtā caiva sainyena sasṛje nadīm // HV_85.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:12862: tato 'śvaśakṛd ityeva nāma nadyā babhūva ha // HV_85.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:12863: tat sainyaṃ mahad āyād vai śrutvā vṛṣṇyandhakāgraṇīḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12864: vāsudevaḥ samānāyya jñātīn idam uvāca ha // HV_85.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:12866: avadhyaś cāpi naḥ śatrur varadānāt pinākinaḥ // HV_85.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:12868: matto madabalābhyāṃ ca yuddham eva cikīrṣati /
GE07hv_conpu:12869: etāvān iha vāsaś ca kathito nāradena me // HV_85.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:12870: [k: Ñ2.3V BDs D3.5.6 G2 ins. (Dn after 27ab): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:12871: etāvati ca vaktavyaṃ sāmaiva paramaṃ matam |
GE07hv_conpu:12872: jarāsaṃdhaś ca no rājā nityam eva na mṛṣyate /
GE07hv_conpu:12874: kecit kaṃsavadhāc cāpi viraktās tadgatā nṛpāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12875: samāśritya jarāsaṃdham asmān icchanti bādhitum // HV_85.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:12876: bahavo jñātayaś caiva yadūnāṃ nihatā nṛpaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12877: vivardhituṃ na śakṣyāmaḥ pure 'sminn iti keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12881: kṛtvā ca niścayaṃ sarve palāyanam arocayan || *HV_85.29cd*967:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:12884: apayāne matiṃ kṛtvā dūtaṃ tasmai sasarja ha // HV_85.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:12886: ghoram āśīviṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ prākṣepayat tadā // HV_85.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:12887: tatas taṃ mudrayitvā tu svena dūtena hārayat /
GE07hv_conpu:12888: nidarśanārthaṃ govindo bhīṣayāṇaś ca taṃ nṛpam /
GE07hv_conpu:12889: sa dūtaḥ kālayavanaṃ darśayām āsa taṃ ghaṭam // HV_85.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:12891: idaṃ covāca rājānaṃ rājñāṃ samsadi dūtakaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12892: bho rājann āha kṛṣṇas tvāṃ kim ebhiḥ śalabhais tava |
GE07hv_conpu:12893: aham ekas tavaiteṣāṃ samartho vāraṇe prabhuḥ || *HV_85.31*968:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:12894: tvāṃ ca hatvā nṛpaśreṣṭha sabalaṃ sasuhṛdgaṇam |
GE07hv_conpu:12895: idaṃ tava balaṃ rājan grahīṣyāmīti niścitam || *HV_85.31*968:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:12896: anyathā gaccha rājaṃs tvaṃ balenānena saṃyutaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12897: ity uktvā darśayām āsa ghaṭaṃ kṛṣṇapracoditam |
GE07hv_conpu:12899: tat kālayavano budhvā trāsanaṃ yādavaiḥ kṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:12900: pipīlikānāṃ caṇḍānāṃ pūrayām āsa taṃ ghaṭam // HV_85.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:12902: ślokam ekaṃ likhitvā tu ghaṭamadhye 'kṣipat tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:12903: sa sarpo bahubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ sarvatas taiḥ pipīlikaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12906: preṣayām āsa kṛṣṇāya bāhulyam upavarṇayan // HV_85.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:12908: dūtānītaṃ harir dṛṣṭvā patraṃ tad vācayaṃs tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:12910: sphuran tam api nāgendraṃ bhakṣayiṣyanti kīṭikāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12911: vāsudevas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā yogaṃ vihitam ātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12912: utsṛjya mathurām āśu dvārakām abhijagmivān // HV_85.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:12914: niveśya dvārakāṃ rājan vṛṣṇīn āśvāsya caiva ha // HV_85.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:12917: taṃ dṛṣṭvā niryayau hṛṣṭaḥ sa kālayavano ruṣā /
GE07hv_conpu:12918: prekṣāpūrvaṃ ca kṛṣṇo 'pi niścakrāma mahābalaḥ // HV_85.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:12920: na cainam aśakad rājā grahītuṃ yogadharmiṇam // HV_85.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:12922: hastaprāptam ivātmānaṃ hariṇā sa pade pade |
GE07hv_conpu:12929: ko hi nāma jagannāthaṃ balād yātuṃ priyād ṛte |
GE07hv_conpu:12931: māndhātus tu suto rājā mucukundo mahāyaśāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12933: yatra tiṣṭhati rājendras tatra cāśu viveśa vai |
GE07hv_conpu:12934: purā devāsure yuddhe kṛtakarmā mahābalaḥ // HV_85.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:12935: vareṇa cchandito devair nidrām eva gṛhītavān /
GE07hv_conpu:12936: śrāntasya tasya vāg evaṃ tadā prādur abhūt kila // HV_85.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:12937: prasuptam bodhayed yo māṃ taṃ daheyam ahaṃ surāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12938: cakṣuṣā krodhadīptena evam āha punaḥ punaḥ // HV_85.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:12939: evam astv iti śakras tam uvāca tridaśaiḥ saha /
GE07hv_conpu:12940: sa surair abhyanujñāto lokaṃ mānuṣam āgamat // HV_85.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:12942: suṣvāpa kālam etaṃ vai yāvat kṛṣṇasya darśanam // HV_85.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:12944: varadānaṃ ca devebhyas tejas tasya ca bhūpateḥ // HV_85.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:12945: anugamyamānaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca tena mlecchena śatruṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:12946: tāṃ guhāṃ mucukundasya praviveśa vinītavat // HV_85.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:12948: pītāmbareṇa svīyena tam ācchādya sa bhūpatim |
GE07hv_conpu:12950: saṃdarśanapathaṃ tyaktvā tasthau buddhimatāṃ varaḥ // HV_85.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:12953: vāsudevaṃ tu taṃ matvā ghaṭṭayām āsa pārthivam /
GE07hv_conpu:12956: cukopa nicrācchedena pādasparśena tena ca // HV_85.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:12957: saṃsmṛtya ca varaṃ śakrād avaikṣata tamagrataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12958: sa dṛṣṭamātraḥ kruddhena saṃprajajvāla sarvataḥ // HV_85.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:12959: dadāha pāvakas taṃ tu śuṣkaṃ vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12962: kṛtakāryo 'bravīd dhīmān idaṃ vacanam uttamam // HV_85.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:12964: kṛtaṃ me sumahat kāryaṃ svasti te 'stu vrajāmy aham // HV_85.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:12966: parivṛttaṃ yugaṃ mene kālena mahatā tataḥ // HV_85.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:12975: śaṅkitaḥ śanakaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ durdharṣam iva tejasā |
GE07hv_conpu:12976: uvāca rājā govindaṃ ko bhavān kim ihāgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:12977: kaś ca kālaḥ prasuptasya yadi jānāsi kathyatām // HV_85.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:12981: kiṃ svit tejasvināṃ tejo bhagavāṃs tvaṃ vibhāvasuḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:12982: sūryaḥ somo mahendro vā lokapālo 'paro 'pi vā || *HV_85.56*976:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:12984: yad bādhase guhādhvāntaṃ pradīpaḥ prabhayā yathā || *HV_85.56*976:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:12986: svaṃ janma karma gotraṃ vā kathyatāṃ yadi rocate |
GE07hv_conpu:12989: tasya putro yadur jyeṣṭhaś catvāro 'nye yavīyasaḥ // HV_85.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:12991: vāsudevaṃ vijānīhi nṛpate mām ihāgatam // HV_85.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:12993: idaṃ kaliyugaṃ viddhi kim anyat karavāṇi te // HV_85.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:12994: mama śatrus tvayā dagdho devadattavaro nṛpa /
GE07hv_conpu:12995: avadhyo yo mayā saṃkhye bhaved varṣaśatair api // HV_85.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:13005: evaṃ stutas tadā viṣṇur mucukundena dhīmatā |
GE07hv_conpu:13006: vareṇa cchandayām āsa bhagavān acyutas tadā || *HV_85.60*977:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:13007: punar apy abravīt kṛṣṇo mucukundaṃ mahābhujam |
GE07hv_conpu:13009: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te yathākāmaṃ caratv iha |
GE07hv_conpu:13010: ityuktaḥ sa tu kṛṣṇena nirjagāma guhāmukhāt /
GE07hv_conpu:13013: tato dadarśa pṛthivīm āvṛtāṃ hrasvakair naraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13015: pareṇādhiṣṭhitaṃ caiva rājyaṃ kevalam ātmanaḥ // HV_85.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:13017: yat syāt tvaddarśane puṇyaṃ tan me kṛṣṇa bhaved iti |
GE07hv_conpu:13019: himavantam agād rājā tapase dhṛtamānasaḥ // HV_85.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:13020: tataḥ sa tapa āsthāya vinirmucya kalevaram /
GE07hv_conpu:13021: āruroha divaṃ rājā karmabhiḥ svair jitaṃ śubhaiḥ // HV_85.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:13023: ghātayitvātmanaḥ śatruṃ tat sainyaṃ pratyapadyata // HV_85.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:13028: ādāyopayayau dhīmāṃs tat sainyaṃ nihateśvaram // HV_85.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:13029: nivedayām āsa tato narādhipe tad ugrasene pratipūrṇamānasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13030: janārdano dvāravatīṃ ca tāṃ purīm aśobhayat tena dhanena bhūriṇā //
GE07hv_conpu:13031: [h: HV (CE) chapter 86, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic, proof-read by Kreshimir Krnic, version of June 20, 2004 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:13033: kṛṣṇāya ca namas tubhyaṃ rāmarāmāya te namaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13034: vāmanāya namas tubhyaṃ kapilāya namo 'stu te || *HV_86.0*980:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13035: nānārūpa namas tubhyaṃ namas te karmasākṣiṇe |
GE07hv_conpu:13036: viśvarūpa namas tubhyaṃ hṛṣīkeśāya te namaḥ || *HV_86.0*980:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13038: uttarāṃ diśam āśritya tapam ācara sāttvikam |
GE07hv_conpu:13041: kṛtajapyo hṛṣīkeśo vanānte niṣasāda ha // HV_86.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:13044: rohiṇyām ahani śreṣṭhe svasti vācya dvijottamān /
GE07hv_conpu:13047: provāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho devān vṛtraripur yathā // HV_86.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:13049: nāma cāsyāḥ kṛtaṃ puryāḥ khyātiṃ yad upayāsyati // HV_86.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:13050: iyaṃ dvāravatī nāma pṛthivyāṃ nirmitā mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:13052: tāny evāsyāḥ kārayiṣye cihnāny āyatanāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:13055: catvarān rājamārgāṃś ca samān antaḥpurāṇi ca // HV_86.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:13059: mīyantāṃ rājamārgāś ca prākārasya ca yā gatiḥ // HV_86.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:13061: niyujyantāṃ ca deśeṣu preṣyakarmakarā janāḥ // HV_86.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:13065: puṇye 'hani mahārāja dvijātīn abhipūjya ca // HV_86.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:13067: sthapatīn atha govindas tatrovāca mahāmatiḥ // HV_86.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:13070: te tatheti mahābāhum uktvā sthapatayas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:13073: sthānāni vidadhuś cātra brahmādīnāṃ yathākramam // HV_86.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:13075: caturdaivāni catvāri dvārāṇi vidadhuś ca te /
GE07hv_conpu:13078: puryāḥ kṣipraṃ niveṣārthaṃ cintayām āsa mādhavaḥ // HV_86.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:13079: tasya daivī sthitā buddhiś capalā kṣiprakāriṇī /
GE07hv_conpu:13080: purī sā vai priyakarī yadūnām abhivardhanī // HV_86.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:13082: viśvakarmā svamatyā vai purīṃ saṃsthāpayiśyati // HV_86.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:13085: tasminn eva tataḥ kāle śilpācāryo mahāmatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13086: viśvakarmā suraśreṣṭhaḥ kṛṣṇasya pramukhe sthitaḥ // HV_86.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:13088: daivena manasā kśipraṃ tava viṣṇo dhṛtavrata /
GE07hv_conpu:13089: kiṃkaraḥ samanuprāptaḥ śādhi māṃ kiṃ karomi te // HV_86.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:13090: yathā syād devadeveśas tryambakaś ca yathāvyayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13091: tathā tvaṃ deva mānyo 'si viśeṣo nāsti me prabho // HV_86.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:13093: eṣo 'smi paridṛṣṭārthaḥ kiṃ karomi praśādhi mām // HV_86.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:13095: pratyuvāca yaduśreṣṭhaḥ kaṃsārir atulaṃ vacaḥ // HV_86.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:13096: śrutārtho devaguhyasya bhavāny atra vayaṃ sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13097: avaśyaṃ tv iha kartavyaṃ sadanaṃ me surottama // HV_86.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:13098: tad iyaṃ bhūḥ prakāśārthaṃ niveśyā mayi suvrata /
GE07hv_conpu:13099: matprabhāvānurūpaiś ca gṛhaiś ceyaṃ samantataḥ // HV_86.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:13100: uttamā ca pṛthivyāṃ vai yathā svarge 'marāvatī /
GE07hv_conpu:13101: tatheyaṃ hi tvayā kāryā śakto hy asi mahāmate // HV_86.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:13102: mama sthānam idaṃ kāryaṃ yathā vai tridive tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:13103: martyāḥ paśyantu me lakṣmīṃ puryā yadukulasya ca // HV_86.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:13104: evam uktas tataḥ prāha viśvakarmā matīśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13106: sarvam etat kariṣyāmi yat tvayābhihitaṃ prabho /
GE07hv_conpu:13107: purī tv iyaṃ janasyāsya na paryāptā bhaviṣyati // HV_86.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:13108: bhaviṣyati ca vistīrṇā vṛddhir asyās tu śobhanā /
GE07hv_conpu:13109: catvāraḥ sāgarā hy asyāṃ vicariṣyanti rūpiṇaḥ // HV_86.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:13110: yadīcchet sāgaraḥ kiṃcid utsraṣṭum iha toyarāṭ /
GE07hv_conpu:13111: tataḥ svāyatalakṣaṇyā purī syāt puruṣottama // HV_86.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:13112: evam uktas tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prāg eva kṛtabuddhimān /
GE07hv_conpu:13113: sāgaraṃ saritāṃ nātham uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // HV_86.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:13114: samudra daśa ca dve ca yojanāni jalāśaye /
GE07hv_conpu:13115: pratisaṃhriyatām ātmā yady asti mayi mānyatā // HV_86.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:13116: avakāśe tvayā datte purīyaṃ māmakaṃ balam /
GE07hv_conpu:13120: viśvakarmā tataḥ prītaḥ puryāḥ saṃdṛśya vāstu tat /
GE07hv_conpu:13121: govinde caiva saṃmānaṃ sāgaraḥ kṛtavāṃs tadā // HV_86.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:13124: manasā nirmitā ceyaṃ mayā pūḥpravarā vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:13129: cakāra tasyāṃ puryāṃ vai deśe tridaśapūjite // HV_86.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:13130: tataḥ sā nirmitā kāntā purī dvāravatī tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:13132: [k: Ś1 K1.2.4 ÑV BD T1.4 G2 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13136: nānāpaṇyasamākīrṇā khecarīva ca gāṃ gatā // HV_86.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:13140: [k: N T4 G2 ins. (T1 cont. after *982): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13142: bhūṣayantī samudraṃ sā svargam indrapurī yathā || *HV_86.47ab*983:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13149: satārakā dyaur iva sā dvārakā pratyarājata // HV_86.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:13155: abhipretajanākīrṇāṃ somaḥ kham iva bhāsayan // HV_86.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:13158: viśvakarmā ca tāṃ kṛtvā purīṃ śakrapurīm iva /
GE07hv_conpu:13160: bhūyas tu buddhir abhavat kṛṣṇasya viditātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13161: janān imān dhanaughais tu tarpayeyam ahaṃ yadi // HV_86.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:13163: śaṅkham āhvayatopendro niśi svabhavane vibhuḥ // HV_86.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:13164: sa śaṅkhaḥ keśavāhvānaṃ jñātvā guhyakarāṭ svayam /
GE07hv_conpu:13165: ājagāma samīpaṃ vai tasya dvāravatīpateḥ // HV_86.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:13166: sa śaṅkhaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vinayādavaniṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13167: kṛṣṇaṃ vijñāpayām āsa yathā vaiśravaṇaṃ tathā // HV_86.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:13168: bhagavan kiṃ mayā kāryaṃ surāṇāṃ vittarakṣiṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:13170: tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ śaṅkhaṃ guhyakam uttamam /
GE07hv_conpu:13171: janā ye 'smin kṛśadhanās tān dhanenābhipūraya // HV_86.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:13172: necchāmy anāśitaṃ draṣṭuṃ kṛśaṃ malinam eva vā /
GE07hv_conpu:13173: dehīti cābhibhāṣantaṃ nagaryāṃ nirdhanaṃ naram // HV_86.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:13174: śirasā śāsanaṃ gṛhya nidhīnaḥ keśavasya saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13176: ghanaughair abhivarṣadhvaṃ cakruḥ sarve tathā ca te // HV_86.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:13177: nādhano vidyate tatra hīnabhāgyo 'pi vā naraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13178: [k: K3. 4 ÑV BD T4 G2 subst. for 62cd: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13180: kṛśo vā malino vāpi dvāravatyāṃ gṛhe gṛhe // HV_86.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:13181: cakāra vāyor āhvānaṃ bhūyaś ca puruṣottamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13182: tatrastha eva bhagavān yādavānāṃ priyaṃkaraḥ // HV_86.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:13189: yathaiva dūto devānāṃ tathaivāsmi tavānagha // HV_86.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:13190: tam uvāca tataḥ kṛṣṇo rahasyaṃ puruṣottamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13191: mārutaṃ jagataḥ prāṇaṃ rūpiṇaṃ samupasthitam // HV_86.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:13193: sabhāṃ sudharmām ādāya devebhyas tvam ihānaya // HV_86.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:13195: tasyāṃ viśeyur ete hi na tu yā kṛtrimā bhavet // HV_86.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:13196: sā hy akṣayā sabhā vāyo kāmagā kāmarūpiṇī /
GE07hv_conpu:13197: sā yadūn dhārayet sarvān yathaiva tridaśāṃs tathā // HV_86.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:13200: so 'numānya surān sarvān kṛṣṇavākyaṃ nivedya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:13201: sabhāṃ sudharmām ādāya punar āyān mahītalam // HV_86.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:13203: devo devasabhāṃ dattvā vāyur antaradhīyata // HV_86.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:13205: na bhayaṃ vidyate yatra sabhā sā dharmavatsalā |
GE07hv_conpu:13206: dvāravatyās tu sā madhye keśavena niveśitā /
GE07hv_conpu:13207: sudharmā yadumukhyānāṃ devānāṃ tridive yathā // HV_86.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:13208: evaṃ sa divyair bhaumaiś ca jalajaiś cāvyayo hariḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13209: dravyairalaṃkaroti sma purīṃ svāṃ pramadām iva // HV_86.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:13213: [k: after 74 Ś1 D2 repeat 73ab. After the repetition of 73ab Ś1 D2
GE07hv_conpu:13215: maryādāś caiva saṃcakre śreṇīḥ prakṛtayas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:13216: balādhyakṣāṃś ca yuktāṃś ca prakṛtīśāṃs tathaiva ca // HV_86.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:13219: yādavānāṃ kulakarān sthavirān daśa tatra vai /
GE07hv_conpu:13221: uddhavo vasudevaś ca kaṅko vipṛthur eva ca |
GE07hv_conpu:13222: śvaphalkaś citrakaś caiva gadaḥ satyaka eva ca |
GE07hv_conpu:13223: baladevaḥ pṛthuś caivaṃ matreśv abhyantarā daśa |
GE07hv_conpu:13224: sthāpayām āsa matimān sarvakāryeṣv anantarān // HV_86.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:13225: ratheṣv atiratho yantā dārukaḥ keśavasya vai /
GE07hv_conpu:13226: yodhamukhyaś ca yodhānāṃ sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ // HV_86.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:13230: vidhānam evaṃ kṛtvā sa kṛṣṇaḥ puryām aninditaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13231: mumude yadubhiḥ sārdhaṃ lokasraṣṭā mahītale // HV_86.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:13233: prāptavān baladevas tu kṛṣṇasyānumate tadā // HV_86.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:13239: [h: HV (CE) chapter 87, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic, proof-read by Kreshimir Krnic, version of June 21, 2004 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:13241: etasminn eva kāle tu jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13244: yathārhaṃ ca yathāyogaṃ praśrayaṃ pradadau nṛpaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13246: sarvam antaḥpuraṃ caiva vivāhe utsukaṃ kila |
GE07hv_conpu:13247: śvobhūte tu vivāhasya caidyasyeti ca bhūmipāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13253: śiśupālasya nṛpater vivāho bhavitā kila // HV_87.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:13255: sahasrākṣasamaṃ yuddhe māyāsu ca viśāradam // HV_87.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:13259: putraṃ ca pāṇḍyarājasya kaliṅgādhipatiṃ tathā // HV_87.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:13261: aṃśumantaṃ tathā krāthaṃ śrutarvāṇaṃ ca bhārata // HV_87.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:13263: paṭuśaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ kāśyādhipatim eva ca // HV_87.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:13264: [k: Ds2 D5.6 ins. (Dn after the second occurrence of 7cd): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13267: saṃśaptakās tu te sarve āsyandā yavanās tathā |
GE07hv_conpu:13268: yavanasya sutaś cāpi ārṣāyaṇas tathā śakāḥ || *HV_87.7*993:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13271: [k: Dn Ds2 D5.6 Bom. Poona eds cont.; Ds1 G2 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13277: kasmin deśe nṛpo jajñe rukmī vedavidāṃ vara /
GE07hv_conpu:13280: rājarṣer yādavasyāsīd vidarbho nāma vai sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13281: vindhyasya dakṣiṇe pārśve vidarbhān yo nyaveśayat // HV_87.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:13283: babhūvur vīryasaṃpannāḥ pṛthag vaṃśakarā nṛpāḥ // HV_87.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:13285: krathasya tv aṃśumāṇ vaṃśe kaiśikasya tu bhīṣmakaḥ // HV_87.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:13288: rukmī tasyābhavat putro rukmiṇī ca viśāṃ pate // HV_87.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:13289: rukmī cāstrāṇi divyāni drumāt prāpa mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13290: jāmadagnyāt tatha rāmād brāhmam astram avāptavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13291: prāspardhat saha kṛṣṇena nityam adbhutakarmaṇā // HV_87.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:13292: rukmiṇī tv abhavad rājan rūpeṇāsadṛśī bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:13293: cakame vāsudevas tāṃ śravād eva mahādyutiḥ // HV_87.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:13294: sa cābhilaṣitas tasyāḥ śravād eva janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13295: tejovīryabalopetaḥ sa me bhartā bhaved iti // HV_87.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:13296: tāṃ dadau na tu kṛṣṇāya rukmī dveṣān mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13299: yācamānāya kaṃsasya preṣyo 'sāv iti cintayan // HV_87.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:13301: varayām āsa tāṃ rājā bhīṣmakaṃ bhīmavikramam // HV_87.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:13302: cedirājasya hi vasor āsīt putro bṛhadrathaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13303: magadheṣu purā yena nirmitaṃ tad girivrajam // HV_87.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:13305: vasor eva tadā vaṃśe damaghoṣo 'pi cedirāṭ // HV_87.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:13315: jarāsaṃdhaḥ svasutavad dadarśainaṃ jugopa ca // HV_87.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:13317: kṛtāny āgāṃsi caidyena vṛṣṇīnāṃ tatpriyaiṣiṇā // HV_87.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:13318: jāmātā tv abhavat tasya kaṃsas tasmin hate yudhi /
GE07hv_conpu:13321: tāṃ dadau bhīṣmakaś cāpi śiśupālāya vīryavān // HV_87.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:13323: yayau vidarbhān sahito dantavaktreṇa yāyinā // HV_87.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:13326: mānayiṣyaṃś ca tān rukmī pratyudgamya narādhipān /
GE07hv_conpu:13327: parayā pūjayopetān ānināya purīṃ prati // HV_87.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:13328: pitṛṣv asuḥ priyārthaṃ ca rāmakṛṣṇāv ubhāv api /
GE07hv_conpu:13329: prayayur vṛṣṇayaś cānye rathais tatra balānvitāḥ // HV_87.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:13333: pūjayām āsa pūjārhān nyavasanta bahiś ca te // HV_87.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:13335: nyaveśayac ca tān sarvān bhīṣmako nagarād bahiḥ || *HV_87.30*999:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13336: sthite tasmiñ jarāsaṃdhe ripau teṣāṃ mahātmani |
GE07hv_conpu:13338: śaṅkhāś ca paṭahāś caiva sasvanāḥ sarvatas tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:13339: brāhmaṇāś ca samāyātā nānādigbhyas tathaiva ca |
GE07hv_conpu:13340: utthitāś caiva sarvatra dhvajāś ca samalaṃkṛtāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13341: śvobhāvini vivāhe tu rukmiṇī niryayau bahiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13347: dīpyamānena vapuṣā balena mahatā vṛtā // HV_87.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:13349: keśavo me bhaved bhartā nānyaḥ kaścid bhaved iti |
GE07hv_conpu:13351: tāṃ dadarśa tataḥ kṛṣṇo lakṣmīṃ sākṣād iva sthitām /
GE07hv_conpu:13353: vahner iva śikhāṃ dīptāṃ māyāṃ bhūmigatām iva /
GE07hv_conpu:13354: pṛthivīm iva gambhīrām utthitāṃ pṛthivītalāt // HV_87.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:13355: marīcim iva somasya saumyāṃ strīvigrahāṃ bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:13357: kṛṣṇena manasā dṛṣṭāṃ durnirīkśyāṃ surair api // HV_87.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:13364: tīkṣṇaśuklaiḥ samair dantaiḥ prabhāsadbhir alaṃkṛtā // HV_87.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:13365: ananyā pramadā loke rūpeṇa yaśasā śriyā /
GE07hv_conpu:13367: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vavṛdhe kāmaḥ kṛṣṇasya śubhadarśanām /
GE07hv_conpu:13370: rukmiṇī ca tadā devī dadṛśe kṛṣṇam īśvaram || *HV_87.39*1003:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:13371: acintayac ca sā devī dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇam avasthitam |
GE07hv_conpu:13372: so 'yam viṣṇur jagannāthaḥ sākṣād rāmānujaḥ kṛtī || *HV_87.39*1003:3
GE07hv_conpu:13373: asya cakraṃ sadā śaṅkhaṃ bhujayor ubhayorapi |
GE07hv_conpu:13376: sadā bhāti mahac cāpaṃ loke khyātataraṃ hareḥ || *HV_87.39*1003:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:13377: yamāśritya gadā devī sadā kaumodakīti sā |
GE07hv_conpu:13380: ripūn hanti mahāvīryān asahyān daivatair api || *HV_87.39*1003:11 |
GE07hv_conpu:13381: asya syād vāhanaṃ viṣṇor garutmān pakṣipuṃgavaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13382: śakrādīṃś ca surāñ jitvā jahārāmṛtam uttamam || *HV_87.39*1003:13 |
GE07hv_conpu:13383: so 'yam viṣṇur guruḥ sākṣād gopaveṣeṇa bhūṣitaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13385: yo nanarta hrade tasyā yamunāyās tadā hariḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13387: ayaṃ govardhanaṃ śailaṃ dadhāv ekena bāhunā |
GE07hv_conpu:13388: līlayā sa jagannātho kolakaṃ bālako yathā || *HV_87.39*1003:19 |
GE07hv_conpu:13389: ayaṃ sa puṇḍarīkākṣo yo hayaṃ prajaghāna ha || *HV_87.39*1003:20 |
GE07hv_conpu:13390: yaś cāṇūraṃ mṛdhe hatvā kaṃsaṃ caiva mahābalam |
GE07hv_conpu:13391: nanarta raṅge govindo gopaiḥ sārdhaṃ sayādavaiḥ || *HV_87.39*1003:22
GE07hv_conpu:13395: so 'yam adya jagannāthaḥ prāpto mām iha yādavaḥ || *HV_87.39*1003:26
GE07hv_conpu:13396: amuṣya pādayoḥ padmam udvahāmi na saṃśayaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13398: evaṃ vicintayitvā sā vavande tāṃ śacīṃ tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:13400: tatpramāthe 'karod buddhiṃ vṛṣṇibhyaḥ praṇidhāya ca // HV_87.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:13402: unmathya sahasā kṛṣṇaḥ svaṃ nināya rathottamam // HV_87.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:13404: samanahyanta dāśārhās tadājñāya tu sarvaśaḥ // HV_87.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:13406: vājibhir vāraṇaiś cāpi parivavrur halāyudham // HV_87.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:13407: ādāya rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇo jagāmāśu purīṃ prati /
GE07hv_conpu:13408: rāme cāsajya taṃ bhāraṃ yuyudhāne ca vīryavān // HV_87.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:13409: akrūre vipṛthau cāpi gade ca kṛtavarmaṇi /
GE07hv_conpu:13410: cakradeve sunakṣatre sāraṇe ca mahābale // HV_87.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:13412: ugrasenātmaje kaṅke śatadyumne ca keśavaḥ // HV_87.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:13414: atidānte bṛhaddurge śvaphalke citrake pṛthau // HV_87.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:13416: gurum āsajya taṃ bhāraṃ yayau dvāravatīṃ prati // HV_87.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:13418: tataś ca yādavāḥ sarve yuddhāya samupasthitāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13421: saṃnaddhā niryayuḥ kruddhā jighāṃsanto janārdanam // HV_87.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:13422: aṅgavaṅgakaliṅgaiś ca sārdhaṃ pauṇḍraiś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13423: niryayau cedirājaḥ sa bhrātṛbhiḥ sumahārathaiḥ // HV_87.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:13428: kuto nu vīro yudhi sātyakiḥ kila || *HV_87.50*1005:4 |*
GE07hv_conpu:13437: yādavāś ca mahārāja śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak ||
GE07hv_conpu:13438: bherīṇāṃ ca mṛdaṅgānāṃ jharjharīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13440: tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat senayor ubhayor api |
GE07hv_conpu:13443: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ puraskṛtya vāsavaṃ maruto yathā // HV_87.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:13445: ṣaḍbhir vivyādha nārācair yuyudhāno mahāmṛdhe // HV_87.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:13446: akrūro dantavaktraṃ tu vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13447: taṃ pratyavidhyat kārūṣo bāṇair daśabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_87.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:13448: vipṛthuḥ śiśupālaṃ tu śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13449: aṣṭabhiḥ pratyavidhyat taṃ śiśupālaḥ pratāpavāṇ // HV_87.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:13450: gaveśaṇo 'pi caidyaṃ tu ṣaḍbhir vivyādha mārgaṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13451: anirdāntas tathāṣṭābhir bṛhaddurgaś ca pañcabhiḥ // HV_87.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:13452: prativivyādha tāṃś caidyaḥ pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13453: jaghāna cāśvāṃś caturaś caturbhir vipṛthoḥ śaraiḥ // HV_87.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:13456: hatāśvaṃ sa rathaṃ tyakvā vipṛthus tu mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13457: āruroha rathaṃ kṣipraṃ bṛhaddurgasya vīryavān // HV_87.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:13459: āruhya javanān aśvān niyantum upacakrame // HV_87.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:13463: paṭuśaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā vivyādha yudhi mārgaṇaiḥ // HV_87.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:13464: tābhyāṃ sa viddho daśabhir bāṇair marmātigaiḥ śitaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13465: tato balī cakradevaṃ bibheda daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_87.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:13467: vidūratho 'pi taṃ ṣaḍbhir vivyādhājau śitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_87.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:13470: triṃśatā pratyavidhyat taṃ balī bāṇair mahābalam /
GE07hv_conpu:13471: kṛtavarmā bibhedājau rājaputraṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_87.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:13472: nyahanat sārathiṃ cāsya dhvajaṃ ciccheda cocchritam /
GE07hv_conpu:13473: prativivyādha taṃ kruddhaḥ pauṇḍraḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ // HV_87.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:13477: gajenāsādya kaṅkas tu gajam aṅgasya vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13478: tomareṇa bibhedāṅgaṃ bibhedāṅgaś ca taṃ śaraiḥ // HV_87.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:13479: citrakaś ca śvaphalkaś ca satyakaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13480: kaliṅgasya tathānīkaṃ nārācair bibhiduḥ śitaiḥ // HV_87.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:13482: jaghāna rāmaḥ samkruddho vaṅgarājaṃ ca saṃyuge // HV_87.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:13483: taṃ hatvā ratham āruhya dhanur ādāya vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13484: saṃkarṣaṇo jaghānograir nārācaiḥ kaiśikān bahūn // HV_87.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:13485: ṣaḍbhir nihatya kārūṣān maheṣvāsān sa vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13487: nihatya tān mahābāhur jarāsaṃdhaṃ tato 'bhyayāt // HV_87.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:13488: tam āpatantaṃ vivyādha nārācair māgadhas tribhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13490: ciccheda cāsya bhallena dhvajaṃ ratnavibhūṣitam // HV_87.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:13492: cāpaṃ ca mahad āyattaṃ śarair eva halāyudhaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13493: rathaṃ cāsya mahārāja tilaśaś ca samāhanat || *HV_87.72*1007:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:13495: bibheda balabhadraṃ tu jaghāna ca punaḥ punaḥ || *HV_87.72*1007:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:13496: rathaṃ ca cūrṇayām āsa gadayāsya sa māgadhaḥ || *HV_87.72*1007:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:13498: sātyakes tu rathaṃ prāyāt sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ || *HV_87.72*1007:7
GE07hv_conpu:13499: sātyakis tu mahārāja śarair vivyādha māgadham || *HV_87.72*1007:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:13501: jaghāna māgadhaṃ saṃkhye vajreṇeva giriṃ hariḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13502: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ teṣāṃ devāsuropamam /
GE07hv_conpu:13506: gajair gajā hi saṃkruddhāḥ saṃnipetuḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13507: rathai rathāś ca saṃrabdhāḥ sādibhiś cāpi sādinaḥ // HV_87.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:13509: chindantaś cottamāṅgāni vicerur yudhi te pṛthak // HV_87.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:13511: śarāṇāṃ patatāṃ śabdaḥ pakṣiṇām iva śuśruve // HV_87.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:13513: jugūha ghoṣaḥ śastrāṇāṃ jyāghoṣaś ca mahātmanāṃ // HV_87.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:13515: taṃ prāvidhyata saptatyā bāṇair gāḍhaṃ janārdanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13516: yatamānaś ca ciccheda dhvajaṃ cāsya mahābalaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13517: jahāra ca śiraḥ kāyāt sārathes tasya vīryavān || *HV_87.77*1009:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13519: dākṣiṇātyā jighāṃsanto rājānaḥ sarva eva te || *HV_87.77*1009:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:13520: tam aṃśumān mahābāhur vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13521: śrutarvā pañcabhiḥ kruddho veṇudāriś ca saptabhiḥ || *HV_87.77*1009:7
GE07hv_conpu:13525: veṇudārir dhvajaṃ chittvā bhujaṃ vivyādha dakṣiṇam ||
GE07hv_conpu:13526: tathaiva ca śrutarvāṇaṃ śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13527: śiśriye ca dhvajaṃ śrānto nyaṣīdac ca vyathānvitaḥ ||
GE07hv_conpu:13530: bāṇān bāṇaiś ca ciccheda teṣāṃ yudhi janārdanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13531: jaghāna caiṣāṃ saṃrabdho yatamānān yatān bahūn || *HV_87.77*1009:17 |
GE07hv_conpu:13532: punar anyāṃś catuḥṣaṣṭyā nijaghāna śitaiḥ śaraiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13533: kruddhān āpatato vīro prādravat tadbalaṃ tataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13537: mūrchāṃ jagāma rājā tu nipapāta ca bhūtale || *HV_87.77*1010:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:13538: sātyakir vaṅgarājaṃ tu jaghāna niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13539: tat sainyaṃ vimukhaṃ cāsīj jarāsaṃdhe pataty api || *HV_87.77*1010:5
GE07hv_conpu:13540: sātyakir balabhadraś ca jitvā yodhān sahasraśaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13541: śaṅkhaṃ dadhmatū rājānau sarveṣām agrataḥ sthitau |
GE07hv_conpu:13542: tataś ca vidrute sainye jarāsaṃdhe parājite |
GE07hv_conpu:13543: tayoḥ śaṅkhadhvaniṃ śrutvā gacchann eva janārdanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13545: ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān |
GE07hv_conpu:13547: [h: HV (CE) chapter 88, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic, proof-read by Kreshimir Krnic, version of September 23, 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:13549: kṛṣṇena hriyamāṇāṃ tu rukmī śrutvā tu rukmiṇīm /
GE07hv_conpu:13550: pratijñām akarot kruddhaḥ samakṣaṃ bhīṣmakasya ha // HV_88.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:13551: ahatvā yudhi govindam anānīya ca rukmiṇīm /
GE07hv_conpu:13552: kuṇḍinaṃ na pravekṣyāmi satyam etad bravīmi te // HV_88.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:13554: javena prayayau kruddho balena mahatā vṛtaḥ // HV_88.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:13556: krātho 'ṃśumāñ śrutarvā ca veṇudāriśca vīryavān // HV_88.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:13557: bhīṣmakasya sutaś cāpi rathena rathināṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13559: te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ saritaṃ narmadām anu /
GE07hv_conpu:13560: govindaṃ dadṛśuḥ kruddhāḥ sahaiva priyayā sthitam // HV_88.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:13561: avasthāpya ca tat sainyaṃ rukmī balamadānvitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13565: vimucyatām iyaṃ bālā sthātavyaṃ ca kṣaṇāntaram |
GE07hv_conpu:13566: śiraśchetsyāmi te bāṇaiḥ sthito 'si yadi matpuraḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13567: ityuktvā niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ saṃdadhe dhanuṣi prabho |
GE07hv_conpu:13568: cikīrṣur dvairathaṃ yuddham abhyayān madhusūdanam // HV_88.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:13569: sa vivyādha catuḥṣaṣṭyā govindaṃ niśitaiḥ śraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13570: taṃ pratyavidhyat saptatyā bāṇair yudhi janārdanaḥ // HV_88.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:13572: jahāra ca śiraḥ kāyāt sāratheś cāsya vīryavān // HV_88.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:13574: dākṣiṇātyā jighāṃsanto rājānaḥ sarva eva te // HV_88.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:13575: tam aṃśumān mahābāhur vivyādha daśabhiḥ śraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13576: śrutarvā pañcabhiḥ kruddho veṇudāriś ca saptabhiḥ // HV_88.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:13578: niṣasāda rathopasthe vyathitaḥ sa narādhipaḥ // HV_88.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:13580: veṇudārer dhvajaṃ chittvā bhujaṃ vivyādha dakṣiṇam // HV_88.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:13581: tathaiva ca śrutarvāṇaṃ śarair vivyādha pañcabhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13582: śiśriye sa dhvajaṃ klānto nyaṣīdacca vyathānvitaḥ // HV_88.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:13585: bāṇair bāṇāṃś ca ciccheda teṣāṃ yudhi janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13586: jaghāna caiṣāṃ saṃrabdho yatamānāṃś ca tāñ śarān // HV_88.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:13587: punar anyāṃś catuḥṣaṣṭyā jaghāna niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13588: kruddhān ādravato vīrān ādravat sa mahābalaḥ // HV_88.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:13589: vidrutaṃ svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā rukmī krodhavaśaṃ gataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13590: pañcabhir niśitair bāṇair vivyādhorasi keśavam // HV_88.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:13591: sārathiṃ cāsya vivyādha sāyakair niśitais tribhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13592: ājaghāna dhvajaṃ cāsya śareṇa nataparvaṇā // HV_88.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:13593: keśavaś cāpi taṃ ṣaṣṭyā kruddho vivyādha mārgaṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13594: dhanuś ciccheda cāpy asya yatamānasya rukmiṇaḥ // HV_88.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:13596: prāduś cakāra divyāni dīptāny astrāṇi vīryavān // HV_88.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:13598: vāyavyaṃ vāruṇaṃ caiva māhendram atha nairṛtam |
GE07hv_conpu:13599: paiśācaṃ rākṣasaṃ caiva raudraṃ māheśvaraṃ tathā || *HV_88.21*1012:2
GE07hv_conpu:13601: tair eva tāni govindo nijaghāna janārdanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13602: astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya tasya kṛṣṇo mhābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13603: punaś ciccheda taṃ cāpaṃ ratheṣāṃ ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_88.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:13604: sa cchinnadhanvā virathaḥ khaḍgam ādāya carma ca /
GE07hv_conpu:13605: utpapāta rathād vīro garutmān iva vīryavān // HV_88.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:13607: nārācaiś ca tribhiḥ kruddho bibhedainam athorasi // HV_88.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:13609: kruddho bibhedainam atho śarair urasi pañcabhiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13611: visaṃjño mūrchito rājā vajreṇeva hato giriḥ // HV_88.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:13612: tāṃś ca rājñaḥ śaraiḥ sarvān punarvivyādha keśavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13615: rukmiṇaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyadravanta narādhipāḥ // HV_88.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:13618: viveṣṭamānaṃ bhūmau taṃ bhrātaraṃ vīkṣya rukmiṇī /
GE07hv_conpu:13619: pādayor nyapatad bhartur bhrātur jīvitakāṅkṣiṇī // HV_88.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:13621: abhayaṃ rukmiṇe dattvā prayayau svāṃ purīṃ tataḥ // HV_88.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:13622: vṛṣṇayo 'pi jarāsaṃdhaṃ bhaṅktvā tāṃś cāpi pārthivān /
GE07hv_conpu:13626: te 'pi vīrā yathāyogaṃ jitvā tān yādavottamāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13627: prayayur dvārakāṃ hṛṣṭāḥ puraskṛtya halāyudham // HV_88.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:13629: rukmiṇaṃ ratham āropya prayayau svapuraṃ tataḥ // HV_88.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:13631: hīnapratijño naicchat sa praveṣṭuṃ kuṇḍinaṃ puram // HV_88.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:13632: vidarbheṣu ca vāsārthaṃ nirmame 'nyat puraṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:13633: tadbhojakaṭam ity eva babhūva bhuvi viśrutam // HV_88.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:13636: tacchaśāsa mahāvīryo rukmī jīvati tatra vai |
GE07hv_conpu:13638: bhīṣmakaḥ kuṇḍine caiva rājovāsa mahāmanāḥ // HV_88.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:13640: jarāsaṃdho 'pi saṃprāpya saṃjñāṃ prāpa svakaṃ puram |
GE07hv_conpu:13644: idānīm anyathā vṛttaḥ svāṃ purī niryayau bahiḥ || *HV_88.33*1018:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:13645: ko nu nāma samartho 'tra kṛṣṇe jīvati sāṃpratam |
GE07hv_conpu:13647: iti paurāś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā sunīthaṃ mandavikramam |
GE07hv_conpu:13648: āhuḥ parasparaṃ sarve gacchantaṃ svapuraṃ nṛpam |
GE07hv_conpu:13650: rukmiṇyāḥ keśavaḥ pāṇiṃ jagrāha vidhivat prabhuḥ // HV_88.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:13651: [k: after 88.34, D6 S (except G2) ins. a passage given in App I (No.
GE07hv_conpu:13653: tataḥ saha tayā reme priyayā prīyamāṇayā /
GE07hv_conpu:13654: sītayeva purā rāmaḥ paulomy eva puraṃdaraḥ // HV_88.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:13657: sā hi tasyābhavaj jyeṣṭhā patnī kṛṣṇasya bhāminī /
GE07hv_conpu:13660: cārudeṣṇaṃ sudeṣṇaṃ ca pradyumnaṃ ca mahābalam // HV_88.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:13661: suṣeṇaṃ cāruguptaṃ ca cārubāhuṃ ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13662: cāruvindaṃ sucāruṃ ca bhadracāruṃ tathaiva ca // HV_88.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:13663: cāruṃ ca balināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sutāṃ cārumatīṃ tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:13664: dharmārthakuśalās te tu kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥ // HV_88.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:13667: kālindīṃ mitravindāṃ ca satyāṃ nāgnajitīm api /
GE07hv_conpu:13668: sutāṃ jāmbavataś cāpi rohiṇīṃ kāmarūpiṇīm // HV_88.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:13671: śaibyāṃ sudattāṃ rūpeṇa śriyā hy apsarasopamām // HV_88.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:13673: upayeme hṛṣīkeśaḥ sarvā bheje sa tāḥ samam /
GE07hv_conpu:13675: jajñire tasya putrāś ca tāsu vīrāḥ sahasraśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13682: kṛtvā tu rāmeṇa ca yādavaiḥ saha |
GE07hv_conpu:13685: [k: after 88.34, D6 S (except G2) ins. a passage given in App I (No.
GE07hv_conpu:13687: [h: HV (CE) Chapter 89 transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of March
GE07hv_conpu:13690: tataḥ kāle vyatīte tu rukmī mahati vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13691: duhituḥ kārayām āsa svayaṃvaram ariṃdamaḥ // HV_89.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:13692: tatrāhūtāś ca rājāno rājaputrāś ca rukmiṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:13694: jagāma tatra pradyumnaḥ kumārair aparair vṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13695: sā hi taṃ cakame kanyā sa ca tāṃ śubhalocanām // HV_89.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:13697: pṛthivyām abhavat khyātā rukmiṇas tanayā tadā // HV_89.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:13699: vaidarbhī varayām āsa pradyumnam arisūdanam // HV_89.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:13703: nārāyaṇī candrasenā jātakāmā ca taṃ prati // HV_89.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:13704: vṛtte svayaṃvare jagmū rājānaḥ svapurāṇi te /
GE07hv_conpu:13705: upādāya tu vaidarbhīṃ pradyumno dvārakāṃ yayau // HV_89.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:13707: reme saha tayā vīro damayantyā nalo yathā |
GE07hv_conpu:13708: sa tasyāṃ janayām āsa devagarbhopamaṃ sutam /
GE07hv_conpu:13710: dhanurvede ca vede ca nītiśāstre ca pāragam // HV_89.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:13711: abhavat sa yadā rājann aniruddho vayonvitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13713: patnyarthaṃ varayām āsa nāmnā rukmavatīti sā // HV_89.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:13714: aniruddhaṃ guṇair dātuṃ kṛtabuddhir nṛpas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:13715: prītyā ca raukmiṇeyasya rukmiṇyāś cāpy upagrahāt // HV_89.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:13716: vispardhann api kṛṣṇena vairaṃ tad apahāya saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13717: dadānīty abravīd rājā prītimāñ janamejaya // HV_89.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:13718: keśavaḥ saha rukmiṇyā putraiḥ saṃkarṣaṇena ca /
GE07hv_conpu:13719: anyaiś ca vṛṣṇibhiḥ sārdhaṃ vidarbhān sabalo yayau // HV_89.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:13720: saṃyuktā jñātayaś caiva rukmiṇaḥ suhṛdaś ca ye /
GE07hv_conpu:13721: āhūtā rukmiṇā te 'pi tatrājagmur narādhipāḥ // HV_89.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:13724: pāṇau gṛhīte vaidarbhyās tv aniruddhena bhārata /
GE07hv_conpu:13725: [k: K2.3 Ñ2.3 V B1.2 Dn Ds D1.2.4-6 T4 G2 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13727: remire vṛṣṇayas tatra pūjyamānā yathāmarāḥ // HV_89.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:13729: akṣaḥ śrutarvā cāṇūraḥ krāthaś caivāṃśumān api // HV_89.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:13731: pāṇḍyaś ca nṛpatiḥ śrīmān ṛṣīkādhipatis tathā // HV_89.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:13733: abhigamyābruvan sarve rukmiṇaṃ rahasi prabhum // HV_89.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:13734: bhavān akṣeṣu kuśalo vayaṃ cāpi riraṃsavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13735: priyadyūtaś ca rāmo 'sāv akṣeṣv anipuṇo 'pi ca // HV_89.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:13736: te bhavantaṃ puraskṛtya jetum icchāma taṃ vayam /
GE07hv_conpu:13737: ity ukto rocayām āsa dyūtaṃ rukmī mahārathaḥ // HV_89.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:13739: sabhām āviviśur hṛṣṭāḥ siktāṃ candanavāriṇā // HV_89.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:13741: sauvarṇeṣv āsaneṣv āsāṃ cakrire vijigīṣavaḥ // HV_89.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:13743: bāḍham ity abravīdd hṛṣṭaḥ saha dīvyāma paṇyatām // HV_89.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:13745: maṇimuktāḥ suvarṇaṃ ca tatrāninyuḥ sahasraśaḥ // HV_89.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:13749: rukmiṇā saha saṃpāte baladevo glahaṃ dadau // HV_89.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:13750: taṃ jigāya tato rukmī yatamānaṃ mahāratham /
GE07hv_conpu:13751: tāvad evāparaṃ bhūyo baladevaṃ jigāya saḥ // HV_89.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:13753: suvarṇakoṭiṃ jagrāha glahaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_89.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:13754: jitam ity eva hṛṣṭo 'tha tam āhvṛtir abhāṣata /
GE07hv_conpu:13755: ślāghamānaś ca cikṣepa prahasan musalāyudham // HV_89.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:13756: avidyo durbalaḥ śrīmān hiraṇyam amitaṃ mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:13758: kaliṅgarājas tac chrutvā prajahāsa bhṛśaṃ tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:13759: dantān vidarśayan hṛṣṭas tatrākrudhyadd halāyudhaḥ // HV_89.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:13762: roṣam āhārayām āsa jitaroṣo 'pi dharmavit // HV_89.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:13764: dhairyān manaḥ saṃniyamya tato vacanam abravīt // HV_89.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:13767: kṛṣṇākṣāṃl lohitākṣāṃś ca deśe 'smiṃs tvam apāṃsule // HV_89.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:13768: ity evam āhvayām āsa rukmiṇaṃ rohiṇīsutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13769: anuktvā vacanaṃ kiṃcid bāḍham ity abravīt punaḥ // HV_89.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:13770: akṣān rukmī tato hṛṣṭaḥ pātayām āsa pārthivaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13771: cāturakṣe nivṛtte tu nirjitaḥ sa narādhipaḥ // HV_89.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:13772: baladevena dharmeṇa nety uvāca tato balam /
GE07hv_conpu:13773: dhairyān manaḥ saṃniyamya sa na kiṃcid uvāca ha /
GE07hv_conpu:13775: ete bruvantu rājāno ye tathyavacanā iha |
GE07hv_conpu:13776: baladevaṃ tato rukmī mayā jitam iti smayan // HV_89.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:13777: baladevas tu tac chrutvā jihmaṃ vākyaṃ narādhipāt /
GE07hv_conpu:13778: bhūyaḥ krodhasamāviṣṭo nottaraṃ vyājahāra ha // HV_89.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:13781: satyam āha balaḥ śrīmān dharmeṇaiṣa parājitaḥ // HV_89.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:13782: anuktvā vacanaṃ kiṃcit prāpto bhavati karmaṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:13783: manasā samanujñātaṃ tat syād ity avagamyatām // HV_89.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:13784: iti śrutvā vacas tathyam antarikṣāt subhāṣitam /
GE07hv_conpu:13790: akṣaiḥ krīḍanti rājāno bāṇaiś ca na bhavādṛśāḥ || *HV_89.42ab*1025:4
GE07hv_conpu:13792: rukmiṇyā bhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ niṣpipeṣa mahītale // HV_89.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:13796: dantān babhañja saṃrambhād unnanāda ca siṃhavat /
GE07hv_conpu:13797: khaḍgam udyamya tāṃś cāpi trāsayām āsa pārthivān // HV_89.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:13800: stambhaṃ sabhāyāḥ sauvarṇam utpāṭya balināṃ varaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13801: gajendra iva taṃ stambhaṃ karṣan samkarṣaṇas tataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13805: [k: T1.3.4 G1.3.5 M (T2 G4 after 45cd) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13806: keśeṣu rukmiṇaṃ gṛhya cakarṣa ca punaḥ punaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13807: tam ādāya sabhādvārāc charapātaṃ sasarja ha |
GE07hv_conpu:13809: vitrāsya dviṣataḥ sarvān siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgān iva // HV_89.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:13810: jagāma śibiraṃ rāmaḥ svam eva svajanāvṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13811: nyavedayata kṛṣṇāya tac ca sarvaṃ yathābhavat // HV_89.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:13812: novāca sa tadā kiṃcit kṛṣṇo rāmaṃ mahādyutim /
GE07hv_conpu:13813: [k: Ñ2 V2 B2 Dn Ds D6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13814: rukmiṇī tu tataḥ śrutvā nihataṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam |
GE07hv_conpu:13815: nigṛhya ca tadātmānaṃ krodhād aśrūṇy avartayat // HV_89.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:13816: na hato vāsudevena yaḥ pūrvaṃ paravīrahā /
GE07hv_conpu:13824: vṛṣṇayaś cāndhakāś caiva sarve vimanaso 'bhavan // HV_89.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:13827: rukmiṇī ca mahābhāgā vilapanty ārtayā girā |
GE07hv_conpu:13828: vilapantīṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā sāntvayām āsa keśavaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:13829: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ rukmiṇo nidhanaṃ yathā /
GE07hv_conpu:13830: vairasya ca samutthānaṃ vṛṣṇibhir bharatarṣabha // HV_89.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:13832: rāmakṛṣṇau samāśritya yayur dvāravatīṃ purīm // HV_89.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:13833: [k: After 89.53, V1.3 Ds D6 ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 24)
GE07hv_conpu:13835: [h: HV (CE) Chapter 90 transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of March
GE07hv_conpu:13838: bhūya eva tu viprarṣe baladevasya dhīmataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13839: māhātmyaṃ śrotum icchāmi śeṣasya dharaṇībhṛtaḥ // HV_90.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:13841: kathayanti mahātmānaṃ ye purāṇavido janāḥ // HV_90.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:13842: tasya karmāṇy ahaṃ vipra śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13843: anantaṃ yaṃ vidur nāgam ādidevaṃ mahaujasam // HV_90.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:13846: śeṣas tejonidhiḥ śrīmān akampyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ // HV_90.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:13848: jarāsaṃdhaṃ gadāyuddhe jitavān yo na cāvadhīt // HV_90.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:13850: anvayur māgadhaṃ saṃkhye te cāpi vijitā raṇe // HV_90.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:13855: [k: K1 (marg.).2 Ñ2.3V BDs D2-6T GM4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13856: rājabhiḥ sarvato ruddho haramāṇo balāt kila |
GE07hv_conpu:13858: rāmas tasya vimokṣārtham āgato nālabhac ca tam /
GE07hv_conpu:13859: tataś cukrodha balavān adbhutaṃ cākaron mahat // HV_90.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:13860: anivāryam abhedyaṃ ca divyam apratimaṃ balī /
GE07hv_conpu:13863: prakṣeptum aicchad gaṅgāyāṃ nagaraṃ kauravasya tat // HV_90.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:13864: tad āghūrṇitam ālakṣya puraṃ duryodhano nṛpaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13865: sāmbaṃ niryātayām āsa sabhāryaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ // HV_90.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:13867: gadāyuddhe kurupatiḥ pratijagrāha taṃ ca saḥ // HV_90.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:13868: tataḥ prabhṛti rājendra puram etad vighūrṇitaṃ /
GE07hv_conpu:13869: āvarjitam ivābhāti gaṅgām abhimukhaṃ nṛpa // HV_90.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:13870: idam atyadbhutaṃ karma rāmasya prathitaṃ bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:13871: bhāṇḍīre kathyate rājan yat kṛtaṃ śauriṇā purā // HV_90.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:13873: dhenukaṃ ca mahākāyaṃ cikṣepa nagamūrdhani // HV_90.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:13874: [k: K2.3 Ñ2.3V BD T4 G2 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13877: nagaram abhimukhā yad āhṛtā halavidhṛtā yamunā yamasvasā // HV_90.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:13878: baladevasya māhātmyam etat te kathitaṃ mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:13880: iti puruṣavarasya lāṅgaler bahuvidham uttamam anyad eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:13881: yad akathitam ihādya karma te tad upalabhasva purāṇavistarāt // HV_90.19
GE07hv_conpu:13885: [h: HV (CE) Chapter 91 transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of March
GE07hv_conpu:13888: pratyetya dvārakāṃ viṣṇur hate rukmiṇi vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:13889: akarod yan mahābāhus tan me vada mahāmune // HV_91.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:13891: sa tair vṛtaḥ purīṃ gatvā sarvayādavanandanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13892: dvārakāṃ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ pratyavaikṣata vīryavān // HV_91.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:13895: tatra vighnaṃ caranti sma daiteyāḥ saha dānavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13896: tāñ jaghāna mahābāhur varadattān mahāsurān // HV_91.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:13897: vighnaṃ tatrākarot tasya narako nāma dānavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13900: [k: After 6ab, D6 S ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 25). :k]
GE07hv_conpu:13901: ṛṣīṇāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca pratīpam akarot tadā // HV_91.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:13902: tvaṣṭur duhitaraṃ bhaumaḥ kaśerum agamat tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:13904: pramathya ca varārohāṃ narako vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:13907: bibharti ca mahī kṛtsnā sāgareṣu ca yad vasu // HV_91.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:13909: mamaivopahariṣyanti daityāś ca saha dānavaiḥ // HV_91.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:13911: saṃjahāra tadā bhaumas tac ca nādhicacāra saḥ // HV_91.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:13912: gandharvāṇāṃ ca yāḥ kanyā jahāra narako balī /
GE07hv_conpu:13913: yāś ca devamanuṣyāṇāṃ sapta cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ // HV_91.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:13915: ekaveṇīdharāḥ sarvāḥ satāṃ mārgam anuvratāḥ // HV_91.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:13917: alakāyām adīnātmā murasya viṣayaṃ prati // HV_91.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:13918: tāś ca prāgjyotiṣapatir muroś caiva daśātmajāḥ /

GE07hv_conpu:13920: sa eṣa tamasaḥ pāre varadatto mahāsuraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:13921: aditiṃ dharṣayām āsa kuṇḍalārthe mahāsuraḥ // HV_91.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:13923: ye hi devamanuṣyeṣu kuṇḍale te śubhe ubhe |
GE07hv_conpu:13924: na cāsuragaṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ sahitaiḥ karma tat purā /
GE07hv_conpu:13925: kṛtapūrvaṃ tadā ghoraṃ yad akārṣīn mahāsuraḥ // HV_91.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:13926: yaṃ mahī suṣuve devī yasya prāgjyotiṣaṃ puram /
GE07hv_conpu:13928: hayagrīvo nisundaś ca vīraḥ pañcajanas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:13929: muruḥ putrasahasraiś ca varadatto mahāsuraḥ // HV_91.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:13933: vitrāsanaḥ sukṛtināṃ virūpai rākṣasaiḥ saha // HV_91.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:13935: jāto vṛṣṇiṣu devakyāṃ vasudevāj janārdanaḥ // HV_91.21 //

GE07hv_conpu:14260: [h: HV (CE) chapter 92, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of march
GE07hv_conpu:14266: dadarśa dhanam akṣayyaṃ ratnāni vividhāni ca // HV_92.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:14271: śayanāni mahārhāṇi tathā siṃhāsanāni ca // HV_92.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:14273: dadarśa ca mahac chatraṃ varṣamāṇam ivāmbudam // HV_92.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:14275: varuṇād āhṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ narakeṇeti naḥ śrutam // HV_92.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:14276: yādṛśaṃ tu gṛhe dṛṣṭaṃ narakasya dhanaṃ bahu /
GE07hv_conpu:14277: na vai rājñā kubereṇa na śakreṇa yamena ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14278: ratnasaṃnicyas tādṛg dṛṣṭapūrvo na ca śrutaḥ // HV_92.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:14279: hate bhaume nisunde ca hayagrīve ca dānave /
GE07hv_conpu:14280: upaninyus tatas tāni ratnāny antaḥpurāṇi ca // HV_92.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:14282: keśavāya mahārhāṇi yāny arhati janārdanaḥ // HV_92.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:14287: rucirābhiḥ patākābhir vasānā vividhāḥ kuthāḥ // HV_92.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:14289: aṣṭau śatasahasrāṇi deśajāś cottamā hayāḥ // HV_92.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:14290: goṣu cāpi kṛto yāvat kāmas tava janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14292: āvikāni ca sūkṣmāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14295: vasu yat triṣu lokeṣu dharmeṇādhigataṃ tvayā /
GE07hv_conpu:14298: tāni santīha sarvāṇi narakasya niveśane // HV_92.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:14300: iti vijñāpitas tais tu dānavaiś ca janārdanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:14301: [k: N2 ins. after 16 an addl. colophon. :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14302: sa tat sarvaṃ hṛṣīkeśaḥ pratigṛhya parīkṣya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14303: sarvam āhārayāmāsa dānavair dvārakāṃ purīm // HV_92.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:14304: tatas tad vāruṇaṃ chatraṃ svayam utkṣipya mādhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14308: tatra puṇyā vavur vātā hy abhavaṃś cāmalāḥ prabhāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14319: nivasantyo yathā devyaḥ sukhinyaḥ kāmavarjitāḥ // HV_92.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:14321: sarvāḥ kāṣāyavāsinyaḥ sarvāś ca niyatendriyāḥ // HV_92.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:14323: sametya yadusiṃhasya sarvāś cakruḥ striyo 'ñjalīn // HV_92.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:14324: narakaṃ nihataṃ jñātvā muraṃ caiva mahāsuram /
GE07hv_conpu:14325: hayagrīvaṃ nisundaṃ ca tāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ paryavārayan // HV_92.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:14326: te cāsāṃ rakṣiṇo vṛddhā dānavā yadunandanam /
GE07hv_conpu:14329: sarvāsām eva saṃkalpaḥ patitvenābhavat tataḥ // HV_92.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:14331: saṃprahṛṣṭā mahābāhum idaṃ vacanam abruvan // HV_92.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:14332: satyaṃ bata purā vāyur ihāsmān vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:14333: sarvabhūtarutajñaś ca devarṣir api nāradaḥ // HV_92.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:14335: sa bhaumaṃ narakaṃ hatvā bhartā ca bhavitā hi saḥ // HV_92.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:14337: darśanena kṛtārthā hi vayam adya mahātmanaḥ // HV_92.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:14339: sarvāḥ kamalapatrākṣīr dṛṣṭyā vācā ca mādhavaḥ // HV_92.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:14343: śibikāṃ vahatāṃ tatra nirghoṣaḥ sumahān abhūt // HV_92.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:14348: nyaṅkubhiś ca varāhaiś ca rurubhiś ca niṣevitam /
GE07hv_conpu:14351: jīvaṃjīvakasaṃghaiś ca barhibhiś ca nināditam // HV_92.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:14352: tad apy atibalo viṣṇur dorbhyām utpāṭya bhāsvaram /
GE07hv_conpu:14353: āropayāmāsa tadā garuḍe pakṣiṇāṃ vare // HV_92.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:14355: uvāha līlayā pakṣī garuḍaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ // HV_92.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:14357: dikṣu sarvāsu saṃhrādaṃ janayāmāsa pakṣirāṭ // HV_92.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:14359: saṃjahāra mahābhrāṇi vijahāra ca kānicit // HV_92.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:14361: yayau vātajavaḥ pakṣī janārdanavaśe sthitaḥ // HV_92.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:14364: viśveṣāṃ marutāṃ caiva sādhyānāṃ ca narādhipa /
GE07hv_conpu:14365: bhrājamānāny atikrāmad aśvinoś ca paraṃtapaḥ // HV_92.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:14368: avatīrya sa tārkṣyāt tu dadarśa vibudhādhipam /
GE07hv_conpu:14369: prītaś caivābhyanandat taṃ devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ // HV_92.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:14370: pradāya kuṇḍale divye vavande taṃ tadācyutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14373: satyabhāmā ca paulomyā yathāvad abhinanditā // HV_92.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:14377: prītāsmi darśanād devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ karavāṇi te |
GE07hv_conpu:14378: diṣṭyā hato bhavatyā tu narako duṣṭacetanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:14379: ity uktā sā tadā devī kṛtam ity abravīc ca tām |
GE07hv_conpu:14380: vāsavo vāsudevaś ca sahitau jagmatus tataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14381: adityā bhavanaṃ puṇyaṃ devamātur maharddhimat // HV_92.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:14384: tatas te kuṇḍale dattvā vavande tāṃ śacīpatiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14385: janārdanaṃ puraskṛtya kama caiva śaśaṃśa tat // HV_92.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:14386: [k: For 55b, K2-4 N2.3 V B2 Dn Ds D1-5T GM4 subst.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14388: vavande tāṃ śacībhartā mātaraṃ svāṃ puraṃdaraḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:14389: aditis tau sutau prītyā pariṣvajyābhinandya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:14390: āśirbhir anurūpābhir ubhāv abhyavadat tadā // HV_92.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:14391: paulomī satyabhāmā ca prītyā paramayā yute /
GE07hv_conpu:14392: agṛhṇītāṃ varārhāyā devyāś ca caraṇau śubhau // HV_92.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:14393: te cāpy abhyavadat premṇā devamātā yaśasvinī /
GE07hv_conpu:14394: yathāvad abravīc caiva janārdanam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_92.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:14399: tava ceyaṃ varārohā nityaṃ ca priyadarśanā |
GE07hv_conpu:14404: jarāṃ na yāsyati vadhūr yāvat tvaṃ kṛṣṇa mānuṣaḥ // HV_92.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:14409: sa dadarśa mahābāhur ākrīḍe vāsavasya ha /
GE07hv_conpu:14410: divyam abhyarcitaṃ caityaṃ pārijātaṃ mahādrumam // HV_92.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:14412: yam āsādya janaḥ sarvo jātiṃ smarati paurvikīm // HV_92.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:14414: utpāṭyāropayāmāsa viṣṇus taṃ vai mahādrumam // HV_92.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:14415: so 'paśyat satyabhāmāṃ ca divyām apsarasaṃ hariḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14416: [k: K2 N2.3 V1.2 B Ds D2.4-6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14418: tataḥ prāyād dvāravatīṃ vāyujuṣṭena vai pathā // HV_92.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:14419: śrutvā tad devarājas tu karma kṛṣṇasya vai tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:14420: anumene mahābāhuḥ kṛtaṃ karmeti cābravīt // HV_92.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:14422: pratasthe dvārakāṃ kṛṣṇo devalokād ariṃdamaḥ // HV_92.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:14426: pūjito devarājena dadṛśe yādavīṃ purīm // HV_92.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:14428: hatvā tu narakaṃ bhaumaṃ dattvā kuṇḍalam uttamam |
GE07hv_conpu:14429: hṛtvā taṃ pārijātaṃ ca praṇamya suramātaram |
GE07hv_conpu:14430: tathā karma mahat kṛtvā bhagavān vāsavānujaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14431: upāyād dvārakāṃ viṣṇuḥ śrīmān garuḍavāhanaḥ // HV_92.70 //

GE07hv_conpu:14448: priyam icchasi cet kartuṃ mahyaṃ śilpavatāṃ vara /

GE07hv_conpu:14463: dvārakāṃ prati dāśārhaś citritāṃ viśvakarmaṇā // HV_93.10 //

GE07hv_conpu:14484: bhāti caitrarathaṃ caiva nandanaṃ ca mahad vanam /
GE07hv_conpu:14485: ramaṇaṃ bhāvanaṃ caiva veṇumad vai samantataḥ // HV_93.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:14487: bhāti puṣkariṇī ramyā pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhārata // HV_93.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:14495: āyasaiś ca mahācakrair dadṛśe dvārakāṃ purīm // HV_93.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:14499: dviguṇopaniveśāṃ ca dadṛśe dvārakāṃ purīm // HV_93.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:14502: striyo 'pi yasyāṃ yudhyeran kim u vṛṣṇimahārathāḥ // HV_93.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:14503: vyūhānām uttamā mārgāḥ sapta caiva mahāpathāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14504: tatra vai vihitāḥ sākṣād vividhā viśvakarmaṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:14522: dadṛśe dvārakā cāru meghair dyaur iva saṃvṛtā /
