GE07hv_conpu:14914: hataḥ saubhapatiḥ sālvaḥ śaubhaś ca dṛḍhadhanvanā // HV_97.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:14918: jaghāna yo naravyāghro rāvaṇasyābhitaś carau // HV_97.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:14920: gopatis tālaketuś ca nihatau śārṅgadhanvanā // HV_97.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:14921: akṣaprapatane caiva nimir haṃsaś ca dānavau /
GE07hv_conpu:14922: ubhau tāv api kṛṣṇena sarāṣṭrau vinipātitau // HV_97.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:14924: sānubandhaḥ sarāṣṭraś ca kāśīnām adhipo hataḥ // HV_97.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:14925: vijitya ca yamaḥ saṃkhye śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14928: prāpya lohitakūṭāni kṛṣṇena varuṇo jitaḥ // HV_97.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:14931: pāṇḍyaṃ pauṇḍraṃ ca matsyaṃ ca kaliṅgaṃ ca janārdanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14932: jaghāna sahitān sarvān vaṅgarājaṃ tathaiva ca // HV_97.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:14933: eṣa caikaśataṃ hatvā raṇe rājñāṃ mahātmanām /
GE07hv_conpu:14934: gāndhārīm āvahad dhīmān mahiṣīṃ priyadarśanām // HV_97.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:14936: jigāya bharata śreṣṭhaṃ kuntyāḥ pramukhato vibhuḥ // HV_97.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:14937: droṇaṃ drauṇiṃ kṛpaṃ karṇaṃ bhīmasenaṃ suyodhanam /
GE07hv_conpu:14940: sauvīrarājasya sutāṃ prasahya hṛtavān prabhuḥ // HV_97.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:14943: avāpya tapaso vīryaṃ balam ojaś ca mādhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14944: pūrvadehe jahārāyaṃ bales tribhuvanaṃ hariḥ // HV_97.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:14946: yasya nādhigato mṛtyuḥ puraṃ prāgjyotiṣaṃ prati // HV_97.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:14947: abhibhūtaś ca kṛṣṇena sagaṇaḥ sa mahābalaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14948: baleḥ putro mahāvīryo bāṇo draviṇavattaraḥ // HV_97.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:14954: jambham airāvataṃ cāpi virūpaṃ ca mahāyaśāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14956: tathā nāgapatiṃ toye kāliyaṃ ca mahaujasam /
GE07hv_conpu:14957: nirjitya puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ preṣayām āsa sāgaram // HV_97.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:14958: saṃjīvayām āsa mṛtaṃ putraṃ sāṃdīpanes tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:14959: nirjitya puruṣavyāghro yamaṃ vaivasvataṃ hariḥ // HV_97.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:14960: evam eṣa mahābāhuḥ śāstā sarvadurātmanām // HV_97.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:14961: [k: K Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D1.3-6T Gins. (D2 cont. after 1098*): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:14962: devāṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś caiva ye dviṣanti sadā nṛpa |
GE07hv_conpu:14966: devamātur dadau cāpi prītyarthaṃ vajrapāṇinaḥ // HV_97.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:14968: prāptaṃ ca divi deveṣu keśavena mahad yaśaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:14969: evaṃ sa devadaityānāṃ surāṇāṃ ca mahāyaśāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:14972: kṛtvā devārtham amitaṃ svasthānaṃ pratipatsyate // HV_97.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:14980: ya imām āvaset kaścid anyatra madhusūdanāt // HV_97.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:14981: evam eṣa daśārhāṇāṃ vidhāya vidhinā vidhim /
GE07hv_conpu:14982: viṣṇur nārāyaṇaḥ somaḥ sūryaś ca bhavitā svayam // HV_97.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:14984: modaty eṣa sadā bhūtair bālaḥ krīḍanakair iva // HV_97.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:14987: pramāṇaṃ hy atra vicchinnaṃ pramāṇaṃ sarvavastuṣu |
GE07hv_conpu:14988: yato 'yaṃ devadeveśo na pramāṇe pramā bhavet |
GE07hv_conpu:14989: paraṃ hy aparam etasmād viśvarūpān na vidyate // HV_97.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:14991: anto hi karmaṇām asya dṛṣṭapūrvo na kenacit // HV_97.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:14992: evam etāni karmāṇi śiśur madhyavayās tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:14994: ity uvāca purā vyāsas tapodīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā /
GE07hv_conpu:14997: yadubhiḥ pūjitaḥ sarvair nāradas tridivaṃ gataḥ // HV_97.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:15002: yādavāś ca dhanaṃ prāpya vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15003: yajñair iṣṭvā mahātmāno dvārakām āvasan purīm // HV_97.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:15004: [h: HV (CE) chapter 98, transliterated by Julie Bélanger, proof-read by
GE07hv_conpu:15008: tāsām apatyān yaṣṭānāṃ bhagavān prabravītu me // HV_98.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:15010: aṣṭau mahiṣyaḥ putriṇya iti prādhānyataḥ smṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15011: sarvā vīraprajāyinyas tāsv apatyāni me śṛṇu // HV_98.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:15012: rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca devī nagnajitī tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:15013: sudattā ca tathā śaibyā lakṣmaṇā cāruhāsinī // HV_98.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:15014: mitravindā ca kālindī jāmbavaty atha pauravī /
GE07hv_conpu:15015: subhīmā ca tathā mādrī raukmiṇeyān imāñ śṛṇu // HV_98.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:15017: dvitīyaś cārudeṣṇaś ca vṛṣṇisiṃho mahārathaḥ // HV_98.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:15018: cārubhadro bhadracāruḥ sudaṃṣṭro druma eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:15019: suṣeṇaś cāruguptaś ca cāruvindaś ca cārumān /
GE07hv_conpu:15020: cārubāhuḥ kaniṣṭhaś ca kanyā cārumatī tathā // HV_98.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:15023: catasro jajñire teṣāṃ svasāro garuḍadhvajāt // HV_98.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:15024: [k: K Ñ2.3V BD S (except m1-3) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15029: mitravān mitravindaś ca mitravaty api cāṅganā // HV_98.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:15030: mitravāhaḥ sunīthaś ca nagnajityāḥ prajāḥ śṛṇu /
GE07hv_conpu:15031: bhadrakāro bhadravindaḥ kanyā bhadravatī tathā // HV_98.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:15033: satyajit senajic caiva tathā śūraḥ sapatnajit // HV_98.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:15035: kumāro vṛkadīptiś ca lakṣmaṇāyāḥ prajāḥ śṛṇu // HV_98.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:15036: gātravān gātraguptaś ca gātravindaś ca vīryavān /
GE07hv_conpu:15037: jajñire gātravanty ete bhaginyānujayā saha // HV_98.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:15038: aśrutaś ca suto jajñe kālindyāḥ śrutasattamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15040: taṃ pradāya hṛṣīkeśas tāṃ bhāryāṃ mudito 'bravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:15041: eṣa vām ubhayor astu dāyādaḥ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ // HV_98.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:15042: bṛhatyāṃ tu gadasyāhuḥ śaibyāyām aṅgadaṃ sutam /
GE07hv_conpu:15043: utpannaṃ kumudaṃ caiva śvetaṃ śvetāṃ tathāṅganām // HV_98.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:15044: agāvahaḥ sumitraś ca śuciś citrarathas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:15045: citrasenaḥ sute cāsya citrā citravatī tathā // HV_98.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:15046: vanustambasya jajñāte stambaḥ stambavanaś ca ha /
GE07hv_conpu:15049: upāsaṅgasya tu sutau vajraḥ sukṣipra eva ca // HV_98.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:15051: kāpālī garuḍaś caiva jajñāte citrayodhinau // HV_98.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:15054: ayutaṃ tu samākhyātaṃ vāsudevasya te sutāḥ || *HV_98.18*1105:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15057: pradyumnasya suto yas tu vaidarbhyāṃ rājasattamaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15058: aniruddho raṇe yoddhā jajñe sa mṛgaketanaḥ // HV_98.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:15061: sutanuś ca narācī ca śaurer āstāṃ parigrahaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15062: pauṇḍraś ca kapilaś caiva vāsudevasya tau sutau // HV_98.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:15063: narācyāṃ kapilo jajñe pauṇḍraś ca sutanoḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15064: tayor nṛpo 'bhavat pauṇḍraḥ kapilaś ca vanaṃ yayau // HV_98.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:15066: samādhisthaḥ sa bhūteṣu dayāṃ kurvan mahāmatiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:15069: jarā nāma niṣādānāṃ prabhuḥ sarvadhanuṣmatām // HV_98.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:15070: kāśyā supārśvaṃ tanayaṃ lebhe sāmbāt tarasvinam /
GE07hv_conpu:15074: sānor vajro 'niruddhasya vajras tv ādāv ajāyata // HV_98.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:15075: vajrāj jajñe prativahaḥ sucārus tasya cātmajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15076: anamitrāc chinir jajñe kaniṣṭhād vṛṣṇinandanāt // HV_98.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:15077: śines tu satyavāg jajñe satyakaś ca mahārathaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15078: satyakasyātmajaḥ śūro yuyudhānas tv ajāyata // HV_98.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:15080: bhūmer yugaṃdharaḥ putra iti vaṃśaḥ samāpyate // HV_98.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:15081: [h: HV (CE) chapter 99, transliterated by Julie Bélanger, proof-read by
GE07hv_conpu:15084: ya eṣa bhavatā pūrvaṃ śambaraghnety udāhṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15085: pradyumnaḥ sa kathaṃ jaghne śambaraṃ tad bravīhi me // HV_99.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:15092: jahāra kṛṣṇasya sutaṃ śiśuṃ vai kālaśambaraḥ // HV_99.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:15094: tato na nigṛhītaḥ sa dānavo yuddhadurmadaḥ // HV_99.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:15096: dorbhyām utkṣipya nagaraṃ svaṃ jagāma mahāsuraḥ // HV_99.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:15098: nāmnā māyāvatī nāma māyeva śubhadarśana // HV_99.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:15099: dadau taṃ vāsudevasya putraṃ putram ivātmajam /
GE07hv_conpu:15100: tasyā mahiṣyā nāthinyā dānavaḥ kālacoditaḥ // HV_99.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:15101: [k: All Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15103: harṣeṇa mahatā yuktā punaḥ punar udaikṣata || *HV_99.7*1109:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15104: atha tasyā nirīkṣantyāḥ smṛtiḥ prādurbabhūva ha |
GE07hv_conpu:15105: ayaṃ sa mama kānto 'bhūt smṛtvaivaṃ cānvacintayat || *HV_99.7*1109:4
GE07hv_conpu:15106: ayaṃ sa nātho bhartā me yasyārthaṃ hi divāniśam |
GE07hv_conpu:15107: cintāśokahrade magnā na vindāmi ratiṃ kvacit || *HV_99.7*1109:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:15110: katham asya stanaṃ dāsye mātṛbhāvena jānatī |
GE07hv_conpu:15111: bhartur bhāryā tv ahaṃ bhūtvā vakṣye vā putra ity uta ||
GE07hv_conpu:15112: evaṃ saṃcintya manasā dhātryās taṃ sā samarpayat |
GE07hv_conpu:15114: dhātryāḥ sakāśāt sa ca tāṃ śṛṇvan rukmiṇinandanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:15115: māyāvatīm avijñānān mene svām eva mātaram |
GE07hv_conpu:15116: sā taṃ saṃvardhayām āsa kārṣṇiṃ kamalalocanam /
GE07hv_conpu:15117: māyāś cāsmai dadau sarvā dānavīḥ kāmamohitā // HV_99.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:15118: sa yadā yauvanasthas tu pradyumnaḥ kāmadarśanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15120: taṃ sā māyāvatī kāntaṃ kāmayām āsa kāminī /
GE07hv_conpu:15121: iṅgitaiś cāpi vīkṣantī prālobhayata sasmitā // HV_99.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:15122: prasajjantīṃ tu tāṃ devīṃ babhāṣe cāruhāsinīm /
GE07hv_conpu:15123: mātṛbhāvaṃ parityajya kim evaṃ vartase 'nyathā // HV_99.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:15125: yā putrabhāvam utsṛjya mayi kāmāt pravartase // HV_99.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:15126: nanu te 'haṃ sutaḥ saumye ko 'yaṃ śīlavyatikramaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15127: tat tvam icchāmy ahaṃ devi kathitaṃ kas tv ayaṃ vidhiḥ // HV_99.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:15129: yā nareṣu prasajjante nagāgreṣu ghanā iva // HV_99.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:15130: yadi te 'haṃ sutaḥ saumye yadi vā nātmajaḥ śubhe /
GE07hv_conpu:15131: kathitaṃ tat tvam icchāmi kim idaṃ te cikīrṣitam // HV_99.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:15132: evam uktā tu sā bhīruḥ kāmena vyathitendriyā /
GE07hv_conpu:15133: priyaṃ provāca vacanaṃ vivikte keśavātmajam // HV_99.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:15134: na tvaṃ mama sutaḥ saumya nāpi te śambaraḥ pitā /
GE07hv_conpu:15135: rūpavān asi vikrāntas tvaṃ jātyā vṛṣṇinandanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15136: putras tvaṃ vāsudevasya rukmiṇyā nandivardhanaḥ // HV_99.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:15140: pitus te vāsudevasya dharṣayitvā gṛhaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:15141: pākaśāsanakalpasya hṛtas tvaṃ śambareṇa ha // HV_99.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:15142: sā ca te karuṇaṃ mātā tvāṃ bālam anuśocatī /
GE07hv_conpu:15143: atyarthaṃ śrāmyate vīra vivatsā saurabhī yathā // HV_99.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:15144: sa hi śakrād api mahān pitā te garuḍadhvajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15145: iha tvāṃ nābhijānāti bālam evāpavāhitam // HV_99.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:15146: kānta vṛṣṇikumāras tvaṃ na hi tvaṃ śambarātmajaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15147: vīra naivaṃvidhān putrān dānavā janayanti hi // HV_99.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:15148: tato 'haṃ kāmayāmi tvāṃ na hi tvaṃ janito mayā /
GE07hv_conpu:15149: rūpaṃ te saumya paśyantī sīdāmi hṛdi durbalā // HV_99.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:15150: yan me vyavasitaṃ kānta yac ca me hṛdi vartate /
GE07hv_conpu:15151: tanme manasi vārṣṇeya pratisaṃdhātum arhasi // HV_99.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:15152: eṣa te kathitaḥ saumya sadbhāvas tvayi yo mama /
GE07hv_conpu:15153: yathā na mama putras tvaṃ na putraḥ śambarasya ca // HV_99.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:15155: kāmadevaś ca vīra tvaṃ ratiṃ māṃ viddhi vai prabho |
GE07hv_conpu:15156: śaṃkarasya ca śāpena tvam anaṅgagatiḥ purā || *HV_99.25*1110:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15157: tat kālamāyayā rūpaṃ kṛtvā daityasya veśmani |
GE07hv_conpu:15158: viśīrṇā sāham uṣitā daityasyāsya ca veśmani |
GE07hv_conpu:15160: cakrāyudhātmajaḥ kruddhaḥ śambaraṃ sa samāhvayat // HV_99.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:15162: aṣṭamyāṃ nihato yuddhe māyayā kālaśambaraḥ // HV_99.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:15164: gṛhya māyāvatīṃ devīṃ svām agacchat purīṃ pituḥ // HV_99.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:15166: ājagāma purīṃ ramyāṃ rakṣitāṃ tejasā pituḥ // HV_99.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:15168: māyāvatyā saha tayā rūpavān iva manmathaḥ // HV_99.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:15170: vismitāś caiva hṛṣṭāś ca bhīrāś caivābhavaṃs tadā // HV_99.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:15171: tatas taṃ kāmasaṃkāśaṃ kāntayā saha saṃgatam /
GE07hv_conpu:15173: taṃ vrīḍitamukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sajjamānaṃ pade pade /
GE07hv_conpu:15175: rukmiṇī tv eva taṃ dṛṣṭvā śokārtā putragṛddhinī /
GE07hv_conpu:15179: yādṛk svapno mayā dṛṣṭo niśāyā yauvane gate |
GE07hv_conpu:15185: tayā punar ahaṃ gṛhya snāpitā rucirāmbunā || *HV_99.34*1111:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:15187: mama mūrdhany upāghrāya dattā srak sā tayā mama || *HV_99.34*1111:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:15189: sakhījanavṛtā devī kumāraṃ vīkṣya taṃ muhuḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:15191: ity ato 'nantaraṃ tatra abravīd vākyam eva tat |
GE07hv_conpu:15192: dhanyāyāḥ khalv ayaṃ putro dīrghāyuḥ priyadarśanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15193: idṛśaḥ kāmasaṃkāśo yauvane prathame sthitaḥ // HV_99.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:15194: jīvaputrā tvayā putra kā sā bhāgyavibhūṣitā /
GE07hv_conpu:15195: kim arthaṃ cāmbudaśyāma sabhāryas tvam ihāgataḥ // HV_99.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:15196: asmin vayasi suvyaktaṃ pradyumno mama putrakaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15197: bhaved yadi na nītaḥ syāt kṛtāntena balīyasā // HV_99.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:15198: vyaktaṃ vṛṣṇikumāro 'yaṃ na mithyā mama tarkitam /
GE07hv_conpu:15199: vijñāto 'si mayā cihnair vinā cakraṃ janārdanaḥ // HV_99.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:15200: mukhaṃ nārāyaṇasyeva keśāḥ keśānta eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:15201: mūrdhavakṣobhujais tulyo halinaḥ śvaśurasya me // HV_99.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:15202: kas tvaṃ vṛṣṇikulaṃ sarvaṃ vapuṣā dyotayan sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15203: aho janārdanasyāsya divyā tvam aparā tanuḥ // HV_99.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:15204: etasminn antare kṛṣṇaḥ sahasā praviveśa ha /
GE07hv_conpu:15205: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā śambarasya vadhaṃ prati // HV_99.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:15206: so 'paśyat taṃ sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ siddhaṃ manmathalakṣaṇaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15207: snuṣāṃ māyāvatīṃ caiva hṛṣṭacetā janārdanaḥ // HV_99.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:15208: so 'bravīt sahasā devīṃ rukmiṇīṃ devatām iva /
GE07hv_conpu:15209: ayaṃ te devi saṃprāptaḥ putraś cāpadharaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_99.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:15211: hatā māyāś ca tāḥ sarvā yābhir devān abādhata // HV_99.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:15212: satī ceyaṃ śubhā sādhvī bhāryā vai tanayasya te /
GE07hv_conpu:15214: mā ca te śambarasyeyaṃ patnīty evaṃ vyathā bhavet // HV_99.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:15215: manmathe tu gate nāśaṃ gate cānaṅgatāṃ purā /
GE07hv_conpu:15218: kāmapatnī hi kanyaiṣā kāmakāmā ratiḥ śubhā /
GE07hv_conpu:15219: māyārūpeṇa taṃ daityaṃ mohayaty asakṛc chubhā // HV_99.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:15220: na caiṣā tasya kaumāre vaśe tiṣṭhati śobhanā /
GE07hv_conpu:15221: atmamāyāmayaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā śambaram āviśat // HV_99.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:15222: patny eṣā mama putrasya snuṣā tava varāṅganā /
GE07hv_conpu:15224: praveśayaināṃ bhavanaṃ pūjyā hy eṣā snuṣā mama /
GE07hv_conpu:15225: cirapranaṣṭaṃ ca sutaṃ bhajasya punarāgatam // HV_99.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:15226: [k: Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D1-3.5(marg.).6 T2.4 G M4 ins. (T1 after 49a): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15228: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ devī kṛṣṇenodāhṛtaṃ tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:15229: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe rukmiṇī vākyam abravīt || *HV_99.49*1114:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:15231: adya me saphalaḥ kāmaḥ pūrṇaś cādya manorathaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:15233: āgaccha putra bhavanaṃ viśasva saha bhāryayā || *HV_99.49*1114:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:15234: tato 'bhivādya caraṇau govindaṃ mātaraṃ ca saḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:15235: pradyumnaḥ pūjayām āsa halinaṃ ca mahābalam || *HV_99.49*1114:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:15236: utthāpya taṃ pariṣvajya mūrdhny upāghrāya vīryavān |
GE07hv_conpu:15238: snuṣāṃ cotthāpya tāṃ devīṃ rukmiṇī rukmabhūṣaṇāṃ |
GE07hv_conpu:15240: sametaṃ bhavanaṃ patnyā śacyendram aditir yathā |
GE07hv_conpu:15241: praveśayām āsa tadā rukmiṇī sutam āgatam |
GE07hv_conpu:15243: evam uktā tu kṛṣṇena rukmiṇī yoṣitāṃ varā |
GE07hv_conpu:15244: putraṃ prītyā pariṣvajya mūrdhni cāghrāya tāṃ snuṣām |
GE07hv_conpu:15245: gṛhaṃ praveśayām āsa snuṣayā saha bhāminī |
GE07hv_conpu:15246: [h: HV (CE) chapter 100, transliterated by Julie Bélanger, proof-read by
GE07hv_conpu:15250: tam eva māsaṃ sāmbas tu jāmbavatyām ajāyata // HV_100.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:15252: rāmād anantaraṃ caiva mānitaḥ sarvavṛṣṇibhiḥ // HV_100.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:15254: rāmasyaiva priyasutaḥ so 'bhavaj jyeṣṭha ity api |
GE07hv_conpu:15255: jātamātre tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śubhaṃ tat puram āviśat /
GE07hv_conpu:15257: yādavīṃ ca śriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā svāṃ śriyaṃ dveṣṭi vāsavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15258: janārdanabhayāc caiva na śāntiṃ lebhire nṛpāḥ // HV_100.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:15259: kasyacit tv atha kālasya pure vāraṇasāhvaye /
GE07hv_conpu:15260: duryodhanasya yajñe vai sameyuḥ sarvapārthivāḥ // HV_100.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:15261: tāṃ śrutvā mādhavīṃ lakṣmīṃ saputraṃ ca janārdanam /
GE07hv_conpu:15262: purīṃ dvārāvatīṃ caiva niviṣṭāṃ sāgarāntare // HV_100.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:15264: śriyaṃ draṣṭuṃ hṛṣīkeśam ājagmuḥ kṛṣṇamandiram // HV_100.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:15268: akṣauhiṇīḥ prakarṣanto daśa cāṣṭau ca bhūmipāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15271: viviśur yojanāḍhyāsu svāsu svāsv avanīṣv atha // HV_100.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:15275: śārṅgaṃ ca dhanur ādāya kiṃ syād iti vicintayan |
GE07hv_conpu:15281: kṛtvā siṃhāsane kṛṣṇaḥ kāñcane niṣasāda ha // HV_100.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:15283: siṃhāsaneṣu citreṣu pīṭheṣu ca janādhipāḥ // HV_100.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:15285: surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca sadane brahmaṇo yathā // HV_100.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:15287: idaṃ provāca bhagavān kṣatriyān draṣṭum āgatān |
GE07hv_conpu:15289: yad asmākaṃ nṛpaśreṣṭhās tulyaṃ tad bhavatāṃ sadā |
GE07hv_conpu:15290: gṛhyatāṃ vasu yad divyaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ nṛpasattamāḥ || *HV_100.15*1118:4
GE07hv_conpu:15292: teṣāṃ citrāḥ kathās tatra pravṛttās tatsamāgame /
GE07hv_conpu:15295: taṃ dṛṣṭvā devadeveśaṃ prahṛṣṭāḥ kṣatriyās tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:15297: tumulaṃ durdinaṃ cāsīt savidyut stanayitnumat // HV_100.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:15301: gāyann eva harīṃ sāmnā vasantaṃ yadusaṃsadi |
GE07hv_conpu:15307: āsanasthaṃ yaduśreṣṭam uvāca munir avyayaḥ // HV_100.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:15308: āścaryaṃ khalu devānām ekas tvaṃ puruṣottama /
GE07hv_conpu:15309: dhanyaś cāsi mahābāho loke nānyo 'sti kaś cana // HV_100.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:15310: evam uktaḥ smitaṃ kṛtvā pratyuvāca muniṃ prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15311: āścaryaś caiva dhanyaś ca dakṣiṇābhiḥ sahety aham // HV_100.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:15312: evam ukto muniśreṣṭhaḥ prāha madhye mahīkṣitām /
GE07hv_conpu:15314: taṃ prasthitam abhiprekṣya pārthivāḥ prāhur īśvaram /
GE07hv_conpu:15315: guhyaṃ mantram ajānanto vacanaṃ nāraderitam // HV_100.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:15316: āścarya ity abhihito dhanyo 'sīti ca mādhava /
GE07hv_conpu:15317: dakṣiṇābhiḥ sahety evaṃ pratyukte 'pi ca nārade // HV_100.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:15318: kim etan nābhijānīmo divyaṃ mantrapadaṃ mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:15319: yadi śrāvyam idaṃ kṛṣṇa śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // HV_100.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:15320: tān uvāca tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sarvān pārthivapuṃgavān /
GE07hv_conpu:15321: śrotavyaṃ nāradas tv eṣa dvijo vaḥ kathayiṣyati // HV_100.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:15323: yat tvayābhihitaṃ vākyaṃ mayā ca pratibhāṣitam // HV_100.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:15324: sa pīṭhe kāñcane śubhre sūpaviṣṭaḥ svalaṃkṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15325: prabhavaṃ tasya vākyasya pravaktum upacakrame // HV_100.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:15326: śruyatāṃ bho nṛpaśreṣṭhā yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15327: asya praśnasya mahato yathā pāram ahaṃ gataḥ // HV_100.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:15329: carāmy ekaḥ kṣapāpāye saṃdṛśyati divākare // HV_100.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:15334: so 'haṃ taṃ pāṇinā spṛṣṭvā proktavāñ jalacāriṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:15335: tvam āścaryaśarīro 'si kūrma dhanyaś ca me mataḥ // HV_100.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:15336: yas tvam evam abhedyābhyāṃ kapālābhyāṃ samāvṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15337: toye carasi niḥśaṅkaḥ kiṃ cid apy avicintayan // HV_100.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:15338: sa mām uvācāmbucaraḥ kūrmo mānuṣavat svayam /
GE07hv_conpu:15339: kim āścaryaṃ mayi mune dhanyaś cāhaṃ kathaṃ vibho // HV_100.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:15340: gaṅgeyaṃ nimnagā dhanyā kim āścaryam ataḥ param /
GE07hv_conpu:15341: yatrāham iva sattvāni caranty ayutaśo jale // HV_100.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:15343: dhanyāsi tvaṃ nadīśreṣṭhe nityam āścaryadarśane // HV_100.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:15344: yā tvam evaṃ mahādehaiḥ śvāpadair upaśobhitā /
GE07hv_conpu:15345: hradinī sāgaraṃ yāsi rakṣantī tāpasālayān // HV_100.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:15346: evam uktā tato gaṅgā rūpiṇī pratyabhāṣata /
GE07hv_conpu:15347: nāradaṃ devagandharvaṃ śakrasya dayitaṃ dvijam // HV_100.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:15349: tava satye niviṣṭasya vākyaṃ māṃ pratibādhate // HV_100.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:15351: yatrāham iva vistīrṇāḥ śataśo yānti nimnagāḥ // HV_100.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:15353: āścaryaḥ khalu lokānāṃ dhanyaś cāsi mahārṇava /
GE07hv_conpu:15354: tena khalv asi yonis tvam ambhasāṃ salileśvaraḥ // HV_100.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:15357: samudras tv evam uktas tu tato mām abravīd vacaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15358: svaṃ jalaughatalaṃ bhittvā vyutthitaḥ pavaneritaḥ // HV_100.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:15359: mā maivaṃ devagandharva nāsmy āś caryo dvijottama /
GE07hv_conpu:15360: vasudheyaṃ mune dhanyā yatrāham upari sthitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15361: ṛte tu pṛthivīṃ loke kim āścaryam ataḥ param // HV_100.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:15363: kautūhalasam āviṣṭo hy abruvaṃ jagato gatim // HV_100.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:15364: dharitri dehināṃ yonir dhanyā khalv asi śobhane /
GE07hv_conpu:15365: āścaryā cāsi bhūteṣu mahatyā kṣamayā yute // HV_100.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:15366: tena khalv asi lokānāṃ dharaṇī manujāraṇiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15367: kṣamā tvattaḥ prasūtā ca karma cāmbaragāminām // HV_100.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:15368: tato bhūḥ stutivākyena sā mayoktena lajjitā /
GE07hv_conpu:15369: vihāya sahajaṃ dhairyam atha māṃ pratyabhāṣata // HV_100.51 //
GE07hv_conpu:15371: nāsmi dhanyā na cāścaryā pārakyeyaṃ dhṛtir mama // HV_100.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:15372: ete dhanyā dvijaśrestha parvatā dhārayanti mām /
GE07hv_conpu:15373: eṣv āścaryāṇi dṛśyante ete lokasya setavaḥ // HV_100.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:15375: dhanyā bhanto dṛśyante bahvāścaryāś ca bhūdharāḥ // HV_100.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:15377: tena ratnākarāḥ sarve bhavanto bhuvi śāśvatāḥ // HV_100.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:15378: mama tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā parvatās tasthuṣāṃ varāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15379: ūcur māṃ sāntvayuktāni vacāṃsi vanaśobhitāḥ // HV_100.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:15380: brahmarṣe na vayaṃ dhanyā nāpy āścaryāṇi santi naḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15383: nāś caryo vāpi dhanyo vā tasmāt parataro bhuvi || *HV_100.57ab*1121:2
GE07hv_conpu:15384: vihāya taṃ mahādevaṃ nāsmān stotum ihārhasi || *HV_100.57ab*1121:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:15385: iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā kailāsam aham āgataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:15386: dṛṣṭvā taṃ pārvatīśānam abruvaṃ vacanaṃ tadā || *HV_100.57ab*1121:5 |
GE07hv_conpu:15388: āścaryo 'si bhavān eko dhanyas tvaṃ jagatīpate |
GE07hv_conpu:15389: tvattaḥ parataro nāsti devo jagati kaś cana || *HV_100.57ab*1121:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:15390: yad idaṃ dṛśyate deva bhuvanaṃ sacarācaram |
GE07hv_conpu:15392: atha mām abravīd devo virūpākṣas trilocanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:15393: nāhaṃ dhanyo na cāścaryo naivaṃ māṃ vaktum arhasi |
GE07hv_conpu:15394: mattaḥ parataro jñeyo jagat sraṣṭā dvijottama |
GE07hv_conpu:15395: brahmā prajāpatir dhanyaḥ sa cāścaryaḥ sureṣv api // HV_100.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:15397: tasya vākyasya paryāyaṃ paryāptam iva lakṣaye // HV_100.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:15401: āścaryo bhagavān eko dhanyaś ca jagato guruḥ // HV_100.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:15402: na kiṃ cid anyat paśyāmi bhūtaṃ yad bhavatā samam /
GE07hv_conpu:15403: tvattaḥ sarvam idaṃ jātaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṃgamam // HV_100.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:15405: bhavanti sarvadeveśa dṛśyaṃ sarvam idaṃ vapuḥ // HV_100.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:15406: tena khalv asi devānāṃ devadevaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15407: teṣāmevāsi yat sraṣṭā lokānām api saṃbhavaḥ // HV_100.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:15408: tato mām āha bhagavān brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15409: dhanyāścaryāśritair vākyaiḥ kiṃ māṃ nārada bhāṣase // HV_100.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:15410: āścaryaṃ paramaṃ devā dhanyā devāś ca nārada /
GE07hv_conpu:15411: ye lokān dhārayanti sma devās tattvārthadarśinaḥ // HV_100.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:15412: ṛksāmayajuṣāṃ satyam atharvaṇi ca yan matam /
GE07hv_conpu:15413: tanmayaṃ viddhi māṃ vipra dhṛto 'haṃ tair mayā ca te // HV_100.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:15418: dhanyā bhavantaḥ puṇyāś ca nityam āścaryaviśrutāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15419: ādhārāś caiva viprāṇām evam āha prajāpatiḥ // HV_100.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:15421: yuṣmat parataraṃ nāsti śrutyā vā tapasāpi vā // HV_100.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:15422: pratūcus te tato vākyaṃ devā mām abhitaḥ sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15423: āścaryāś caiva dhanyāś ca yajñāś cātmaparāyaṇāḥ // HV_100.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:15424: yajñārthe tu vayaṃ sṛṣṭāḥ sṛṣṭā yena sma nārada /
GE07hv_conpu:15425: tad asmākaṃ parā yajñā na vayaṃ svavaśe sthitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15426: svayaṃbhuvo 'pīha parā vedānāṃ ca parā gatiḥ // HV_100.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:15428: bho yajñāḥ paramaṃ tejo yuṣmāsu khalu lakṣyate /
GE07hv_conpu:15429: brahmaṇābhihitaṃ vākyaṃ yan me vedair iheritam // HV_100.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:15431: dhanyāḥ khalu bhavanto ye dvijātīnāṃ svavaṃśinaḥ // HV_100.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:15432: tena khalv agnayas tṛptiṃ puṣmābhir yānti tarpitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15433: bhāgaiś ca tridaśāḥ sarve mantraiś caiva maharṣayaḥ // HV_100.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:15435: pratyūcur māṃ paraṃ vākyaṃ sarve yūpadhvajāḥ sthitāḥ // HV_100.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:15437: āścaryaṃ paramaṃ viṣṇuḥ sa hy asmākaṃ parā gatiḥ // HV_100.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:15438: yad ājyaṃ vayam aśnīmo hutam agniṣu pāvanam /
GE07hv_conpu:15439: tat sarvaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo lokamūrtiḥ prayacchati // HV_100.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:15443: so 'haṃ viṣṇor gatiṃ prepsur iha saṃpatito bhuvi /
GE07hv_conpu:15444: dṛṣṭaś cāyaṃ mayā viṣṇur bhavadbhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ // HV_100.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:15445: yan mayābhihito hy eṣa tvam āścaryaṃ janārdana /
GE07hv_conpu:15446: dhanyaś cāsīti bhavatāṃ madhyastho hy atra pārthivāḥ // HV_100.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:15448: dakṣiṇābhiḥ sahety evaṃ paryāptaṃ vacanaṃ mama // HV_100.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:15449: yajñānāṃ hi gatir viṣṇuḥ sarveṣāṃ sahadakṣiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15450: dakṣiṇābhiḥ sahety evaṃ praśno mama samāptavān // HV_100.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:15452: sadakṣiṇe 'smin puruṣe tad vākyaṃ paryayāgatam // HV_100.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:15453: yan māṃ bhavantaḥ pṛcchanti vākyasyāsya vinirṇayam /
GE07hv_conpu:15454: tad etat sarvam ākhyātaṃ sādhayāmi yathāgatam // HV_100.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:15458: na ca nārāyaṇād anyat triṣu lokeṣu vidyate |
GE07hv_conpu:15463: ity evam uktvā sa divaṃ jagāma ha |
GE07hv_conpu:15464: nārade tu gate svargaṃ sarve te pṛthivīkṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15465: vismitāḥ svāni rāṣṭrāṇi jagmuḥ sabalavāhanāḥ // HV_100.86 //
GE07hv_conpu:15466: [k: T1.2.4 G1.3.5 M (G4 cont. after *1123) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:15470: dhanyo 'yaṃ nārado yasmād dṛṣṭaḥ sākṣād dhariḥ svayam ||
GE07hv_conpu:15473: ko nāma viṣṇur ity evam anye mūḍhā narādhamāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:15475: iti tattvena vijñāya nṛpā nārāyaṇaṃ param |
GE07hv_conpu:15476: tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā namaskṛtya punaḥ punaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:15478: svam eva bhavanaṃ vīro viveśa yadupuṃgavaḥ // HV_100.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:15479: [h: HV (CE) chapter 101, transliterated by Julie Bélanger, proof-read by
GE07hv_conpu:15485: jātā hi vayam adyaiva tatkathāśravaṇād dvija |
GE07hv_conpu:15487: ity uktaḥ sa smitaṃ kṛtvā praṇamya munipuṃgavam |
GE07hv_conpu:15488: māhātmyaṃ śrotum icchāmi paramaṃ dvijasattama // HV_101.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:15489: na hi me tṛptir astīha śṛṇvatas tasya dhīmataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:15492: nāntaḥ śakyaṃ prabhāvasya vaktuṃ varṣaśatair api /
GE07hv_conpu:15493: govindasya mahārāja śrūyatām idam uttamam // HV_101.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:15495: gāṇḍīvadhanvā bībhatsur māhātmyaṃ keśavasya yat // HV_101.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:15496: rājñāṃ madhye mahārāja jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaram abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:15497: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ jitāmitram iti tac chṛṇu kaurava // HV_101.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:15504: kṛṣṇaṃ vijñāpayām āsa paritrāhīti cābravīt // HV_101.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:15507: caturthāṃśaṃ hi dharmasya rakṣitā labhate phalam // HV_101.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:15509: na bhetavyaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha rakṣāmi tvāṃ kuto 'nagha /
GE07hv_conpu:15510: brūhi tattvena bhadraṃ te yady api syāt suduṣkaram // HV_101.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:15512: jāto jāto mahābāho putro me hriyate vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:15513: trayo hṛtāś caturthaṃ tvaṃ kṛṣṇa rakṣitum arhasi // HV_101.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:15515: yathā dhriyed apatyaṃ me tathā kuru janārdana // HV_101.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:15517: tato mām āha govindo dīkṣito 'smi kratāv iti /

GE07hv_conpu:16006: śoṇitasyāsravan ghorā nipetus tārakā bhṛśam // HV_106.44 //

GE07hv_conpu:16033: acintayac ca tattvārthaṃ tais tair utpātadarśanaiḥ // HV_106.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:16035: yuddham evābhilaṣate na doṣān paśyate madāt // HV_106.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:16036: mahotpātabhayaṃ caiva na tan mithyā bhaviṣyati /

GE07hv_conpu:16045: sa bhavaḥ kārttikeyaś ca kṛtavāso hi naḥ pure // HV_106.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:16046: prāṇaiḥ priyataro nityaṃ bhavasya tu guhaḥ sadā /

GE07hv_conpu:16064: [h: HV (CE) chapter 107, transliterated by Julie Bélanger, proof-read by
GE07hv_conpu:16068: devyā saha nadītīre ramye śrīmati sa prabhuḥ // HV_107.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:16072: gandhoddāmam ivākāśaṃ nadītīraṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_107.3 //

GE07hv_conpu:16077: [k: Ñ2 V1.2 B Ds D1.5.6 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16079: tatas tu devyā rūpeṇa vikralekhā varāpsarāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16080: bhavaṃ prasādayām āsa devī ca prāhasat tadā // HV_107.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:16084: devyā hy anujñayā sarve krīḍante tatra tatra ha || *HV_107.6*1161:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16085: atha te pārṣadās tatra rahasye suvipaścitaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:16086: mahādevasya rūpeṇa tac cihnaṃ rūpam āsthitāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:16089: tato devyās tu rūpeṇa līlayā vadanena ca /
GE07hv_conpu:16090: devī prahāsaṃ mumuce tāś caivāpsarasas tadā // HV_107.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:16092: praharṣam atulaṃ cāpi lebhe prītamanā bhavaḥ // HV_107.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:16093: bāṇasya duhitā kanyā tatroṣā nāma bhāminī /
GE07hv_conpu:16094: devaṃ prakrīḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā devyā saha nadīgatam // HV_107.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:16095: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 Ñ1) T1.2.4 G ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16098: uṣā manorathaṃ cakre pārvatyāḥ saṃnidhau tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16099: dhanyā hi bhartṛsahitā ramyanty evaṃ samāgatāḥ // HV_107.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:16100: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 Ñ1 D3) T1.2.4 G ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16101: manasā tv atha saṃkalpam uṣayā bhāṣitaṃ tathā |
GE07hv_conpu:16103: prāha devī tato vākyam uṣāṃ harṣayatī śanaiḥ // HV_107.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:16104: uṣe śīghraṃ tvam apy evaṃ bhartrā saha ramiṣyasi /
GE07hv_conpu:16105: yathā devo mayā sārdhaṃ śaṃkaraḥ śatrusūdanaḥ // HV_107.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:16106: evam ukte tadā devyā vākye cintāvilekṣaṇā /
GE07hv_conpu:16107: uṣā bhāvaṃ hṛdā cakre bhartrā raṃsye kadā saha // HV_107.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:16109: uṣe śṛṇuṣva kalyāṇi yadā saṃyogam eṣyasi // HV_107.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:16110: vaiśākhe māsi harmyasthāṃ dvādaśyāṃ tvāṃ dinakṣaye /
GE07hv_conpu:16111: dharṣayiṣyati yaḥ svapne sa te bhartā bhaviṣyati // HV_107.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:16119: uktā ca tatra tābhiḥ sā bhartā tava varānane |
GE07hv_conpu:16121: na hi devyā vaco mithyā bhaviṣyati kadācana |
GE07hv_conpu:16123: uṣā sakhīnāṃ tad vākyaṃ pratipūjya yathāvidhi |
GE07hv_conpu:16130: gate 'hani punaḥ sarvās tā nāryo jagmur adbhutāḥ // HV_107.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:16131: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 D6; Ñ1 om.) T1.2.4 G ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16132: yayuḥ svān ālayān sarvā devī cādarśaṇaṃ gatā |
GE07hv_conpu:16133: kāś cid aśvais tathā yānair gajair anyās tathā rathaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16134: puraṃ praviviśur hṛṣṭāḥ kāścid ākāśam āsthitāḥ // HV_107.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:16135: tato harmye śayānāṃ tu vaiśākhe māsi bhāminīm /
GE07hv_conpu:16137: yathoktaḥ puruṣaḥ svapne dharṣayām āsa tām uṣām /
GE07hv_conpu:16139: sā svapne dharṣitā tena strībhāvaṃ cāpi lambhitā /
GE07hv_conpu:16141: tāṃ tathā rudatīṃ dṛṣṭvā sakhī bhayasamanvitām /
GE07hv_conpu:16142: citralekhā vacaḥ snigdham uvāca param ādbhutam // HV_107.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:16143: uṣe mā bhaiḥ kim evaṃ tvaṃ rudatī paritapyase /
GE07hv_conpu:16144: baleḥ sutasutā ca tvaṃ prakhyātā kiṃ bhayānvitā // HV_107.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:16145: na bhayaṃ vidyate loke tava subhru viśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16146: bhayadas tava vāmoru pitā devāntako raṇe // HV_107.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:16147: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te viṣādaṃ mā kṛthāḥ śubhe /
GE07hv_conpu:16148: naivaṃvidheṣu vāseṣu bhayam asti varānane // HV_107.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:16150: aprāpta eva nagaraṃ pitrā te mṛdito raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:16151: ayaṃ devasamūhasya bhayadas te pitā raṇe // HV_107.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:16152: [k: After 107.26cd, D6 T1 G1.2.4.5 M G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16153: airāvataḥ sa mṛdito gadayā cāsya bhāmini |
GE07hv_conpu:16155: [k: After 107.26, N (except Ś1) T4 G5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16160: evaṃ saṃdūṣitā sādhvī kathaṃ jīvitum utsahe /
GE07hv_conpu:16161: pitaraṃ kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi devaśatrum ariṃdamam // HV_107.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:16163: śreyo hi maraṇaṃ manye na me śreyo 'dya jīvitam // HV_107.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:16164: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2V BD T4 G1.2.5 G (ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16165: īpsito vā yatha ko 'pi puruṣo 'dhigato hi me |
GE07hv_conpu:16166: jāgratīva yathāhaṃ syām avastheyaṃ kṛtā mama |
GE07hv_conpu:16167: niśāyāṃ jāgratī vāhaṃ nītā kena daśām imām |
GE07hv_conpu:16168: katham evaṃ kṛtā nāma kanyā jīvitum utsahe /
GE07hv_conpu:16170: jīvituṃ spṛhayen nārī sādhvīnām agrataḥ sthitā // HV_107.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:16172: vilalāpa ciraṃ kālam uṣā kamalalocanā // HV_107.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:16174: ūcur aśruparītākṣya uṣāṃ sarvāḥ samāgatāḥ // HV_107.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:16175: duṣṭena manasā devi śubhaṃ yadi vāsubham /
GE07hv_conpu:16176: kriyate na ca te subhru kaccid duṣṭaṃ manas tava // HV_107.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:16178: prasabhaṃ devi saṃyogād yadi bhuktāsi bhāmini |
GE07hv_conpu:16180: vyabhicāreṇa te devi nāsti kaścid vyatikramaḥ // HV_107.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:16182: na ca svapnakṛto doṣo martyaloke 'sti sundari |
GE07hv_conpu:16183: evaṃ viprarṣayo devi dharmajñāḥ kathayanti vai |
GE07hv_conpu:16184: manasā caiva vācā ca karmaṇā ca viśeṣataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16185: duṣṭā yā tribhir etais tu pāpā sā procyate bhuvi // HV_107.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:16186: na va te duṣyate bhīru manaḥ prajavitaṃ sadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16187: kathaṃ tvaṃ doṣaduṣṭā vai niyatā brahmacāriṇī // HV_107.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:16188: yadi suptā satī sādhvī śuddhabhāvā manasvinī /
GE07hv_conpu:16189: imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ naiva dharmo vilupyate // HV_107.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:16190: yasyā duṣṭaṃ manaḥ pūrvaṃ karmaṇā copapāditam /
GE07hv_conpu:16191: tām āhur asatīṃ nāma satī tvam asi bhāmini // HV_107.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:16193: imām avasthāṃ nītāsi kālo hi duratikramaḥ // HV_107.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:16195: kumbhāṇḍaduhitā vākyaṃ paramaṃ tv idam abravīt // HV_107.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:16197: tyaja śokaṃ viśālākṣi apāpā tvaṃ varānane |
GE07hv_conpu:16198: smṛtaṃ me yad idaṃ vākyaṃ yāthātathyena tac chṛṇu |
GE07hv_conpu:16199: uṣe yad uktā devyāsi bhartāraṃ dhyāyatī tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16200: samīpe devadevasya smara bhāmini tad vacaḥ // HV_107.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:16201: dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣasya vaiśākhe māsi yo niśi /
GE07hv_conpu:16202: harmye śayānāṃ rudatīṃ strībhāvam upaneṣyati // HV_107.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:16203: bhavitā sa hi te bhartā śūraḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16204: ity uvāca tato hṛṣṭā devī tava manogatam // HV_107.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:16205: na hi tad vacanaṃ mithyā pārvatyā yad udāhṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:16206: tattvaṃ kim idam atyarthaṃ rodiṣīndunibhānane // HV_107.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:16207: ity evam uktā vacanaṃ smṛtvā devīvacas tataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16208: abhavan naṣṭaśokā sā bāṇaputrī śubhekṣaṇā // HV_107.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:16210: smṛtvā tu vacanaṃ devyāḥ pratyuvāca sakhīṃ tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:16212: smarāmi bhāmini vaco devyāḥ krīḍāgate bhave /
GE07hv_conpu:16213: yathoktaṃ sarvam akhilaṃ prāptaṃ harmyatale mayā // HV_107.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:16214: bhartā tu mama yady eṣa lokanāthasya bhāryayā /
GE07hv_conpu:16215: vyādiṣṭaḥ sa kathaṃ jñeyas tatra kāryaṃ vidhīyatām // HV_107.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:16216: ity evam ukte vacane kumbhāṇḍaduhitā punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16218: na hi tasya kulaṃ devi na kīrtir nāpi pauruṣam /
GE07hv_conpu:16219: kaścij jānāti tattvena kim idaṃ tvaṃ vihanyase // HV_107.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:16220: adṛṣṭaś cāśrutaś caiva dṛṣṭaḥ svapne tvayānaghe /
GE07hv_conpu:16221: kathaṃ jñeyo bhaved bhīru so 'smābhī ratitaskaraḥ // HV_107.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:16223: rudatī prasabhaṃ bhuktā praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ sakhi // HV_107.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:16224: na hy ayaṃ prākṛtaḥ kaścid yaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prasahya naḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16226: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca mahaujasau /
GE07hv_conpu:16227: na śaktāḥ śoṇitapuraṃ praveṣṭuṃ bhīmavikramāḥ // HV_107.52 //
GE07hv_conpu:16229: purīṃ śāsati bāṇe tu jitvā śakraṃ śacīpatim |
GE07hv_conpu:16231: praviṣṭaḥ śoṇitapuraṃ bāṇam ākramya mūrdhani // HV_107.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:16233: ko nu nāma jagaty asmin manaḥ kartuṃ mahāsure |
GE07hv_conpu:16234: śāsaty etat puraṃ devi manuṣyo jīvitaspṛhaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:16235: praviśet tam avajñāya bāṇaṃ kiṃ vāpi dharṣaṇam |
GE07hv_conpu:16237: kas tasyā jīvitenārtho bhogair vā syāc chubhekṣaṇe // HV_107.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:16238: dhanyāsy anugṛhītāsi yasyās te patir īdṛśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16239: prāpto devyāḥ prasādena pārvatyā mattakāśini // HV_107.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:16240: idaṃ tu te kāryatamaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ vai mayeritam /
GE07hv_conpu:16241: vijñeyo yasya putras tu yan nāmā yat kulaś ca saḥ // HV_107.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:16242: ity evam ukte vacane tatroṣā kāmamohitā /
GE07hv_conpu:16246: uvāca kumbhāṇḍasutāṃ kathaṃ jñāsyāmahe sakhi // HV_107.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:16248: tvam eva cintaya sakhi nottaraṃ pratibhāti me |
GE07hv_conpu:16249: svakārye muhyate loko yathā jīvaṃ labhāmy aham || *HV_107.57*1179:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16250: uṣāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmā vākyam idaṃ punaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:16253: apsarā citralekhā vai kṣipraṃ vijñāpyatāṃ sakhi || *HV_107.57*1179:6
GE07hv_conpu:16254: asyāḥ sarvam aśeṣeṇa trailokyaṃ viditaṃ sadā || *HV_107.57*1179:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16256: tām apsarasam ānāyya citralekhāṃ sakhīṃ priyām |
GE07hv_conpu:16259: sā tac chrutvā tu vacanam uṣāyāḥ parikīrtitam |
GE07hv_conpu:16261: tataḥ sā cintayāviṣṭā vacanaṃ prāha durvacaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16262: citralekhām apsarasaṃ praṇayāt tāṃ sakhīṃ sakhī // HV_107.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:16263: paramaṃ śṛṇu me vākyaṃ yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi bhāmini /
GE07hv_conpu:16264: bhartāraṃ yadi me 'dya tvaṃ nānayiṣyasi matpriyam // HV_107.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:16266: tyakṣyāmy ahaṃ priyān prāṇāṃs tataḥ kamalalocane // HV_107.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:16267: vikralekhābravīd vākyam uṣāṃ tāṃ hasatī śanaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16268: naiṣo 'rthaḥ śakyate 'smābhir vettuṃ bhāmini suvrate // HV_107.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:16270: na kulena na varṇena na śīlena na rūpataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:16271: na deśataś ca vijñātaḥ sa hi coro mayā sakhi |
GE07hv_conpu:16272: kiṃ tu śakyam idaṃ kāryaṃ buddhipūrvaṃ mayā sakhi /
GE07hv_conpu:16273: prāptuṃ tac chṛṇu me vākyaṃ yathā kāmam avāpsyasi // HV_107.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:16278: ye viśiṣṭāḥ prabhāvena rūpeṇābhijanena ca // HV_107.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:16279: yathāpradhānāṃs tān sarvān ālikhiṣyāmy ahaṃ sakhi /
GE07hv_conpu:16280: manuṣyaloke ye cāpi pravarā lokaviśrutāḥ // HV_107.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:16281: saptarātreṇa te bhīru darśayiṣyāmi tān aham /
GE07hv_conpu:16282: tato vijñāya paṭṭasthaṃ bhartāraṃ pratilapsyase // HV_107.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:16284: na darśaye yadi sakhi tarhi vahnim ahaṃ viśe |
GE07hv_conpu:16285: [k: Ds1 cont.: K1.3.4 Ñ2V BDn Ds2 D1-6 T4 G1.2.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16287: kriyatām evam ity āha citralekhāṃ sakhīṃ priyām || *HV_107.65*1184:2
GE07hv_conpu:16289: ity uktvā saptarātreṇa kṛtvālekhyagatāṃs tu tān /
GE07hv_conpu:16290: citrapaṭṭagatān mukhyān ānayām āsa śobhanā // HV_107.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:16291: tataḥ prāstīrya paṭṭaṃ sā citralekhā svayaṃkṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:16294: uṣāyā darśayām āsa sakhīnāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_107.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:16295: ete deveṣu ye mukhyās tathā dānavavaṃśajāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16296: kiṃ naroragayakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_107.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:16299: manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ ye viśiṣṭatamā narāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16300: tad etān paśya sarvāṃs tvaṃ yathābhilikhitān mayā // HV_107.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:16301: yas te bhartā yathārūpo yathābhilaṣitaḥ sakhi /
GE07hv_conpu:16302: taṃ tvaṃ pratyabhijānīhi svapne yaṃ dṛṣṭavaty asi // HV_107.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:16303: tataḥ krameṇa sarvāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā sā mattakāśinī /
GE07hv_conpu:16306: atītya ca yadūn sarvān dadarśa yadunandanam // HV_107.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:16308: balabhadram atho dṛṣṭvā pradyumnam atha sātyakim |
GE07hv_conpu:16309: dadarśa yadusiṃhaṃ taṃ pautraṃ viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:16310: aniruddhaṃ raṇe ruddhaṃ pañcabāṇam iva sthitam || *HV_107.71*1188:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16311: paṭe sthitaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā vīraṃ citrātmanā yadum |
GE07hv_conpu:16313: abravīc citralekhāṃ tām ayaṃ coraḥ sa vai sakhi // HV_107.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:16314: yenāhaṃ dūṣitā pūrvaṃ svapne harmyagatā satī /
GE07hv_conpu:16315: so 'yaṃ vijñātarūpo me kutastyas taskaraḥ śubhe // HV_107.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:16317: guṇaśīlābhijanato nāma kiṃ cāsya bhāmini // HV_107.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:16322: [k: T1G MG(ed.) ins. after the ref., T2 after 74: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16324: dānavānāṃ raṇe hantā viṣṇur jiṣṇur jagatpatiḥ || *HV_107.75*1190:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16330: bhartā tava viśālākṣi prādyumnir bhīmavikramaḥ // HV_107.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:16331: na hy asya triṣu lokeṣu sadṛśo 'sti parākrame /
GE07hv_conpu:16332: utpāṭya parvatān eṣa parvatair eva śātayet // HV_107.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:16334: tryakṣapatnyā samādiṣṭaḥ sadṛśaḥ sajjanaḥ patiḥ // HV_107.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:16336: yady enaṃ me viśālākṣi bhartāram amaropamam /
GE07hv_conpu:16337: [k: After the ref.,K1.3.4 Ñ2V BD T4 G1.2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16338: tvam evātra viśālākṣi yogyā bhava varānane |
GE07hv_conpu:16339: aśakyā hi gatiś cānyā agatyā me gatir bhava || *HV_107.78*1192:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16342: upāyaś cintyatāṃ bhīru apratarkyaṃ priye sukham |
GE07hv_conpu:16344: bhaved āpatsu yan mitraṃ tan mitraṃ śasyate budhaiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:16345: kāmārtā cāsmi suśroṇi bhava me prāṇadhāriṇī |
GE07hv_conpu:16346: adya nānayasi kṣipraṃ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmy ahaṃ śubhe // HV_107.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:16348: śrotum arhasi kalyāṇi vacanaṃ me śucismite // HV_107.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:16349: yathā bāṇasya nagaraṃ rakṣyate devi sarvataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16350: dvārakāpi tathā bhīru durādharṣā viśeṣataḥ // HV_107.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:16351: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16358: na ca śakyam avijñātaiḥ praveṣṭuṃ dvārakāṃ purīm /
GE07hv_conpu:16360: nānuyokṣyasi māṃ devi sāhase 'smiṃs tu karmaṇi |
GE07hv_conpu:16361: tato virama buddhiṃ tvaṃ duḥprāpāt svapnavastunaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:16362: ātmānaṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva pitaraṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_107.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:16365: [k: Ś1 M4 om. the ref. After the ref. Ñ (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G1.2.4.5
GE07hv_conpu:16368: kiṃ me bahuvilāpena śrūyatāṃ sakhi kāraṇam |
GE07hv_conpu:16369: yady ahaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi yāsyāmi yamasādanam // HV_107.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:16370: [k: N(except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16371: dūtam āsādya kāryāṇāṃ siddhir bhavati bhāmini |
GE07hv_conpu:16372: tasmād dautyena me gaccha jīvantīṃ māṃ yadīcchasi |
GE07hv_conpu:16373: yadi tvaṃ me vijānāsi sakhyaṃ premṇā ca bhāṣitam /
GE07hv_conpu:16374: kṣipram ānaya me kāntaṃ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi vā priyān // HV_107.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:16375: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16376: jīvitasya hi saṃdehaṃ kṣayaṃ caiva kulasya ca |
GE07hv_conpu:16377: kāmārtā hi na paśyanti dūṣaṇaṃ vai kulasya ca || *HV_107.83*1197:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16379: tvaṃ ca śaktā viśālākṣi dvārakāyāḥ praveśane |
GE07hv_conpu:16380: saṃstutāsi mayā bhīru kuru me priyadarśanam |
GE07hv_conpu:16382: eṣā gacchāmy ahaṃ bhīru praviśya dvārakāṃ purīm /
GE07hv_conpu:16386: kāritā ca samudyogaṃ priyaiḥ kāntaiś ca bhāṣitaiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:16387: bhartāram ānayāmy adya tava vṛṣṇikulodvaham // HV_107.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:16388: [k: N (except Ś1 K1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16390: sā vacas tathyam aśivaṃ dānavānāṃ bhayāvaham /
GE07hv_conpu:16393: uktvā cāntarhitā kṣipraṃ citralekhā manojavā // HV_107.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:16394: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16395: sakhībhiḥ sahitā hy ūṣā cintayantī sthitā tu sā |
GE07hv_conpu:16396: tṛtīye tu muhūrte sā naṣṭā bāṇapurāt tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:16397: [k: Ñ2V BDn Ds D2.6 T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16401: dadarśa dvārakāṃ caiva divi tāreva saṃsthitām // HV_107.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:16402: [h: HV (CE) chapter 108, transliterated by Julie Bélanger, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of February 4, 2003. :h]
GE07hv_conpu:16403: [k: After the ref., all Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 ins. a passage given in
GE07hv_conpu:16415: dadarśa bhavanaṃ yatra prādyumnir avasat sukham // HV_108.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:16417: tataḥ praviśya sahasā bhavanaṃ tasya tan mahat /
GE07hv_conpu:16418: [k: K1.3.4V BD S (T3 missing) ins. (Ñ2 after the first occurence of 2ab): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16420: dadarśa madhye nārīṇāṃ tārāpatim ivoditam // HV_108.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:16422: pibantaṃ madhu mādhvīkaṃ śriyā paramayā yutam /
GE07hv_conpu:16424: [k: K Ñ2.3V BD (except D3) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16425: vādyate samatālaṃ ca gīyate madhuraṃ tathā |
GE07hv_conpu:16426: na ca tasya manas tatra tam evārtham acintayat || *HV_108.3*1205:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:16427: striyaḥ sarvaguṇopetā nṛtyante tatra tatra vai |
GE07hv_conpu:16428: na cāsya manasas tuṣṭiṃ citralekhā prapaśyati |
GE07hv_conpu:16429: na cābhiramate bhogair na cāpi madhu sevate |

GE07hv_conpu:16770: aniruddhaḥ prahasyātha samāśvāsya ca tāṃ sthitām || *HV_108.60*1240:6
GE07hv_conpu:16773: aniruddhas tu ciccheda kāṅkṣaṃs tasya parājayam |
GE07hv_conpu:16775: bāṇo'niruddhaśirasi kāṅkṣaṃs tasya raṇe vadham // HV_108.61 //
GE07hv_conpu:16777: babhau pramukhatas tasya sthitaḥ sūrya ivodaye // HV_108.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:16779: siṃhaḥ pramukhato dṛṣṭvā gajam ekaṃ yathā vane // HV_108.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:16781: vivyādha niśitais tīkṣṇaiḥ prādyumnim aparājitam // HV_108.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:16783: tato vivyādha niśitair bāṇaiḥ prādyumnim āsthitaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:16784: [k: B2 D5 T4 G2.4.5 G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16786: [k: B2 D5 T4 G2.4.5 cont.; K1.3.4 Ñ2V BDs2 D1.4.6 ins. after 64
GE07hv_conpu:16788: tam āpatantaṃ niśitair abhyaghnan sāyakais tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:16792: abhibhūtaḥ susaṃkruddho yayau bāṇarathaṃ prati // HV_108.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:16793: asibhir musalaiḥ śūlaiḥ paṭṭisais tomarais tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:16794: so 'tividdhaḥ śaraughais tu prādyumnir nābhyakampata // HV_108.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:16795: āplutya sahasā kruddho ratheṣāṃ tasya so 'cchinat /
GE07hv_conpu:16796: jaghānāśvāṃś ca khaḍgena bāṇasya rathamūrdhani // HV_108.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:16797: taṃ punaḥ śaravarṣeṇa tomaraiḥ paṭṭisais tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:16799: hato 'yam iti vijñāya prāṇadan nairṛtā gaṇāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16801: śaktiṃ bāṇas tataḥ kruddho ghorarūpāṃ bhayāvahām /
GE07hv_conpu:16802: jagrāha jvalitāṃ dīptāṃ ghaṇṭāmālākulāṃ raṇe // HV_108.71 //
GE07hv_conpu:16807: prāhiṇot tām asaṅgena maholkāṃ jvalitām iva // HV_108.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:16810: so 'bhiplutya tadā śaktiṃ jagrāha puruṣottamaḥ // HV_108.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:16812: sā bhittvā tasya dehaṃ tu jagāma vasudhātalam // HV_108.74 //
GE07hv_conpu:16813: [k: After an addl. colophon, M3 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16817: [k: N (except Ś1) T4 G2.4.5 ins. after 74: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16819: tato mūrchābhibhūtaṃ taṃ kumbhāṇḍo vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:16820: upekṣase dānavendra kim evaṃ śatrum udyatam // HV_108.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:16821: labdhalakṣyo hy ayaṃ vīro nirvikāro 'dya dṛśyate /
GE07hv_conpu:16822: māyām āśritya yudhyasva nāyaṃ vadhyo 'nyathā bhavet // HV_108.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:16823: ātmānaṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva pramādāt kim upekṣase /
GE07hv_conpu:16824: vadhyatām ayam adyaiva na naḥ sarvān vināśayet // HV_108.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:16826: anyāṃś ca śataśo hatvā uṣāṃ nītvā vrajiṣyati |
GE07hv_conpu:16828: vācaṃ rūkṣām abhikruddhaḥ provāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // HV_108.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:16829: eṣo 'ham asya vidadhe mṛtyuṃ prāṇaharaṃ raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:16830: ādāsyāmy aham enaṃ vai garutmān iva pannagam // HV_108.79 //
GE07hv_conpu:16831: ity evam uktvā sarathaḥ sāśvaḥ sadhvajasārathiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16834: pauruṣeṇa samāyuktaḥ sa praikṣata diśo daśa // HV_108.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:16835: āsthāya tāmasīṃ vidyāṃ tadā kruddho baleḥ sutaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16836: mumoca viśikhāṃs tīkṣṇāṃś channo māyādharo balī // HV_108.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:16838: veṣṭito bahudhā tasya dehaḥ pannagarāśibhiḥ // HV_108.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:16841: sa tu veṣṭitasarvāṅgo baddhaḥ prādyumnir āhave /
GE07hv_conpu:16842: niṣprayatnaḥ sthitaḥ svastho maināka iva parvataḥ // HV_108.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:16844: abhītaḥ parvatākāraḥ prādyumnir abhavad raṇe // HV_108.85 //
GE07hv_conpu:16846: na vivyathe sa bhūtātmā sarvataḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ // HV_108.86 //
GE07hv_conpu:16847: tatas taṃ vāgbhir ugrābhiḥ saṃrabdhaḥ samatarjayat /
GE07hv_conpu:16848: bāṇo dhvajaṃ samāśritya provācāmarṣito vacaḥ // HV_108.87 //
GE07hv_conpu:16849: kumbhāṇḍa vadhyatāṃ śīghram ayaṃ vai kulapāṃsanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16850: cāritraṃ yena me loke dūṣitaṃ dūṣitātmanā // HV_108.88 //
GE07hv_conpu:16851: ity evam ukte vacane kumbhāṇḍo vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:16852: rājan vakṣyāmy ahaṃ kiṃcit tan me śṛṇu yadīcchasi // HV_108.89 //
GE07hv_conpu:16853: ayaṃ vijñāyatāṃ kasya kuto vāyam ihāgataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16856: mayāyaṃ bahuśo yuddhe dṛṣṭo rājan mahāraṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:16857: krīḍann iva ca yuddheṣu dṛśyate devasūnuvat // HV_108.91 //
GE07hv_conpu:16863: vijñāya ca vadhaṃ vāsya pūjāṃ vāpi kariṣyasi // HV_108.92 //
GE07hv_conpu:16864: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3V BD T2.4 G2.3 ins. (G4 after 92ab; G5 after first occurrence of 92cd):
GE07hv_conpu:16866: adeyā hy apratigrāhyā ataś cintya vadhaṃ kuru |
GE07hv_conpu:16867: vadhe hy asya mahān doṣo rakṣaṇe sumahān guṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16868: ayaṃ hi puruṣotkarṣaḥ sarvathā mānam arhati // HV_108.93 //
GE07hv_conpu:16869: sarvato veṣṭitatanur na vyathaty eṣa bhogibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16873: na no gaṇayate sarvān vadhaṃ prāpto 'py ayaṃ balī // HV_108.94 //
GE07hv_conpu:16874: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2V BDn (both second time) Ds D1-5.6 (second time) T2
GE07hv_conpu:16875: G2-5 ins. after 94 (Dn D6 (all first time) after 77ab): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16876: yadi māyāprabhāvena nātra baddho bhaved ayam |
GE07hv_conpu:16880: triśikhāṃ bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā na cintayati naḥ sthitān // HV_108.95 //
GE07hv_conpu:16882: na cintayati rājaṃs tvāṃ vīryavān ko 'py asau yuvā // HV_108.96 //
GE07hv_conpu:16884: rucitaṃ yadi te rājañ jñeyo vīryabalānvitaḥ // HV_108.97 //
GE07hv_conpu:16885: [k: K2 V2.3 D2-4.6 G3 ins. (K1.4 Ñ2.3 V1 B Dn Ds D1.5 T4 G2.4.5 after second occurrence of 97cd): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16886: kanyā ceyaṃ na cānyasya niryātyānena saṃgatā || *HV_108.97*1254:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16887: yadi ceṣṭatamaḥ kaścid ayaṃ vaṃśe mahātmanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:16888: tataḥ pūjām ayaṃ vīraḥ prāpsyaty evāsurottamaḥ || *HV_108.97*1254:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16889: rakṣyatām iti coktvaiva tathāstv iti ca tasthivān |
GE07hv_conpu:16890: [k: G3-5 cont., T1 M ins. after 97 (T2 after 95ab; G1 after 68a): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16891: bāḍham ity abravīd bāṇo hantuṃ vyavasitaḥ kila |
GE07hv_conpu:16892: uṣāṃ babandha nigaḍair dṛḍhaiḥ pāśaiś ca saṃyataiḥ ||
GE07hv_conpu:16893: vyādideśa tato bāṇo rakṣiṇaḥ kiṃkarān bahūn |
GE07hv_conpu:16894: rakṣyatām eṣa duṣṭātmā sā ca rakṣyā kulādhamā || *HV_108.97*1255:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:16896: kumbhāṇḍena yayau sārdhaṃ svam eva bhavanaṃ balī |
GE07hv_conpu:16897: kumbhāṇḍasya vacaḥ śrutvā śuddhānte pannagair bhṛśam /
GE07hv_conpu:16898: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3V BD T.4 G4.5 subst.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16899: evam ukte tu vacane kumbhāṇḍena mahātmanā |
GE07hv_conpu:16900: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2V BD T4 M4 cont., G2 M4 ins. after 98ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16901: tathety āha ca kumbhāṇḍaṃ bāṇaḥ śatruniṣūdanaḥ || *HV_108.98*1257:1 |
GE07hv_conpu:16903: aniruddhaṃ yodhayitvā bāṇaḥ svagṛham āviśat // HV_108.98 //
GE07hv_conpu:16904: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2V BD T4 G2 subst.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16905: yayau svam eva bhavanaṃ baleḥ putro mahāsuraḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:16906: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2V BD T4 G2 cont., Ñ3 ins. after 98 (T2 G1.3 cont.
GE07hv_conpu:16910: tato hy ākāśamārgeṇa munir dvāravatīṃ gataḥ || *HV_108.98*1259:3 |
GE07hv_conpu:16912: naṣṭo 'yaṃ dānavaḥ krūro yuddhaṃ prāpya na saṃśayaḥ ||
GE07hv_conpu:16914: jñāpayiṣyati tattvena imam arthaṃ yathaiva tat || *HV_108.98*1259:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:16915: nāgair viveṣṭitaṃ dṛṣṭvā uṣā prādyumnim āturā |
GE07hv_conpu:16916: ruroda bāṣparaktākṣī tām āha rudatīṃ punaḥ || *HV_108.98*1259:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:16917: kim idaṃ rudyeta bhīru mā bhais tvaṃ śubhalocane |
GE07hv_conpu:16919: yasya śaṅkhadhvaniṃ śrutvā bāhuśabdaṃ balasya ca |
GE07hv_conpu:16922: evam uktā niruddhena uṣā viśrambham āgatā |
GE07hv_conpu:16923: nṛśaṃsaṃ cāpi pitaraṃ śocate sā sumadhyamā |
GE07hv_conpu:16924: [k: After line 3, Ñ2 V2 B2 Ds1 D2.6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16927: [h: HV (CE) chapter 109, transliterated by Julie Bélanger, proof-read, by Horst Brinkhaus, version of February 4, 2003 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:16930: priyaṃ nātham apaśyantyaḥ kiṃnarya iva saṃghaśaḥ // HV_109.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:16931: aho dhik kim idaṃ loke nāthe kṛṣṇe vyavasthite /
GE07hv_conpu:16932: anāthā iva saṃtrastā rudimo bhayamohitāḥ // HV_109.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:16934: bāhucchāyāṃ samāśritya vasanti divi devatāḥ // HV_109.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:16936: yasyāniruddhaḥ pautraḥ sa vīraḥ kenāpi no hṛtaḥ // HV_108.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:16937: aho nāsti bhayaṃ nūnaṃ tasya loke sudurmateḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16938: vāsudevasya yaḥ krodhaṃ prajvālayati duḥsaham // HV_109.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:16943: sa vāsudevaṃ samare mohāt pratyudiyād ripuḥ // HV_109.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:16945: kathaṃ jīvan vimucyeta sākṣād api śatakratuḥ // HV_109.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:16946: kṛtāgā na sa śocyas tu vayaṃ tv adya vinākṛtāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16948: ity evaṃ tā rudantyaś ca vadantyaś ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16949: netrajaṃ vāri mumucur aśivaṃ paramāṅganāḥ // HV_109.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:16956: taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoram apūrvaṃ bhayam āgatam /
GE07hv_conpu:16957: utpetuḥ sahasā khebhyo gṛhebhyaḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ // HV_109.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:16959: gṛhe kṛṣṇābhiguptānāṃ kuto no bhayam āgatam // HV_109.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:16961: pradharṣitā yathā siṃhā guhābhya iva niḥsṛtāḥ // HV_109.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:16963: tasyāḥ śabdena te sarve sabhām āgamya viṣṭhitāḥ // HV_109.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:16964: kim etad iti cānyonyaṃ samapṛcchanta yādavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16965: anyonyasya hi te sarve yathānyāyam avedayan // HV_109.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:16971: kṛṣṇaṃ praharatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥ // HV_109.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:16972: kim evaṃ cintayāviṣṭaḥ puruṣendra bhavān iha /
GE07hv_conpu:16974: bhavantam āśritāḥ kṛṣṇa saṃvibhaktāś ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_109.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:16975: tathaiva balahā śakras tvayy āveśya jayājayau /
GE07hv_conpu:16976: sukhaṃ svapiti niścintaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ cintayānvitaḥ // HV_109.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:16977: śokasāgaram akṣobhyaṃ sarve te jñātayo gatāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16978: tān majjamānān ekas tvaṃ samuddhara mahābhuja // HV_109.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:16979: kim evaṃ cintayāviṣṭo na kiṃcid api bhāṣase /
GE07hv_conpu:16980: cintāṃ kartuṃ vṛthā deva na tvam arhasi mādhava // HV_109.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:16981: ity evam uktaḥ kṛṣṇas tu niḥśvasya suciraṃ punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16982: prāha vākyaṃ sa vākyajño bṛhaspatir iva svayam // HV_109.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:16984: [k: Ś1 K1 Ñ2V BDn Ds D1.2.4-6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:16985: vicintayaṃs tv ahaṃ cāsya kāryasya na labhe gatim |
GE07hv_conpu:16986: tathāhaṃ bhavatāpy ukto nottaraṃ vidadhe kvacit // HV_109.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:16988: śṛṇudhvaṃ yādavāḥ sarve yathā cintānvito hy aham // HV_109.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:16990: aśaktān iva manyante sarvān asmān sabāndhavān // HV_109.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:16991: āhukaś caiva no rājā hṛtaḥ sālvena vai purā /
GE07hv_conpu:16992: pratyānītas tato 'smābhir yuddhaṃ kṛtvā sudāruṇam // HV_109.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:16993: pradyumnaś cāpi no bālye śambareṇa hṛto hy abhūt /
GE07hv_conpu:16994: sa taṃ nihatya samare prāpto rukmiṇinandanaḥ // HV_09.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:16995: idaṃ tu sumahatkaṣṭaṃ prādyumniḥ kva pravāsitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16996: naivaṃvidham ahaṃ doṣaṃ smarāmi manujarṣabhāḥ // HV_109.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:16997: bhasmanā guṇṭhitaḥ pādo yena me mūrdhni pātitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:16999: mama netraṃ durāsrāvam andhatāṃ ko 'nayad balāt |
GE07hv_conpu:17000: ko vā jaḍamatiḥ satyaṃ ratnaṃ me makuṭād dharet ||
GE07hv_conpu:17001: ko vā balaṃ durādharṣam avamatyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:17002: ko nu vā śiniputrasya cāpaṃ na smarati prabho |
GE07hv_conpu:17003: sānubandhasya tasyāhaṃ hariṣye jīvitaṃ raṇe // HV_109.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:17004: ity evam ukte kṛṣṇena sātyakir vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:17005: carāḥ kṛṣṇa prayujyantām aniruddhasya mārgaṇe // HV_109.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:17009: atraiva prāyaśas tatra yadi syāt kenacid dhṛtaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:17010: jñāte pratikariṣyāmi yat tu prāptam anantaram |
GE07hv_conpu:17011: āhukaṃ prāha kṛṣṇas tu smitaṃ kṛtvā vacas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:17012: ābhyantarāś ca bāhyāś ca vyādiśyantāṃ carā nṛpa // HV_109.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:17013: [k: K1.2.4 Ñ2V BDn Ds D1.3-6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17017: tataś carās tu vyādiṣṭāḥ pārthivena yaśasvinā /
GE07hv_conpu:17018: abhyantaraṃ ca mārgadhvaṃ bāhyataś ca samantataḥ // HV_109.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:17019: [k: K Ñ2 Dn D1-5 T4 ins. (V B Ds D6 after 34ab): :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17020: hayā rathāś ca vyādiṣṭāḥ pārthivena mahātmanā |
GE07hv_conpu:17022: ṛkṣavantaṃ giriṃ caiva mārgadhvaṃ tvaritā hayaiḥ // HV_109.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:17024: gantavyaṃ cāpi niḥsaṅgam udyāneṣu samantataḥ // HV_109.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:17025: hayānāṃ ca sahasrāṇi rathānāṃ cāpy anekaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17026: āruhya tvaritāḥ sarve mārgadhvaṃ yadunandanam // HV_109.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:17029: śṛṇu kṛṣṇa vaco mahyaṃ yadi te rocate vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:17030: cirāt prabhṛti me vaktuṃ bhavantaṃ jāyate matiḥ // HV_109.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:17032: saubhaḥ sālvaś ca nihatau maindo dvivida eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:17033: hayagrīvaś ca sumahān sānubandhas tvayā hataḥ // HV_109.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:17035: kaṃsaś ca nihataḥ kṛṣṇa narakaś ca nipātitaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:17036: anye ca bahavas tatra sainyāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:17038: sarvāṇy etāni karmāṇi niḥśeṣāṇi raṇe raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:17039: kṛtavān asi govinda pārṣṇigrāhaś ca nāsti te // HV_109.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:17040: idaṃ karma tvayā kṛṣṇa sānubandhaṃ kṛtaṃ raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:17041: pārijātasya haraṇe yat kṛtaṃ karma duṣkaraṃ // HV_109.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:17044: tena vairaṃ tvayā sārdhaṃ kartavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17045: tatrānubandhaś ca mahāṃs tena kāryas tvayā saha // HV_109.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:17047: na hy anyasya bhavec chaktir vairaniryātanaṃ prati // HV_109.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:17048: ity evam ukte vacane kṛṣṇo nāga iva śvasan /
GE07hv_conpu:17049: uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān anādhṛṣṭiṃ mahābalam // HV_109.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:17050: senānīs tāta mā maivaṃ na devāḥ kṣudrakarmiṇaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17051: nākṛtajñā na vā klībā nāvaliptā na bāliśāḥ // HV_109.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:17052: devatārthaṃ ca me yatno mahān dānavasaṃkṣaye /
GE07hv_conpu:17053: teṣāṃ priyārthaṃ ca raṇe hanmi dṛptān mahāsurān // HV_109.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:17054: tatparas tanmanāś cāsmi tadbhaktas tatpriye rataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:17055: kathaṃ pāpaṃ kariṣyanti vijñāyaivaṃvidhaṃ hi mām // HV_109.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:17057: na teṣu pāpaṃ vijñeyaṃ bāliśa tvaṃ prabhāṣase // HV_109.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:17058: [k: Ñ2 V2 B Ds D1.2.4.5. (D6 after 1270*, T1.2 G1.3-5 after 54ab)

GE07hv_conpu:17555: kṛṣṇo bhujabalābhyāṃ taṃ cikṣepātha mahītale // HV_111.1 //

GE07hv_conpu:17687: apāṃ tu nīlikāṃ vidyāc chikhodbhedaś ca barhiṇām |
GE07hv_conpu:17688: padminīṣu himo bhūtvā pṛthivyām api coṣaraḥ || *HV_111.9*1345:16 |
GE07hv_conpu:17690: goṣv apasmārako bhūtvā khorakaś ca bhaviṣyasi || *HV_111.9*1345:18 |
GE07hv_conpu:17692: darśanāt sparśanāc cāpi prāṇināṃ vadham eṣyasi |
GE07hv_conpu:17696: kṛṣṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvā jvaro hṛṣṭamanā hy abhūt |

GE07hv_conpu:17700: tad ājñāpaya govinda kiṃ karomi mahābhuja |
GE07hv_conpu:17703: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te yathā tvaṃ jvara kākṣase |
GE07hv_conpu:17704: [k: K Ñ2.3V BD G5 cont.: T1.2 G1 M ins. after 9: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:17711: abhisaṃdhiṃ śṛṇuṣvādya yat tvā vakṣyāmi niścayāt |

GE07hv_conpu:17714: pīḍāyāṃ ca bhavān svāmī maraṇe māmakas tathā || *HV_111.9*1347:2 |

GE07hv_conpu:17717: dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yat tvayā matpriyaṃ krṭaṃ /

GE07hv_conpu:18441: ajeyo 'si sadā viṣṇo yāce tvāṃ nityam avyayam |
GE07hv_conpu:18442: tasmāt saṃhara divyaṃ tvam idaṃ cakraṃ samudyatam /
GE07hv_conpu:18445: ye tvā deva prapadyante na te suvyaktimānavāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18446: bhaye mahati magnānāṃ trātā nityaṃ janārdanaḥ || *HV_112.109*1461:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18447: ye cāpy asmatkṛtaṃ stotram abhidhāsyanti bhaktitaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18449: nāthas tvaṃ sarvalokānāṃ viśeṣeṇa mama prabho |
GE07hv_conpu:18452: tan me na syān mṛṣā vākyam atas tvāṃ kṣamayāmy aham // HV_112.110 //
GE07hv_conpu:18454: na hy enaṃ vadhakāmasya yadīcchet pārvatīhitam |
GE07hv_conpu:18455: [k: While T1.2 G1.3-4 M ins. after 110: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18456: kṣantavyaṃ bhavatā bhūyo yat kṛtaṃ bhaktavatsala |
GE07hv_conpu:18458: jīvatāṃ deva bāṇo 'yam etac cakraṃ nivartitam /
GE07hv_conpu:18459: mānyas tvaṃ deva devānām asurāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_112.111 //
GE07hv_conpu:18462: yasmān mānyaḥ sadā deva tasmāj jīvatu bāṇakaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18463: namas te 'stu gamiṣyāmi yat kāryaṃ tan maheśvara /
GE07hv_conpu:18464: na tāvat kriyate tasmān mām anujñātum arhasi // HV_112.112 //
GE07hv_conpu:18465: evam uktvā mahādevaṃ kṛṣṇas tūrṇaṃ garutmatā /
GE07hv_conpu:18466: jagāma tatra yatrāste prādyumniḥ sāyakaiś citaḥ // HV_112.113 //
GE07hv_conpu:18467: gate kṛṣṇe tato nandī bāṇam āha śubhaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18468: [k: After 114ab, K3.4 Ñ2 V2.3 B Dn Ds D2.3.5.6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18470: tac chrutvā nandivākyaṃ tu bāṇo 'gacchata śīghragaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18471: [k: K3.4 Ñ2 V2.3 B Dn Ds D2.3.5.6 cont.: K1.2 Ñ3 V1 D1.4 T1.4 G5 ins.
GE07hv_conpu:18473: chinnabāhuṃ tato bāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā nandī pratāpavān |
GE07hv_conpu:18474: apavāhya rathenaiva yato devas tato yayau || *HV_112.114ab*1466:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18475: tato nandī punar bāṇaṃ prāg uvācottaraṃ vacaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18476: bāṇa bāṇa pranṛtyasva śreyas tava bhaviṣyati // HV_112.114 //
GE07hv_conpu:18478: kṛttabāṇa mahādaitya tataḥ śreyas tvam āpsyasi |
GE07hv_conpu:18479: [k: Ñ2 B Dn Ds D6 T1 G3 ins. after 114: V2 cont. after 1466*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18482: jīvitārthī tato bāṇaḥ pramukhe śaṃkarasya vai // HV_112.115 //
GE07hv_conpu:18484: etac chrutvā vaco nandeḥ śoṇitāṅgaḥ sa dānavaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18486: prānṛtyata bhaye jāte dānavaḥ sa vicetanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18487: [k: After 116ab, D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18495: tataḥ pranṛttaṃ bāṇaṃ ca cakram apratimaṃ raṇe |
GE07hv_conpu:18496: bāṇaṃ dvibāhuṃ kṛtvā tu svām eva prakṛtiṃ gatam |
GE07hv_conpu:18497: [k: K1.2 D4 cont.: K3.4 Dn D1-3.5 ins. after 116ab: Ñ2.3V BDs T1.4
GE07hv_conpu:18499: taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca pranṛtyantaṃ bhayodvignaṃ punaḥ punaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18502: [k: While T1.2 G1.3-5 M1.3.4 ins. after 116: M2 after the first
GE07hv_conpu:18504: prānṛtyad bahuśo rājan yathā prīto bhaved bhava |
GE07hv_conpu:18505: [k: T2 G1.3.4 M cont.: T1 G5 ins. after line 2 of 1472*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18506: tataḥ prīto 'bhavad rājan bāṇasyāsya sa līlayā |
GE07hv_conpu:18508: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bāṇa tvaṃ yat te manasi vartate /
GE07hv_conpu:18511: yat prārthyase varaṃ bāṇa cirāya manasepsitam |
GE07hv_conpu:18512: tat te 'haṃ tvāṃ pradāsyāmi tridaśair api durlabham |
GE07hv_conpu:18514: rudravākyaṃ tataḥ śrutvā bāṇo manasi harṣitaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18517: ajaraś cāmaraś caiva bhaveyaṃ satataṃ vibho /
GE07hv_conpu:18518: eṣa me prathamo deva varo 'stu yadi manyase // HV_112.118 //
GE07hv_conpu:18520: tulyo 'si daivatair bāṇa na mṛtyus tava vidyate /
GE07hv_conpu:18521: anyaṃ varaṃ vṛṇīṣvādya anugrāhyo 'si me sadā // HV_112.119 //
GE07hv_conpu:18524: bhaktānāṃ nṛtyatām evaṃ putrajanma bheved bhava // HV_112.120 //
GE07hv_conpu:18527: madbhaktā ye hi nṛtyanti teṣām evaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_112.121 //
GE07hv_conpu:18528: [k: After 121, Ñ2 repeats 119cd and G3 repeats 120.K VB D T1.4 G5
GE07hv_conpu:18529: ins. after 121: Ñ2 after the repetition of 119cd: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18530: tṛtīyaṃ tvam atho bāṇa varaṃ vara manogatam |
GE07hv_conpu:18531: tad vidhāsyāmi te putra saphalo 'stu bhavān iha |
GE07hv_conpu:18533: cakrapāṭanajā ghorā rujā tīvrā hi yā mama /
GE07hv_conpu:18534: vareṇa sā tṛtīyena śāntiṃ gacchatu me bhava // HV_112.122 //
GE07hv_conpu:18536: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te na rujā prabhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:18537: akṣataṃ tava gātraṃ ca svasthāvasthaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_112.123 //
GE07hv_conpu:18538: [k: For 123, Ś1 Ñ2 V3 B3 T4 subst.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18541: na bhaviṣyati gātreṣu balavāṃś ca bhaviṣyasi |
GE07hv_conpu:18542: caturthaṃ te varaṃ dadmi vṛṇīṣvāsura kāṅkṣitaṃ /
GE07hv_conpu:18543: na te 'haṃ vimukhas tāta prasādasumukho hy aham // HV_112.124 //
GE07hv_conpu:18546: mahākāla iti khyātaḥ khyātiṃ gaccheyam īśvara // HV_112.125 //
GE07hv_conpu:18547: [k: After 125, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.4 G5 M4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18549: evaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha devo bāṇaṃ mahādyutiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18555: evaṃ bhaviṣyaty avaśyaṃ yaṃ varaṃ tvam ihecchasi |
GE07hv_conpu:18557: taṃ taṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te yad icchasi mahāsura // HV_112.126 //
GE07hv_conpu:18559: vairūpyam aṅgajaṃ kiṃ cin mā bhūn me devasattama /
GE07hv_conpu:18560: dvibāhutve 'pi me deho na virūpo bhaved bhava // HV_112.127 //
GE07hv_conpu:18561: [k: N (except Ñ1 Dn1) T1.4 Cal. ed. ins. after 127: G5 after 128ab:
GE07hv_conpu:18564: bhavitā sarvam etat te yathecchasi mahāsura |
GE07hv_conpu:18565: bhaktas tvaṃ me na cādeyaṃ bhaktānāṃ vidyate mama |
GE07hv_conpu:18567: evaṃ bhaviṣyate bāṇa yat tvayā samudāhṛtam // HV_112.128 //
GE07hv_conpu:18568: [k: T2 G1.3.4 M4 ins. after the repetition of 128ab: M1-3 after 128:
GE07hv_conpu:18570: tyaja mūḍhāṃ matiṃ bāṇa mā mohavaśago bhava |
GE07hv_conpu:18573: [h: HV (CE), adhyāya 113, transliterated from the critical ed. (P. L.
GE07hv_conpu:18574: Vaidya, Poona 1969) by Arlo Griffiths (Leiden/Groningen); proof-read by Arlo Griffiths. This is the version of April 5, 2004 :h]
GE07hv_conpu:18577: [k: D2 om. the ref. N T4 ins. and T2 G1.4 repeat after the ref.: T1.2
GE07hv_conpu:18578: G1.3-5 M (T2 G1.4 for the first time) ins. after 112.129: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18579: evaṃ varān bahūṃl labdhvā bāṇaḥ prītimān abhavat |
GE07hv_conpu:18580: [k: K1.2 Ñ2.3 V2.3 B Dn Ds D1.4.5 cont.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18583: cont. after 1483*: T1 G3.5 M1-3 G(ed.) ins. after the ref.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18586: śrotum icchāmi tattvena snehaklinnaṃ hi me manaḥ || *HV_113.1*1485:3
GE07hv_conpu:18587: aniruddhe hṛte vīre kṣubhitā dvārakā purī |
GE07hv_conpu:18588: śīghraṃ taṃ mokṣayiṣyāmi yad arthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ || *HV_113.1*1485:5
GE07hv_conpu:18589: adya taṃ naṣṭaśatruṃ vai draṣṭum icchāmahe vayam |
GE07hv_conpu:18590: sa pradeśas tu bhagavan viditas tava suvrata || *HV_113.1*1485:7 |
GE07hv_conpu:18591: evam uktas tu kṛṣṇena nāradaḥ pratyabhāṣata |
GE07hv_conpu:18592: kanyāpure kumāro 'sau baddho nāgaiś ca mādhava || *HV_113.1*1485:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:18593: etasminn antare śīghraṃ citralekhā hy upasthitā |
GE07hv_conpu:18596: tataḥ praviṣṭās te sarve aniruddhasya mokṣaṇe |
GE07hv_conpu:18597: balaḥ suparṇaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca pradyumno nāradas tathā |
GE07hv_conpu:18600: śararūpā mahāsarpā veṣṭayitvā tanuṃ sthitāḥ // HV_113.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:18601: te sarve sahasā dehāt tasya niḥsṛtya bhoginaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18603: dṛṣṭaḥ spṛṣṭaś ca kṛṣṇena so 'niruddho mahātmanā /
GE07hv_conpu:18604: sthitiḥ prītimanā bhūtvā prāñjalir vākyam abravīt // HV_113.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:18605: devadeva sadā yudhe jetā tvam asi kas tava /
GE07hv_conpu:18606: śakto vai pramukhe sthātuṃ sākṣād api śatakratuḥ // HV_113.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:18608: āroha garuḍaṃ tūrṇaṃ gacchāma dvārakāṃ purīm /
GE07hv_conpu:18609: ityuktaḥ so 'dhirūḍhas tu saha dānavakanyayā // HV_113.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:18611: gurubhiḥ samanujñātās tatas te prayayus tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:18612: [k: While K Ñ2 V2.3 B Dn Ds D3-6 G4.5 ins. a passage given in App. I
GE07hv_conpu:18613: (No. 38) after 5; Ñ3 D1.2 T1.2 G1.3 ins. it after 3c; V1 after 3; T4 after
GE07hv_conpu:18614: 3ab; On the other hand, M ins. after 5: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18616: tatas te dīrgham adhvānaṃ prayayuḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18624: āruhya garuḍaṃ sarve jitvā bāṇaṃ mahāsuram // HV_113.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:18626: [k: After 7ab, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.2.4 G1.3-5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18629: [k: After 7, N (except Ś1 Ñ1 D3) T1.2.4 G1.3-5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18632: niśamya bāṇagāvas tu tāsu cakre manas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:18633: āsthito garuḍaṃ devaḥ sarvalokādir avyayaḥ // HV_113.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:18634: [k: After 8, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.2.4 G1.3-5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18636: garuḍa prayāhi tatra tvaṃ yatra bāṇasya godhanam |
GE07hv_conpu:18638: yāsāṃ pītvā kila kṣīram amṛtatvam avāpnuyāt |
GE07hv_conpu:18639: āha māṃ satyabhāmā ca bāṇagāvo mamānaya /
GE07hv_conpu:18640: yāsāṃ pītvā kila kṣīraṃ na jīryanti mahāsurāḥ // HV_113.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:18641: [k: Ñ2 V3 B2.3 Dn Ds D3.5.6 T2 ins. after 9: Ñ2 (error for other siglum?) after 9ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18642: vijarāś ca jarāṃ tyaktvā bhavanti kila jantavaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18643: tā mamānaya bhadraṃ te yadi kāryaṃ na lupyate /
GE07hv_conpu:18644: atha kāryanirodhaḥ syān naiva tāsu manaḥ kṛthāḥ // HV_113.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:18645: [k: After 10, K Ñ2V BD T4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18646: iti mām abravīt satyā tāś caitā viditā mama |
GE07hv_conpu:18647: dṛśyante gāva etās tā māṃ dṛṣṭvā varuṇālayam /
GE07hv_conpu:18648: viśanti sahitāḥ sarvāḥ kāryam atra vidhīyatām // HV_113.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:18649: tathety uktvā tu garuḍaḥ pakṣavātena sāgaram /
GE07hv_conpu:18650: so 'vagāḍho hi sahasā varuṇālayam antikāt // HV_113.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:18652: dṛṣṭvā javena garuḍaṃ prāptaṃ vai varuṇālayam |
GE07hv_conpu:18653: vāruṇāś ca gaṇāḥ sarve vibhrāntāḥ prācalaṃs tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:18654: tatas tu vāruṇaṃ sainyam abhiyātaṃ sudāruṇam /
GE07hv_conpu:18656: [k: K Ñ1.3 V B2.3 Dn Ds D1-5 T1.4 ins. after 13: B1 D6 cont. after
GE07hv_conpu:18658: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ vāruṇaiḥ pannagāriṇā |
GE07hv_conpu:18660: tatas tu tasya pramukhe vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18662: [k: T1.2 G1.5 M ins. after 14ab: G4 cont. after 1499*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18663: dehā vidyotayanti sma kṛtsnaṃ vai varuṇālayam |
GE07hv_conpu:18664: cakreṇa bhagavāñ śauriś cakāra kadanaṃ mahat |
GE07hv_conpu:18665: [k: T1 G5 M4 cont.: K ÑV BD T4 G4 ins. after 14ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18667: te bhagnāḥ sahasā yānti tam eva varuṇālayam // HV_113.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:18671: tāny ayudhyanta kṛṣṇena pradyumnena balena ca |
GE07hv_conpu:18672: tāni sarvāṇi sahasā nijaghāna raṇe hariḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18674: bhagnaṃ varuṇam āśritya naiva sthānam avindata // HV_113.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:18675: [k: K1.2 Ñ2.3 V2.3 B1.3 Dn Ds D4.6 T1 G4.5 ins. after 16: K3.4 V1 B2
GE07hv_conpu:18681: varuṇas tv atha saṃkruddho niryayau yatra keśavaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18685: salilasrāviṇā śreṣṭhaṃ cāpam udyamya viṣṭhitaḥ // HV_113.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:18687: āhvayann iva yuddhe sa visphāritamahādhanuḥ // HV_113.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:18688: sa tu pradhmāpayañ śaṅkhaṃ varuṇaḥ samadhāvata /
GE07hv_conpu:18689: hariṃ hara iva krodhād bāṇajālaiḥ samāvṛṇot // HV_113.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:18691: bāṇavarṣākulāḥ sarvā diśaś cakre janārdanaḥ // HV_113.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:18692: tataḥ śaraughair bahudhā varuṇaḥ pīḍito raṇe /
GE07hv_conpu:18693: smayann iva tadā kṛṣṇaṃ varuṇaḥ pratyayudhyata // HV_113.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:18695: vāsudevo 'bravīd vākyaṃ pramukhe tasya saṃsthitaḥ // HV_113.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:18697: mayodyataṃ vadhārthaṃ te tiṣṭhedānīṃ sthiro bhava // HV_113.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:18698: tatas tad varuṇo devo hy astraṃ vaiṣṇavam udyatam /
GE07hv_conpu:18699: vāruṇāstreṇa saṃyojya nanāda sa mahābalaḥ // HV_113.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:18702: [k: After 26, K Ñ2.3V BD T4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18703: āpas tu vāruṇās tatra kṣiptāḥ kṣiptā jvalanti vai |
GE07hv_conpu:18708: dahyante vāruṇāḥ sarve tato 'stre jvalite punaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18709: vaiṣṇave tu mahāvīrye diśo bhītāḥ pradudruvuḥ // HV_113.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:18710: tāṃs tu prajvalato dṛṣṭvā varuṇo vākyam abravīt /
GE07hv_conpu:18711: smara tāṃ prakṛtiṃ pūrvām avyaktāṃ vyaktalakṣaṇāṃ /
GE07hv_conpu:18712: tamo jahi mahābhāga rajasā muhyase katham // HV_113.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:18713: sattvastho nityam āsīt tvaṃ yogīśvara mahāmate /
GE07hv_conpu:18714: pañcabhūtāśrayān doṣān ahaṃkāraṃ ca saṃtyaja // HV_113.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:18715: yeyaṃ te vaiṣṇavī mūrtis tasyā jyeṣṭho hy ahaṃ tava /
GE07hv_conpu:18716: jyeṣṭhabhāvena mānyas te kiṃ māṃ dagdhum icchasi // HV_113.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:18717: nāgnir vikramate hy agnau tyaja kopaṃ yudhāṃ vara /
GE07hv_conpu:18718: tvayi na prabhaviṣyanti jagataḥ prabhavo hy asi // HV_113.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:18719: pūrvaṃ hi yā tvayā sṛṣṭā prakṛtir vikṛtātmikā /
GE07hv_conpu:18721: āgneyaṃ caiva saumyaṃ ca prakṛtyaivedam āditaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18722: tvayā sṛṣṭaṃ jagad idaṃ sa kathaṃ manyase mayi // HV_113.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:18724: akṣayaś cāvyayaś caiva bhavān eva mahādyute // HV_113.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:18725: rakṣa māṃ rakṣaṇīyo 'haṃ tvayānagha namo 'stu te /
GE07hv_conpu:18727: kiṃ krīḍasi mahādeva bālaḥ krīḍanakair iva /
GE07hv_conpu:18728: na hy ahaṃ prakṛtidveṣī nāhaṃ prakṛtidūṣakaḥ // HV_113.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:18730: tasyā vikāraśamane vartase tvaṃ yathāvidhi // HV_113.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:18732: tān adharmavido mandān bhavān vikurute sadā // HV_113.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:18733: iyaṃ hi prakṛtir doṣais tamasā yujyate sadā /
GE07hv_conpu:18734: rajasā vāpi saṃduṣṭā tato mohaḥ pravartate // HV_113.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:18736: kiṃ mohayasi naḥ sarvān prajāpatir iva svayam // HV_113.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:18737: [k: After 40, K Ñ2.3V BD T4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18739: bhāvajñaḥ sarvavidvīras tataḥ prītimanā hy abhūt |
GE07hv_conpu:18741: gāḥ saṃprayaccha me deva śāntyarthaṃ bhīmavikrama // HV_113.41 //
GE07hv_conpu:18742: [k: After 41, K Ñ2.3V BD T4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18744: varuṇo hy abravīd būyaḥ śṛṇu me madhusūdana |
GE07hv_conpu:18746: bāṇena sārdhaṃ samayo mayā deva purā kṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18747: kathaṃ ca samayaṃ kṛtvā kuryāṃ viphalam anyathā // HV_113.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:18748: [k: After 42, K Ñ2.3V BD t1.4 G5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18749: tvam eva deva sarvasya yathā samayabhedakaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18750: cāritraṃ duṣyate tāta na ca sadbhiḥ praśasyate || *HV_113.42*1506:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18752: na ca lokān avāpnoti pāpaḥ samayabhedakaḥ || *HV_113.42*1506:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18753: prasīda dharmalopaś ca mā bhūn me madhusūdana |

GE07hv_conpu:18759: [k: While K Ñ2.3V BD ins. after 43: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18760: etac ca me samākhyātaṃ samayaṃ madhusūdana |

GE07hv_conpu:18766: satyaṃ prabhāṣase yat tvaṃ tasmān madbhāvabhāvitaḥ ||
GE07hv_conpu:18770: varuṇena gṛhītvā tu yayau dvāravatīṃ hariḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18773: eṣa te bāṇaviṣayaḥ proktas te janamejaya |

GE07hv_conpu:18777: evam ukto 'tha bāṇasya gāvo muktvā mahāyaśāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18778: [k: While K Ñ2.3V BD ins. after 44ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18779: abhedyaṃ samayaṃ matvā nyastavādo gavāṃ prati |
GE07hv_conpu:18780: prahasya varuṇaṃ devaṃ mānayām āsa mādhavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18781: [k: For 44cd, K ÑV BD T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 Bom. Poona eds. subst.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18784: mānayan varuṇaṃ devo gā bāṇasya vyamuñcata |
GE07hv_conpu:18785: [k: K Ñ2.3V BD Bom. Poona eds. cont. after 1512*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18786: tasmān mukto 'si yady evaṃ bāṇena samayaḥ kṛtaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18788: kathaṃ pāpaṃ kariṣyāmi varuṇa tvayy ahaṃ prabho |
GE07hv_conpu:18789: gaccha mukto 'si varuṇa satyasaṃdho 'stu no bhavān |
GE07hv_conpu:18790: tvatpriyārthaṃ mayā muktā bāṇagāvo na saṃśayaḥ || *HV_113.44cd*1514:5
GE07hv_conpu:18791: tatas tūryaninādaiś ca bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18794: balaṃ pūjayate devaḥ kuśalī ca samāhitaḥ || *HV_113.44cd*1514:9 |
GE07hv_conpu:18796: [k: On the other hand, T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 cont. after 1512*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18797: tvadarthaṃ dhenavo muktā bāṇasya tu durātmanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18798: ity uktvā varuṇaṃ devo gā bāṇasya vimuñcata |
GE07hv_conpu:18799: prayayau dvārakāṃ cāpi śakrādyair amarair vṛtaḥ // HV_113.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:18800: [k: For 44ef, N (except Ś1) T1.2 G1.3-5 M subst.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18803: [k: After 45ab, K Ñ1.3V BD (except D1) T2 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18805: [k: While, T1 G1.3-5 M ins. after 45ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18808: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca mahābalau /
GE07hv_conpu:18809: [k: After 46ab, K Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D2-4.6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18811: āyāntam anugacchanti yaśasā vijayena ca // HV_113.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:18813: nāradaś ca mahābhāgaḥ prasthito dvārakāṃ prati |
GE07hv_conpu:18814: tuṣṭo bāṇajayaṃ dṛṣṭvā varuṇaṃ ca kṛtapriyam || *HV_113.46*1520:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18816: durād eva tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dvārakāṃ dvāramālinīm /
GE07hv_conpu:18818: [k: After 47, Ś1 K Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D2-6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18820: [k: While T1.2 G1.3-5 M ins. after 47: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18823: śrutvā dvāravatī sarvā praharṣam atulaṃ gatā // HV_113.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:18824: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B2.3 D ins. after 48: B1 after the first occurrence of 49: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18829: jayaśabdaiś ca vividhaiḥ pūjayanti sma mādhavam |

GE07hv_conpu:18839: praharṣam atulaṃ prāptā dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ mahābhujam |

GE07hv_conpu:18844: gatvā ca dūram adhvānaṃ suparṇo drutam āgataḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18845: dhanyāḥ smo 'nugṛhītāḥ smo yeṣāṃ no jagataḥ patiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18846: rakṣitā cāpi goptā ca dīrghabāhur janārdanaḥ // HV_113.53 //
GE07hv_conpu:18848: prāpto 'yaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo manāṃsy āhlādayann iva // HV_113.54 //
GE07hv_conpu:18850: vāsudevagṛhaṃ devā viviśus te mahārathāḥ // HV_113.55 //
GE07hv_conpu:18851: [k: After 55, K Ñ2.3V BDn D2-6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18852: avatīrya suparṇāt tu vāsudevo balas tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:18853: pradyumnaś cāniruddhaś ca gṛhān praviviśus tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:18854: tāni teṣāṃ vimānāni divi saṃcaratāṃ tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:18855: sthitāny eva pradṛśyante nānārūpāṇi sarvaśaḥ // HV_113.56 //
GE07hv_conpu:18857: bhāsvanti tāni dṛśyante vimānāni sahasraśaḥ // HV_113.57 //
GE07hv_conpu:18859: atha kṛṣṇo 'bravīd vākyaṃ kumārāṃs tān sahasraśaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18860: pradyumnādīn samastāṃs tu ślakṣṇaṃ madhurayā girā |
GE07hv_conpu:18862: sādhyā devās tathānye cāpy avandaṃs tān yathākramam // HV_113.58 //
GE07hv_conpu:18867: ṛṣayaś ca mahātmāno vandadhvaṃ ca yathāsukham || *HV_113.58*1529:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18868: ete cakradharāś caiva etān vadanta sarvaśaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18869: sāgarāś ca hradāś caiva matpriyārtham ihāgatāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18870: diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva vandadhvaṃ ca yathākramam || *HV_113.58*1529:7
GE07hv_conpu:18872: gāvaś ca matpriyārthaṃ vai vandadhvaṃ ca yathākramam ||
GE07hv_conpu:18874: āgatā matpriyārthaṃ vai vandadhvaṃ ca yathākramam ||
GE07hv_conpu:18877: sarvān divaukaso dṛṣṭvā paurā vismayam āgatāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18878: pūjārtham atha saṃbhārān pragṛhya drutam āgatāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18879: aho vai mahad āścaryaṃ vāsudevasya saṃśrayāt /
GE07hv_conpu:18880: prāpyate yad ihāsmābhir iti vācaś caranti hi // HV_113.59 //
GE07hv_conpu:18881: tataś candanacūrṇaiś ca puṣpavarṣaiś ca sarvaśaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18882: kiranti paurāḥ sarvāṃs tān pūjayanto divaukasaḥ // HV_113.60 //
GE07hv_conpu:18883: lājaiḥ praṇāmair dhūpaiś ca vāgbuddhiniyatās tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:18885: āhukaṃ vasudevaṃ ca sāmbaṃ ca yadunandanam /
GE07hv_conpu:18886: sātyakiṃ colmukaṃ caiva vipṛthuṃ ca mahābalam // HV_113.62 //
GE07hv_conpu:18888: akrūraṃ ca mahābhāgaṃ tathā niṣadham eva ca |
GE07hv_conpu:18889: etān pariṣvajya tadā mūrdhni cāghrāya vīryavān /
