GE07hv_conpu:18894: andhakaṃ ca śubhākṣaṃ ca tato vacanam abravīt // HV_113.63 //
GE07hv_conpu:18895: vāsavaḥ sātvatān sarvān eṣa vo yadunandanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18896: yojayitvā raṇe caiva yaśasā pauruṣeṇa ca // HV_113.64 //
GE07hv_conpu:18899: mahādevasya miṣato guhasya ca tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:18900: eṣa bāṇaṃ raṇe jitvā dvārakāṃ punar āgatāḥ // HV_113.65 //
GE07hv_conpu:18902: sthāpayitvā dvibāhutve prāpto 'yaṃ svapurīṃ hariḥ // HV_113.66 //
GE07hv_conpu:18904: tad apy avasitaṃ kṛtsnaṃ naṣṭaśokā vayaṃ kṛtāḥ // HV_113.67 //
GE07hv_conpu:18906: kālo yāsyaty avirataṃ viṣayeṣv eva sajjatām // HV_113.68 //
GE07hv_conpu:18907: bāhūnāṃ saṃśrayāt sarve vayam asya mahātmanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18908: pranaṣṭaśokā raṃsyāmaḥ sarva evāmarāḥ sukham // HV_113.69 //
GE07hv_conpu:18912: āpṛcchya taṃ mahābhāgaḥ sarvair devagaṇair vṛtaḥ ||
GE07hv_conpu:18915: [k: While T1.2 G1.3-5 M subst. for 70ab: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18916: ity uktvā yādavān sarvān kṛṣṇaṃ saṃpūjya vāsavaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18918: [k: T2 G1.3.4 cont. after the addl. colophon: K Ñ2.3 V2.3B DT1 G5
GE07hv_conpu:18925: gacchanti kaumudīṃ draṣṭuṃ so 'naghaḥ priyayā saha |
GE07hv_conpu:18926: dvārakāṃ prāpya kṛṣṇas tu reme yadugaṇair vṛtaḥ // HV_113.70 //
GE07hv_conpu:18927: [k: After 70, Ś1 K Ñ2V BD M4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18931: etaiś ca kāraṇaiḥ śrīmān vasudevakule prabhuḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18932: jāto vṛṣṇiṣu devakyāṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // HV_113.72 //
GE07hv_conpu:18934: uktās te vistarāḥ sarve pūrvaṃ ye janamejaya // HV_113.73 //
GE07hv_conpu:18935: viṣṇos tu māthure kalpe yatra te saṃśayo mahān /

GE07hv_conpu:18938: sarveṣv āścaryakalpeṣu nāsty āścaryam avaiṣṇavam // HV_113.75 //
GE07hv_conpu:18939: sa eva dhanyo dhanināṃ dhanyakṛd dhanyabhāvanaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:18940: deveṣv api sadaityeṣu nāsti dhanyataro 'cyutāt // HV_113.76 //
GE07hv_conpu:18941: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau marutas tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:18942: gaganaṃ bhūr diśaś caiva salilaṃ jyotir eva ca // HV_113.77 //
GE07hv_conpu:18944: sarvam etaj jagaddhātā viṣṇur eva na cāparaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18945: eṣa dhātā vidhātā ca saṃhartā kāla eva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:18946: satyaṃ dharmas tapaś caiva brahma caiva sanātanam /
GE07hv_conpu:18947: [k: Ś1 Ñ2 B1.2 D2.4.5 ins. after 78cd: Dn Ds after 78: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18948: anantaś caiva nāgānāṃ rudrāṇāṃ śaṃkaraḥ smṛtaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18950: etasmāc ca jagat sarvaṃ prasūyeta janārdanāt |
GE07hv_conpu:18951: jagac ca sarvaṃ deveśas taṃ namas kuru bhārata // HV_113.78 //
GE07hv_conpu:18952: [k: Ś1 K ÑV BD1-5 ins. after 78: X Dn Ds cont. after 1538*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18953: pūjyaś ca satataṃ sarvair devair eṣa sanātanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18954: [k: While D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M ins. after 78: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18956: ijyaś ca devadeveśas taṃ namaskuru bhārata || *HV_113.78*1540:2 |
GE07hv_conpu:18957: ādikartā ca bhoktā ca bhūtādir bhūtir eva ca |
GE07hv_conpu:18958: namaskuru jagannāthaṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ prabho nṛpa || *HV_113.78*1540:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18960: namasyāmo jagannāthaṃ devakīṃ ca hariṃ sadā || *HV_113.78*1540:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:18962: śreyas tava sadā viṣṇur vidhāsyati na saṃśayaḥ || *HV_113.78*1540:8 |
GE07hv_conpu:18963: namas tasmin samādhatsva mano 'nudhyāhi tat param |
GE07hv_conpu:18964: upāsyaś ca sadā viṣṇur manasā rājasattama |
GE07hv_conpu:18969: ityuktaṃ bāṇayuddhaṃ te māhātmyaṃ keśavasya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:18972: keśavasya ca māhātmyaṃ nādharmas tān bhajiṣyati // HV_113.80 //
GE07hv_conpu:18974: teṣāṃ dharmo bhaved rājan nātra kāryā vicāraṇā |
GE07hv_conpu:18975: eṣā te vaiṣṇavī caryā mayā kārtsnyena kīrtitā /
GE07hv_conpu:18976: pṛcchatas tāta yajñe 'smin nivṛtte janamejaya // HV_113.81 //
GE07hv_conpu:18977: āścaryaparvam akhilaṃ yo hīdaṃ dhārayen nṛpa /
GE07hv_conpu:18978: [k: After 82ab, K2 Ñ2.3V BDn Ds D2-4.5(marg.).6 G4 M2 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18980: kalpa utthāya yo nityaṃ kīrtayet susamāhitaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18981: na tasya durlabhaṃ kiṃ cid iha loke paratra ca || *HV_113.82ab*1542:3
GE07hv_conpu:18982: brāhmaṇaḥ sarvavedī syāt kṣatriyo vijayī bhavet |
GE07hv_conpu:18983: vaiśyo dhanasamṛddhaḥ syāc chūdro gacchec ca sadgatim |
GE07hv_conpu:18984: nāśubhaṃ prāpnuyāt kiṃcid dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt // HV_113.82 //
GE07hv_conpu:18986: harivaṃśam imaṃ puṇyaṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti mahīpatiḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:18987: āyur ārogyam aiśvaryam atulām ṛddhim āpnuyāt |
GE07hv_conpu:18989: aputro labhate putram adhano 'pi dhanaṃ vrajet |
GE07hv_conpu:18991: vāsudeve parāṃ bhaktiṃ bhogān apy atulān bhuvi |
GE07hv_conpu:18992: avyāhataṃ pratāpaṃ ca yaśo vindeta mānavaḥ || *HV_113.82*1544:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:18995: [k: G4 cont.: T2 G1.3 cont. after 1543*: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:18996: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ viṣṇubhaktād dvijarṣabhāt |
GE07hv_conpu:18998: vede rāmāyaṇe caiva harivaṃśe ca bhārata |
GE07hv_conpu:18999: ādau madhye tathaivānte hariḥ sarvatra gīyate || *HV_113.82*1545:4 |
GE07hv_conpu:19002: tasya vaṃśam imaṃ puṇyam itihāsaṃ purātanam |
GE07hv_conpu:19003: ye narāḥ kīrtayiṣyanti nāsti teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:19004: [k: T2 G1.3.4 cont.: D6 T1 G5 M ins. after 82: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19006: manas te niścalaṃ bhūyāt prasanno 'stu janārdanaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:19009: śrutavān amalo bhūtvā harivaṃśaṃ dvijarṣabhāḥ // HV_113.83 //
GE07hv_conpu:19010: evaṃ śaunaka saṃkṣepād vistareṇa tathaiva ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19013: proktā vai sarvavaṃśās te kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te // HV_113.84 //
GE07hv_conpu:19014: [k: After 84, T1.2 G1.3-5 M G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19015: śaunakādyās tu munayaḥ prītās tuṣṭās tadābhavan |
GE07hv_conpu:19017: ādidevaṃ hariṃ viṣṇuṃ namasyanti sma mādhavam |
GE07hv_conpu:19024: vedāvāsaṃ sarasvatyā vāsaṃ vyāsaṃ namāmy aham || *HV_113.84*1549:6 |
GE07hv_conpu:19026: yat prasādād ṛte snigdhaṃ jihvā na parivartate |
GE07hv_conpu:19027: [h: HV (CE) chapter 114, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of december 22, 2001
GE07hv_conpu:19030: [k: T2 G1 ins. after the ref.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19032: kasmin pratiṣṭhito vaṃśaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām // HV_114.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:19034: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ mama |
GE07hv_conpu:19035: tvattaḥ kathayataḥ sarvaṃ vedmy ahaṃ taṃ parisphuṭam |
GE07hv_conpu:19038: candrāpīḍaś ca nṛpatiḥ sūryāpīḍaś ca mokṣavit // HV_114.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:19040: janamejaya ity eva kṣatraṃ bhuvi pariśrutam // HV_114.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:19041: teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhas tu rājāsīt pure vāraṇasāhvaye /
GE07hv_conpu:19044: aputraḥ sa tu dharmātmā praviveśa tapovanam // HV_114.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:19046: sucāror duhitā subhrūr mālinī bhrātṛmālini // HV_114.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:19047: sa tv ajanmani garbhasya śvetakarṇaḥ prajeśvaraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19048: anvagacchata taṃ pūrvair mahāprasthānam acyutam // HV_114.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:19049: sā dṛṣṭvā saṃprayātaṃ taṃ mālinī pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt /
GE07hv_conpu:19050: pathi sā suṣuve subhrūr vane rājīvalocanam // HV_114.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:19051: tam apāśya ca tatraiva rājānaṃ sānvagacchata /
GE07hv_conpu:19052: pativratā mahābhāgā draupadīva purā patīn // HV_114.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:19054: dayārthaṃ tasya meghās tu prādurāsan mahātmanaḥ // HV_114.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:19055: śraviṣṭhāyāś ca putrau dvau paippalādau ca tau dvijau /
GE07hv_conpu:19056: dṛṣṭvā kṛpānvitau gṛhya taṃ prakṣālayatāṃ jale // HV_114.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:19057: vighṛṣṭe tasya te pārśve khelena rudhirasrave /
GE07hv_conpu:19058: ajaśyāmau ca pārśvau tāv ubhāv api samāhitau // HV_114.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:19060: ājagamānayo pārśvaṃ pibann apy anayoḥ stanau |
GE07hv_conpu:19063: ājaśyāmasya te pārśve rūḍhe vai saṃabhūvatuḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:19065: taṃ tathaiva ca tiṣṭhantaṃ ajapārśve kumārakam |
GE07hv_conpu:19066: tato 'japārśva iti tau cakrāte tasya nāma ha // HV_114.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:19067: sa tu vemakaśālāyāṃ ubhābhyām abhivardhitaḥ // HV_114.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:19068: vemakasya tu bhāryā tam udvahat putrakāraṇāt /
GE07hv_conpu:19070: sevakasya tu tāṃ bhāryām ūhatus tasya kāraṇāt |
GE07hv_conpu:19071: vemakyāḥ sa tu putro 'bhūd brāhmaṇau sucivau ca tau // HV_114.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:19072: teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca yugapat tulyajīvinaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19073: sa eṣa pauravo vaṃśaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // HV_114.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:19075: jarāsaṃkramaṇe pūrvaṃ tadā prītena dhīmatā // HV_114.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:19076: acandrārkagrahā bhūmir bhaved api na saṃśayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19077: apauravā na tu mahī bhaviṣyati kadācana // HV_114.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:19080: [h: HV (CE) chapter 115, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of december 26, 2001
GE07hv_conpu:19082: ukto 'yaṃ harivaṃśas te parvāṇi nikhilāni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19083: yathā puroktāni tathā vyāsaśiṣyeṇa dhīmatā // HV_115.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:19086: [k: K1.2.4N VB Dn Ds D2-6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19090: saute kim akarot paścāt sarpasatrād anantaram // HV_115.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:19092: yad ārabhata pārikṣit tan me kathaya suvrata |
GE07hv_conpu:19095: yad ārabhat tad ākhyāsye sarpasatrād anantaram // HV_115.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:19096: tasmin satre samāpte tu rājā pārikṣitas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:19097: yaṣṭuṃ sa vājimedhena saṃbhārān upacakrame // HV_115.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:19099: yakṣye 'haṃ vājimedhena haya utsṛjyatām iti // HV_115.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:19100: tato 'sya vijñāya cikīrṣitaṃ tadā kṛṣṇo mahātmā sahasājagāma /
GE07hv_conpu:19101: pārikṣitaṃ draṣṭum adīnasattvam dvaipāyanaḥ sarvaparāvarajñaḥ // HV_115.7
GE07hv_conpu:19102: pārikṣitas tu nṛpatir dṛṣṭvā tam ṛṣim āgatam /
GE07hv_conpu:19104: tau copaviṣṭāv abhitaḥ sadasyās tasya śaunaka /
GE07hv_conpu:19107: kathā bahuvidhāś citrāś cakrāte vedasaṃhitāḥ // HV_115.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:19108: tataḥ kathānte nṛpatiś codayāmāsa taṃ munim /
GE07hv_conpu:19111: nimeṣamātram iva me sukhaśravyatayā gatam // HV_115.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:19113: tvayā tv abhihitaṃ brahmañ śaṅkhe kṣīram ivāhitam // HV_115.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:19114: nāmṛtenāpi tṛptiḥ syād yathā svargasukhena vā /
GE07hv_conpu:19115: tathā tṛptiṃ na gacchāmi śrutvemāṃ bhāratīṃ kathām // HV_115.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:19116: anumānya tu sarvajñaṃ pṛcchāmi bhagavann aham /
GE07hv_conpu:19117: hetuḥ kurūṇāṃ nāśasya rājasūyo mato mama // HV_115.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:19119: rājasūyaṃ tathā manye yuddhārtham upakalpitam // HV_115.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:19120: rājasūyo hi somena śrūyate pūrvam āhṛtaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19124: hariścandras tu rājarṣir etaṃ kratum avāptavān /
GE07hv_conpu:19125: tatrāpy āḍībakam abhūd yuddhaṃ kṣatravināśanam // HV_115.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:19128: tasya mūlaṃ hi yuddhasya lokakṣayakarasya ha /
GE07hv_conpu:19129: rājasūyo mahāyajñaḥ kimarthaṃ na nivāritaḥ // HV_115.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:19130: rājasūye hy asaṃhārye yajñāṅgaiś ca durāsadaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19131: mithyāpraṇīte yajñāṅge prajānāṃ saṃkṣayo dhruvaḥ // HV_115.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:19132: bhavān api ca sarveṣāṃ pūrveṣāṃ naḥ pitāmahaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19133: atītānāgatajñaś ca nāthaś cādikaraś ca naḥ // HV_115.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:19134: te kathaṃ bhagavan netrā buddhimantaś cyutā nayāt /
GE07hv_conpu:19135: anāthā hy aparādhyante kunetāraś ca mānavāḥ // HV_115.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:19137: kālenādya parītās te tava vatsa pitāmahāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19138: na māṃ bhaviṣyaṃ papracchur na cāpṛṣṭo bravīmy aham // HV_115.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:19140: parihartuṃ na śakṣyāmi kālaniṣṭhāṃ hi tāṃ gatim // HV_115.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:19141: tvayā tv idam ahaṃ pṛṣṭo vakṣyāmy āgantu bhāvi yat /
GE07hv_conpu:19142: ataś ca balavān kālaḥ śrutvāpi na kariṣyasi // HV_115.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:19143: na saṃrambhān na cārambhān na vai sthāsyasi pauruṣe /
GE07hv_conpu:19144: lekhā hi kālalikhitā veleva duratikramāḥ // HV_115.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:19146: tena bhāvena te yajñaṃ vāsavo dharṣayiṣyati // HV_115.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:19147: yadi tac chakyate rājan parihartuṃ kathaṃcana /
GE07hv_conpu:19148: daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa mā yajethāś ca taṃ kratum // HV_115.29 //
GE07hv_conpu:19150: tava vā yajamānasya kālo 'tra parameśvaraḥ // HV_115.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:19151: tasya saṃsthāpanam idam kālasya vaśavarti vai /
GE07hv_conpu:19152: tat praṇeyaṃ nibodhasya trailokyaṃ sacarācaram // HV_115.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:19153: yathā yaṣṭā nṛpaḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati yugakṣaye /
GE07hv_conpu:19154: tathā yajñaphalānāṃ ca vikretāro dvijātayaḥ // HV_115.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:19157: śrutvā parihariṣyāmi bhagavan yadi śakyate // HV_115.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:19160: yatasva parihartuṃ tad ity etad bhadram astu te // HV_115.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:19161: tvayā dhṛtaḥ kratuś caiva vājimedhaḥ paraṃtapa /
GE07hv_conpu:19162: kṣatriyā nāhariṣyanti yāvad bhūmir dhariṣyati // HV_115.35 //
GE07hv_conpu:19165: ahaṃ nimittaṃ iti ced bhayaṃ tīvraṃ ca jāyate // HV_115.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:19166: kathaṃ hy akīrttyā saṃyuktaḥ sukṛtī madvidho janaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19167: lokān utsahate gantuṃ khaṃ sapāśa iva dvijaḥ // HV_115.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:19168: yathā hy anāgatam idam dṛṣṭam atra praṇāśanam /
GE07hv_conpu:19169: yajñasya punarāvṛttir yady asty āśvāsayasva mām // HV_115.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:19172: [k: T2 G1.3 ins. after the ref.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19173: vihito yajña eṣo 'tra devaiś ca brāhmaṇair api |
GE07hv_conpu:19175: audbhido bhavitā kaścit senānīḥ kāśyapo dvijaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19177: tadyuge tatkulīnaś ca rājasūyam api kratum /
GE07hv_conpu:19182: vinivartiṣyate loke vṛttānte vṛttimatsv api // HV_115.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:19185: tadā hy alpena tapasā siddhiṃ yāsyanti mānavāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19186: dhanyā dharmaṃ cariṣyanti yugāmte janamejaya // HV_115.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:19187: [h: HV (CE) chapter 116, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of december 26, 2001
GE07hv_conpu:19189: āsannaṃ viprakṛṣṭaṃ vā yadi kālaṃ na vidmahe /
GE07hv_conpu:19190: tasmād dvāparavidhvaṃsād yugāntaṃ spṛhayāmy aham // HV_116.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:19191: prāptā vayaṃ hi taṃ kālam anayā dharmatṛṣṇayā /
GE07hv_conpu:19192: prāptā vayaṃ ca dharmaṃ svaṃ sukham alpena karmaṇā // HV_116.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:19196: pranaṣṭadharmaṃ dharmajña nimittair vaktum arhasi // HV_116.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:19198: pṛṣṭa evaṃ bhaviṣyasya gatiṃ tattvena cintayan /
GE07hv_conpu:19200: evaṃ bhaviṣye tu gatiṃ yogenaiva vicintayan |
GE07hv_conpu:19201: yugānte pūrvarūpāṇi bhagavān abravīt tadā // HV_116.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:19206: śūdrāś ca brāhmaṇācārā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // HV_116.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:19216: alpodakās tathā meghā alpasasyā ca medinī |
GE07hv_conpu:19221: nāryaś cāpi kariṣyanti kṛṣim eva kalau yuge |
GE07hv_conpu:19222: akutsanā ca patite bhaviṣyati yugakṣaye // HV_116.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:19224: aśāntās tāpasā nityaṃ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge |
GE07hv_conpu:19226: unaṣoḍaśavarṣāś ca prajāsyanti narās tadā // HV_116.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:19228: pramadāḥ keśaśūlāś ca bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // HV_116.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:19230: aṭṭam annam iti proktaṃ śūlo vikraya ucyate |
GE07hv_conpu:19231: catuṣpathā brāhmaṇa iti śivo veda udāhṛtaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:19232: keśo bhaga iti khyāto rājan naivātra saṃśayaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:19234: śūdrā bhovādinaś caiva bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye // HV_116.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:19236: ṛtavaś ca bhaviṣyanti viparītā yugakṣaye // HV_116.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:19240: svādūnāṃ vinivṛttiś ca vidyād antagate yuge // HV_116.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:19242: yathānimnaṃ prajāḥ sarvā gamiṣyanti yugakṣaye // HV_116.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:19244: citravarṣī ca parjanyo yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati // HV_116.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:19247: svalpenāḍhyā bhaviṣyanti yat kiṃcit prāpya durgatāḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:19248: na te dharmaṃ cariṣyanti mānavā nirgate yuge /
GE07hv_conpu:19250: sarve vāṇijakāś caiva bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // HV_116.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:19256: saukumārye tathā rūpe ratne copakṣayaṃ gate /
GE07hv_conpu:19257: bhaviṣyanti yugasyānte nāryaḥ keśair alaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_116.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:19259: yugānte samanuprāpte nānyā bhāryāsamā ratiḥ // HV_116.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:19261: puruṣālpaṃ bahustrīkaṃ tad yugāntasya lakṣaṇam // HV_116.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:19263: [k: K1.4 N2 V2 B Ds D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19267: īhayāsukhino lokā bhaviṣyanti gate yuge // HV_116.25 //
GE07hv_conpu:19269: saṃdigdhaḥ paralokaś ca bhaviṣyati yugakṣaye // HV_116.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:19270: [k: Dn Bomb. Poona eds. G (ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19272: ātmānaṃ bahu manyante manyur evābhyayād dvijān |
GE07hv_conpu:19276: ṛṇaṃ ca vinayabhraṃśo yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati // HV_116.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:19277: bhaviṣyaty aphalo harṣaḥ krodhaś ca saphalo nṛṇām /
GE07hv_conpu:19282: [k: N2 V1.2 B2 Dn D3.5 T2 G1 cont.: V3 B1 Ds D6 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19285: sarvaḥ sarvaṃ vijānāti vṛddhān anupasevya ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19286: na kaścid akavir nāma yugānte pratyupasthite // HV_116.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:19288: coraprāyāś ca rājāno yugānte pratyupasthite // HV_116.32 //
GE07hv_conpu:19293: bhogārtham abhipatsyante na ca kaścit paṭhiṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:19296: saṃdhyārāgo 'tha digdāho bhaviṣyaty apare yuge // HV_116.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:19297: pitṝn putrā niyokṣyanti vadhvaḥ śvaśrūś ca karmasu /
GE07hv_conpu:19298: [k: V3 B Ds D2-6 ins. after 37ab: N2 V1.2 Dn after 37: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19299: vākśarais tarjayiṣyanti gurūñ śiṣyās tathaiva ca |
GE07hv_conpu:19300: [k: V3 B1.2 Ds D6 cont.: N1 ins. after 37: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19301: mukheṣu ca prayokṣyanti pramattāś ca narās tadā |
GE07hv_conpu:19302: viyoniṣu cariṣyanti pramadāsu narās tadā // HV_116.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:19304: bhikṣāṃ balim adattvā ca bhokṣyanti puruṣāḥ svayam // HV_116.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:19305: patīn suptān vañcayitvā gamiṣyanti striyo aṇyataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19306: puruṣāś ca prasuptāsu bhāryāsu ca parastriyam // HV_116.39 //
GE07hv_conpu:19308: na kṛtapratikartā ca kāle kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati // HV_116.40 //
GE07hv_conpu:19309: [h: HV (CE) chapter 117, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of december 27, 2001
GE07hv_conpu:19311: eṣaṃ vilulite loke manuṣyāḥ kena pālitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19314: kāṃ ca kāṣṭhāṃ samāsādya prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ yugam // HV_117.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:19316: ata ūrdhvaṃ cyute dharme guṇahīnāḥ prajās tataḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19317: śīlavyasanam āsādya prāpsyante hrāsam āyuṣaḥ // HV_117.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:19322: evaṃ gatvā parāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ yugam // HV_117.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:19325: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca pramāṇam iti niścitāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19327: apramāṇaṃ kariṣyanti vedoktam apare janāḥ // HV_117.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:19331: bhaviṣyanti narā mūḍhā mandāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ // HV_117.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:19337: bhaviṣyati tadā lokas tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam // HV_117.11 //
GE07hv_conpu:19338: viprāṇāṃ śāśvatīṃ vṛttiṃ yadā varṇāvaro janaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19339: abhipatsyati vṛttyarthaṃ tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam // HV_117.12 //
GE07hv_conpu:19341: siddhim alpena kālena yāsyanti nirupaskṛtāḥ // HV_117.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:19343: bhaviṣyati yuge kṣīṇe tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam // HV_117.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:19352: vyavāhāropavṛttāś ca cyutā dharmāc ca śāśvatāt // HV_117.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:19358: kathāyogena tān sarvān pūjayiṣyanti mānavāḥ // HV_117.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:19360: bhakṣyabhojyaharāś caiva bhāṇḍānāṃ caiva hāriṇaḥ // HV_117.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:19361: corāś corasya hartāro hantā hartur bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:19362: corāś corakṣaye cāpi kṛte kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_117.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:19363: niḥsāre kṣubhite loke niṣkriye vyantare sthite /
GE07hv_conpu:19365: [k: K N2.3 V1 B Dn Ds D1.3-5 G (ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19367: snuṣāḥ śvaśrūs tathā caiva yugānte paryupasthite |
GE07hv_conpu:19371: kṣemaṃ subhikṣam ārogyaṃ sāmagryam atha bandhubhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19374: maṇḍalaiḥ prabhaviṣyanti deśe deśe pṛthak pṛthak // HV_117.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:19376: narās tadā bhaviṣyanti sarve kālapratīkṣiṇaḥ // HV_117.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:19377: tadā skandhe samādāya kumārān pradrutā bhayāt /
GE07hv_conpu:19381: aṅgān vaṅgān kaliṅgāṃś ca kāśmīrān atha mekalān /
GE07hv_conpu:19383: kṛtsnaṃ ca himavatpārśvaṃ kūlaṃ ca lavaṇāmbhasaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19384: araṇyāni ca vatsyanti narā mlecchagaṇaiḥ saha // HV_117.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:19385: naiva śūnyā na cāśūnyā bhaviṣyati vasuṃdharā /
GE07hv_conpu:19386: goptāraś cāpy agoptāraḥ prabhaviṣyanti śāsinaḥ // HV_117.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:19387: mṛgair matsyair vihaṃgaiś ca śvāpadaiḥ sarvakīṭakaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19391: cīraṃ parṇaṃ ca vividhaṃ valkalāny ajināni ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19392: svayaṃ kṛtvā nivatsyanti yathā munijanās tathā // HV_117.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:19394: ajaiḍakaṃ kharoṣṭraṃ ca pālayiṣyanti yatnataḥ // HV_117.34 //
GE07hv_conpu:19400: hīnādd hīnaṃ tadā dharmaṃ prajā samanuvartsyati // HV_117.37 //
GE07hv_conpu:19401: āyus tatra ca martyānāṃ paraṃ triṃśad bhaviṣyati /
GE07hv_conpu:19406: evaṃ viplāvite loke pīḍitāḥ saṃkṣaye kāle |
GE07hv_conpu:19413: catuṣpādapravṛttaṃ ca dharmam āpsyanti mānavāḥ // HV_117.42 //
GE07hv_conpu:19415: svādu kiṃ nv iti vijñāya dharma eva svadiṣyati // HV_117.43 //
GE07hv_conpu:19416: yathā hāniḥ kramaprāptā tathā vṛddhiḥ kramāgatā /
GE07hv_conpu:19418: yadā hānir bhaviṣyati kaleḥ sarvāṇi bhūpate |
GE07hv_conpu:19419: pragṛhīte tato dharme prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ punaḥ // HV_117.44 //
GE07hv_conpu:19421: eka eva tu kālaḥ sa hīnavarṇo yathā śaśī // HV_117.45 //
GE07hv_conpu:19422: channo hi tamasā somo yathā kaliyuge tathā /
GE07hv_conpu:19423: pūrṇaś ca tapasā hīno yathā kaliyuge tathā // HV_117.46 //
GE07hv_conpu:19424: arthavādaparo dharmo vedārtha iti tu viduḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19425: anirṇiktam avijñātaṃ dāyādyam iva dhāryate // HV_117.47 //
GE07hv_conpu:19426: iṣṭaṃ dānaṃ tapo nāma brahmacaryaṃ supūjitam /
GE07hv_conpu:19427: guṇaiḥ karmābhinirvṛttir guṇās tathyena karmaṇā // HV_117.48 //
GE07hv_conpu:19429: yuge yuge yathākālam ṛṣibhiḥ samudāhṛtā // HV_117.49 //
GE07hv_conpu:19431: āśiṣaś ca śubhāḥ puṇyās tathaivāyur yuge yuge // HV_117.50 //
GE07hv_conpu:19435: kṣaṇaṃ na saṃtiṣṭhati jīvalokaḥ kṣayodayābhyāṃ parivartamānaḥ // HV_117.51
GE07hv_conpu:19436: [h: HV (CE) chapter 118, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of december 29, 2001
GE07hv_conpu:19439: atītānāgataṃ vākyam ṛṣeḥ pariṣadā śrutam // HV_118.1 //
GE07hv_conpu:19441: atarpayata tac chotraṃ maharṣer vāṅmayo rasaḥ // HV_118.2 //
GE07hv_conpu:19443: ramaṇīyaṃ tad ākhyānaṃ kṛtsnaṃ pariṣadā śrutam // HV_118.3 //
GE07hv_conpu:19444: kecid aśrūṇi mumucuḥ śrutvā dadhyus tathāpare /
GE07hv_conpu:19445: itihāsaṃ tam ṛṣiṇā pārāśaryeṇa darśitam // HV_118.4 //
GE07hv_conpu:19449: punar drakṣyāma ity uktvā jagāma bhagavān ṛṣiḥ // HV_118.5 //
GE07hv_conpu:19451: loke pravadatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śiṣṭāḥ sarve tapodhanāḥ // HV_118.6 //
GE07hv_conpu:19452: yāte bhagavati vyāse viprāḥ saha maharṣibhiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19453: ṛtvijaḥ pārthivāś caiva pratijagmur yathāgatam // HV_118.7 //
GE07hv_conpu:19455: jagāma roṣam utsṛtya rājā viṣam ivoragaḥ // HV_118.8 //
GE07hv_conpu:19457: āstīko 'py āśramapadaṃ jagāma ca mahāmuniḥ // HV_118.9 //
GE07hv_conpu:19459: anvaśāsac ca muditas tadā pramuditāḥ prajāḥ // HV_118.10 //
GE07hv_conpu:19460: kasyacit tv atha kālasya sa rājā janamejayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19462: saṃjñaptam aśvaṃ tatrāsya devī kāśyā vapuṣṭamā /
GE07hv_conpu:19464: tāṃ tu sarvānavadyāṅgīṃ cakame vāsavas tadā /
GE07hv_conpu:19465: saṃjñaptam aśvaṃ āviśya tayā miśrībabhūva saḥ // HV_118.13 //
GE07hv_conpu:19466: tasmin vikāre janite viditvā tattvataś ca tat /
GE07hv_conpu:19467: asaṃjñapto 'yam aśvas te dhvaṃsety adhvaryum abravīt // HV_118.14 //
GE07hv_conpu:19469: kathayāmāsa rājarṣeḥ śaśāpa sa puraṃdaram // HV_118.15 //
GE07hv_conpu:19471: yady asti me yajñaphalaṃ tapo vā rakṣataḥ prajāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19472: phalena tena sarveṇa bravīmi śrūyatām idam // HV_118.16 //
GE07hv_conpu:19474: kṣatriyā vājimedhena na yakṣyantīti śaunaka // HV_118.17 //
GE07hv_conpu:19475: ṛtvijaś cābravīt kruddhaḥ sa rājā janamejayaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19476: daurbalyaṃ bhavatām etad yad ayaṃ dharṣitaḥ kratuḥ // HV_118.18 //
GE07hv_conpu:19477: viṣaye me na vastavyaṃ dhvaṃsadhvaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19478: ity uktās tatyajur viprās taṃ nṛpaṃ jātamanyavaḥ // HV_118.19 //
GE07hv_conpu:19482: asatīṃ vapuṣṭamām etāṃ nirvāsayata me gṛhāt /
GE07hv_conpu:19484: yayā me caraṇo mūrdhni bhasmareṇūṣitaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_118.20 //
GE07hv_conpu:19485: śauṇḍīryaṃ me 'nayā bhagnaṃ yaśo mānaś ca dūṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19486: naināṃ draṣṭum apīcchāmi parikliṣṭām iva srajam // HV_118.21 //
GE07hv_conpu:19487: na svādu so 'śnāti naraḥ sukhaṃ svapiti vā rahaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19488: anvāste yaḥ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ pareṇa mṛditām iha // HV_118.22 //
GE07hv_conpu:19489: [k: D5 (marg.) Bom. Poona eds. G (ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conpu:19491: evam uccaiḥ prabhāṣantaṃ kruddhaṃ pārikṣitaṃ nṛpam /
GE07hv_conpu:19492: gandharvarājaḥ provāca viśvāvasur idaṃ vācaḥ // HV_118.23 //
GE07hv_conpu:19494: na duṣyatīyaṃ patnī te vihiteyaṃ vapuṣṭamā // HV_118.24 //
GE07hv_conpu:19497: yajñe vivaram āsādya vighnam indreṇa te kṛtam /
GE07hv_conpu:19498: yajvā hy asi kuruśreṣṭha samṛddhyā vāsavopamaḥ // HV_118.26 //
GE07hv_conpu:19499: bibhety abhibhavāc chakras tava kratuphalair nṛpa /
GE07hv_conpu:19500: tasmād āvartitaś caiva kratur indreṇa te vibho // HV_118.27 //
GE07hv_conpu:19502: yajñe vivaram āsādya saṃjñaptaṃ dṛśya vājinam /
GE07hv_conpu:19503: ratim indreṇa rambhāyāṃ manyase yāṃ vapuṣṭamām // HV_118.28 //
GE07hv_conpu:19505: bhraṃśitas tvaṃ ca viprāś ca phalād indrasamād iha /
GE07hv_conpu:19507: bibheti hi sadā tvatto brāhmaṇebhyo 'pi vāsavaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19508: ekena vai tad ubhayaṃ tīrṇaṃ śakreṇa māyayā // HV_118.30 //
GE07hv_conpu:19510: katham anyair anācīrṇaṃ naptur dārān atikramet // HV_118.31 //
GE07hv_conpu:19511: yathaiva hi parā buddhiḥ paro dharmaḥ paro damaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19514: mā vāsavaṃ mā ca gurum ātmāṇaṃ mā vapuṣtamām /
GE07hv_conpu:19515: gaccha doṣeṇa kālo hi sarvathā duratikramaḥ // HV_118.33 //
GE07hv_conpu:19520: apāpās tyajyamānā vai śapeyur api yoṣitaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19521: aduṣṭās tu striyo rājan divyās tu saviśeṣataḥ // HV_118.36 //
GE07hv_conpu:19522: bhānoḥ prabhā śikhā vahner vedīhotre tathāhutiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19524: grāhyā lālayitavyāś ca pūjyāś ca satataṃ budhaiḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19525: śīlavatyo namaskāryāḥ pūjyāḥ striya iva striyaḥ // HV_118.38 //
GE07hv_conpu:19527: evaṃ sa viśvāvasunānunītaḥ prasādam āgamya vapuṣṭamāyām /
GE07hv_conpu:19528: cakāra mithyāvyatiśaṅkitātmā śāntiṃ parāṃ tatra sa dharmajuṣṭām //
GE07hv_conpu:19529: śramam abhivinivartya mānasaṃ sa samabhilaṣajjanamejayo yaśaḥ svam /
GE07hv_conpu:19530: viṣayam anuśaśāsa dharmabuddhir muditamanā ramayan vapuṣṭamāṃ tām //
GE07hv_conpu:19531: na ca viramati viprapūjanān na ca vinivartati yajñaśīlanāt /
GE07hv_conpu:19532: na ca viṣayaparirakṣaṇāc cyuto 'sau na ca parigarhati vapuṣṭamāṃ ca //
GE07hv_conpu:19533: vidhivihitam aśakyam anyathā hi kartum yad ṛṣir acintyatapāḥ purābravīt saḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19535: na ca tad aśakyam anyathā hi kartum |
GE07hv_conpu:19536: iti narapatir ātmavāṃs tadāsau tad anuvicintya babhūva vītamanyuḥ //
GE07hv_conpu:19538: iti nṛpatir adīnavikramas tad anuvicintya babhūva nirvṛtaḥ |
GE07hv_conpu:19539: idaṃ mahākāvyam ṛṣer mahātmanaḥ paṭhan nṛṇāṃ pūjyatamo bhaven naraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19540: prakṛṣṭam āyuḥ samavāpya durlabhaṃ labheta sarvajñaphalaṃ ca kevalam //
GE07hv_conpu:19541: śatakratoḥ kalmaṣavipramokṣaṇaṃ paṭhan idam mucyati kalmaṣān naraḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19542: tathaiva kāmān vividhān samaśnute samāptakāmaś ca cirāya nandati //
GE07hv_conpu:19543: yathā hi puṣpaprabhavaṃ phalaṃ drumāt tataḥ prajāyanti punaś ca pādapāḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19544: tathā maharṣiprabhavā imā giraḥ pravardhayante tam ṛṣiṃ pravartitāḥ //
GE07hv_conpu:19545: putrān aputro labhate suvarcasaś cyutaḥ punar vindati cātmanaḥ sthitim /
GE07hv_conpu:19546: vyādhiṃ na cāpnoti ciraṃ ca bandhanaṃ kriyāṃ ca puṇyāṃ labhate guṇānvitaḥ // HV_118.46
GE07hv_conpu:19547: patim upalabhate ca satsu kanyā śravaṇam upetya śubhā munes tu vācaḥ /
GE07hv_conpu:19548: janayati ca sutān guṇair upetān ripujanamardanavīryaśālinaś ca //
GE07hv_conpu:19549: vijayati vasudhāṃ ca kṣatravṛttir dhanam atulaṃ labhate dviṣajjayaṃ ca /
GE07hv_conpu:19550: vipulam api dhanaṃ labhec ca vaiśyaḥ sugatim iyāc chravaṇāc ca śūdrajātiḥ // HV_118.48
GE07hv_conpu:19551: purāṇam etac caritaṃ mahātmanām adhītya buddhiṃ labhate ca naiṣṭhikīm /
GE07hv_conpu:19552: vihāya duḥkhāni vimuktasaṅgaḥ sa vītarāgo vicared vasuṃdharām // HV_118.49
GE07hv_conpu:19553: ity etad ākhyānam udāhṛtaṃ vaḥ pratismaranto dvijamaṇḍaleṣu /
GE07hv_conpu:19554: sthairyeṇa jātena punaḥ smarantaḥ sukhaṃ bhavanto vicarantu lokam //
GE07hv_conpu:19555: iti caritam idaṃ mahātmanām ṛṣikṛtam adbhutavīryakarmaṇām /
GE07hv_conpu:19556: kathitam idaṃ hi samāsavistaraiḥ kim aparam icchasi kiṃ bravīmi te //
